<s> preface </s>
<s> this tale originally appeared as serial in the monthly packet beginning in april </s>
<s> the writer's intention was to embody in each knot like the medicine so dexterously but ineffectually concealed in the jam of our early childhood one or more mathematical questions in arithmetic algebra or geometry as the case might be for the amusement and possible edification of the fair readers of that magazine </s>

<s> tangled tale </s>
<s> knot </s>
<s> excelsior </s>
<s> goblin lead them up and down the ruddy glow of sunset was already fading into the sombre shadows of night when two travellers might have been observed swiftly at pace of six miles in the hour descending the rugged side of mountain the younger bounding from crag to crag with the agility of fawn while his companion whose aged limbs seemed ill at ease in the heavy chain armour habitually worn by tourists in that district toiled on painfully at his side </s>
<s> as is always the case under such circumstances the younger knight was the first to break the silence </s>
<s> goodly pace trow he exclaimed </s>
<s> we sped not thus in the ascent goodly indeed the other echoed with groan </s>
<s> we clomb it but at three miles in the hour and on the dead level our pace is the younger suggested for he was weak in statistics and left all such details to his aged companion </s>
<s> four miles in the hour the other wearily replied </s>
<s> not an ounce more he added with that love of metaphor so common in old age and not farthing less twas three hours past high noon when we left our hostelry the young man said musingly </s>
<s> we shall scarce be back by supper time </s>
<s> perchance mine host will roundly deny us all food he will chide our tardy return was the grave reply and such rebuke will be meet brave conceit cried the other with merry laugh </s>
<s> and should we bid him bring us yet another course trow his answer will be tart we shall but get our deserts sighed the elder knight who had never seen joke in his life and was somewhat displeased at his companion's untimely levity </s>
<s> twill be nine of the clock he added in an undertone by the time we regain our hostelry </s>
<s> full many mile shall we have plodded this day how many </s>
<s> how many cried the eager youth ever athirst for knowledge </s>
<s> the old man was silent </s>
<s> tell me he answered after moment's thought what time it was when we stood together on yonder peak </s>
<s> not exact to the minute he added hastily reading protest in the young man's face </s>
<s> an thy guess be within one poor half hour of the mark tis all ask of thy mother's son </s>
<s> then will tell thee true to the last inch how far we shall have trudged betwixt three and nine of the clock groan was the young man's only reply while his convulsed features and the deep wrinkles that chased each other across his manly brow revealed the abyss of arithmetical agony into which one chance question had plunged him </s>
<s> knot ii </s>
<s> eligible apartments </s>
<s> straight down the crooked lane and all round the square let's ask balbus about it said hugh </s>
<s> all right said lambert </s>
<s> he can guess it said hugh </s>
<s> rather said lambert </s>
<s> no more words were needed the two brothers understood each other perfectly </s>
<s> illustration balbus was assisting his mother in law to convince the dragon balbus was waiting for them at the hotel the journey down had tired him he said so his two pupils had been the round of the place in search of lodgings without the old tutor who had been their inseparable companion from their childhood </s>
<s> they had named him after the hero of their latin exercise book which overflowed with anecdotes of that versatile genius anecdotes whose vagueness in detail was more than compensated by their sensational brilliance </s>
<s> balbus has overcome all his enemies had been marked by their tutor in the margin of the book successful bravery in this way he had tried to extract moral from every anecdote about balbus sometimes one of warning as in balbus had borrowed healthy dragon against which he had written rashness in speculation sometimes of encouragement as in the words influence of sympathy in united action which stood opposite to the anecdote balbus was assisting his mother in law to convince the dragon and sometimes it dwindled down to single word such as prudence which was all he could extract from the touching record that balbus having scorched the tail of the dragon went away his pupils liked the short morals best as it left them more room for marginal illustrations and in this instance they required all the space they could get to exhibit the rapidity of the hero's departure </s>
<s> their report of the state of things was discouraging </s>
<s> that most fashionable of watering places little mendip was chockfull as the boys expressed it from end to end </s>
<s> but in one square they had seen no less than four cards in different houses all announcing in flaming capitals eligible apartments so there's plenty of choice after all you see said spokesman hugh in conclusion </s>
<s> that doesn't follow from the data said balbus as he rose from the easy chair where he had been dozing over the little mendip gazette </s>
<s> they may be all single rooms </s>
<s> however we may as well see them </s>
<s> shall be glad to stretch my legs bit an unprejudiced bystander might have objected that the operation was needless and that this long lank creature would have been all the better with even shorter legs but no such thought occurred to his loving pupils </s>
<s> one on each side they did their best to keep up with his gigantic strides while hugh repeated the sentence in their father's letter just received from abroad over which he and lambert had been puzzling </s>
<s> he says friend of his the governor of what was that name again lambert kgovjni said lambert well yes </s>
<s> the governor of what you may call it wants to give very small dinner party and he means to ask his father's brother in law his brother's father in law his father in law's brother and his brother in law's father and we're to guess how many guests there will be there was an anxious pause </s>
<s> how large did he say the pudding was to be balbus said at last </s>
<s> take its cubical contents divide by the cubical contents of what each man can eat and the quotient he didn't say anything about pudding said hugh and here's the square as they turned corner and came into sight of the eligible apartments it is square was balbus first cry of delight as he gazed around him </s>
<s> beautiful </s>
<s> beau ti ful </s>
<s> equilateral </s>
<s> and rectangular the boys looked round with less enthusiasm </s>
<s> number nine is the first with card said prosaic lambert but balbus would not so soon awake from his dream of beauty </s>
<s> see boys he cried </s>
<s> twenty doors on side </s>
<s> what symmetry </s>
<s> each side divided into twenty one equal parts </s>
<s> it's delicious shall knock or ring said hugh looking in some perplexity at square brass plate which bore the simple inscription ring also both said balbus </s>
<s> that's an ellipsis my boy </s>
<s> did you never see an ellipsis before couldn't hardly read it said hugh evasively </s>
<s> it's no good having an ellipsis if they don't keep it clean which there is one room gentlemen said the smiling landlady </s>
<s> and sweet room too </s>
<s> as snug little back room we will see it said balbus gloomily as they followed her in </s>
<s> knew how it would be </s>
<s> one room in each house </s>
<s> no view suppose which indeed there is gentlemen the landlady indignantly protested as she drew up the blind and indicated the back garden </s>
<s> cabbages perceive said balbus </s>
<s> well they're green at any rate which the greens at the shops their hostess explained are by no means dependable upon </s>
<s> here you has them on the premises and of the best does the window open was always balbus first question in testing lodging and does the chimney smoke his second </s>
<s> satisfied on all points he secured the refusal of the room and they moved on to number twenty five </s>
<s> this landlady was grave and stern </s>
<s> i've nobbut one room left she told them and it gives on the back gyardin but there are cabbages balbus suggested </s>
<s> the landlady visibly relented </s>
<s> there is sir she said and good ones though say it as shouldn't </s>
<s> we can't rely on the shops for greens </s>
<s> so we grows them ourselves singular advantage said balbus and after the usual questions they went on to fifty two </s>
<s> and i'd gladly accommodate you all if could was the greeting that met them </s>
<s> we are but mortal irrelevant muttered balbus and i've let all my rooms but one which one is back room perceive said balbus and looking out on on cabbages presume yes indeed sir said their hostess </s>
<s> whatever other folks may do we grows our own </s>
<s> for the shops an excellent arrangement balbus interrupted </s>
<s> then one can really depend on their being good </s>
<s> does the window open the usual questions were answered satisfactorily but this time hugh added one of his own invention does the cat scratch the landlady looked round suspiciously as if to make sure the cat was not listening will not deceive you gentlemen she said </s>
<s> it do scratch but not without you pulls its whiskers </s>
<s> it'll never do it she repeated slowly with visible effort to recall the exact words of some written agreement between herself and the cat without you pulls its whiskers much may be excused in cat so treated said balbus as they left the house and crossed to number seventy three leaving the landlady curtseying on the doorstep and still murmuring to herself her parting words as if they were form of blessing not without you pulls its whiskers at number seventy three they found only small shy girl to show the house who said yes'm in answer to all questions </s>
<s> the usual room said balbus as they marched in the usual back garden the usual cabbages </s>
<s> suppose you can't get them good at the shops yes'm said the girl </s>
<s> well you may tell your mistress we will take the room and that her plan of growing her own cabbages is simply admirable yes'm said the girl as she showed them out </s>
<s> one day room and three bed rooms said balbus as they returned to the hotel </s>
<s> we will take as our day room the one that gives us the least walking to do to get to it must we walk from door to door and count the steps said lambert </s>
<s> no no </s>
<s> figure it out my boys figure it out balbus gaily exclaimed as he put pens ink and paper before his hapless pupils and left the room </s>
<s> say </s>
<s> it'll be job said hugh </s>
<s> rather said lambert </s>
<s> knot iii </s>
<s> mad mathesis </s>
<s> waited for the train well they call me so because am little mad suppose she said good humouredly in answer to clara's cautiously worded question as to how she came by so strange nick name </s>
<s> you see never do what sane people are expected to do now days </s>
<s> never wear long trains talking of trains that's the charing cross metropolitan station i've something to tell you about that and never play lawn tennis </s>
<s> can't cook an omelette </s>
<s> can't even set broken limb </s>
<s> there's an ignoramus for you clara was her niece and full twenty years her junior in fact she was still attending high school an institution of which mad mathesis spoke with undisguised aversion </s>
<s> let woman be meek and lowly she would say </s>
<s> none of your high schools for me but it was vacation time just now and clara was her guest and mad mathesis was showing her the sights of that eighth wonder of the world london </s>
<s> the charing cross metropolitan station she resumed waving her hand towards the entrance as if she were introducing her niece to friend </s>
<s> the bayswater and birmingham extension is just completed and the trains now run round and round continuously skirting the border of wales just touching at york and so round by the east coast back to london </s>
<s> the way the trains run is most peculiar </s>
<s> the westerly ones go round in two hours the easterly ones take three but they always manage to start two trains from here opposite ways punctually every quarter of an hour they part to meet again said clara her eyes filling with tears at the romantic thought </s>
<s> no need to cry about it her aunt grimly remarked </s>
<s> they don't meet on the same line of rails you know </s>
<s> talking of meeting an idea strikes me she added changing the subject with her usual abruptness </s>
<s> let's go opposite ways round and see which can meet most trains </s>
<s> no need for chaperon ladies saloon you know </s>
<s> you shall go whichever way you like and we'll have bet about it never make bets clara said very gravely </s>
<s> our excellent preceptress has often warned us you'd be none the worse if you did mad mathesis interrupted </s>
<s> in fact you'd be the better i'm certain neither does our excellent preceptress approve of puns said clara </s>
<s> but we'll have match if you like </s>
<s> let me choose my train she added after brief mental calculation and i'll engage to meet exactly half as many again as you do not if you count fair mad mathesis bluntly interrupted </s>
<s> remember we only count the trains we meet on the way </s>
<s> you mustn't count the one that starts as you start nor the one that arrives as you arrive that will only make the difference of one train said clara as they turned and entered the station </s>
<s> but never travelled alone before </s>
<s> there'll be no one to help me to alight </s>
<s> however don't mind </s>
<s> let's have match ragged little boy overheard her remark and came running after her </s>
<s> buy box of cigar lights miss he pleaded pulling her shawl to attract her attention </s>
<s> clara stopped to explain </s>
<s> never smoke cigars she said in meekly apologetic tone </s>
<s> our excellent preceptress but mad mathesis impatiently hurried her on and the little boy was left gazing after her with round eyes of amazement </s>
<s> the two ladies bought their tickets and moved slowly down the central platform mad mathesis prattling on as usual clara silent anxiously reconsidering the calculation on which she rested her hopes of winning the match </s>
<s> mind where you go dear cried her aunt checking her just in time </s>
<s> one step more and you'd have been in that pail of cold water know know clara said dreamily </s>
<s> the pale the cold and the moony take your places on the spring boards shouted porter </s>
<s> what are they for clara asked in terrified whisper </s>
<s> merely to help us into the trains the elder lady spoke with the nonchalance of one quite used to the process </s>
<s> very few people can get into carriage without help in less than three seconds and the trains only stop for one second at this moment the whistle was heard and two trains rushed into the station </s>
<s> moment's pause and they were gone again but in that brief interval several hundred passengers had been shot into them each flying straight to his place with the accuracy of minie bullet while an equal number were showered out upon the side platforms </s>
<s> three hours had passed away and the two friends met again on the charing cross platform and eagerly compared notes </s>
<s> then clara turned away with sigh </s>
<s> to young impulsive hearts like hers disappointment is always bitter pill </s>
<s> mad mathesis followed her full of kindly sympathy </s>
<s> try again my love she said cheerily </s>
<s> let us vary the experiment </s>
<s> we will start as we did before but not to begin counting till our trains meet </s>
<s> when we see each other we will say one and so count on till we come here again clara brightened up </s>
<s> shall win that she exclaimed eagerly if may choose my train another shriek of engine whistles another upheaving of spring boards another living avalanche plunging into two trains as they flashed by and the travellers were off again </s>
<s> each gazed eagerly from her carriage window holding up her handkerchief as signal to her friend </s>
<s> rush and roar </s>
<s> two trains shot past each other in tunnel and two travellers leaned back in their corners with sigh or rather with two sighs of relief </s>
<s> one clara murmured to herself </s>
<s> won </s>
<s> it's word of good omen </s>
<s> this time at any rate the victory will be mine but was it </s>
<s> knot iv </s>
<s> the dead reckoning </s>
<s> did dream of money bags to night noonday on the open sea within few degrees of the equator is apt to be oppressively warm and our two travellers were now airily clad in suits of dazzling white linen having laid aside the chain armour which they had found not only endurable in the cold mountain air they had lately been breathing but necessary precaution against the daggers of the banditti who infested the heights </s>
<s> their holiday trip was over and they were now on their way home in the monthly packet which plied between the two great ports of the island they had been exploring </s>
<s> along with their armour the tourists had laid aside the antiquated speech it had pleased them to affect while in knightly disguise and had returned to the ordinary style of two country gentlemen of the twentieth century </s>
<s> stretched on pile of cushions under the shade of huge umbrella they were lazily watching some native fishermen who had come on board at the last landing place each carrying over his shoulder small but heavy sack </s>
<s> large weighing machine that had been used for cargo at the last port stood on the deck and round this the fishermen had gathered and with much unintelligible jabber seemed to be weighing their sacks </s>
<s> more like sparrows in tree than human talk isn't it the elder tourist remarked to his son who smiled feebly but would not exert himself so far as to speak </s>
<s> the old man tried another listener </s>
<s> what have they got in those sacks captain he inquired as that great being passed them in his never ending parade to and fro on the deck </s>
<s> the captain paused in his march and towered over the travellers tall grave and serenely self satisfied </s>
<s> fishermen he explained are often passengers in my ship </s>
<s> these five are from mhruxi the place we last touched at and that's the way they carry their money </s>
<s> the money of this island is heavy gentlemen but it costs little as you may guess </s>
<s> we buy it from them by weight about five shillings pound </s>
<s> fancy ten pound note would buy all those sacks by this time the old man had closed his eyes in order no doubt to concentrate his thoughts on these interesting facts but the captain failed to realise his motive and with grunt resumed his monotonous march </s>
<s> meanwhile the fishermen were getting so noisy over the weighing machine that one of the sailors took the precaution of carrying off all the weights leaving them to amuse themselves with such substitutes in the form of winch handles belaying pins as they could find </s>
<s> this brought their excitement to speedy end they carefully hid their sacks in the folds of the jib that lay on the deck near the tourists and strolled away </s>
<s> when next the captain's heavy footfall passed the younger man roused himself to speak </s>
<s> what did you call the place those fellows came from captain he asked </s>
<s> mhruxi sir and the one we are bound for the captain took long breath plunged into the word and came out of it nobly </s>
<s> they call it kgovjni sir give it up the young man faintly said </s>
<s> he stretched out his hand for glass of iced water which the compassionate steward had brought him minute ago and had set down unluckily just outside the shadow of the umbrella </s>
<s> it was scalding hot and he decided not to drink it </s>
<s> the effort of making this resolution coming close on the fatiguing conversation he had just gone through was too much for him he sank back among the cushions in silence </s>
<s> his father courteously tried to make amends for his nonchalance </s>
<s> whereabouts are we now captain said he have you any idea the captain cast pitying look on the ignorant landsman </s>
<s> could tell you that sir he said in tone of lofty condescension to an inch you don't say so the old man remarked in tone of languid surprise </s>
<s> and mean so persisted the captain </s>
<s> why what do you suppose would become of my ship if were to lose my longitude and my latitude </s>
<s> could you make anything of my dead reckoning nobody could i'm sure the other heartily rejoined </s>
<s> but he had overdone it </s>
<s> it's perfectly intelligible the captain said in an offended tone to any one that understands such things with these words he moved away and began giving orders to the men who were preparing to hoist the jib </s>
<s> our tourists watched the operation with such interest that neither of them remembered the five money bags which in another moment as the wind filled out the jib were whirled overboard and fell heavily into the sea </s>
<s> but the poor fishermen had not so easily forgotten their property </s>
<s> in moment they had rushed to the spot and stood uttering cries of fury and pointing now to the sea and now to the sailors who had caused the disaster </s>
<s> the old man explained it to the captain </s>
<s> let us make it up among us he added in conclusion </s>
<s> ten pounds will do it think you said illustration but the captain put aside the suggestion with wave of the hand </s>
<s> no sir he said in his grandest manner </s>
<s> you will excuse me am sure but these are my passengers </s>
<s> the accident has happened on board my ship and under my orders </s>
<s> it is for me to make compensation he turned to the angry fishermen </s>
<s> come here my men he said in the mhruxian dialect </s>
<s> tell me the weight of each sack </s>
<s> saw you weighing them just now then ensued perfect babel of noise as the five natives explained all screaming together how the sailors had carried off the weights and they had done what they could with whatever came handy </s>
<s> two iron belaying pins three blocks six holystones four winch handles and large hammer were now carefully weighed the captain superintending and noting the results </s>
<s> but the matter did not seem to be settled even then an angry discussion followed in which the sailors and the five natives all joined and at last the captain approached our tourists with disconcerted look which he tried to conceal under laugh </s>
<s> it's an absurd difficulty he said </s>
<s> perhaps one of you gentlemen can suggest something </s>
<s> it seems they weighed the sacks two at time if they didn't have five separate weighings of course you can't value them separately the youth hastily decided </s>
<s> let's hear all about it was the old man's more cautious remark </s>
<s> they did have five separate weighings the captain said but well it beats me entirely he added in sudden burst of candour </s>
<s> here's the result </s>
<s> first and second sack weighed twelve pounds second and third thirteen and half third and fourth eleven and half fourth and fifth eight and then they say they had only the large hammer left and it took three sacks to weigh it down that's the first third and fifth and they weighed sixteen pounds </s>
<s> there gentlemen </s>
<s> did you ever hear anything like that the old man muttered under his breath if only my sister were here and looked helplessly at his son </s>
<s> his son looked at the five natives </s>
<s> the five natives looked at the captain </s>
<s> the captain looked at nobody his eyes were cast down and he seemed to be saying softly to himself contemplate one another gentlemen if such be your good pleasure </s>
<s> contemplate myself knot </s>
<s> oughts and crosses </s>
<s> look here upon this picture and on this and what made you choose the first train goosey said mad mathesis as they got into the cab </s>
<s> couldn't you count better than that took an extreme case was the tearful reply </s>
<s> our excellent preceptress always says when in doubt my dears take an extreme case and was in doubt does it always succeed her aunt enquired </s>
<s> clara sighed </s>
<s> not always she reluctantly admitted </s>
<s> and can't make out why </s>
<s> one day she was telling the little girls they make such noise at tea you know the more noise you make the less jam you will have and vice vers and thought they wouldn't know what vice vers meant so explained it to them </s>
<s> said if you make an infinite noise you'll get no jam and if you make no noise you'll get an infinite lot of jam but our excellent preceptress said that wasn't good instance </s>
<s> why wasn't it she added plaintively </s>
<s> her aunt evaded the question </s>
<s> one sees certain objections to it she said </s>
<s> but how did you work it with the metropolitan trains </s>
<s> none of them go infinitely fast believe called them hares and tortoises clara said little timidly for she dreaded being laughed at </s>
<s> and thought there couldn't be so many hares as tortoises on the line so took an extreme case one hare and an infinite number of tortoises an extreme case indeed her aunt remarked with admirable gravity and most dangerous state of things and thought if went with tortoise there would be only one hare to meet but if went with the hare you know there were crowds of tortoises it wasn't bad idea said the elder lady as they left the cab at the entrance of burlington house </s>
<s> you shall have another chance to day </s>
<s> we'll have match in marking pictures clara brightened up </s>
<s> should like to try again very much she said </s>
<s> i'll take more care this time </s>
<s> how are we to play to this question mad mathesis made no reply she was busy drawing lines down the margins of the catalogue </s>
<s> see she said after minute i've drawn three columns against the names of the pictures in the long room and want you to fill them with oughts and crosses crosses for good marks and oughts for bad </s>
<s> the first column is for choice of subject the second for arrangement the third for colouring </s>
<s> and these are the conditions of the match </s>
<s> you must give three crosses to two or three pictures </s>
<s> you must give two crosses to four or five do you mean only two crosses said clara </s>
<s> or may count the three cross pictures among the two cross pictures of course you may said her aunt </s>
<s> any one that has three eyes may be said to have two eyes suppose clara followed her aunt's dreamy gaze across the crowded gallery half dreading to find that there was three eyed person in sight </s>
<s> and you must give one cross to nine or ten and which wins the match clara asked as she carefully entered these conditions on blank leaf in her catalogue </s>
<s> whichever marks fewest pictures but suppose we marked the same number then whichever uses most marks clara considered </s>
<s> don't think it's much of match she said </s>
<s> shall mark nine pictures and give three crosses to three of them two crosses to two more and one cross each to all the rest will you indeed said her aunt </s>
<s> wait till you've heard all the conditions my impetuous child </s>
<s> you must give three oughts to one or two pictures two oughts to three or four and one ought to eight or nine </s>
<s> don't want you to be too hard on the clara quite gasped as she wrote down all these fresh conditions </s>
<s> it's great deal worse than circulating decimals she said </s>
<s> but i'm determined to win all the same her aunt smiled grimly </s>
<s> we can begin here she said as they paused before gigantic picture which the catalogue informed them was the portrait of lieutenant brown mounted on his favorite elephant he looks awfully conceited said clara </s>
<s> don't think he was the elephant's favorite lieutenant </s>
<s> what hideous picture it is </s>
<s> and it takes up room enough for twenty mind what you say my dear her aunt interposed </s>
<s> it's by an but clara was quite reckless </s>
<s> don't care who it's by she cried </s>
<s> and shall give it three bad marks aunt and niece soon drifted away from each other in the crowd and for the next half hour clara was hard at work putting in marks and rubbing them out again and hunting up and down for suitable pictures </s>
<s> this she found the hardest part of all </s>
<s> can't find the one want she exclaimed at last almost crying with vexation </s>
<s> what is it you want to find my dear the voice was strange to clara but so sweet and gentle that she felt attracted to the owner of it even before she had seen her and when she turned and met the smiling looks of two little old ladies whose round dimpled faces exactly alike seemed never to have known care it was as much as she could do as she confessed to aunt mattie afterwards to keep herself from hugging them both </s>
<s> was looking for picture she said that has good subject and that's well arranged but badly coloured the little old ladies glanced at each other in some alarm </s>
<s> calm yourself my dear said the one who had spoken first and try to remember which it was </s>
<s> what was the subject was it an elephant for instance the other sister suggested </s>
<s> they were still in sight of lieutenant brown </s>
<s> don't know indeed clara impetuously replied </s>
<s> you know it doesn't matter bit what the subject is so long as it's good one once more the sisters exchanged looks of alarm and one of them whispered something to the other of which clara caught only the one word mad they mean aunt mattie of course she said to herself fancying in her innocence that london was like her native town where everybody knew everybody else </s>

<s> in another minute they were crossing large quadrangle paved with marble and tastefully decorated with pigsty in each corner </s>

<s> knot ix </s>
<s> serpent with corners </s>
<s> water water every where nor any drop to drink it'll just take one more pebble what ever are you doing with those buckets the speakers were hugh and lambert </s>
<s> place the beach of little mendip </s>
<s> time </s>
<s> hugh was floating bucket in another size larger and trying how many pebbles it would carry without sinking </s>
<s> lambert was lying on his back doing nothing </s>
<s> for the next minute or two hugh was silent evidently deep in thought </s>
<s> suddenly he started </s>
<s> say look here lambert he cried </s>
<s> if it's alive and slimy and with legs don't care to said lambert </s>
<s> didn't balbus say this morning that if body is immersed in liquid it displaces as much liquid as is equal to its own bulk said hugh </s>
<s> he said things of that sort lambert vaguely replied </s>
<s> well just look here minute </s>
<s> here's the little bucket almost quite immersed so the water displaced ought to be just about the same bulk </s>
<s> and now just look at it he took out the little bucket as he spoke and handed the big one to lambert </s>
<s> why there's hardly teacupful </s>
<s> do you mean to say that water is the same bulk as the little bucket course it is said lambert </s>
<s> well look here again cried hugh triumphantly as he poured the water from the big bucket into the little one </s>
<s> why it doesn't half fill it that's its business said lambert </s>
<s> if balbus says it's the same bulk why it is the same bulk you know well don't believe it said hugh </s>
<s> you needn't said lambert </s>
<s> besides it's dinner time </s>
<s> come along they found balbus waiting dinner for them and to him hugh at once propounded his difficulty </s>
<s> let's get you helped first said balbus briskly cutting away at the joint </s>
<s> you know the old proverb mutton first mechanics afterwards the boys did not know the proverb but they accepted it in perfect good faith as they did every piece of information however startling that came from so infallible an authority as their tutor </s>
<s> they ate on steadily in silence and when dinner was over hugh set out the usual array of pens ink and paper while balbus repeated to them the problem he had prepared for their afternoon's task </s>
<s> friend of mine has flower garden very pretty one though no great size how big is it said hugh </s>
<s> that's what you have to find out balbus gaily replied </s>
<s> all tell you is that it is oblong in shape just half yard longer than its width and that gravel walk one yard wide begins at one corner and runs all round it joining into itself said hugh </s>
<s> not joining into itself young man </s>
<s> just before doing that it turns corner and runs round the garden again alongside of the first portion and then inside that again winding in and in and each lap touching the last one till it has used up the whole of the area like serpent with corners said lambert </s>
<s> exactly so </s>
<s> and if you walk the whole length of it to the last inch keeping in the centre of the path it's exactly two miles and half furlong </s>
<s> now while you find out the length and breadth of the garden i'll see if can think out that sea water puzzle you said it was flower garden hugh inquired as balbus was leaving the room </s>
<s> did said balbus </s>
<s> where do the flowers grow said hugh </s>
<s> but balbus thought it best not to hear the question </s>
<s> he left the boys to their problem and in the silence of his own room set himself to unravel hugh's mechanical paradox </s>
<s> to fix our thoughts he murmured to himself as with hands deep buried in his pockets he paced up and down the room we will take cylindrical glass jar with scale of inches marked up the side and fill it with water up to the inch mark and we will assume that every inch depth of jar contains pint of water </s>
<s> we will now take solid cylinder such that every inch of it is equal in bulk to half pint of water and plunge inches of it into the water so that the end of the cylinder comes down to the inch mark </s>
<s> well that displaces pints of water </s>
<s> what becomes of them </s>
<s> why if there were no more cylinder they would lie comfortably on the top and fill the jar up to the inch mark </s>
<s> but unfortunately there is more cylinder occupying half the space between the inch and the inch marks so that only one pint of water can be accommodated there </s>
<s> what becomes of the other pint </s>
<s> why if there were no more cylinder it would lie on the top and fill the jar up to the inch mark </s>
<s> but unfortunately shade of newton he exclaimed in sudden accents of terror </s>
<s> when does the water stop rising bright idea struck him </s>
<s> i'll write little essay on it he said </s>
<s> balbus's essay when solid is immersed in liquid it is well known that it displaces portion of the liquid equal to itself in bulk and that the level of the liquid rises just so much as it would rise if quantity of liquid had been added to it equal in bulk to the solid </s>
<s> lardner says precisely the same process occurs when solid is partially immersed the quantity of liquid displaced in this case equalling the portion of the solid which is immersed and the rise of the level being in proportion </s>
<s> suppose solid held above the surface of liquid and partially immersed portion of the liquid is displaced and the level of the liquid rises </s>
<s> but by this rise of level little bit more of the solid is of course immersed and so there is new displacement of second portion of the liquid and consequent rise of level </s>
<s> again this second rise of level causes yet further immersion and by consequence another displacement of liquid and another rise </s>
<s> it is self evident that this process must continue till the entire solid is immersed and that the liquid will then begin to immerse whatever holds the solid which being connected with it must for the time be considered part of it </s>
<s> if you hold stick six feet long with its end in tumbler of water and wait long enough you must eventually be immersed </s>
<s> the question as to the source from which the water is supplied which belongs to high branch of mathematics and is therefore beyond our present scope does not apply to the sea </s>
<s> let us therefore take the familiar instance of man standing at the edge of the sea at ebb tide with solid in his hand which he partially immerses he remains steadfast and unmoved and we all know that he must be drowned </s>
<s> the multitudes who daily perish in this manner to attest philosophical truth and whose bodies the unreasoning wave casts sullenly upon our thankless shores have truer claim to be called the martyrs of science than galileo or kepler </s>
<s> to use kossuth's eloquent phrase they are the unnamed demigods of the nineteenth century there's fallacy somewhere he murmured drowsily as he stretched his long legs upon the sofa </s>
<s> must think it over again he closed his eyes in order to concentrate his attention more perfectly and for the next hour or so his slow and regular breathing bore witness to the careful deliberation with which he was investigating this new and perplexing view of the subject </s>
<s> illustration he remains steadfast and unmoved footnote footnote note by the writer for the above essay am indebted to dear friend now deceased knot </s>
<s> chelsea buns </s>
<s> yea buns and buns and buns old song </s>
<s> how very very sad exclaimed clara and the eyes of the gentle girl filled with tears as she spoke </s>
<s> sad but very curious when you come to look at it arithmetically was her aunt's less romantic reply </s>
<s> some of them have lost an arm in their country's service some leg some an ear some an eye and some perhaps all clara murmured dreamily as they passed the long rows of weather beaten heroes basking in the sun </s>
<s> did you notice that very old one with red face who was drawing map in the dust with his wooden leg and all the others watching </s>
<s> think it was plan of battle the battle of trafalgar no doubt her aunt interrupted briskly </s>
<s> hardly that think clara ventured to say </s>
<s> you see in that case he couldn't well be alive couldn't well be alive the old lady contemptuously repeated </s>
<s> he's as lively as you and me put together </s>
<s> why if drawing map in the dust with one's wooden leg doesn't prove one to be alive perhaps you'll kindly mention what does prove it clara did not see her way out of it </s>
<s> logic had never been her forte </s>
<s> to return to the arithmetic mad mathesis resumed the eccentric old lady never let slip an opportunity of driving her niece into calculation what percentage do you suppose must have lost all four leg an arm an eye and an ear how can tell gasped the terrified girl </s>
<s> she knew well what was coming </s>
<s> you can't of course without data her aunt replied but i'm just going to give you give her chelsea bun miss </s>
<s> that's what most young ladies likes best the voice was rich and musical and the speaker dexterously whipped back the snowy cloth that covered his basket and disclosed tempting array of the familiar square buns joined together in rows richly egged and browned and glistening in the sun </s>
<s> no sir </s>
<s> shall give her nothing so indigestible </s>
<s> be off the old lady waved her parasol threateningly but nothing seemed to disturb the good humour of the jolly old man who marched on chanting his melodious refrain music chel sea buns </s>
<s> chel sea buns hot </s>
<s> chel sea buns </s>
<s> pi ping hot </s>
<s> chel sea buns hot </s>
<s> chel sea buns far too indigestible my love said the old lady </s>
<s> percentages will agree with you ever so much better clara sighed and there was hungry look in her eyes as she watched the basket lessening in the distance but she meekly listened to the relentless old lady who at once proceeded to count off the data on her fingers </s>
<s> say that per cent </s>
<s> have lost an eye per cent </s>
<s> an ear per cent </s>
<s> an arm per cent </s>
<s> leg that'll do it beautifully </s>
<s> now my dear what percentage at least must have lost all four no more conversation occurred unless smothered exclamation of piping hot which escaped from clara's lips as the basket vanished round corner could be counted as such until they reached the old chelsea mansion where clara's father was then staying with his three sons and their old tutor </s>
<s> balbus lambert and hugh had entered the house only few minutes before them </s>
<s> they had been out walking and hugh had been propounding difficulty which had reduced lambert to the depths of gloom and had even puzzled balbus </s>
<s> it changes from wednesday to thursday at midnight doesn't it hugh had begun </s>
<s> sometimes said balbus cautiously </s>
<s> always said lambert decisively </s>
<s> sometimes balbus gently insisted </s>
<s> six midnights out of seven it changes to some other name meant of course hugh corrected himself when it does change from wednesday to thursday it does it at midnight and only at midnight surely said balbus </s>
<s> lambert was silent </s>
<s> well now suppose it's midnight here in chelsea </s>
<s> then it's wednesday west of chelsea say in ireland or america where midnight hasn't arrived yet and it's thursday east of chelsea say in germany or russia where midnight has just passed by surely balbus said again </s>
<s> even lambert nodded this time </s>
<s> but it isn't midnight anywhere else so it can't be changing from one day to another anywhere else </s>
<s> and yet if ireland and america and so on call it wednesday and germany and russia and so on call it thursday there must be some place not chelsea that has different days on the two sides of it </s>
<s> and the worst of it is the people there get their days in the wrong order they've got wednesday east of them and thursday west just as if their day had changed from thursday to wednesday i've heard that puzzle before cried lambert </s>
<s> and i'll tell you the explanation </s>
<s> when ship goes round the world from east to west we know that it loses day in its reckoning so that when it gets home and calls its day wednesday it finds people here calling it thursday because we've had one more midnight than the ship has had </s>
<s> and when you go the other way round you gain day know all that said hugh in reply to this not very lucid explanation but it doesn't help me because the ship hasn't proper days </s>
<s> one way round you get more than twenty four hours to the day and the other way you get less so of course the names get wrong but people that live on in one place always get twenty four hours to the day suppose there is such place balbus said meditatively though never heard of it </s>
<s> and the people must find it very queer as hugh says to have the old day east of them and the new one west because when midnight comes round to them with the new day in front of it and the old one behind it one doesn't see exactly what happens </s>
<s> must think it over so they had entered the house in the state have described balbus puzzled and lambert buried in gloomy thought </s>
<s> yes m'm master is at home m'm said the stately old butler </s>
<s> it is only butler of experience who can manage series of three m's together without any interjacent vowels and the ole party is waiting for you in the libery don't like his calling your father an old party mad mathesis whispered to her niece as they crossed the hall </s>
<s> and clara had only just time to whisper in reply he meant the whole party before they were ushered into the library and the sight of the five solemn faces there assembled chilled her into silence </s>
<s> her father sat at the head of the table and mutely signed to the ladies to take the two vacant chairs one on each side of him </s>
<s> his three sons and balbus completed the party </s>
<s> writing materials had been arranged round the table after the fashion of ghostly banquet the butler had evidently bestowed much thought on the grim device </s>
<s> sheets of quarto paper each flanked by pen on one side and pencil on the other represented the plates penwipers did duty for rolls of bread while ink bottles stood in the places usually occupied by wine glasses </s>
<s> the pi ce de resistance was large green baize bag which gave forth as the old man restlessly lifted it from side to side charming jingle as of innumerable golden guineas </s>
<s> sister daughter sons and balbus the old man began so nervously that balbus put in gentle hear hear while hugh drummed on the table with his fists </s>
<s> this disconcerted the unpractised orator </s>
<s> sister he began again then paused moment moved the bag to the other side and went on with rush mean this being critical occasion more or less being the year when one of my sons comes of age he paused again in some confusion having evidently got into the middle of his speech sooner than he intended but it was too late to go back </s>
<s> hear hear cried balbus </s>
<s> quite so said the old gentleman recovering his self possession little when first began this annual custom my friend balbus will correct me if am wrong hugh whispered with strap but nobody heard him except lambert who only frowned and shook his head at him this annual custom of giving each of my sons as many guineas as would represent his age it was critical time so balbus informed me as the ages of two of you were together equal to that of the third so on that occasion made speech he paused so long that balbus thought it well to come to the rescue with the words it was most but the old man checked him with warning look yes made speech he repeated </s>
<s> few years after that balbus pointed out say pointed out hear hear </s>
<s> cried balbus </s>
<s> quite so said the grateful old man that it was another critical occasion </s>
<s> the ages of two of you were together double that of the third </s>
<s> so made another speech another speech </s>
<s> and now again it's critical occasion so balbus says and am making here mad mathesis pointedly referred to her watch all the haste can the old man cried with wonderful presence of mind </s>
<s> indeed sister i'm coming to the point now </s>
<s> the number of years that have passed since that first occasion is just two thirds of the number of guineas then gave you </s>
<s> now my boys calculate your ages from the data and you shall have the money but we know our ages cried hugh </s>
<s> silence sir thundered the old man rising to his full height he was exactly five foot five in his indignation </s>
<s> say you must use the data only </s>
<s> you mustn't even assume which it is that comes of age he clutched the bag as he spoke and with tottering steps it was about as much as he could do to carry it he left the room </s>
<s> and you shall have similar cadeau the old lady whispered to her niece when you've calculated that percentage and she followed her brother </s>
<s> nothing could exceed the solemnity with which the old couple had risen from the table and yet was it was it grin with which the father turned away from his unhappy sons </s>
<s> could it be could it be wink with which the aunt abandoned her despairing niece </s>
<s> and were those were those sounds of suppressed chuckling which floated into the room just before balbus who had followed them out closed the door </s>
<s> surely not and yet the butler told the cook but no that was merely idle gossip and will not repeat it </s>
<s> the shades of evening granted their unuttered petition and closed not o'er them for the butler brought in the lamp the same obliging shades left them lonely bark the wail of dog in the back yard baying the moon for awhile but neither morn alas nor any other epoch seemed likely to restore them to that peace of mind which had once been theirs ere ever these problems had swooped upon them and crushed them with load of unfathomable mystery </s>
<s> it's hardly fair muttered hugh to give us such jumble as this to work out fair clara echoed bitterly </s>
<s> well and to all my readers can but repeat the last words of gentle clara fare well </s>
<s> appendix </s>
<s> knot said alice </s>
<s> oh do let me help to undo it answers to knot </s>
<s> problem two travellers spend from o'clock till in walking along level road up hill and home again their pace on the level being miles an hour up hill and down hill </s>
<s> find distance walked also within half an hour time of reaching top of hill answer miles half past solution level mile takes of an hour up hill down hill </s>
<s> hence to go and return over the same mile whether on the level or on the hill side takes an hour </s>
<s> hence in hours they went miles out and back </s>
<s> if the miles out had been nearly all level they would have taken little over hours if nearly all up hill little under </s>
<s> hence hours must be within an hour of the time taken in reaching the peak thus as they started at they got there within an hour of past </s>
<s> twenty seven answers have come in </s>
<s> of these are right partially right and wrong </s>
<s> the give the distance correctly but they have failed to grasp the fact that the top of the hill might have been reached at any moment between o'clock and </s>
<s> the two wrong answers are from gerty vernon and nihilist </s>
<s> the former makes the distance miles while her revolutionary companion puts it at gerty vernon says they had to go miles along the plain and got to the foot of the hill at o'clock they might have done so grant but you have no ground for saying they did so </s>
<s> it was miles to the top of the hill and they reached that at before o'clock here you go wrong in your arithmetic and must however reluctantly bid you farewell </s>
<s> miles at miles an hour would not require hours </s>
<s> nihilist says let denote the whole number of miles the number of hours to hill top therefore number of miles to hill top and number of miles on the other side you bewilder me </s>
<s> the other side of what </s>
<s> of the hill you say </s>
<s> but then how did they get home again </s>
<s> however to accommodate your views we will build new hostelry at the foot of the hill on the opposite side and also assume what grant you is possible though it is not necessarily true that there was no level road at all </s>
<s> even then you go wrong </s>
<s> you say </s>
<s> </s>
<s> ii grant you but deny ii it rests on the assumption that to go part of the time at miles an hour and the rest at miles an hour comes to the same result as going the whole time at miles an hour </s>
<s> but this would only be true if the part were an exact half if they went up hill for hours and down hill for the other which they certainly did not do </s>
<s> the sixteen who are partially right are agnes bailey </s>
<s> fifee </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> kit </s>
<s> </s>
<s> mysie mother's son nairam redruthian socialist spear maiden </s>

<s> vis inerti and yak </s>
<s> of these </s>

<s> </s>
<s> and vis inerti do not attempt the second part at all </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> and </s>
<s> </s>
<s> give no working </s>
<s> the rest make particular assumptions such as that there was no level road that there were miles of level road and so on all leading to particular times being fixed for reaching the hill top </s>
<s> the most curious assumption is that of agnes bailey who says let number of hours occupied in ascent then hours occupied in descent and hours occupied on the level suppose you were thinking of the relative rates up hill and on the level which we might express by saying that if they went miles up hill in certain time they would go miles on the level in the same time </s>
<s> you have in fact assumed that they took the same time on the level that they took in ascending the hill </s>
<s> fifee assumes that when the aged knight said they had gone four miles in the hour on the level he meant that four miles was the distance gone not merely the rate </s>
<s> this would have been if fifee will excuse the slang expression sell ill suited to the dignity of the hero </s>
<s> and now descend ye classic nine who have solved the whole problem and let me sing your praises </s>

<s> do not actually state that the hill top was reached some time between and but as they have clearly grasped the fact that mile ascended and descended took the same time as two level miles mark them as right marlborough boy and putney walker deserve honourable mention for their algebraical solutions being the only two who have perceived that the question leads to an indeterminate equation </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> brings charge of untruthfulness against the aged knight serious charge for he was the very pink of chivalry </s>
<s> she says according to the data given the time at the summit affords no clue to the total distance </s>

<s> problem square has doors on each side which contains equal parts </s>
<s> they are numbered all round beginning at one corner </s>
<s> from which of the four nos </s>
<s> is the sum of the distances to the other three least answer from no </s>
<s> illustration let be no </s>
<s> no </s>
<s> no </s>
<s> and no </s>
<s> </s>
<s> then ab sqrt sqrt ac ad sqrt sqrt </s>
<s> between and bc sqrt sqrt bd sqrt sqrt cd sqrt sqrt hence sum of distances from is between and from between and from between and from between and </s>
<s> why not between and </s>
<s> make this out for yourselves hence the sum is least for </s>
<s> twenty five solutions have been received </s>
<s> of these must be marked are partly right and right </s>
<s> of the may dismiss alphabetical phantom bog oak dinah mite fifee galanthus nivalis major fear the cold spring has blighted our snowdrop guy </s>
<s> pinafore janet and valentine with the simple remark that they insist on the unfortunate lodgers keeping to the pavement </s>
<s> used the words crossed to number seventy three for the special purpose of showing that short cuts were possible sea breeze does the same and adds that the result would be the same even if they crossed the square but gives no proof of this </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> draws diagram and says that no </s>
<s> is the house as the diagram shows cannot see how it does so </s>
<s> old cat assumes that the house must be no </s>
<s> or no </s>
<s> </s>
<s> she does not explain how she estimates the distances </s>
<s> bee's arithmetic is faulty she makes sqrt sqrt sqrt </s>
<s> suppose you mean sqrt which would be little nearer the truth </s>
<s> but roots cannot be added in this manner </s>
<s> do you think sqrt sqrt is or even sqrt but ayr's state is more perilous still she draws illogical conclusions with frightful calmness </s>
<s> after pointing out rightly that ac is less than bd she says therefore the nearest house to the other three must be or and again after pointing out rightly that and are both within the half square containing she says therefore ab ad must be less than bc cd </s>
<s> there is no logical force in either therefore for the first try nos </s>
<s> this will make your premiss true and your conclusion false </s>
<s> similarly for the second try nos </s>

<s> remonstrance has reached me from scrutator on the subject of knot which he declares was no problem at all two questions he says are put </s>

<s> answers to knot iii </s>
<s> problem two travellers starting at the same time went opposite ways round circular railway </s>
<s> trains start each way every minutes the easterly ones going round in hours the westerly in </s>
<s> how many trains did each meet on the way not counting trains met at the terminus itself they went round as before each traveller counting as one the train containing the other traveller </s>
<s> how many did each meet answers </s>
<s> the easterly traveller met the other </s>
<s> the trains one way took minutes the other way </s>
<s> let us take the </s>
<s> </s>
<s> and divide the railway into units </s>
<s> then one set of trains went at the rate of units minute and at intervals of units the other at the rate of units minute and at intervals of units </s>
<s> an easterly train starting has units between it and the first train it will meet it does ths of this while the other does ths and thus meets it at the end of units and so all the way round </s>
<s> westerly train starting has units between it and the first train it will meet it does ths of this while the other does ths and thus meets it at the end of units and so all the way round </s>
<s> hence if the railway be divided by posts into parts each containing units trains meet at every post and in each traveller passes posts in going round and so meets trains </s>
<s> but in the easterly traveller only begins to count after traversing ths of the journey on reaching the th post and so counts posts similarly the other counts </s>
<s> they meet at the end of ths of hours or ths of hours minutes </s>
<s> forty five answers have been received </s>
<s> of these are beyond the reach of discussion as they give no working </s>
<s> can but enumerate their names </s>
<s> ardmore </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> matthew matticks </s>
<s> </s>
<s> poo poo and the red queen are all wrong </s>
<s> beta and rowena have got right and wrong </s>
<s> cheeky bob and nairam give the right answers but it may perhaps make the one less cheeky and induce the other to take less inverted view of things to be informed that if this had been competition for prize they would have got no marks </s>
<s> have not ventured to put </s>
<s> name in full as she only gave it provisionally in case her answer should prove right of the answers for which the working is given are wrong half wrong and half right right except that they cherish the delusion that it was clara who travelled in the easterly train point which the data do not enable us to settle and wholly right </s>
<s> the wrong answers are from bo peep financier </s>
<s> </s>
<s> kate </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> sea gull thistledown tom quad and an unsigned one </s>
<s> bo peep rightly says that the easterly traveller met all trains which started during the hours of her trip as well as all which started during the previous hours all which started at the commencements of periods of minutes each and she is right in striking out the one she met at the moment of starting but wrong in striking out the last train for she did not meet this at the terminus but minutes before she got there </s>
<s> she makes the same mistake in </s>
<s> financier thinks that any train met for the second time is not to be counted </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> finds by process which is not stated that the travellers met at the end of minutes and seconds </s>
<s> kate </s>
<s> thinks the trains which are met on starting and on arriving are never to be counted even when met elsewhere </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> tries rather complex algebraical solution and succeeds in finding the time of meeting correctly all else is wrong </s>
<s> sea gull seems to think that in the easterly train stood still for hours and says that in the travellers met at the end of minutes seconds </s>
<s> thistledown nobly confesses to having tried no calculation but merely having drawn picture of the railway and counted the trains in she counts wrong in she makes them meet in minutes </s>
<s> tom quad omits in he makes clara count the train she met on her arrival </s>
<s> the unsigned one is also unintelligible it states that the travellers go th more than the total distance to be traversed </s>
<s> the clara theory already referred to is adopted by of these viz bo peep financier kate tom quad and the nameless writer </s>

<s> guy mary </s>
<s> </s>
<s> old maid </s>
<s> and vendredi </s>
<s> all these adopt the clara theory </s>
<s> castor omits </s>
<s> vendredi gets right but in makes the same mistake as bo peep </s>
<s> notice in your solution marvellous proportion sum miles hours one mile seconds may venture to advise your acquiring as soon as possible an utter disbelief in the possibility of ratio existing between miles and hours </s>
<s> do not be disheartened by your two friends sarcastic remarks on your roundabout ways their short method of adding and has the slight disadvantage of bringing the answer wrong even roundabout method is better than that </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> in makes the travellers count one after they met not when they met </s>
<s> cheshire cat and old maid get as answer for by forgetting to strike out the train met on arrival </s>
<s> the others all get in various ways </s>
<s> bog oak guy and </s>
<s> </s>
<s> divide the trains which the westerly traveller has to meet into sets viz those already on the line which they rightly make and those which started during her hours journey exclusive of train met on arrival which they wrongly make and they make similar mistake with the easterly train </s>
<s> bridget rightly says that the westerly traveller met train every minutes for hours but wrongly makes the number it should be </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> adopts bo peep's method but wrongly strikes out for the easterly traveller the train which started at the commencement of the previous hours </s>

<s> for no </s>
<s> </s>

<s> ninety seven answers have been received </s>
<s> of these are beyond the reach of discussion as they give no working </s>
<s> can but enumerate their names and take this opportunity of saying that this is the last time shall put on record the names of competitors who give no sort of clue to the process by which their answers were obtained </s>
<s> in guessing conundrum or in catching flea we do not expect the breathless victor to give us afterwards in cold blood history of the mental or muscular efforts by which he achieved success but mathematical calculation is another thing </s>

<s> answers to knot </s>
<s> problem to mark pictures giving x's to or to or and to or also giving o's to or to or and to or so as to mark the smallest possible number of pictures and to give them the largest possible number of marks </s>
<s> answer pictures marks arranged thus solution by giving all the x's possible putting into brackets the optional ones we get pictures marked thus by then assigning o's in the same way beginning at the other end we get pictures marked thus all we have now to do is to run these two wedges as close together as they will go so as to get the minimum number of pictures erasing optional marks where by so doing we can run them closer but otherwise letting them stand </s>
<s> there are necessary marks in the st row and in the rd but only in the nd </s>
<s> hence we erase all optional marks in the st and rd rows but let them stand in the nd </s>
<s> twenty two answers have been received </s>
<s> of these give no working so in accordance with what announced in my last review of answers leave them unnamed merely mentioning that are right and wrong </s>
<s> of the eleven answers with which some working is supplied are wrong </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> begins with the rash assertion that under the given conditions the sum is impossible </s>
<s> for he or she adds these initialed correspondents are dismally vague beings to deal with perhaps it would be better pronoun is the least possible number of pictures granted therefore we must either give x's to or o's to why must oh alphabetical phantom </s>
<s> it is nowhere ordained that every picture must have marks </s>
<s> fifee sends folio page of solution which deserved better fate she offers answers in each of which pictures are marked with marks in one she gives x's to pictures in another to in the rd she gives o's to thus in every case ignoring the conditions </s>
<s> pause to remark that the condition x's to or pictures can only mean either to or else to if as one competitor holds it might mean any number not less than the words or would be superfluous </s>

<s> </s>
<s> am happy to say that none of these bloodless phantoms appear this time in the class list </s>
<s> is it idea with the left out gives x's to pictures </s>
<s> she then takes me to task for using the word ought instead of nought no doubt to one who thus rebels against the rules laid down for her guidance the word must be distasteful </s>
<s> but does not </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>

<s> that creature was originally nadder then the two words took to bandying the poor backwards and forwards like shuttlecock the final state of the game being an adder may not nought have similarly become an ought </s>
<s> anyhow oughts and crosses is very old game </s>
<s> don't think ever heard it called noughts and crosses in the following class list hope the solitary occupant of iii </s>

<s> problem and began the year with only piece </s>

<s> but or to express it in latin at spes infracta has solved it even more ingeniously with the first cypher she turns the of the into and adds the result to the original sum thus getting and in this by means of the other she turns the into thus hitting the exact class list </s>

<s> ii </s>
<s> addlepate </s>
<s> problem makes scarves while makes makes while makes </s>
<s> five scarves of weigh one of of weigh of </s>
<s> one of is as warm as of and one of as warm as of </s>
<s> which is best giving equal weight in the result to rapidity of work lightness and warmth </s>
<s> answer the order is </s>
<s> solution as to rapidity other things being constant merit is to in the ratio of to to in the ratio of to </s>
<s> in order to get one set of numbers fulfilling these conditions it is perhaps simplest to take the one that occurs twice as unity and reduce the others to fractions this gives for and the marks </s>
<s> in estimating for lightness we observe that the greater the weight the less the merit so that merit is to as to </s>
<s> thus the marks for lightness are </s>
<s> and similarly the marks for warmth are </s>
<s> to get the total result we must multiply marks together and do the same for and for </s>
<s> the final numbers are multiplying throughout by which will not alter the proportion showing the order of merit to be </s>
<s> twenty nine answers have been received of which five are right and twenty four wrong </s>
<s> these hapless ones have all with three exceptions fallen into the error of adding the proportional numbers together for each candidate instead of multiplying </s>
<s> why the latter is right rather than the former is fully proved in text books so will not occupy space by stating it here but it can be illustrated very easily by the case of length breadth and depth </s>
<s> suppose and are rival diggers of rectangular tanks the amount of work done is evidently measured by the number of cubical feet dug out </s>
<s> let dig tank feet long wide deep let dig one feet long wide deep </s>
<s> the cubical contents are is best digger in the ratio of to </s>
<s> now try marking for length width and depth separately giving maximum mark of to the best in each contest and then adding the results </s>
<s> of the twenty four malefactors one gives no working and so has no real claim to be named but break the rule for once in deference to its success in problem he she or it is addlepate </s>
<s> the other twenty three may be divided into five groups </s>
<s> first and worst are take it those who put the rightful winner last arranging them as lolo zuzu mimi the names of these desperate wrong doers are ayr bradshaw of the future furze bush and pollux who send joint answer greystead guy old hen and simple susan </s>
<s> the latter was once best of all the old hen has taken advantage of her simplicity and beguiled her with the chaff which was the bane of her own chickenhood </s>
<s> secondly point the finger of scorn at those who have put the worst candidate at the top arranging them as zuzu mimi lolo they are graecia </s>

<s> </s>

<s> mrs </s>
<s> gamp says if zuzu makes while lolo makes zuzu makes while lolo makes bad reasoning while mimi makes from this she concludes therefore zuzu excels in speed by when compared with lolo but what about mimi </s>

<s> balbus </s>
<s> the elder traveller </s>
<s> with regard to knot beg to express to vis inerti and to any others who like her understood the condition to be that every marked picture must have three marks my sincere regret that the unfortunate phrase fill the columns with oughts and crosses should have caused them to waste so much time and trouble </s>
<s> can only repeat that literal interpretation of fill would seem to me to require that every picture in the gallery should be marked </s>
