<s> answers to knot vii </s>
<s> problem given that one glass of lemonade sandwiches and biscuits cost and that one glass of lemonade sandwiches and biscuits cost find the cost of glass of lemonade sandwich and biscuit and glasses of lemonade sandwiches and biscuits </s>
<s> answer solution this is best treated algebraically </s>
<s> let the cost in pence of glass of lemonade of sandwich and of biscuit </s>
<s> then we have and </s>
<s> and we require the values of and of </s>
<s> now from two equations only we cannot find separately the values of three unknowns certain combinations of them may however be found </s>
<s> also we know that we can by the help of the given equations eliminate of the unknowns from the quantity whose value is required which will then contain one only </s>
<s> if then the required value is ascertainable at all it can only be by the rd unknown vanishing of itself otherwise the problem is impossible </s>
<s> let us then eliminate lemonade and sandwiches and reduce everything to biscuits state of things even more depressing than if all the world were apple pie by subtracting the st equation from the nd which eliminates lemonade and gives or and then substituting this value of in the st which gives </s>
<s> now if we substitute these values of in the quantities whose values are required the first becomes and the second becomes </s>
<s> hence the answers are the above is universal method that is it is absolutely certain either to produce the answer or to prove that no answer is possible </s>
<s> the question may also be solved by combining the quantities whose values are given so as to form those whose values are required </s>
<s> this is merely matter of ingenuity and good luck and as it may fail even when the thing is possible and is of no use in proving it im possible cannot rank this method as equal in value with the other </s>
<s> even when it succeeds it may prove very tedious process </s>
<s> suppose the competitors who have sent in what may call accidental solutions had had question to deal with where every number contained or digits </s>
<s> suspect it would have been case of silvered is the raven hair see patience before any solution would have been hit on by the most ingenious of them </s>
<s> forty five answers have come in of which give am happy to say some sort of working and therefore deserve to be mentioned by name and to have their virtues or vices as the case may be discussed </s>
<s> thirteen have made assumptions to which they have no right and so cannot figure in the class list even though in of the cases the answer is right </s>
<s> of the remaining no less than have sent in accidental solutions and therefore fall short of the highest honours </s>
<s> will now discuss individual cases taking the worst first as my custom is </s>
<s> froggy gives no working at least this is all he gives after stating the given equations he says therefore the difference sandwich biscuits then follow the amounts of the unknown bills with no further hint as to how he got them </s>
<s> froggy has had very narrow escape of not being named at all </s>
<s> of those who are wrong vis inerti has sent in piece of incorrect working </s>
<s> peruse the horrid details and shudder </s>
<s> she takes call it as the cost of sandwich and concludes rightly enough that biscuit will cost </s>
<s> she then subtracts the second equation from the first and deduces </s>
<s> by making two mistakes in this line she brings out </s>
<s> try it again oh vis inerti </s>
<s> away with inerti infuse little more vis and you will bring out the correct though uninteresting result </s>
<s> this will show you that it is hopeless to try to coax any one of these unknowns to reveal its separate value </s>
<s> the other competitor who is wrong throughout is either </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> or </s>
<s> </s>
<s> but whether he be juvenile mis calculator or true mathematician confused he makes the answers and he assumes with too much confidence that biscuits were each and that clara paid for though she only ate </s>
<s> we will now consider the whose working is wrong though the answer is right and not to measure their demerits too exactly will take them in alphabetical order </s>
<s> anita finds rightly that sandwich and biscuits cost and proceeds therefore sandwich biscuits lemonade dinah mite begins like anita and thence proves rightly that biscuit costs less than whence she concludes wrongly that it must cost </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> is so beautifully resigned to the certainty of verdict of guilty that have hardly the heart to utter the word without adding recommended to mercy owing to extenuating circumstances but really you know where are the extenuating circumstances </s>
<s> she begins by assuming that lemonade is glass and sandwiches each making with the given equations four conditions to be fulfilled by three miserable unknowns </s>
<s> and having naturally developed this into contradiction she then tries and with similar result </s>
<s> </s>
<s> this process might have been carried on through the whole of the tertiary period without gratifying one single megatherium she then by happy thought tries half penny biscuits and so obtains consistent result </s>
<s> this may be good solution viewing the problem as conundrum but it is not scientific </s>
<s> janet identifies sandwiches with biscuits </s>
<s> one sandwich biscuits she makes equal to four what </s>
<s> mayfair makes the astounding assertion that the equation is evidently only satisfied by </s>
<s> old cat believes that the assumption that sandwich costs is the only way to avoid unmanageable fractions but why avoid them </s>
<s> is there not certain glow of triumph in taming such fraction </s>
<s> ladies and gentlemen the fraction now before you is one that for years defied all efforts of refining nature it was in word hopelessly vulgar </s>
<s> treating it as circulating decimal the treadmill of fractions only made matters worse </s>
<s> as last resource reduced it to its lowest terms and extracted its square root joking apart let me thank old cat for some very kind words of sympathy in reference to correspondent whose name am happy to say have now forgotten who had found fault with me as discourteous critic </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> is beyond my comprehension </s>
<s> he takes the given equations as and thence by the process deduces rightly equation viz </s>
<s> and thence again by the process hopeless mystery deduces </s>
<s> have nothing to say about it give it up </s>
<s> sea breeze says it is immaterial to the answer why in what proportion is divided between the sandwich and the biscuits so she assumes stanza is one of very irregular metre </s>
<s> at first she like janet identifies sandwiches with biscuits </s>
<s> she then tries two assumptions and and naturally ends in contradictions </s>
<s> then she returns to the first assumption and finds the unknowns separately quod est absurdum </s>
<s> stiletto identifies sandwiches and biscuits as articles is the word ever used by confectioners </s>
<s> fancied what is the next article ma'am was limited to linendrapers </s>
<s> two sisters first assume that biscuits are penny and then that they are penny adding that the answer will of course be the same in both cases it is dreamy remark making one feel something like macbeth grasping at the spectral dagger </s>
<s> is this statement that see before me if you were to say we both walked the same way this morning and were to say one of you walked the same way but the other didn't which of the three would be the most hopelessly confused </s>
<s> turtle pyate what is turtle pyate please and old crow who send joint answer and </s>
<s> adopt the same method </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> gets the equation and then says this sum must be apportioned in one of the three following ways it may be grant you but </s>
<s> </s>
<s> do you say must </s>
<s> fear it is possible for </s>
<s> </s>
<s> to be two y's </s>
<s> the other two conspirators are less positive they say it can be so divided but they add either of the three prices being right </s>
<s> this is bad grammar and bad arithmetic at once oh mysterious birds </s>
<s> of those who win honours the shetland snark must have the rd class all to himself </s>
<s> he has only answered half the question viz </s>
<s> the amount of clara's luncheon the two little old ladies he pitilessly leaves in the midst of their difficulty beg to assure him with thanks for his friendly remarks that entrance fees and subscriptions are things unknown in that most economical of clubs the knot untiers the authors of the accidental solutions differ only in the number of steps they have taken between the data and the answers </s>
<s> in order to do them full justice have arranged the nd class in sections according to the number of steps </s>
<s> the two kings are fearfully deliberate </s>
<s> suppose walking quick or taking short cuts is inconsistent with kingly dignity but really in reading theseus solution one almost fancied he was marking time and making no advance at all </s>
<s> the other king will hope pardon me for having altered coal into cole king coilus or coil seems to have reigned soon after arthur's time </s>
<s> henry of huntingdon identifies him with the king co who first built walls round colchester which was named after him </s>
<s> in the chronicle of robert of gloucester we read aftur kyng aruirag of wam we habbeth told marius ys sone was kyng quoynte mon bold </s>
<s> and ys sone was aftur hym coil was ys name bothe it were quoynte men of noble fame balbus lays it down as general principle that in order to ascertain the cost of any one luncheon it must come to the same amount upon two different assumptions query should not it be we </s>
<s> otherwise the luncheon is represented as wishing to ascertain its own cost he then makes two assumptions one that sandwiches cost nothing the other that biscuits cost nothing either arrangement would lead to the shop being inconveniently crowded and brings out the unknown luncheons as and on each assumption </s>
<s> he then concludes that this agreement of results shows that the answers are correct now propose to disprove his general law by simply giving one instance of its failing </s>
<s> one instance is quite enough </s>
<s> in logical language in order to disprove universal affirmative it is enough to prove its contradictory which is particular negative must pause for digression on logic and especially on ladies logic </s>
<s> the universal affirmative everybody says he's duck is crushed instantly by proving the particular negative peter says he's goose which is equivalent to peter does not say he's duck and the universal negative nobody calls on her is well met by the particular affirmative called yesterday in short either of two contradictories disproves the other and the moral is that since particular proposition is much more easily proved than universal one it is the wisest course in arguing with lady to limit one's own assertions to particulars and leave her to prove the universal contradictory if she can </s>
<s> you will thus generally secure logical victory practical victory is not to be hoped for since she can always fall back upon the crushing remark that has nothing to do with it move for which man has not yet discovered any satisfactory answer </s>
<s> now let us return to balbus here is my particular negative on which to test his rule </s>
<s> suppose the two recorded luncheons to have been buns one queen cake sausage rolls and bottle of zo done total one and ninepence and one bun queen cakes sausage roll and bottle of zo done total one and fourpence and suppose clara's unknown luncheon to have been buns one queen cake one sausage roll and bottles of zo done while the two little sisters had been indulging in buns queen cakes sausage rolls and bottles of zo done poor souls how thirsty they must have been if balbus will kindly try this by his principle of two assumptions first assuming that bun is and queen cake and then that bun is and queen cake he will bring out the other two luncheons on each assumption as one and nine pence and four and ten pence respectively which harmony of results he will say shows that the answers are correct and yet as matter of fact the buns were each the queen cakes the sausage rolls and the zo done bottle so that clara's third luncheon had cost one and sevenpence and her thirsty friends had spent four and fourpence </s>
<s> another remark of balbus will quote and discuss for think that it also may yield moral for some of my readers </s>
<s> he says it is the same thing in substance whether in solving this problem we use words and call it arithmetic or use letters and signs and call it algebra now this does not appear to me correct description of the two methods the arithmetical method is that of synthesis only it goes from one known fact to another till it reaches its goal whereas the algebraical method is that of analysis it begins with the goal symbolically represented and so goes backwards dragging its veiled victim with it till it has reached the full daylight of known facts in which it can tear off the veil and say know you take an illustration </s>
<s> your house has been broken into and robbed and you appeal to the policeman who was on duty that night </s>
<s> well mum did see chap getting out over your garden wall but was good bit off so didn't chase him like </s>
<s> just cut down the short way to the chequers and who should meet but bill sykes coming full split round the corner </s>
<s> so just ups and says my lad you're wanted that's all says </s>
<s> and he says i'll go along quiet bobby he says without the darbies he says there's your arithmetical policeman </s>
<s> now try the other method </s>
<s> seed somebody running but he was well gone or ever got nigh the place </s>
<s> so just took look round in the garden </s>
<s> and noticed the foot marks where the chap had come right across your flower beds </s>
<s> they was good big foot marks sure ly </s>
<s> and noticed as the left foot went down at the heel ever so much deeper than the other </s>
<s> and says to myself the chap's been big hulking chap and he goes lame on his left foot and rubs my hand on the wall where he got over and there was soot on it and no mistake </s>
<s> so says to myself now where can light on big man in the chimbley sweep line what's lame of one foot and flashes up permiscuous and says it's bill sykes says there is your algebraical policeman higher intellectual type to my thinking than the other </s>
<s> little jack's solution calls for word of praise as he has written out what really is an algebraical proof in words without representing any of his facts as equations </s>
<s> if it is all his own he will make good algebraist in the time to come </s>
<s> beg to thank simple susan for some kind words of sympathy to the same effect as those received from old cat </s>
<s> hecla and martreb are the only two who have used method certain either to produce the answer or else to prove it impossible so they must share between them the highest honours </s>

<s> theseus </s>
<s> answers to correspondents </s>
<s> have received several letters on the subjects of knots ii </s>
<s> and vi which lead me to think some further explanation desirable </s>
<s> in knot ii had intended the numbering of the houses to begin at one corner of the square and this was assumed by most if not all of the competitors </s>
<s> trojanus however says assuming in default of any information that the street enters the square in the middle of each side it may be supposed that the numbering begins at street but surely the other is the more natural assumption </s>
<s> in knot vi the first problem was of course mere jeu de mots whose presence thought excusable in series of problems whose aim is to entertain rather than to instruct but it has not escaped the contemptuous criticisms of two of my correspondents who seem to think that apollo is in duty bound to keep his bow always on the stretch </s>
<s> neither of them has guessed it and this is true human nature </s>
<s> only the other day the st of september to be quite exact met my old friend brown and gave him riddle had just heard </s>
<s> with one great effort of his colossal mind brown guessed it </s>
<s> right said </s>
<s> ah said he it's very neat very neat </s>
<s> and it isn't an answer that would occur to everybody </s>
<s> very neat indeed few yards further on fell in with smith and to him propounded the same riddle </s>
<s> he frowned over it for minute and then gave it up </s>
<s> meekly faltered out the answer </s>
<s> poor thing sir smith growled as he turned away </s>
<s> very poor thing </s>
<s> wonder you care to repeat such rubbish yet smith's mind is if possible even more colossal than brown's </s>
<s> the second problem of knot vi </s>
<s> is an example in ordinary double rule of three whose essential feature is that the result depends on the variation of several elements which are so related to it that if all but one be constant it varies as that one hence if none be constant it varies as their product </s>
<s> thus for example the cubical contents of rectangular tank vary as its length if breadth and depth be constant and so on hence if none be constant it varies as the product of the length breadth and depth </s>
<s> when the result is not thus connected with the varying elements the problem ceases to be double rule of three and often becomes one of great complexity </s>
<s> to illustrate this let us take two candidates for prize and who are to compete in french german and italian let it be laid down that the result is to depend on their relative knowledge of each subject so that whether their marks for french be or the result will be the same and let it also be laid down that if they get equal marks on papers the final marks are to have the same ratio as those of the rd paper </s>
<s> this is case of ordinary double rule of three </s>
<s> we multiply marks together and do the same for </s>
<s> note that if gets single his final mark is even if he gets full marks for papers while gets only one mark for each paper </s>
<s> this of course would be very unfair on though correct solution under the given conditions </s>
<s> the result is to depend as before on relative knowledge but french is to have twice as much weight as german or italian </s>
<s> this is an unusual form of question </s>
<s> should be inclined to say the resulting ratio is to be nearer to the french ratio than if we multiplied as in and so much nearer that it would be necessary to use the other multipliers twice to produce the same result as in if the french ratio were and the others so that the ultimate ratio by method would be should multiply instead by giving the result which is nearer to than if he had used method </s>
<s> the result is to depend on actual amount of knowledge of the subjects collectively </s>
<s> here we have to ask two questions </s>
<s> what is to be the unit standard to measure by in each subject </s>
<s> are these units to be of equal or unequal value </s>
<s> the usual unit is the knowledge shown by answering the whole paper correctly calling this all lower amounts are represented by numbers between and then if these units are to be of equal value we simply add marks together and do the same for </s>
<s> the conditions are the same as but french is to have double weight </s>
<s> here we simply double the french marks and add as before </s>
<s> french is to have such weight that if other marks be equal the ultimate ratio is to be that of the french paper so that in this would swamp the candidate but the other two subjects are only to affect the result collectively by the amount of knowledge shown the two being reckoned of equal value </s>
<s> here should add german and italian marks together and multiply by his french mark </s>
<s> but need not go on the problem may evidently be set with many varying conditions each requiring its own method of solution </s>
<s> the problem in knot vi </s>
<s> was meant to belong to variety and to make this clear inserted the following passage usually the competitors differ in one point only </s>
<s> thus last year fifi and gogo made the same number of scarves in the trial week and they were equally light but fifi's were twice as warm as gogo's and she was pronounced twice as good what have said will suffice hope as an answer to balbus who holds that and are the only possible varieties of the problem and that to say we cannot use addition therefore we must be intended to use multiplication is no more illogical than from knowledge that one was not born in the night to infer that he was born in the daytime and also to fifee who says think little more consideration will show you that our error of adding the proportional numbers together for each candidate instead of multiplying is no error at all why even if addition had been the right method to use not one of the writers speak from memory showed any consciousness of the necessity of fixing unit for each subject </s>
<s> no error at all they were positively steeped in error </s>
<s> one correspondent do not name him as the communication is not quite friendly in tone writes thus wish to add very respectfully that think it would be in better taste if you were to abstain from the very trenchant expressions which you are accustomed to indulge in when criticising the answer </s>
<s> that such tone must not be be not agreeable to the persons concerned who have made mistakes may possibly have no great weight with you but hope you will feel that it would be as well not to employ it unless you are quite certain of being correct yourself the only instances the writer gives of the trenchant expressions are hapless and malefactors beg to assure him and any others who may need the assurance trust there are none that all such words have been used in jest and with no idea that they could possibly annoy any one and that sincerely regret any annoyance may have thus inadvertently given </s>
<s> may hope that in future they will recognise the distinction between severe language used in sober earnest and the words of unmeant bitterness which coleridge has alluded to in that lovely passage beginning little child limber elf </s>
<s> if the writer will refer to that passage or to the preface to fire famine and slaughter he will find the distinction for which plead far better drawn out than could hope to do in any words of mine </s>
<s> the writer's insinuation that care not how much annoyance give to my readers think it best to pass over in silence but to his concluding remark must entirely demur </s>
<s> hold that to use language likely to annoy any of my correspondents would not be in the least justified by the plea that was quite certain of being correct trust that the knot untiers and are not on such terms as those </s>
<s> beg to thank </s>
<s> for the offer of puzzle which however is too like the old one make four into answers to knot viii </s>
<s> </s>
<s> the pigs </s>
<s> problem place twenty four pigs in four sties so that as you go round and round you may always find the number in each sty nearer to ten than the number in the last </s>
<s> answer place pigs in the first sty in the second nothing in the third and in the fourth is nearer ten than nothing is nearer ten than is nearer ten than nothing and is nearer ten than </s>
<s> this problem is noticed by only two correspondents </s>
<s> balbus says it certainly cannot be solved mathematically nor do see how to solve it by any verbal quibble nolens volens makes her radiancy change the direction of going round and even then is obliged to add the pigs must be carried in front of her </s>
<s> </s>
<s> the grurmstipths </s>
<s> problem omnibuses start from certain point both ways every minutes </s>
<s> traveller starting on foot along with one of them meets one in minutes when will he be overtaken by one </s>
<s> answer in minutes </s>
<s> solution let be the distance an omnibus goes in minutes and the distance from the starting point to where the traveller is overtaken </s>
<s> since the omnibus met is due at the starting point in minutes it goes in that time as far as the traveller walks in it goes times as fast </s>
<s> now the overtaking omnibus is behind the traveller when he starts and therefore goes while he goes hence and </s>
<s> this distance would be traversed by an omnibus in minutes and therefore by the traveller in </s>
<s> hence he is overtaken in minutes after starting in minutes after meeting the omnibus </s>
<s> four answers have been received of which two are wrong </s>
<s> dinah mite rightly states that the overtaking omnibus reached the point where they met the other omnibus minutes after they left but wrongly concludes that going times as fast it would overtake them in another minute </s>
<s> the travellers are minutes walk ahead of the omnibus and must walk th of this distance farther before the omnibus overtakes them which will be th of the distance traversed by the omnibus in the same time this will require minutes more </s>
<s> nolens volens tries it by process like achilles and the tortoise he rightly states that when the overtaking omnibus leaves the gate the travellers are th of ahead and that it will take the omnibus minutes to traverse this distance during which time the travellers he tells us go th of this should be th </s>
<s> the travellers being now th of ahead he concludes that the work remaining to be done is for the travellers to go th of while the omnibus goes th </s>
<s> the principle is correct and might have been applied earlier </s>

<s> answers to knot ix </s>

<s> the buckets </s>
<s> problem lardner states that solid immersed in fluid displaces an amount equal to itself in bulk </s>
<s> how can this be true of small bucket floating in larger one </s>
<s> solution lardner means by displaces occupies space which might be filled with water without any change in the surroundings if the portion of the floating bucket which is above the water could be annihilated and the rest of it transformed into water the surrounding water would not change its position which agrees with lardner's statement </s>
<s> five answers have been received none of which explains the difficulty arising from the well known fact that floating body is the same weight as the displaced fluid </s>
<s> hecla says that only that portion of the smaller bucket which descends below the original level of the water can be properly said to be immersed and only an equal bulk of water is displaced hence according to hecla solid whose weight was equal to that of an equal bulk of water would not float till the whole of it was below the original level of the water but as matter of fact it would float as soon as it was all under water </s>
<s> magpie says the fallacy is the assumption that one body can displace another from place where it isn't and that lardner's assertion is incorrect except when the containing vessel was originally full to the brim but the question of floating depends on the present state of things not on past history </s>
<s> old king cole takes the same view as hecla </s>
<s> tympanum and vindex assume that displaced means raised above its original level and merely explain how it comes to pass that the water so raised is less in bulk than the immersed portion of bucket and thus land themselves or rather set themselves floating in the same boat as hecla </s>
<s> regret that there is no class list to publish for this problem </s>
<s> </s>
<s> balbus essay </s>
<s> problem balbus states that if certain solid be immersed in certain vessel of water the water will rise through series of distances two inches one inch half an inch which series has no end </s>
<s> he concludes that the water will rise without limit </s>
<s> is this true </s>
<s> solution no </s>
<s> this series can never reach inches since however many terms we take we are always short of inches by an amount equal to the last term taken </s>
<s> three answers have been received but only two seem to me worthy of honours </s>
<s> tympanum says that the statement about the stick is merely blind to which the old answer may well be applied solvitur ambulando or rather mergendo trust tympanum will not test this in his own person by taking the place of the man in balbus essay </s>
<s> he would infallibly be drowned </s>
<s> old king cole rightly points out that the series is decreasing geometrical progression while vindex rightly identifies the fallacy as that of achilles and the tortoise class list </s>
<s> </s>
<s> old king cole </s>
<s> vindex </s>
<s> </s>
<s> the garden </s>
<s> problem an oblong garden half yard longer than wide consists entirely of gravel walk spirally arranged yard wide and yards long </s>
<s> find the dimensions of the garden </s>
<s> answer </s>
<s> solution the number of yards and fractions of yard traversed in walking along straight piece of walk is evidently the same as the number of square yards and fractions of square yard contained in that piece of walk and the distance traversed in passing through square yard at corner is evidently yard </s>
<s> hence the area of the garden is square yards if be the width </s>
<s> solving this quadratic we find </s>
<s> hence the dimensions are </s>
<s> twelve answers have been received seven right and five wrong </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> nabob old crow and tympanum assume that the number of yards in the length of the path is equal to the number of square yards in the garden </s>
<s> this is true but should have been proved </s>
<s> but each is guilty of darker deeds </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> working consists of dividing by </s>
<s> whence came this divisor oh segiel </s>
<s> divination </s>
<s> or was it dream </s>
<s> fear this solution is worth nothing </s>
<s> old crow's is shorter and so if possible worth rather less </s>
<s> he says the answer is at once seen to be </s>
<s> nabob's calculation is short but as rich as nabob in error </s>
<s> he says that the square root of multiplied by equals the length plus the breadth </s>
<s> that is </s>
<s> his first assertion is only true of square garden </s>
<s> his second is irrelevant since is not the square root of </s>
<s> nay bob this will not do </s>
<s> tympanum says that by extracting the square root of we get yards with remainder of or half yard which we add so as to make the oblong </s>
<s> this is very terrible but worse remains behind </s>
<s> tympanum proceeds thus but why should there be the half yard at all </s>
<s> because without it there would be no space at all for flowers </s>
<s> by means of it we find reserved in the very centre small plot of ground two yards long by half yard wide the only space not occupied by walk but balbus expressly said that the walk used up the whole of the area oh tympanum </s>
<s> my tympa is exhausted my brain is num </s>
<s> can say no more </s>
<s> hecla indulges again and again in that most fatal of all habits in computation the making two mistakes which cancel each other </s>
<s> she takes as the width of the garden in yards and as its length and makes her first coil the sum of but the fourth term should be so that her first coil is yard too long </s>
<s> her second coil is the sum of here the first term should be and the last these two mistakes cancel and this coil is therefore right </s>
<s> and the same thing is true of every other coil but the last which needs an extra half yard to reach the end of the path and this exactly balances the mistake in the first coil </s>
<s> thus the sum total of the coils comes right though the working is all wrong </s>
<s> of the seven who are right dinah mite janet magpie and taffy make the same assumption as </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> and co </s>
<s> they then solve by quadratic </s>
<s> magpie also tries it by arithmetical progression but fails to notice that the first and last coils have special values </s>
<s> alumnus eton attempts to prove what </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> assumes by particular instance taking garden by </s>
<s> he ought to have proved it generally what is true of one number is not always true of others </s>
<s> old king cole solves it by an arithmetical progression </s>
<s> it is right but too lengthy to be worth as much as quadratic </s>
<s> vindex proves it very neatly by pointing out that yard of walk measured along the middle represents square yard of garden whether we consider the straight stretches of walk or the square yards at the angles in which the middle line goes half yard in one direction and then turns right angle and goes half yard in another direction class list </s>

<s> the chelsea pensioners </s>
<s> problem if per cent </s>
<s> have lost an eye per cent </s>
<s> an ear per cent </s>
<s> an arm per cent </s>
<s> leg what percentage at least must have lost all four </s>
<s> answer ten </s>
<s> solution adopt that of polar star as being better than my own </s>
<s> adding the wounds together we get among men which gives to each and to men </s>
<s> therefore the least percentage is </s>
<s> nineteen answers have been received </s>
<s> one is but as no working is given with it it must in accordance with the rule remain deed without name janet makes it and ths am sorry she has misunderstood the question and has supposed that those who had lost an ear were per cent </s>
<s> of those who had lost an eye and so on </s>
<s> of course on this supposition the percentages must all be multiplied together </s>
<s> this she has done correctly but can give her no honours as do not think the question will fairly bear her interpretation three score and ten makes it and ths her solution has given me will not say many anxious days and sleepless nights for wish to be strictly truthful but some trouble in making any sense at all of it </s>
<s> she makes the number of pensioners wounded once to be per cent suppose dividing by she gets and half as average percentage again dividing by she gets and ths as percentage wounded four times does she suppose wounds of different kinds to absorb each other so to speak </s>
<s> then no doubt the data are equivalent to pensioners with one wound each and half pensioner with half wound </s>
<s> and does she then suppose these concentrated wounds to be transferable so that ths of these unfortunates can obtain perfect health by handing over their wounds to the remaining th </s>
<s> granting these suppositions her answer is right or rather if the question had been road is covered with one inch of gravel along and half per cent </s>
<s> of it </s>
<s> how much of it could be covered inches deep with the same material her answer would have been right </s>
<s> but alas that wasn't the question </s>
<s> delta makes some most amazing assumptions let every one who has not lost an eye have lost an ear let every one who has not lost both eyes and ears have lost an arm her ideas of battle field are grim indeed </s>
<s> fancy warrior who would continue fighting after losing both eyes both ears and both arms </s>
<s> this is case which she or it evidently considers possible </s>
<s> next come eight writers who have made the unwarrantable assumption that because per cent </s>
<s> have lost an eye therefore per cent </s>
<s> have not lost one so that they have both eyes </s>
<s> this is illogical </s>
<s> if you give me bag containing sovereigns and if in an hour come to you my face not beaming with gratitude nearly so much as when received the bag to say am sorry to tell you that of these sovereigns are bad do thereby guarantee the other to be good </s>
<s> perhaps have not tested them yet </s>
<s> the sides of this illogical octagon are as follows in alphabetical order algernon bray dinah mite </s>
<s> </s>
<s> jane </s>
<s> </s>
<s> magpie who makes the delightful remark therefore per cent </s>
<s> have two of something recalling to one's memory that fortunate monarch with whom xerxes was so much pleased that he gave him ten of everything </s>
<s> </s>
<s> and tokio </s>
<s> bradshaw of the future and </s>
<s> </s>
<s> do the question in piecemeal fashion on the principle that the per cent </s>
<s> and the per cent though commenced at opposite ends of the must overlap by at least per cent and so on </s>
<s> this is quite correct working but not think quite the best way of doing it </s>
<s> the other five competitors will hope feel themselves sufficiently glorified by being placed in the first class without my composing triumphal ode for each </s>

<s> the sons ages </s>
<s> problem at first two of the ages are together equal to the third </s>
<s> few years afterwards two of them are together double of the third </s>
<s> when the number of years since the first occasion is two thirds of the sum of the ages on that occasion one age is </s>
<s> what are the other two </s>
<s> answer and solution let the ages at first be </s>
<s> now if then whatever be the value of </s>
<s> hence the second relationship if ever true was always true </s>
<s> hence it was true at first </s>
<s> but it cannot be true that and are together double of </s>
<s> hence it must be true of together with or and it does not matter which we take </s>
<s> we assume then </s>
<s> hence the three ages were at first and the number of years since that time is two thirds of is </s>
<s> hence the present ages are </s>
<s> the ages are clearly integers since this is only the year when one of my sons comes of age hence and the other ages are </s>
<s> eighteen answers have been received </s>
<s> one of the writers merely asserts that the first occasion was years ago that the ages were then and and that on the second occasion they were and </s>
<s> as roman father ought to withhold the name of the rash writer but respect for age makes me break the rule it is three score and ten </s>
<s> jane </s>
<s> also asserts that the ages at first were then she calculates the present ages leaving the second occasion unnoticed </s>
<s> old hen is nearly as bad she tried various numbers till found one that fitted all the conditions but merely scratching up the earth and pecking about is not the way to solve problem oh venerable bird </s>
<s> and close after old hen prowls with hungry eyes old cat who calmly assumes to begin with that the son who comes of age is the eldest </s>
<s> eat your bird puss for you will get nothing from me </s>
<s> there are yet two zeroes to dispose of </s>
<s> minerva assumes that on every occasion son comes of age and that it is only such son who is tipped with gold is it wise thus to interpret now my boys calculate your ages and you shall have the money </s>
<s> bradshaw of the future says let the ages at first be then assumes that the second occasion was years afterwards and on these baseless assumptions brings out the right answers </s>
<s> guide future travellers an thou wilt thou art no bradshaw for this age </s>
<s> of those who win honours the merely honourable are two </s>
<s> dinah mite ascertains rightly the relationship between the three ages at first but then assumes one of them to be thus making the rest of her solution tentative </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> does the algebra all right up to the conclusion that the present ages are and it then assumes without giving any reason that </s>
<s> of the more honourable delta attempts novelty to discover which son comes of age by elimination it assumes successively that it is the middle one and that it is the youngest and in each case it apparently brings out an absurdity </s>
<s> still as the proof contains the following bit of algebra therefore sevenths of trust it will admit that its proof is not quite conclusive </s>
<s> the rest of its work is good </s>
<s> magpie betrays the deplorable tendency of her tribe to appropriate any stray conclusion she comes across without having any strict logical right to it </s>
<s> assuming as the ages at first and as the number of the years that have elapsed since then she finds rightly the equations </s>
<s> she then says supposing that then and </s>
<s> therefore for four numbers are wanted which shall be to each other as it is in the therefore that detect the unconscientiousness of this bird </s>
<s> the conclusion is true but this is only because the equations are homogeneous having one unknown in each term fact which strongly suspect had not been grasped beg pardon clawed by her </s>
<s> were to lay this little pitfall supposing then and </s>
<s> therefore for three numbers are wanted which shall be to one another as would you not flutter down into it oh magpie as amiably as dove </s>
<s> simple susan is anything but simple to me </s>
<s> after ascertaining that the ages at first are as she says then as two thirds of their sum added to one of them the sum cannot exceed and consequently the highest cannot exceed suppose her mental argument is something like this two thirds of sum one age therefore sum halves of one age and half </s>
<s> but halves of one age cannot be less than and half here perceive that simple susan would on no account present guinea to new born baby hence the sum cannot exceed this is ingenious but her proof after that is as she candidly admits clumsy and roundabout she finds that there are possible sets of ages and eliminates four of them </s>
<s> suppose that instead of there had been million possible sets </s>
<s> would simple susan have courageously ordered in the necessary gallon of ink and ream of paper </s>
<s> the solution sent in by </s>
<s> </s>
<s> is like that of simple susan partly tentative and so does not rise higher than being clumsily right </s>
<s> among those who have earned the highest honours algernon bray solves the problem quite correctly but adds that there is nothing to exclude the supposition that all the ages were fractional </s>
<s> this would make the number of answers infinite </s>
<s> let me meekly protest that never intended my readers to devote the rest of their lives to writing out answers </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> rix points out that if fractional ages be admissible any one of the three sons might be the one come of age but she rightly rejects this supposition on the ground that it would make the problem indeterminate </s>
<s> white sugar is the only one who has detected an oversight of mine had forgotten the possibility which of course ought to be allowed for that the son who came of age that year need not have done so by that day so that he might be only </s>
<s> this gives second solution viz </s>
<s> well said pure crystal </s>
<s> verily thy fair discourse hath been as sugar </s>

<s> have received more than one remonstrance on my assertion in the chelsea pensioners problem that it was illogical to assume from the datum </s>

<s> have lost an eye that </s>

<s> algernon bray states as parallel case suppose tommy's father gives him apples and he eats one of them how many has he left and says think we are justified in answering think so too </s>
<s> there is no must here and the data are evidently meant to fix the answer exactly but if the question were set me how many must he have left should understand the data to be that his father gave him at least but may have given him more </s>
<s> take this opportunity of thanking those who have sent along with their answers to the tenth knot regrets that there are no more knots to come or petitions that should recall my resolution to bring them to an end </s>
<s> am most grateful for their kind words but think it wisest to end what at best was but lame attempt </s>
<s> the stretched metre of an antique song is beyond my compass and my puppets were neither distinctly in my life like those now address nor yet like alice and the mock turtle distinctly out of it </s>
<s> yet let me at least fancy as lay down the pen that carry with me into my silent life dear reader farewell smile from your unseen face and kindly farewell pressure from your unfelt hand </s>
