<s> chorus again cried the gryphon and the mock turtle had just begun to repeat it when cry of the trial's beginning was heard in the distance </s>
<s> come on cried the gryphon and taking alice by the hand he hurried off without waiting for the end of the song </s>
<s> what trial is it panted alice as she ran but the gryphon only answered come on and ran the faster and more and more faintly came borne on the breeze that followed them the melancholy words soo oop of the evening beautiful beautiful soup the king and queen were seated on their throne when they arrived with great crowd assembled around them the knave was in custody and before the king stood the white rabbit with trumpet in one hand and scroll of parchment in the other </s>
<s> herald </s>
<s> read the accusation said the king </s>
<s> on this the white rabbit blew three blasts on the trumpet and then unrolled the parchment scroll and read as follows illustration the queen of hearts she made some tarts all on summer day the knave of hearts he stole those tarts and took them quite away illustration now for the evidence said the king and then the sentence no said the queen first the sentence and then the evidence nonsense cried alice so loudly that everybody jumped the idea of having the sentence first hold your tongue said the queen </s>
<s> won't said alice you're nothing but pack of cards </s>
<s> who cares for you at this the whole pack rose up into the air and came flying down upon her she gave little scream of fright and tried to beat them off and found herself lying on the bank with her head in the lap of her sister who was gently brushing away some leaves that had fluttered down from the trees on to her face </s>
<s> wake up </s>
<s> alice dear said her sister what nice long sleep you've had oh i've had such curious dream said alice and she told her sister all her adventures under ground as you have read them and when she had finished her sister kissed her and said it was curious dream dear certainly </s>
<s> but now run in to your tea it's getting late so alice ran off thinking while she ran as well she might what wonderful dream it had been </s>
<s> but her sister sat there some while longer watching the setting sun and thinking of little alice and her adventures till she too began dreaming after fashion and this was her dream she saw an ancient city and quiet river winding near it along the plain and up the stream went slowly gliding boat with merry party of children on board she could hear their voices and laughter like music over the water and among them was another little alice who sat listening with bright eager eyes to tale that was being told and she listened for the words of the tale and lo </s>
<s> it was the dream of her own little sister </s>
<s> so the boat wound slowly along beneath the bright summer day with its merry crew and its music of voices and laughter till it passed round one of the many turnings of the stream and she saw it no more </s>
<s> then she thought in dream within the dream as it were how this same little alice would in the after time be herself grown woman and how she would keep through her riper years the simple and loving heart of her childhood and how she would gather around her other little children and make their eyes bright and eager with many wonderful tale perhaps even with these very adventures of the little alice of long ago and how she would feel with all their simple sorrows and find pleasure in all their simple joys remembering her own child life and the happy summer days </s>
<s> illustration happy summer days </s>
<s> the end </s>
<s> postscript the profits if any of this book will be given to children's hospitals and convalescent homes for sick children and the accounts down to june in each year will be published in the st </s>
<s> james's gazette on the second tuesday of the following december ps the thought so prettily expressed by the little boy is also to be found in longfellow's hiawatha where he appeals to those who believe that the feeble hands and helpless groping blindly in the darkness touch god's right hand in that darkness and are lifted up and strengthened who will riddle me the how and the why so questions one of england's sweetest singers </s>
<s> the how has already been told after fashion in the verses prefixed to alice in wonderland and some other memories of that happy summer day are set down for those who care to see them in this little book the germ that was to grow into the published volume </s>
<s> but the why cannot and need not be put into words </s>
<s> those for whom child's mind is sealed book and who see no divinity in child's smile would read such words in vain while for any one that has ever loved one true child no words are needed </s>
<s> for he will have known the awe that falls on one in the presence of spirit fresh from god's hands on whom no shadow of sin and but the outermost fringe of the shadow of sorrow has yet fallen he will have felt the bitter contrast between the haunting selfishness that spoils his best deeds and the life that is but an overflowing love for think child's first attitude to the world is simple love for all living things and he will have learned that the best work man can do is when he works for love's sake only with no thought of name or gain or earthly reward </s>
<s> no deed of ours suppose on this side the grave is really unselfish yet if one can put forth all one's powers in task where nothing of reward is hoped for but little child's whispered thanks and the airy touch of little child's pure lips one seems to come somewhere near to this there was no idea of publication in my mind when wrote this little book that was wholly an afterthought pressed on me by the perhaps too partial friends who always have to bear the blame when writer rushes into print and can truly say that no praise of theirs has ever given me one hundredth part of the pleasure it has been to think of the sick children in hospitals where it has been delight to me to send copies forgetting for few bright hours their pain and weariness perhaps thinking lovingly of the unknown writer of the tale perhaps even putting up childish prayer and oh how much it needs for one who can but dimly hope to stand some day not quite out of sight of those pure young faces before the great white throne </s>
<s> am very sure writes lady visitor at home for sick children that there will be many loving earnest prayers for you on easter morning from the children would like to quote further from her letters as embodying suggestion that may perhaps thus come to the notice of some one able and willing to carry it out want you to send me one of your easter greetings for very dear child who is dying at our home </s>
<s> she is just fading away and alice has brightened some of the weary hours in her illness and know that letter would be such delight to her especially if you would put minnie at the top and she could know you had sent it for her she knows you and would so value it </s>
<s> she suffers so much that long for what know would so please her </s>
<s> thank you very much for sending me the letter and for writing minnie's name </s>
<s> am quite sure that all these children will say loving prayer for the alice man on easter day and am sure the letter will help the little ones to the real easter joy </s>
<s> how do wish that you who have won the hearts and confidence of so many children would do for them what is so very near my heart and yet what no one will do viz </s>
<s> write book for children about god and themselves which is not goody and which begins at the right end about religion to make them see what it really is </s>
<s> get quite miserable very often over the children come across hardly any of them have an idea of really knowing that god loves them or of loving and confiding in him </s>
<s> they will love and trust me and be sure that want them to be happy and will not let them suffer more than is necessary but as for going to him in the same way they would never think of it </s>
<s> they are dreadfully afraid of him if they think of him at all which they generally only do when they have been naughty and they look on all connected with him as very grave and dull and when they are full of fun and thoroughly happy am sure they unconsciously hope he is not looking </s>
<s> am sure don't wonder they think of him in this way for people never talk of him in connection with what makes their little lives the brightest </s>
<s> if they are naughty people put on solemn faces and say he is very angry or shocked or something which frightens them and for the rest he is talked about only in way that makes them think of church and having to be quiet </s>
<s> as for being taught that all joy and all gladness and brightness is his joy that he is wearying for them to be happy and is not hard and stern but always doing things to make their days brighter and caring for them so tenderly and wanting them to run to him with all their little joys and sorrows they are not taught that </s>
<s> do so long to make them trust him as they trust us to feel that he will take their part as they do with us in their little woes and to go to him in their plays and enjoyments and not only when they say their prayers </s>
<s> was quite grateful to one little dot short time ago who said to his mother when am in bed put out my hand to see if can feel jesus and my angel </s>
<s> thought perhaps in the dark they'd touch me but they never have yet do so want them to want to go to him and to feel how if he is there it must be happy let me add for feel have drifted into far too serious vein for preface to fairy tale the deliciously na ve remark of very dear child friend whom asked after an acquaintance of two or three days if she had read alice and the looking glass oh yes she replied readily i've read both of them </s>
<s> and think this more slowly and thoughtfully think through the looking glass is more stupid than alice's adventures don't you think so but this was question felt it would be hardly discreet for me to enter upon lewis carroll dec </s>
<s> an easter greeting to every child who loves alice dear child please to fancy if you can that you are reading real letter from real friend whom you have seen and whose voice you can seem to yourself to hear wishing you as do now with all my heart happy easter do you know that delicious dreamy feeling when one first wakes on summer morning with the twitter of birds in the air and the fresh breeze coming in at the open window when lying lazily with eyes half shut one sees as in dream green boughs waving or waters rippling in golden light </s>
<s> it is pleasure very near to sadness bringing tears to one's eyes like beautiful picture or poem </s>
<s> and is not that mother's gentle hand that undraws your curtains and mother's sweet voice that summons you to rise </s>
<s> to rise and forget in the bright sunlight the ugly dreams that frightened you so when all was dark to rise and enjoy another happy day first kneeling to thank that unseen friend who sends you the beautiful sun </s>
<s> are these strange words from writer of such tales as alice </s>
<s> and is this strange letter to find in book of nonsense </s>
<s> it may be so </s>
<s> some perhaps may blame me for thus mixing together things grave and gay others may smile and think it odd that any one should speak of solemn things at all except in church and on sunday but think nay am sure that some children will read this gently and lovingly and in the spirit in which have written it for do not believe god means us thus to divide life into two halves to wear grave face on sunday and to think it out of place to even so much as mention him on week day </s>
<s> do you think he cares to see only kneeling figures and to hear only tones of prayer and that he does not also love to see the lambs leaping in the sunlight and to hear the merry voices of the children as they roll among the hay </s>
<s> surely their innocent laughter is as sweet in his ears as the grandest anthem that ever rolled up from the dim religious light of some solemn cathedral and if have written anything to add to those stores of innocent and healthy amusement that are laid up in books for the children love so well it is surely something may hope to look back upon without shame and sorrow as how much of life must then be recalled when my turn comes to walk through the valley of shadows this easter sun will rise on you dear child feeling your life in every limb and eager to rush out into the fresh morning air and many an easter day will come and go before it finds you feeble and gray headed creeping wearily out to bask once more in the sunlight but it is good even now to think sometimes of that great morning when the sun of righteousness shall arise with healing in his wings surely your gladness need not be the less for the thought that you will one day see brighter dawn than this when lovelier sights will meet your eyes than any waving trees or rippling waters when angel hands shall undraw your curtains and sweeter tones than ever loving mother breathed shall wake you to new and glorious day and when all the sadness and the sin that darkened life on this little earth shall be forgotten like the dreams of night that is past your affectionate friend lewis carroll </s>
<s> easter </s>
<s> christmas greetings </s>
<s> from fairy to child lady dear if fairies may for moment lay aside cunning tricks and elfish play tis at happy christmas tide </s>
<s> we have heard the children say gentle children whom we love long ago on christmas day came message from above </s>
<s> still as christmas tide comes round they remember it again echo still the joyful sound peace on earth good will to men yet the hearts must childlike be where such heavenly guests abide unto children in their glee all the year is christmas tide </s>
<s> thus forgetting tricks and play for moment lady dear we would wish you if we may merry christmas glad new year </s>
<s> lewis carroll </s>

<s> mr </s>
<s> lewis carroll having been requested to allow an easter greeting leaflet addressed to children first published in and frequently given with his books to be sold separately has arranged with messrs </s>
<s> harrison of pall mall who will supply single copy for or for or for </s>
<s> eight or nine wise words about letter writing by lewis carroll emberlin and son magdalen street oxford first published </s>
<s> contents </s>
<s> page </s>
<s> on stamp cases how to begin letter how to go on with letter how to end letter on registering correspondence </s>
<s> on stamp cases some american writer has said the snakes in this district may be divided into one species the venomous the same principle applies here </s>
<s> postage stamp cases may be divided into one species the wonderland imitations of it will soon appear no doubt but they cannot include the two pictorial surprises which are copyright </s>
<s> you don't see why call them surprises </s>
<s> well take the case in your left hand and regard it attentively </s>
<s> you see alice nursing the duchess's baby </s>
<s> an entirely new combination by the way it doesn't occur in the book now with your right thumb and forefinger lay hold of the little book and suddenly pull it out </s>
<s> the baby has turned into pig if that doesn't surprise you why suppose you wouldn't be surprised if your own mother in law suddenly turned into gyroscope </s>
<s> this case is not intended to carry about in your pocket </s>
<s> far from it </s>
<s> people seldom want any other stamps on an emergency than penny stamps for letters sixpenny stamps for telegrams and bit of stamp edging for cut fingers it makes capital sticking plaster and will stand three or four washings cautiously conducted and all these are easily carried in purse or pocketbook </s>
<s> no this is meant to haunt your envelope case or wherever you keep your writing materials </s>
<s> what made me invent it was the constantly wanting stamps of other values for foreign letters parcel post and finding it very bothersome to get at the kind wanted in hurry </s>
<s> since have possessed wonderland stamp case life has been bright and peaceful and have used no other </s>
<s> believe the queen's laundress uses no other </s>
<s> each of the pockets will hold stamps comfortably </s>
<s> would recommend you to arrange the before putting them in something like bouquet making them lean to the right and to the left alternately thus there will always be free corner to get hold of so as to take them out quickly and easily one by one otherwise you will find them apt to come out two or three at time </s>
<s> according to my experience the and stamps are hardly ever wanted though have constantly to replenish all the other pockets </s>
<s> if your experience agrees with mine you may find it convenient to keep only couple say of each of these kinds in the pocket and to fill the other pockets with extra stamps </s>
<s> </s>
<s> how to begin letter if the letter is to be in answer to another begin by getting out that other letter and reading it through in order to refresh your memory as to what it is you have to answer and as to your correspondent's present address otherwise you will be sending your letter to his regular address in london though he has been careful in writing to give you his torquay address in full </s>
<s> next address and stamp the envelope </s>
<s> what </s>
<s> before writing the letter most certainly </s>
<s> and i'll tell you what will happen if you don't </s>
<s> you will go on writing till the last moment and just in the middle of the last sentence you will become aware that time's up then comes the hurried wind up the wildly scrawled signature the hastily fastened envelope which comes open in the post the address mere hieroglyphic the horrible discovery that you've forgotten to replenish your stamp case the frantic appeal to every one in the house to lend you stamp the headlong rush to the post office arriving hot and gasping just after the box has closed and finally week afterwards the return of the letter from the dead letter office marked address illegible </s>
<s> next put your own address in full at the top of the note sheet </s>
<s> it is an aggravating thing speak from bitter experience when friend staying at some new address heads his letter dover simply assuming that you can get the rest of the address from his previous letter which perhaps you have destroyed </s>
<s> next put the date in full </s>
<s> it is another aggravating thing when you wish years afterwards to arrange series of letters to find them dated feb </s>
<s> aug </s>
<s> without any year to guide you as to which comes first </s>
<s> and never never dear madam </s>
<s> this remark is addressed to ladies only no man would ever do such thing put wednesday simply as the date </s>
<s> that way madness lies </s>
<s> how to go on with letter here is golden rule to begin with </s>
<s> write legibly the average temper of the human race would be perceptibly sweetened if everybody obeyed this rule </s>
<s> great deal of the bad writing in the world comes simply from writing too quickly </s>
<s> of course you reply do it to save time </s>
<s> very good object no doubt but what right have you to do it at your friend's expense </s>
<s> isn't his time as valuable as yours </s>
<s> years ago used to receive letters from friend and very interesting letters too written in one of the most atrocious hands ever invented </s>
<s> it generally took me about week to read one of his letters </s>
<s> used to carry it about in my pocket and take it out at leisure times to puzzle over the riddles which composed it holding it in different positions and at different distances till at last the meaning of some hopeless scrawl would flash upon me when at once wrote down the english under it and when several had been thus guessed the context would help one with the others till at last the whole series of hieroglyphics was deciphered </s>
<s> if all one's friends wrote like that life would be entirely spent in reading their letters </s>
<s> this rule applies specially to names of people or places and most specially to foreign names </s>
<s> got letter once containing some russian names written in the same hasty scramble in which people often write yours sincerely </s>
<s> the context of course didn't help in the least and one spelling was just as likely as another so far as knew it was necessary to write and tell my friend that couldn't read any of them </s>
<s> my second rule is don't fill more than page and half with apologies for not having written sooner </s>
<s> the best subject to begin with is your friend's last letter </s>
<s> write with the letter open before you </s>
<s> answer his questions and make any remarks his letter suggests </s>
<s> then go on to what you want to say yourself </s>
<s> this arrangement is more courteous and pleasanter for the reader than to fill the letter with your own invaluable remarks and then hastily answer your friend's questions in postscript </s>
<s> your friend is much more likely to enjoy your wit after his own anxiety for information has been satisfied </s>
<s> in referring to anything your friend has said in his letter it is best to quote the exact words and not to give summary of them in your words </s>
<s> a's impression of what has said expressed in a's words will never convey to the meaning of his own words </s>
<s> this is specially necessary when some point has arisen as to which the two correspondents do not quite agree </s>
<s> there ought to be no opening for such writing as you are quite mistaken in thinking said so and so </s>
<s> it was not in the least my meaning which tends to make correspondence last for lifetime </s>
<s> few more rules may fitly be given here for correspondence that has unfortunately become controversial </s>
<s> one is don't repeat yourself </s>
<s> when once you have said your say fully and clearly on certain point and have failed to convince your friend drop that subject to repeat your arguments all over again will simply lead to his doing the same and so you will go on like circulating decimal </s>
<s> did you ever know circulating decimal come to an end another rule is when you have written letter that you feel may possibly irritate your friend however necessary you may have felt it to so express yourself put it aside till the next day </s>
<s> then read it over again and fancy it addressed to yourself </s>
<s> this will often lead to your writing it all over again taking out lot of the vinegar and pepper and putting in honey instead and thus making much more palatable dish of it </s>
<s> if when you have done your best to write inoffensively you still feel that it will probably lead to further controversy keep copy of it </s>
<s> there is very little use months afterwards in pleading am almost sure never expressed myself as you say to the best of my recollection said so and so </s>
<s> far better to be able to write did not express myself so these are the words used my fifth rule is if your friend makes severe remark either leave it unnoticed or make your reply distinctly less severe and if he makes friendly remark tending towards making up the little difference that has arisen between you let your reply be distinctly more friendly </s>
<s> if in picking quarrel each party declined to go more than three eighths of the way and if in making friends each was ready to go five eighths of the way why there would be more reconciliations than quarrels </s>
<s> which is like the irishman's remonstrance to his gad about daughter shure you're always goin out </s>
<s> you go out three times for wanst that you come in my sixth rule and my last remark about controversial correspondence is don't try to have the last word </s>
<s> how many controversy would be nipped in the bud if each was anxious to let the other have the last word </s>
<s> never mind how telling rejoinder you leave unuttered never mind your friend's supposing that you are silent from lack of anything to say let the thing drop as soon as it is possible without discourtesy remember speech is silvern but silence is golden </s>
<s> if you are gentleman and your friend lady this rule is superfluous you won't get the last word my seventh rule is if it should ever occur to you to write jestingly in dispraise of your friend be sure you exaggerate enough to make the jesting obvious word spoken in jest but taken as earnest may lead to very serious consequences </s>
<s> have known it to lead to the breaking off of friendship </s>
<s> suppose for instance you wish to remind your friend of sovereign you have lent him which he has forgotten to repay you might quite mean the words mention it as you seem to have conveniently bad memory for debts in jest yet there would be nothing to wonder at if he took offence at that way of putting it </s>
<s> but suppose you wrote long observation of your career as pickpocket and burglar has convinced me that my one lingering hope for recovering that sovereign lent you is to say pay up or i'll summons yer he would indeed be matter of fact friend if he took that as seriously meant </s>
<s> my eighth rule </s>
<s> when you say in your letter enclose cheque for or enclose john's letter for you to see leave off writing for moment go and get the document referred to and put it into the envelope </s>
<s> otherwise you are pretty certain to find it lying about after the post has gone </s>
<s> my ninth rule </s>
<s> when you get to the end of note sheet and find you have more to say take another piece of paper whole sheet or scrap as the case may demand but whatever you do don't cross </s>
<s> remember the old proverb cross writing makes cross reading </s>
<s> the old proverb you say enquiringly </s>
<s> how old well not so very ancient must confess </s>
<s> in fact i'm afraid invented it while writing this paragraph </s>
<s> still you know old is comparative term </s>
<s> think you would be quite justified in addressing chicken just out of the shell as old boy when compared with another chicken that was only half out </s>
<s> </s>
<s> how to end letter if doubtful whether to end with yours faithfully or yours truly or yours most truly </s>
<s> there are at least dozen varieties before you reach yours affectionately refer to your correspondent's last letter and make your winding up at least as friendly as his in fact even if shade more friendly it will do no harm </s>
<s> postscript is very useful invention but it is not meant as so many ladies suppose to contain the real gist of the letter it serves rather to throw into the shade any little matter we do not wish to make fuss about </s>
<s> for example your friend had promised to execute commission for you in town but forgot it thereby putting you to great inconvenience and he now writes to apologize for his negligence </s>
<s> it would be cruel and needlessly crushing to make it the main subject of your reply </s>
<s> how much more gracefully it comes in thus </s>
<s> ps don't distress yourself any more about having omitted that little matter in town </s>
<s> won't deny that it did put my plans out little at the time but it's all right now </s>
<s> often forget things myself and those who live in glass houses mustn't throw stones you know when you take your letters to the post carry them in your hand </s>
<s> if you put them in your pocket you will take long country walk speak from experience passing the post office twice going and returning and when you get home will find them still in your pocket </s>
<s> </s>
<s> on registering correspondence let me recommend you to keep record of letters received and sent </s>
<s> have kept one for many years and have found it of the greatest possible service in many ways it secures my answering letters however long they have to wait it enables me to refer for my own guidance to the details of previous correspondence though the actual letters may have been destroyed long ago and most valuable feature of all if any difficulty arises years afterwards in connection with half forgotten correspondence it enables me to say with confidence did not tell you that he was an invaluable servant in every way and that you couldn't trust him too much </s>
<s> have pr cis of my letter </s>
<s> what said was he is valuable servant in many ways but don't trust him too much </s>
<s> so if he's cheated you you really must not hold me responsible for it will now give you few simple rules for making and keeping letter register </s>
<s> get blank book containing say leaves about inches wide and high </s>
<s> it should be well fastened into its cover as it will have to be opened and shut hundreds of times </s>
<s> have line ruled in red ink down each margin of every page an inch off the edge the margin should be wide enough to contain number of digits easily manage with inch margin but unless you write very small you will find an inch more comfortable </s>
<s> write pr cis of each letter received or sent in chronological order </s>
<s> let the entry of received letter reach from the left hand edge to the right hand marginal line and the entry of sent letter from the left hand marginal line to the right hand edge </s>
<s> thus the two kinds will be quite distinct and you can easily hunt through the received letters by themselves without being bothered with the sent letters and vice vers </s>
<s> use the right hand pages only and when you come to the end of the book turn it upside down and begin at the other end still using right hand pages </s>
<s> you will find this much more comfortable than using left hand pages </s>
<s> you will find it convenient to write at the top of every sheet of received letter its register number in full </s>
<s> will now give few ideal specimen pages of my letter register and make few remarks on them after which think you will find it easy enough to manage one for yourself </s>

<s> begin each page by putting at the top left hand corner the next entry number am going to use in full the last digits of each entry number are enough afterwards and put the date of the year at the top in the centre </s>
<s> begin each entry with the last digits of the entry number enclosed in an oval this is difficult to reproduce in print so have put round parentheses here </s>
<s> then for the first entry in each page put the day of the month and the day of the week afterwards do is enough for the month day till it changes do not repeat the week day </s>
<s> next if the entry is not letter put symbol for parcel see nos </s>
<s> or telegram see nos </s>
<s> as the case may be </s>
<s> next the name of the person underlined indicated here by italics </s>
<s> if an entry needs special further attention put at the end and when it has been attended to fill in the appropriate symbol </s>
<s> in no </s>
<s> it showed that the bill had to be paid in no </s>
<s> that an answer was really needed the means attended to in no </s>
<s> that owed the old lady visit in no </s>
<s> that the item had to be entered in my account book in no </s>
<s> that must not forget to write in no </s>
<s> that the address had to be entered in my address book in no </s>
<s> that the book had to be returned </s>
<s> give each entry the space of lines whether it fills them or not in order to have room for references </s>
<s> and at the foot of each page leave or lines blank often useful afterwards for entering omitted letters and miss one or numbers before begin the next page </s>
<s> at any odd moments of leisure make up the entry book in various ways as follows draw second line at the right hand end of the received entries and at the left hand end of the sent entries </s>
<s> this usually do pretty well up to date </s>
<s> in my register the first line is red the second blue here distinguish them by making the first thin and the second thick </s>
<s> beginning with the last entry and going backwards read over the names till recognise one as having occurred already then link the two entries together by giving the one that comes first in chronological order foot reference see nos </s>
<s> </s>
<s> do not keep this up to date but leave it till there are or pages to be done </s>
<s> work back till come among entries that are all supplied with foot references when once more glance through the last few pages to see if there are any entries not yet supplied with head references their predecessors may need special search </s>
<s> if an entry is connected in subject with another under different name link them by cross references distinguished from the head and foot references by being written further from the marginal line see no </s>
<s> </s>
<s> when consecutive entries have the same name and are both of the same kind </s>
<s> both received or both sent bracket them see nos </s>
<s> if of different kinds link them with the symbol used for nos </s>
<s> </s>
<s> beginning at the earliest entry not yet done with and going forwards cross out every entry that has got head and foot reference and is done with by continuing the extra line through it see nos </s>
<s> </s>
<s> thus wherever break occurs in this extra line it shows there is some matter still needing attention </s>
<s> do not keep this anything like up to date but leave it till there are or pages to look through at time </s>
<s> when the first page in the volume is thus completely crossed out put mark at the foot of the page to indicate this and so with pages </s>
<s> hence whenever do this part of the making up need not begin at the beginning of the volume but only at the earliest page that has not got this mark </s>
<s> all this looks very complicated when stated at full length but you will find it perfectly simple when you have had little practice and will come to regard the making up as pleasant occupation for rainy day or at any time that you feel disinclined for more severe mental work </s>
<s> in the game of whist hoyle gives us one golden rule when in doubt win the trick find that rule admirable for real life when in doubt what to do make up my letter register </s>
<s> the end </s>
