<s> feeding the mind by lewis carroll with prefatory note by william </s>
<s> draper london chatto windus all rights reserved note the history of this little sparkle from the pen of lewis carroll may soon be told </s>
<s> it was in october of the year that he came on visit to certain vicarage in derbyshire where he had promised on the score of friendship to do what was for him most unusual favour to give lecture before public audience the writer well remembers his nervous highly strung manner as he stood before the little room full of simple people few of whom had any idea of the world wide reputation of that shy slight figure before them when the lecture was over he handed the manuscript to me saying do what you like with it the one for whose sake he did this kindness was not long after called into the silent land so the beautifully written ms in his customary violet ink has been treasured for more than twenty years only now and then being read over at christmastime to friend or two by the study fire always to meet with the same welcome and glad acknowledgment that here was genuine though little flame that could not have belonged to any other source but that which all the world knew in alice in wonderland and through the looking glass </s>
<s> there may be perhaps many others who gathering round winter fire will be glad to read words however few from that bright source and whose memories will respond to the fresh touch of that cherished name it remains to add but one or two more associations that cling to it and make the remembrance more vivid still </s>
<s> while lewis carroll was staying in the house there came to call certain genial and by no means shy dean who without realizing what he was doing proceeded in the presence of other callers to make some remark identifying mr dodgson as the author of his books there followed an immense explosion immediately on the visitor's departure with pathetic and serious request that if there were any risk of repetition of the call due warning might be given and the retreat secured probably not many readers of the immortal alice have ever seen the curious little whimsical paper called eight or nine wise words about letter writing which their author had printed and used to send to his acquaintance accompanied by small case for postage stamps it consists of forty pages and is published by emberlin and son oxford and these are the contents page on stamp cases how to begin letter how to go on with letter how to end letter on registering correspondence in this little script also there are the same sparkles of wit which betoken that nimble pen as for example under how to begin letter and never never dear madam this remark is addressed to ladies only </s>
<s> no man would ever do such thing put wednesday simply as the date </s>
<s> that way madness lies from section how to go on with letter great deal of the bad writing in the world comes simply from writing too quickly </s>
<s> of course you reply do it to save time very good object no doubt but what right have you to do it at your friend's expense </s>
<s> isn't his time as valuable as yours </s>
<s> years ago used to receive letters from friend and very interesting letters too written in one of the most atrocious hands ever invented </s>
<s> it generally took me about week to read one of his letters </s>
<s> used to carry it about in my pocket and take it out at leisure times to puzzle over the riddles which composed it holding it in different positions and at different distances till at last the meaning of some hopeless scrawl would flash upon me when at once wrote down the english under it </s>
<s> and when several had been thus guessed the context would help one with the others till at last the whole series of hieroglyphics was deciphered </s>
<s> if all one's friends wrote like that life would be entirely spent in reading their letters rule for correspondence that has unfortunately become controversial </s>
<s> don't repeat yourself when once you have had your say fully and clearly on certain point and have failed to convince your friend drop that subject </s>
<s> to repeat your arguments all over again will simply lead to his doing the same and so you will go on like circulating decimal </s>
<s> did you ever know circulating decimal come to an end rule if your friend makes severe remark either leave it unnoticed or make your reply distinctly less severe and if he makes friendly remark tending towards making up the little difference that has arisen between you let your reply be distinctly more friendly </s>
<s> if in picking quarrel each party declined to go more than three eighths of the way and if in making friends each was ready to go five eighths of the way why there would be more reconciliations than quarrels </s>
<s> which is like the irishman's remonstrance to his gad about daughter shure you're always goin out </s>
<s> you go out three times for wanst that you come in rule don't try to get the last word </s>
<s> if you are gentleman and your friend lady this rule is superfluous you won't get the last word let the last word to day be part of another rule which gives glimpse into that gentle heart when you have written letter that you feel may possibly irritate your friend however necessary you may have felt it to so express yourself put it aside till the next day </s>
<s> then read it over again and fancy it addressed to yourself </s>
<s> this will often lead to your writing it all over again taking out lot of the vinegar and pepper and putting in honey instead and thus making much more palatable dish of it quis desiderio sit pudor aut modus tam cari capitis </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> november feeding the mind breakfast dinner tea in extreme cases breakfast luncheon dinner tea supper and glass of something hot at bedtime </s>
<s> what care we take about feeding the lucky body </s>
<s> which of us does as much for his mind </s>
<s> and what causes the difference </s>
<s> is the body so much the more important of the two </s>
<s> by no means but life depends on the body being fed whereas we can continue to exist as animals scarcely as men though the mind be utterly starved and neglected </s>
<s> therefore nature provides that in case of serious neglect of the body such terrible consequences of discomfort and pain shall ensue as will soon bring us back to sense of our duty and some of the functions necessary to life she does for us altogether leaving us no choice in the matter </s>
<s> it would fare but ill with many of us if we were left to superintend our own digestion and circulation </s>
<s> bless me one would cry forgot to wind up my heart this morning </s>
<s> to think that it has been standing still for the last three hours can't walk with you this afternoon friend would say as have no less than eleven dinners to digest </s>
<s> had to let them stand over from last week being so busy and my doctor says he will not answer for the consequences if wait any longer well it is say for us that the consequences of neglecting the body can be clearly seen and felt and it might be well for some if the mind were equally visible and tangible if we could take it say to the doctor and have its pulse felt </s>
<s> why what have you been doing with this mind lately </s>
<s> how have you fed it </s>
<s> it looks pale and the pulse is very slow well doctor it has not had much regular food lately </s>
<s> gave it lot of sugar plums yesterday sugar plums </s>
<s> what kind well they were parcel of conundrums sir ah thought so </s>
<s> now just mind this if you go on playing tricks like that you'll spoil all its teeth and get laid up with mental indigestion </s>
<s> you must have nothing but the plainest reading for the next few days </s>
<s> take care now </s>
<s> no novels on any account considering the amount of painful experience many of us have had in feeding and dosing the body it would think be quite worth our while to try and translate some of the rules into corresponding ones for the mind </s>
<s> first then we should set ourselves to provide for our mind its proper kind of food </s>
<s> we very soon learn what will and what will not agree with the body and find little difficulty in refusing piece of the tempting pudding or pie which is associated in our memory with that terrible attack of indigestion and whose very name irresistibly recalls rhubarb and magnesia but it takes great many lessons to convince us how indigestible some of our favourite lines of reading are and again and again we make meal of the unwholesome novel sure to be followed by its usual train of low spirits unwillingness to work weariness of existence in fact by mental nightmare </s>
<s> then we should be careful to provide this wholesome food in proper amount </s>
<s> mental gluttony or over reading is dangerous propensity tending to weakness of digestive power and in some cases to loss of appetite we know that bread is good and wholesome food but who would like to try the experiment of eating two or three loaves at sitting </s>
<s> have heard physician telling his patient whose complaint was merely gluttony and want of exercise that the earliest symptom of hyper nutrition is deposition of adipose tissue and no doubt the fine long words greatly consoled the poor man under his increasing load of fat </s>
<s> wonder if there is such thing in nature as fat mind </s>
<s> really think have met with one or two minds which could not keep up with the slowest trot in conversation could not jump over logical fence to save their lives always got stuck fast in narrow argument and in short were fit for nothing but to waddle helplessly through the world </s>
<s> then again though the food be wholesome and in proper amount we know that we must not consume too many kinds at once </s>
<s> take the thirsty quart of beer or quart of cider or even quart of cold tea and he will probably thank you though not so heartily in the last case </s>
<s> but what think you his feelings would be if you offered him tray containing little mug of beer little mug of cider another of cold tea one of hot tea one of coffee one of cocoa and corresponding vessels of milk water brandy and water and butter milk </s>
<s> the sum total might be quart but would it be the same thing to the haymaker </s>
<s> having settled the proper kind amount and variety of our mental food it remains that we should be careful to allow proper intervals between meal and meal and not swallow the food hastily without mastication so that it may be thoroughly digested both which rules for the body are also applicable at once to the mind </s>
<s> first as to the intervals these are as really necessary as they are for the body with this difference only that while the body requires three or four hours rest before it is ready for another meal the mind will in many cases do with three or four minutes </s>
<s> believe that the interval required is much shorter than is generally supposed and from personal experience would recommend anyone who has to devote several hours together to one subject of thought to try the effect of such break say once an hour leaving off for five minutes only each time but taking care to throw the mind absolutely out of gear for those five minutes and to turn it entirely to other subjects </s>
<s> it is astonishing what an amount of impetus and elasticity the mind recovers during those short periods of rest </s>
<s> and then as to the mastication of the food the mental process answering to this is simply thinking over what we read </s>
<s> this is very much greater exertion of mind than the mere passive taking in the contents of our author </s>
<s> so much greater an exertion is it that as coleridge says the mind often angrily refuses to put itself to such trouble so much greater that we are far too apt to neglect it altogether and go on pouring in fresh food on the top of the undigested masses already lying there till the unfortunate mind is fairly swamped under the flood </s>
<s> but the greater the exertion the more valuable we may be sure is the effect </s>
<s> one hour of steady thinking over subject solitary walk is as good an opportunity for the process as any other is worth two or three of reading only </s>
<s> and just consider another effect of this thorough digestion of the books we read mean the arranging and ticketing so to speak of the subjects in our minds so that we can readily refer to them when we want them </s>
<s> sam slick tells us that he has learnt several languages in his life but somehow couldn't keep the parcels sorted in his mind </s>
<s> and many mind that hurries through book after book without waiting to digest or arrange anything gets into that sort of condition and the unfortunate owner finds himself far from fit really to support the character all his friends give him </s>
<s> thoroughly well read man </s>
<s> just you try him in any subject now </s>
<s> you can't puzzle him you turn to the thoroughly well read man </s>
<s> you ask him question say in english history he is understood to have just finished reading macaulay </s>
<s> he smiles good naturedly tries to look as if he knew all about it and proceeds to dive into his mind for the answer </s>
<s> up comes handful of very promising facts but on examination they turn out to belong to the wrong century and are pitched in again </s>
<s> second haul brings up fact much more like the real thing but unfortunately along with it comes tangle of other things fact in political economy rule in arithmetic the ages of his brother's children and stanza of gray's elegy and among all these the fact he wants has got hopelessly twisted up and entangled </s>
<s> meanwhile every one is waiting for his reply and as the silence is getting more and more awkward our well read friend has to stammer out some half answer at last not nearly so clear or so satisfactory as an ordinary schoolboy would have given </s>
<s> and all this for want of making up his knowledge into proper bundles and ticketing them </s>
<s> do you know the unfortunate victim of ill judged mental feeding when you see him </s>
<s> can you doubt him </s>
<s> look at him drearily wandering round reading room tasting dish after dish we beg his pardon book after book keeping to none </s>
<s> first mouthful of novel but no faugh </s>
<s> he has had nothing but that to eat for the last week and is quite tired of the taste </s>
<s> then slice of science but you know at once what the result of that will be ah of course much too tough for his teeth </s>
<s> and so on through the whole weary round which he tried and failed in yesterday and will probably try and fail in to morrow </s>
<s> mr oliver wendell holmes in his very amusing book the professor at the breakfast table gives the following rule for knowing whether human being is young or old the crucial experiment is this offer bulky bun to the suspected individual just ten minutes before dinner </s>
<s> if this is easily accepted and devoured the fact of youth is established he tells us that human being if young will eat anything at any hour of the day or night to ascertain the healthiness of the mental appetite of human animal place in its hands short well written but not exciting treatise on some popular subject mental bun in fact </s>
<s> if it is read with eager interest and perfect attention and if the reader can answer questions on the subject afterwards the mind is in first rate working order </s>
<s> if it be politely laid down again or perhaps lounged over for few minutes and then can't read this stupid book </s>
<s> would you hand me the second volume of the mysterious murder you may be equally sure that there is something wrong in the mental digestion </s>
<s> if this paper has given you any useful hints on the important subject of reading and made you see that it is one's duty no less than one's interest to read mark learn and inwardly digest the good books that fall in your way its purpose will be fulfilled </s>
<s> billing and sons ltd printers guildford </s>
<s> phantasmagoria and other poems phantasmagoria canto the trystyng one winter night at half past nine cold tired and cross and muddy had come home too late to dine and supper with cigars and wine was waiting in the study </s>
<s> there was strangeness in the room and something white and wavy was standing near me in the gloom took it for the carpet broom left by that careless slavey </s>
<s> but presently the thing began to shiver and to sneeze on which said come come my man </s>
<s> that's most inconsiderate plan </s>
<s> less noise there if you please i've caught cold the thing replies out there upon the landing turned to look in some surprise and there before my very eyes little ghost was standing </s>
<s> he trembled when he caught my eye and got behind chair </s>
<s> how came you here said and why </s>
<s> never saw thing so shy </s>
<s> come out </s>
<s> don't shiver there he said i'd gladly tell you how and also tell you why but here he gave little bow you're in so bad temper now you'd think it all lie </s>
<s> and as to being in fright allow me to remark that ghosts have just as good right in every way to fear the light as men to fear the dark no plea said can well excuse such cowardice in you for ghosts can visit when they choose whereas we humans ca'n refuse to grant the interview he said flutter of alarm is not unnatural is it </s>
<s> really feared you meant some harm but now see that you are calm let me explain my visit </s>
<s> houses are classed beg to state according to the number of ghosts that they accommodate the tenant merely counts as weight with coals and other lumber </s>
<s> this is one ghost house and you when you arrived last summer may have remarked spectre who was doing all that ghosts can do to welcome the new comer </s>
<s> in villas this is always done however cheaply rented for though of course there's less of fun when there is only room for one ghosts have to be contented </s>
<s> that spectre left you on the third since then you've not been haunted for as he never sent us word twas quite by accident we heard that any one was wanted </s>
<s> spectre has first choice by right in filling up vacancy then phantom goblin elf and sprite if all these fail them they invite the nicest ghoul that they can see </s>
<s> the spectres said the place was low and that you kept bad wine so as phantom had to go and was first of course you know couldn't well decline no doubt said they settled who was fittest to be sent yet still to choose brat like you to haunt man of forty two was no great compliment i'm not so young sir he replied as you might think </s>
<s> the fact is in caverns by the water side and other places that i've tried i've had lot of practice but have never taken yet strict domestic part and in my flurry forget the five good rules of etiquette we have to know by heart my sympathies were warming fast towards the little fellow he was so utterly aghast at having found man at last and looked so scared and yellow </s>
<s> at least said i'm glad to find ghost is not dumb thing </s>
<s> but pray sit down you'll feel inclined if like myself you have not dined to take snack of something though certainly you don't appear thing to offer food to </s>
<s> and then shall be glad to hear if you will say them loud and clear the rules that you allude to thanks </s>
<s> you shall hear them by and by </s>
<s> this is piece of luck what may offer you said </s>
<s> well since you are so kind i'll try little bit of duck </s>
<s> one slice </s>
<s> and may ask you for another drop of gravy sat and looked at him in awe for certainly never saw thing so white and wavy </s>
<s> and still he seemed to grow more white more vapoury and wavier seen in the dim and flickering light as he proceeded to recite his maxims of behaviour canto ii hys fyve rules my first but don't suppose he said i'm setting you riddle is if your victim be in bed don't touch the curtains at his head but take them in the middle and wave them slowly in and out while drawing them asunder and in minute's time no doubt he'll raise his head and look about with eyes of wrath and wonder </s>
<s> and here you must on no pretence make the first observation </s>
<s> wait for the victim to commence no ghost of any common sense begins conversation </s>
<s> if he should say how came you here the way that you began sir in such case your course is clear on the bat's back my little dear is the appropriate answer </s>
<s> if after this he says no more you'd best perhaps curtail your exertions go and shake the door and then if he begins to snore you'll know the thing's failure </s>
<s> by day if he should be alone at home or on walk you merely give hollow groan to indicate the kind of tone in which you mean to talk </s>
<s> but if you find him with his friends the thing is rather harder </s>
<s> in such case success depends on picking up some candle ends or butter in the larder </s>
<s> with this you make kind of slide it answers best with suet on which you must contrive to glide and swing yourself from side to side one soon learns how to do it </s>
<s> the second tells us what is right in ceremonious calls first burn blue or crimson light thing quite forgot to night then scratch the door or walls said you'll visit here no more if you attempt the guy </s>
<s> i'll have no bonfires on my floor and as for scratching at the door i'd like to see you try the third was written to protect the interests of the victim and tells us as recollect to treat him with grave respect and not to contradict him that's plain said as tare and tret to any comprehension only wish some ghosts i've met would not so constantly forget the maxim that you mention perhaps he said you first transgressed the laws of hospitality all ghosts instinctively detest the man that fails to treat his guest with proper cordiality </s>
<s> if you address ghost as thing or strike him with hatchet he is permitted by the king to drop all formal parleying and then you're sure to catch it </s>
<s> the fourth prohibits trespassing where other ghosts are quartered and those convicted of the thing unless when pardoned by the king must instantly be slaughtered </s>
<s> that simply means be cut up small ghosts soon unite anew </s>
<s> the process scarcely hurts at all not more than when you're what you call cut up by review </s>
<s> the fifth is one you may prefer that should quote entire the king must be addressed as sir this from simple courtier is all the laws require but should you wish to do the thing with out and out politeness accost him as my goblin king </s>
<s> and always use in answering the phrase your royal whiteness i'm getting rather hoarse fear after so much reciting so if you don't object my dear we'll try glass of bitter beer think it looks inviting canto iii scarmoges and did you really walk said on such wretched night </s>
<s> always fancied ghosts could fly if not exactly in the sky yet at fairish height it's very well said he for kings to soar above the earth but phantoms often find that wings like many other pleasant things cost more than they are worth </s>
<s> spectres of course are rich and so can buy them from the elves but we prefer to keep below they're stupid company you know for any but themselves for though they claim to be exempt from pride they treat phantom as something quite beneath contempt just as no turkey ever dreamt of noticing bantam they seem too proud said to go to houses such as mine </s>
<s> pray how did they contrive to know so quickly that the place was low and that kept bad wine inspector kobold came to you the little ghost began </s>
<s> here broke in inspector who </s>
<s> inspecting ghosts is something new </s>
<s> explain yourself my man his name is kobold said my guest one of the spectre order you'll very often see him dressed in yellow gown crimson vest and night cap with border </s>
<s> he tried the brocken business first but caught sort of chill so came to england to be nursed and here it took the form of thirst which he complains of still </s>
<s> port wine he says when rich and sound warms his old bones like nectar and as the inns where it is found are his especial hunting ground we call him the inn spectre bore it bore it like man this agonizing witticism </s>
<s> and nothing could be sweeter than my temper till the ghost began some most provoking criticism </s>
<s> cooks need not be indulged in waste yet still you'd better teach them dishes should have some sort of taste </s>
<s> pray why are all the cruets placed where nobody can reach them </s>
<s> that man of yours will never earn his living as waiter </s>
<s> is that queer thing supposed to burn </s>
<s> it's far too dismal concern to call moderator </s>
<s> the duck was tender but the peas were very much too old and just remember if you please the next time you have toasted cheese don't let them send it cold </s>
<s> you'd find the bread improved think by getting better flour and have you anything to drink that looks little less like ink and isn't quite so sour then peering round with curious eyes he muttered goodness gracious and so went on to criticise your room's an inconvenient size it's neither snug nor spacious </s>
<s> that narrow window expect serves but to let the dusk in but please said to recollect twas fashioned by an architect who pinned his faith on ruskin don't care who he was sir or on whom he pinned his faith </s>
<s> constructed by whatever law so poor job never saw as i'm living wraith </s>
<s> what re markable cigar </s>
<s> how much are they dozen growled no matter what they are </s>
<s> you're getting as familiar as if you were my cousin </s>
<s> now that's thing will not stand and so tell you flat aha said he we're getting grand taking bottle in his hand i'll soon arrange for that and here he took careful aim and gaily cried here goes tried to dodge it as it came but somehow caught it all the same exactly on my nose </s>
<s> and remember nothing more that can clearly fix till was sitting on the floor repeating two and five are four but five and two are six what really passed never learned nor guessed only know that when at last my sense returned the lamp neglected dimly burned the fire was getting low through driving mists seemed to see thing that smirked and smiled and found that he was giving me lesson in biography as if were child </s>
<s> canto iv hys nouryture oh when was little ghost merry time had we </s>
<s> each seated on his favourite post we chumped and chawed the buttered toast they gave us for our tea that story is in print cried </s>
<s> don't say it's not because it's known as well as bradshaw's guide the ghost uneasily replied he hardly thought it was </s>
<s> it's not in nursery rhymes </s>
<s> and yet almost think it is three little ghosteses were set on posteses you know and ate their buttered toasteses have the book so if you doubt it turned to search the shelf </s>
<s> don't stir he cried </s>
<s> we'll do without it now remember all about it wrote the thing myself </s>
<s> it came out in monthly or at least my agent said it did some literary swell who saw it thought it seemed adapted for the magazine he edited </s>
<s> my father was brownie sir my mother was fairy </s>
<s> the notion had occurred to her the children would be happier if they were taught to vary </s>
<s> the notion soon became craze and when it once began she brought us all out in different ways one was pixy two were fays another was banshee the fetch and kelpie went to school and gave lot of trouble next came poltergeist and ghoul and then two trolls which broke the rule goblin and double if that's snuff box on the shelf he added with yawn i'll take pinch next came an elf and then phantom that's myself and last leprechaun </s>
<s> one day some spectres chanced to call dressed in the usual white stood and watched them in the hall and couldn't make them out at all they seemed so strange sight </s>
<s> wondered what on earth they were that looked all head and sack but mother told me not to stare and then she twitched me by the hair and punched me in the back </s>
<s> since then i've often wished that had been spectre born </s>
<s> but what's the use he heaved sigh they are the ghost nobility and look on us with scorn </s>
<s> my phantom life was soon begun when was barely six went out with an older one and just at first thought it fun and learned lot of tricks </s>
<s> i've haunted dungeons castles towers wherever was sent i've often sat and howled for hours drenched to the skin with driving showers upon battlement </s>
<s> it's quite old fashioned now to groan when you begin to speak this is the newest thing in tone and here it chilled me to the bone he gave an awful squeak </s>
<s> perhaps he added to your ear that sounds an easy thing </s>
<s> try it yourself my little dear </s>
<s> it took me something like year with constant practising </s>
<s> and when you've learned to squeak my man and caught the double sob you're pretty much where you began just try and gibber if you can </s>
<s> that's something like job </s>
<s> i've tried it and can only say i'm sure you couldn't do it ven if you practised night and day unless you have turn that way and natural ingenuity </s>
<s> shakspeare think it is who treats of ghosts in days of old who gibbered in the roman streets dressed if you recollect in sheets they must have found it cold </s>
<s> i've often spent ten pounds on stuff in dressing as double but though it answers as puff it never has effect enough to make it worth the trouble </s>
<s> long bills soon quenched the little thirst had for being funny </s>
<s> the setting up is always worst such heaps of things you want at first one must be made of money </s>
<s> for instance take haunted tower with skull cross bones and sheet blue lights to burn say two an hour condensing lens of extra power and set of chains complete what with the things you have to hire the fitting on the robe and testing all the coloured fire the outfit of itself would tire the patience of job </s>
<s> and then they're so fastidious the haunted house committee i've often known them make fuss because ghost was french or russ or even from the city </s>
<s> some dialects are objected to for one the irish brogue is and then for all you have to do one pound week they offer you and find yourself in bogies </s>
<s> canto byckerment don't they consult the victims though said </s>
<s> they should by rights give them chance because you know the tastes of people differ so especially in sprites the phantom shook his head and smiled </s>
<s> consult them </s>
<s> not bit </s>
<s> twould be job to drive one wild to satisfy one single child there'd be no end to it of course you can't leave children free said to pick and choose but in the case of men like me think mine host might fairly be allowed to state his views he said it really wouldn't pay folk are so full of fancies </s>
<s> we visit for single day and whether then we go or stay depends on circumstances </s>
<s> and though we don't consult mine host before the thing's arranged still if he often quits his post or is not well mannered ghost then you can have him changed </s>
<s> but if the host's man like you mean man of sense and if the house is not too new why what has that said to do with ghost's convenience new house does not suit you know it's such job to trim it but after twenty years or so the wainscotings begin to go so twenty is the limit to trim was not phrase could remember having heard perhaps said you'll be so good as tell me what is understood exactly by that word it means the loosening all the doors the ghost replied and laughed it means the drilling holes by scores in all the skirting boards and floors to make thorough draught </s>
<s> you'll sometimes find that one or two are all you really need to let the wind come whistling through but here there'll be lot to do faintly gasped indeed </s>
<s> if i'd been rather later i'll be bound added trying most unsuccessfully to smile you'd have been busy all this while trimming and beautifying why no said he perhaps should have stayed another minute but still no ghost that's any good without an introduction would have ventured to begin it </s>
<s> the proper thing as you were late was certainly to go but with the roads in such state got the knight mayor's leave to wait for half an hour or so who's the knight mayor cried </s>
<s> instead of answering my question well if you don't know that he said either you never go to bed or you've grand digestion </s>
<s> he goes about and sits on folk that eat too much at night his duties are to pinch and poke and squeeze them till they nearly choke said it serves them right and folk who sup on things like these he muttered eggs and bacon lobster and duck and toasted cheese if they don't get an awful squeeze i'm very much mistaken </s>
<s> he is immensely fat and so well suits the occupation in point of fact if you must know we used to call him years ago the mayor and corporation </s>
<s> the day he was elected mayor know that every sprite meant to vote for me but did not dare he was so frantic with despair and furious with excitement </s>
<s> when it was over for whim he ran to tell the king and being the reverse of slim two mile trot was not for him very easy thing </s>
<s> so to reward him for his run as it was baking hot and he was over twenty stone the king proceeded half in fun to knight him on the spot twas great liberty to take fired up like rocket </s>
<s> he did it just for punning's sake the man says johnson that would make pun would pick pocket man said he is not king argued for while and did my best to prove the thing the phantom merely listening with contemptuous smile </s>
<s> at last when breath and patience spent had recourse to smoking your aim he said is excellent but when you call it argument of course you're only joking stung by his cold and snaky eye roused myself at length to say at least do defy the veriest sceptic to deny that union is strength that's true enough said he yet stay listened in all meekness union is strength i'm bound to say in fact the thing's as clear as day but onions are weakness canto vi dyscomfyture as one who strives hill to climb who never climbed before who finds it in little time grow every moment less sublime and votes the thing bore yet having once begun to try dares not desert his quest but climbing ever keeps his eye on one small hut against the sky wherein he hopes to rest who climbs till nerve and force are spent with many puff and pant who still as rises the ascent in language grows more violent although in breath more scant who climbing gains at length the place that crowns the upward track </s>
<s> and entering with unsteady pace receives buffet in the face that lands him on his back and feels himself like one in sleep glide swiftly down again helpless weight from steep to steep till with headlong giddy sweep he drops upon the plain so that had resolved to bring conviction to ghost and found it quite different thing from any human arguing yet dared not quit my post but keeping still the end in view to which hoped to come strove to prove the matter true by putting everything knew into an axiom commencing every single phrase with therefore or because blindly reeled hundred ways about the syllogistic maze unconscious where was </s>
<s> quoth he that's regular clap trap don't bluster any more </s>
<s> now do be cool and take nap </s>
<s> such ridiculous old chap was never seen before </s>
<s> you're like man used to meet who got one day so furious in arguing the simple heat scorched both his slippers off his feet said that's very curious well it is curious agree and sounds perhaps like fibs but still it's true as true can be as sure as your name's tibbs said he </s>
<s> said my name's not tibbs not tibbs he cried his tone became shade or two less hearty why no said </s>
<s> my proper name is tibbets tibbets aye the same why then you're not the party with that he struck the board blow that shivered half the glasses </s>
<s> why couldn't you have told me so three quarters of an hour ago you prince of all the asses </s>
<s> to walk four miles through mud and rain to spend the night in smoking and then to find that it's in vain and i've to do it all again it's really too provoking </s>
<s> don't talk he cried as began to mutter some excuse </s>
<s> who can have patience with man that's got no more discretion than an idiotic goose </s>
<s> to keep me waiting here instead of telling me at once that this was not the house he said </s>
<s> there that'll do be off to bed </s>
<s> don't gape like that you dunce it's very fine to throw the blame on me in such fashion </s>
<s> why didn't you enquire my name the very minute that you came answered in passion </s>
<s> of course it worries you bit to come so far on foot but how was to blame for it well well said he </s>
<s> must admit that isn't badly put </s>
<s> and certainly you've given me the best of wine and victual excuse my violence said he but accidents like this you see they put one out little </s>
<s> twas my fault after all find shake hands old turnip top the name was hardly to my mind but as no doubt he meant it kind let the matter drop </s>
<s> good night old turnip top good night </s>
<s> when am gone perhaps they'll send you some inferior sprite who'll keep you in constant fright and spoil your soundest naps </s>
<s> tell him you'll stand no sort of trick then if he leers and chuckles you just be handy with stick mind that it's pretty hard and thick and rap him on the knuckles </s>
<s> then carelessly remark old coon </s>
<s> perhaps you're not aware that if you don't behave you'll soon be chuckling to another tune and so you'd best take care that's the right way to cure sprite of such like goings on but gracious me </s>
<s> it's getting light </s>
<s> good night old turnip top good night nod and he was gone </s>
<s> canto vii sad souvenaunce what's this pondered </s>
<s> have slept </s>
<s> or can have been drinking but soon gentler feeling crept upon me and sat and wept an hour or so like winking </s>
<s> no need for bones to hurry so sobbed </s>
<s> in fact doubt if it was worth his while to go and who is tibbs i'd like to know to make such work about </s>
<s> if tibbs is anything like me it's possible said he won't be over pleased to be dropped in upon at half past three after he's snug in bed </s>
<s> and if bones plagues him anyhow squeaking and all the rest of it as he was doing here just now prophesy there'll be row and tibbs will have the best of it then as my tears could never bring the friendly phantom back it seemed to me the proper thing to mix another glass and sing the following coronach </s>
<s> and art thou gone beloved ghost </s>
<s> best of familiars </s>
<s> nay then farewell my duckling roast farewell farewell my tea and toast my meerschaum and cigars </s>
<s> the hues of life are dull and gray the sweets of life insipid when thou my charmer art away old brick or rather let me say old parallelepiped instead of singing verse the third ceased abruptly rather but after such splendid word felt that it would be absurd to try it any farther </s>
<s> so with yawn went my way to seek the welcome downy and slept and dreamed till break of day of poltergeist and fetch and fay and leprechaun and brownie </s>
<s> for year i've not been visited by any kind of sprite yet still they echo in my head those parting words so kindly said old turnip top good night echoes lady clara vere de vere was eight years old she said every ringlet lightly shaken ran itself in golden thread </s>
<s> she took her little porringer of me she shall not win renown for the baseness of its nature shall have strength to drag her down </s>
<s> sisters and brothers little maid </s>
<s> there stands the inspector at thy door like dog he hunts for boys who know not two and two are four kind words are more than coronets she said and wondering looked at me it is the dead unhappy night and must hurry home to tea sea dirge there are certain things as spider ghost the income tax gout an umbrella for three that hate but the thing that hate the most is thing they call the sea </s>
<s> pour some salt water over the floor ugly i'm sure you'll allow it to be suppose it extended mile or more that's very like the sea </s>
<s> beat dog till it howls outright cruel but all very well for spree suppose that he did so day and night that would be like the sea </s>
<s> had vision of nursery maids tens of thousands passed by me all leading children with wooden spades and this was by the sea </s>
<s> who invented those spades of wood </s>
<s> who was it cut them out of the tree </s>
<s> none think but an idiot could or one that loved the sea </s>
<s> it is pleasant and dreamy no doubt to float with thoughts as boundless and souls as free but suppose you are very unwell in the boat how do you like the sea </s>
<s> there is an insect that people avoid whence is derived the verb to flee </s>
<s> where have you been by it most annoyed </s>
<s> in lodgings by the sea </s>
<s> if you like your coffee with sand for dregs decided hint of salt in your tea and fishy taste in the very eggs by all means choose the sea </s>
<s> and if with these dainties to drink and eat you prefer not vestige of grass or tree and chronic state of wet in your feet then recommend the sea </s>
<s> for have friends who dwell by the coast pleasant friends they are to me </s>
<s> it is when am with them wonder most that anyone likes the sea </s>
<s> they take me walk though tired and stiff to climb the heights madly agree and after tumble or so from the cliff they kindly suggest the sea </s>
<s> try the rocks and think it cool that they laugh with such an excess of glee as heavily slip into every pool that skirts the cold cold sea </s>
<s> ye carpette knyghte have horse ryghte good horse ne doe envye those who scoure ye playne yn headye course tyll soddayne on theyre nose they lyghte wyth unexpected force yt ys horse of clothes </s>
<s> have saddel say'st thou soe </s>
<s> wyth styrruppes knyghte to boote sayde not that answere noe yt lacketh such woote yt ys mutton saddel loe </s>
<s> parte of ye fleecye brute </s>
<s> have bytte ryghte good bytte as shall bee seene yn tyme </s>
<s> ye jawe of horse yt wyll not fytte yts use ys more sublyme </s>
<s> fayre syr how deemest thou of yt </s>
<s> yt ys thys bytte of rhyme </s>
<s> hiawatha's photographing in an age of imitation can claim no special merit for this slight attempt at doing what is known to be so easy </s>
<s> any fairly practised writer with the slightest ear for rhythm could compose for hours together in the easy running metre of the song of hiawatha having then distinctly stated that challenge no attention in the following little poem to its merely verbal jingle must beg the candid reader to confine his criticism to its treatment of the subject from his shoulder hiawatha took the camera of rosewood made of sliding folding rosewood neatly put it all together </s>
<s> in its case it lay compactly folded into nearly nothing but he opened out the hinges pushed and pulled the joints and hinges till it looked all squares and oblongs like complicated figure in the second book of euclid </s>
<s> this he perched upon tripod crouched beneath its dusky cover stretched his hand enforcing silence said be motionless beg you mystic awful was the process </s>
<s> all the family in order sat before him for their pictures each in turn as he was taken volunteered his own suggestions his ingenious suggestions </s>
<s> first the governor the father he suggested velvet curtains looped about massy pillar and the corner of table of rosewood dining table </s>
<s> he would hold scroll of something hold it firmly in his left hand he would keep his right hand buried like napoleon in his waistcoat he would contemplate the distance with look of pensive meaning as of ducks that die ill tempests </s>
<s> grand heroic was the notion yet the picture failed entirely failed because he moved little moved because he couldn't help it </s>
<s> next his better half took courage she would have her picture taken </s>
<s> she came dressed beyond description dressed in jewels and in satin far too gorgeous for an empress </s>
<s> gracefully she sat down sideways with simper scarcely human holding in her hand bouquet rather larger than cabbage </s>
<s> all the while that she was sitting still the lady chattered chattered like monkey in the forest </s>
<s> am sitting still she asked him </s>
<s> is my face enough in profile </s>
<s> shall hold the bouquet higher </s>
<s> will it came into the picture and the picture failed completely </s>
<s> next the son the stunning cantab he suggested curves of beauty curves pervading all his figure which the eye might follow onward till they centered in the breast pin centered in the golden breast pin </s>
<s> he had learnt it all from ruskin author of the stones of venice seven lamps of architecture modern painters and some others and perhaps he had not fully understood his author's meaning but whatever was the reason all was fruitless as the picture ended in an utter failure </s>
<s> next to him the eldest daughter she suggested very little only asked if he would take her with her look of passive beauty her idea of passive beauty was squinting of the left eye was drooping of the right eye was smile that went up sideways to the corner of the nostrils </s>
<s> hiawatha when she asked him took no notice of the question looked as if he hadn't heard it but when pointedly appealed to smiled in his peculiar manner coughed and said it didn't matter bit his lip and changed the subject </s>
<s> nor in this was he mistaken as the picture failed completely </s>
<s> so in turn the other sisters </s>
<s> last the youngest son was taken very rough and thick his hair was very round and red his face was very dusty was his jacket very fidgety his manner </s>
<s> and his overbearing sisters called him names he disapproved of called him johnny daddy's darling called him jacky scrubby school boy and so awful was the picture in comparison the others seemed to one's bewildered fancy to have partially succeeded </s>
<s> finally my hiawatha tumbled all the tribe together grouped is not the right expression and as happy chance would have it did at last obtain picture where the faces all succeeded each came out perfect likeness </s>
<s> then they joined and all abused it unrestrainedly abused it as the worst and ugliest picture they could possibly have dreamed of </s>
<s> giving one such strange expressions sullen stupid pert expressions </s>
<s> really any one would take us any one that did not know us for the most unpleasant people hiawatha seemed to think so seemed to think it not unlikely </s>
<s> all together rang their voices angry loud discordant voices as of dogs that howl in concert as of cats that wail in chorus </s>
<s> but my hiawatha's patience his politeness and his patience unaccountably had vanished and he left that happy party </s>
<s> neither did he leave them slowly with the calm deliberation the intense deliberation of photographic artist but he left them in hurry left them in mighty hurry stating that he would not stand it stating in emphatic language what he'd be before he'd stand it </s>
<s> hurriedly he packed his boxes hurriedly the porter trundled on barrow all his boxes hurriedly he took his ticket hurriedly the train received him thus departed hiawatha </s>
<s> melancholetta with saddest music all day long she soothed her secret sorrow at night she sighed fear twas wrong such cheerful words to borrow </s>
<s> dearest sweeter sadder song i'll sing to thee to morrow thanked her but could not say that was glad to hear it left the house at break of day and did not venture near it till time hoped had worn away her grief for nought could cheer it </s>
<s> my dismal sister </s>
<s> couldst thou know the wretched home thou keepest </s>
<s> thy brother drowned in daily woe is thankful when thou sleepest for if laugh however low when thou'rt awake thou weepest </s>
<s> took my sister t'other day excuse the slang expression to sadler's wells to see the play in hopes the new impression might in her thoughts from grave to gay effect some slight digression </s>
<s> asked three gay young dogs from town to join us in our folly whose mirth thought might serve to drown my sister's melancholy the lively jones the sportive brown and robinson the jolly </s>
<s> the maid announced the meal in tones that myself had taught her meant to allay my sister's moans like oil on troubled water rushed to jones the lively jones and begged him to escort her </s>
<s> vainly he strove with ready wit to joke about the weather to ventilate the last on dit to quote the price of leather she groaned here and sorrow sit let us lament together urged you're wasting time you know delay will spoil the venison my heart is wasted with my woe </s>
<s> there is no rest in venice on the bridge of sighs she quoted low from byron and from tennyson </s>
<s> need not tell of soup and fish in solemn silence swallowed the sobs that ushered in each dish and its departure followed nor yet my suicidal wish to be the cheese hollowed </s>
<s> some desperate attempts were made to start conversation madam the sportive brown essayed which kind of recreation hunting or fishing have you made your special occupation her lips curved downwards instantly as if of india rubber </s>
<s> hounds in full cry like said she oh how longed to snub her of fish whale's the one for me it is so full of blubber the night's performance was king john it's dull she wept and so so awhile let her tears flow on she said they soothed her woe so </s>
<s> at length the curtain rose upon bombastes furioso in vain we roared in vain we tried to rouse her into laughter her pensive glances wandered wide from orchestra to rafter tier upon tier she said and sighed and silence followed after </s>
<s> valentine sent to friend who had complained that was glad enough to see him when he came but didn't seem to miss him if he stayed away and cannot pleasures while they last be actual unless when past they leave us shuddering and aghast with anguish smarting </s>
<s> and cannot friends be firm and fast and yet bear parting </s>
<s> and must then at friendship's call calmly resign the little all trifling grant it is and small have of gladness and lend my being to the thrall of gloom and sadness </s>
<s> and think you that should be dumb and full dolorum omnium excepting when you choose to come and share my dinner </s>
<s> at other times be sour and glum and daily thinner </s>
<s> must he then only live to weep who'd prove his friendship true and deep by day lonely shadow creep at night time languish oft raising in his broken sleep the moan of anguish </s>
<s> the lover if for certain days his fair one be denied his gaze sinks not in grief and wild amaze but wiser wooer he spends the time in writing lays and posts them to her </s>
<s> and if the verse flow free and fast till even the poet is aghast touching valentine at last the post shall carry when thirteen days are gone and past of february </s>
<s> farewell dear friend and when we meet in desert waste or crowded street perhaps before this week shall fleet perhaps to morrow </s>
<s> trust to find your heart the seat of wasting sorrow </s>
<s> the three voices the first voice he trilled carol fresh and free he laughed aloud for very glee there came breeze from off the sea it passed athwart the glooming flat it fanned his forehead as he sat it lightly bore away his hat all to the feet of one who stood like maid enchanted in wood frowning as darkly as she could </s>
<s> with huge umbrella lank and brown unerringly she pinned it down right through the centre of the crown </s>
<s> then with an aspect cold and grim regardless of its battered rim she took it up and gave it him </s>
<s> while like one in dreams he stood then faltered forth his gratitude in words just short of being rude for it had lost its shape and shine and it had cost him four and nine and he was going out to dine </s>
<s> to dine she sneered in acid tone </s>
<s> to bend thy being to bone clothed in radiance not its own the tear drop trickled to his chin there was meaning in her grin that made him feel on fire within </s>
<s> term it not radiance said he tis solid nutriment to me </s>
<s> dinner is dinner tea is tea and she yea so </s>
<s> yet wherefore cease </s>
<s> let thy scant knowledge find increase </s>
<s> say men are men and geese are geese he moaned he knew not what to say </s>

<s> to swallow wines all foam and froth </s>

<s> thy well bred manners were enough without such gross material stuff yet well bred men he faintly said are not willing to be fed nor are they well without the bread her visage scorched him ere she spoke there are she said kind of folk who have no horror of joke </s>
<s> such wretches live they take their share of common earth and common air we come across them here and there we grant them there is no escape sort of semi human shape suggestive of the man like ape in all such theories said he one fixed exception there must be </s>
<s> that is the present company baffled she gave wolfish bark he aiming blindly in the dark with random shaft had pierced the mark </s>
<s> she felt that her defeat was plain yet madly strove with might and main to get the upper hand again </s>
<s> fixing her eyes upon the beach as though unconscious of his speech she said each gives to more than each he could not answer yea or nay he faltered gifts may pass away yet knew not what he meant to say </s>
<s> if that be so she straight replied each heart with each doth coincide </s>
<s> what boots it </s>
<s> for the world is wide the world is but thought said he the vast unfathomable sea is but notion unto me and darkly fell her answer dread upon his unresisting head like half hundredweight of lead </s>
<s> the good and great must ever shun that reckless and abandoned one who stoops to perpetrate pun </s>
<s> the man that smokes that reads the times that goes to christmas pantomimes is capable of any crimes he felt it was his turn to speak and with shamed and crimson cheek moaned this is harder than bezique but when she asked him wherefore so he felt his very whiskers glow and frankly owned do not know while like broad waves of golden grain or sunlit hues on cloistered pane his colour came and went again </s>
<s> pitying his obvious distress yet with tinge of bitterness she said the more exceeds the less truth of such undoubted weight he urged and so extreme in date it were superfluous to state roused into sudden passion she in tone of cold malignity to others yea but not to thee but when she saw him quail and quake and when he urged for pity's sake once more in gentle tones she spake </s>
<s> thought in the mind doth still abide that is by intellect supplied and within that idea doth hide and he that yearns the truth to know still further inwardly may go and find idea from notion flow and thus the chain that sages sought is to glorious circle wrought for notion hath its source in thought so passed they on with even pace yet gradually one might trace shadow growing on his face </s>
<s> the second voice they walked beside the wave worn beach her tongue was very apt to teach and now and then he did beseech she would abate her dulcet tone because the talk was all her own and he was dull as any drone </s>
<s> she urged no cheese is made of chalk and ceaseless flowed her dreary talk tuned to the footfall of walk </s>
<s> her voice was very full and rich and when at length she asked him which it mounted to its highest pitch </s>
<s> he bewildered answer gave drowned in the sullen moaning wave lost in the echoes of the cave </s>
<s> he answered her he knew not what like shaft from bow at random shot he spoke but she regarded not </s>
<s> she waited not for his reply but with downward leaden eye went on as if he were not by sound argument and grave defence strange questions raised on why and whence and wildly tangled evidence </s>
<s> when he with racked and whirling brain feebly implored her to explain she simply said it all again </s>
<s> wrenched with an agony intense he spake neglecting sound and sense and careless of all consequence mind believe is essence ent abstract that is an accident which we that is to say meant when with quick breath and cheeks all flushed at length his speech was somewhat hushed she looked at him and he was crushed </s>
<s> it needed not her calm reply she fixed him with stony eye and he could neither fight nor fly </s>
<s> while she dissected word by word his speech half guessed at and half heard as might cat little bird </s>
<s> then having wholly overthrown his views and stripped them to the bone proceeded to unfold her own </s>
<s> shall man be man </s>
<s> and shall he miss of other thoughts no thought but this harmonious dews of sober bliss </s>
<s> what boots it </s>
<s> shall his fevered eye through towering nothingness descry the grisly phantom hurry by </s>
<s> and hear dumb shrieks that fill the air see mouths that gape and eyes that stare and redden in the dusky glare </s>
<s> the meadows breathing amber light the darkness toppling from the height the feathery train of granite night </s>
<s> shall he grown gray among his peers through the thick curtain of his tears catch glimpses of his earlier years and hear the sounds he knew of yore old shufflings on the sanded floor old knuckles tapping at the door </s>
<s> yet still before him as he flies one pallid form shall ever rise and bodying forth in glassy eyes the vision of vanished good low peering through the tangled wood shall freeze the current of his blood still from each fact with skill uncouth and savage rapture like tooth she wrenched some slow reluctant truth </s>
<s> till like silent water mill when summer suns have dried the rill she reached full stop and was still </s>
<s> dead calm succeeded to the fuss as when the loaded omnibus has reached the railway terminus when for the tumult of the street is heard the engine's stifled beat the velvet tread of porters feet </s>
<s> with glance that ever sought the ground she moved her lips without sound and every now and then she frowned </s>
<s> he gazed upon the sleeping sea and joyed in its tranquillity and in that silence dead but she to muse little space did seem then like the echo of dream harked back upon her threadbare theme </s>
<s> still an attentive ear he lent but could not fathom what she meant she was not deep nor eloquent </s>
<s> he marked the ripple on the sand the even swaying of her hand was all that he could understand </s>
<s> he saw in dreams drawing room where thirteen wretches sat in gloom waiting he thought he knew for whom he saw them drooping here and there each feebly huddled on chair in attitudes of blank despair oysters were not more mute than they for all their brains were pumped away and they had nothing more to say save one who groaned three hours are gone who shrieked we'll wait no longer john </s>
<s> tell them to set the dinner on the vision passed the ghosts were fled he saw once more that woman dread he heard once more the words she said </s>
<s> he left her and he turned aside he sat and watched the coming tide across the shores so newly dried </s>
<s> he wondered at the waters clear the breeze that whispered in his ear the billows heaving far and near and why he had so long preferred to hang upon her every word in truth he said it was absurd the third voice not long this transport held its place within little moment's space quick tears were raining down his face his heart stood still aghast with fear wordless voice nor far nor near he seemed to hear and not to hear </s>
<s> tears kindle not the doubtful spark </s>
<s> if so why not </s>
<s> of this remark the bearings are profoundly dark her speech he said hath caused this pain </s>
<s> easier count it to explain the jargon of the howling main or stretched beside some babbling brook to con with inexpressive look an unintelligible book low spake the voice within his head in words imagined more than said soundless as ghost's intended tread if thou art duller than before why quittedst thou the voice of lore </s>
<s> why not endure expecting more rather than that he groaned aghast i'd writhe in depths of cavern vast some loathly vampire's rich repast twere hard it answered themes immense to coop within the narrow fence that rings thy scant intelligence not so he urged nor once alone but there was something in her tone that chilled me to the very bone </s>
<s> her style was anything but clear and most unpleasantly severe her epithets were very queer </s>
<s> and yet so grand were her replies could not choose but deem her wise did not dare to criticise nor did leave her till she went so deep in tangled argument that all my powers of thought were spent little whisper inly slid yet truth is truth you know you did little wink beneath the lid </s>
<s> and sickened with excess of dread prone to the dust he bent his head and lay like one three quarters dead the whisper left him like breeze lost in the depths of leafy trees left him by no means at his ease </s>
<s> once more he weltered in despair with hands through denser matted hair more tightly clenched than then they were </s>
<s> when bathed in dawn of living red majestic frowned the mountain head tell me my fault was all he said </s>
<s> when at high noon the blazing sky scorched in his head each haggard eye then keenest rose his weary cry </s>
<s> and when at eve the unpitying sun smiled grimly on the solemn fun alack he sighed what have done but saddest darkest was the sight when the cold grasp of leaden night dashed him to earth and held him tight </s>
<s> tortured unaided and alone thunders were silence to his groan bagpipes sweet music to its tone what </s>
<s> ever thus in dismal round shall pain and mystery profound pursue me like sleepless hound with crimson dashed and eager jaws me still in ignorance of the cause unknowing what broke of laws the whisper to his ear did seem like echoed flow of silent stream or shadow of forgotten dream the whisper trembling in the wind her fate with thine was intertwined so spake it in his inner mind each orbed on each baleful star each proved the other's blight and bar each unto each were best most far yea each to each was worse than foe thou scared dullard gibbering low and she an avalanche of woe tema con variazioni why is it that poetry has never yet been subjected to that process of dilution which has proved so advantageous to her sister art music </s>
<s> the diluter gives us first few notes of some well known air then dozen bars of his own then few more notes of the air and so on alternately thus saving the listener if not from all risk of recognising the melody at all at least from the too exciting transports which it might produce in more concentrated form </s>
<s> the process is termed setting by composers and any one that has ever experienced the emotion of being unexpectedly set down in heap of mortar will recognise the truthfulness of this happy phrase </s>
<s> for truly just as the genuine epicure lingers lovingly over morsel of supreme venison whose every fibre seems to murmur excelsior yet swallows ere returning to the toothsome dainty great mouthfuls of oatmeal porridge and winkles and just as the perfect connoisseur in claret permits himself but one delicate sip and then tosses off pint or more of boarding school beer so also never loved dear gazelle nor anything that cost me much high prices profit those who sell but why should be fond of such </s>
<s> to glad me with his soft black eye my son comes trotting home from school he's had fight but can't tell why he always was little fool </s>
<s> but when he came to know me well he kicked me out her testy sire and when stained my hair that belle might note the change and thus admire and love me it was sure to dye muddy green or staring blue whilst one might trace with half an eye the still triumphant carrot through </s>

<s> five rosy girls in years from ten to six sitting down to lessons no more time for tricks </s>
<s> five growing girls from fifteen to eleven music drawing languages and food enough for seven </s>

<s> well never mind </s>
<s> we jog along together like the rest of human kind but the quondam careless bachelor begins to think he knows the answer to that ancient problem how the money goes </s>
<s> poeta fit non nascitur how shall be poet </s>
<s> how shall write in rhyme </s>
<s> you told me once the very wish partook of the sublime then tell me how </s>
<s> don't put me off with your another time the old man smiled to see him to hear his sudden sally he liked the lad to speak his mind enthusiastically and thought there's no hum drum in him nor any shilly shally and would you be poet before you've been to school </s>
<s> ah well </s>
<s> hardly thought you so absolute fool </s>
<s> first learn to be spasmodic very simple rule </s>
<s> for first you write sentence and then you chop it small then mix the bits and sort them out just as they chance to fall the order of the phrases makes no difference at all </s>
<s> then if you'd be impressive remember what say that abstract qualities begin with capitals alway the true the good the beautiful those are the things that pay </s>
<s> next when you are describing shape or sound or tint don't state the matter plainly but put it in hint and learn to look at all things with sort of mental squint for instance if wished sir of mutton pies to tell should say dreams of fleecy flocks pent in wheaten cell why yes the old man said that phrase would answer very well </s>
<s> then fourthly there are epithets that suit with any word as well as harvey's reading sauce with fish or flesh or bird of these wild lonely weary strange are much to be preferred and will it do will it do to take them in lump as the wild man went his weary way to strange and lonely pump nay nay </s>
<s> you must not hastily to such conclusions jump </s>
<s> such epithets like pepper give zest to what you write and if you strew them sparely they whet the appetite but if you lay them on too thick you spoil the matter quite </s>
<s> last as to the arrangement your reader you should show him must take what information he can get and look for no im mature disclosure of the drift and purpose of your poem </s>
<s> therefore to test his patience how much he can endure mention no places names or dates and evermore be sure throughout the poem to be found consistently obscure </s>
<s> first fix upon the limit to which it shall extend then fill it up with padding beg some of any friend your great sensation stanza you place towards the end and what is sensation grandfather tell me pray </s>
<s> think never heard the word so used before to day be kind enough to mention one exempli gratia and the old man looking sadly across the garden lawn where here and there dew drop yet glittered in the dawn said go to the adelphi and see the colleen bawn the word is due to boucicault the theory is his where life becomes spasm and history whiz if that is not sensation don't know what it is </s>
<s> now try your hand ere fancy have lost its present glow and then his grandson added we'll publish it you know green cloth gold lettered at the back in duodecimo then proudly smiled that old man to see the eager lad rush madly for his pen and ink and for his blotting pad but when he thought of publishing his face grew stern and sad </s>
<s> size and tears when on the sandy shore sit beside the salt sea wave and fall into weeping fit because dare not shave little whisper at my ear enquires the reason of my fear </s>

<s> atalanta in camden town ay twas here on this spot in that summer of yore atalanta did not vote my presence bore nor reply to my tenderest talk she had heard all that nonsense before she'd the brooch had bought and the necklace and sash on and her heart as thought was alive to my passion and she'd done up her hair in the style that the empress had brought into fashion </s>
<s> had been to the play with my pearl of peri but for all could say she declared she was weary that the place was so crowded and hot and she couldn't abide that dundreary then thought lucky boy </s>
<s> tis for you that she whimpers and noted with joy those sensational simpers and said this is scrumptious phrase had learned from the devonshire shrimpers </s>

<s> those eloquent eyes </s>

<s> then whispered see the sweet secret thou keepest </s>

<s> and the question is license or banns though undoubtedly banns are the cheapest be my hero said and let me be leander but lost her reply something ending with gander for the omnibus rattled so loud that no mortal could quite understand her </s>
<s> the lang coortin the ladye she stood at her lattice high wi her doggie at her feet thorough the lattice she can spy the passers in the street there's one that standeth at the door and tirleth at the pin now speak and say my popinjay if sall let him in then up and spake the popinjay that flew abune her head gae let him in that tirls the pin he cometh thee to wed when he cam the parlour in woeful man was he </s>
<s> and dinna ye ken your lover agen sae well that loveth thee and how wad ken ye loved me sir that have been sae lang away </s>
<s> and how wad ken ye loved me sir </s>
<s> ye never telled me sae said ladye dear and the salt salt tear cam rinnin doon his cheek have sent the tokens of my love this many and many week </s>
<s> didna ye get the rings ladye the rings the gowd sae fine </s>
<s> wot that have sent to thee four score four score and nine they cam to me said that fair ladye </s>
<s> wow they were flimsie things said that chain gowd my doggie to howd it is made thae self same rings and didna ye get the locks the locks the locks my ain black hair whilk sent by post whilk sent by box whilk sent by the carrier they cam to me said that fair ladye and prithee send nae mair said that cushion sae red for my doggie's head it is stuffed wi thae locks hair and didna ye get the letter ladye tied wi silken string whilk sent to thee frae the far countrie message of love to bring it cam to me frae the far countrie wi its silken string and but it wasna prepaid said that high born maid sae gar'd them tak it awa ever alack that ye sent it back it was written sae clerkly and well </s>
<s> now the message it brought and the boon that it sought must even say it mysel then up and spake the popinjay sae wisely counselled he </s>
<s> now say it in the proper way gae doon upon thy knee the lover he turned baith red and pale went doon upon his knee ladye hear the waesome tale that must be told to thee </s>
<s> for five lang years and five lang years coorted thee by looks by nods and winks by smiles and tears as had read in books </s>
<s> for ten lang years weary hours </s>
<s> coorted thee by signs by sending game by sending flowers by sending valentines </s>
<s> for five lang years and five lang years have dwelt in the far countrie till that thy mind should be inclined mair tenderly to me </s>
<s> now thirty years are gane and past am come frae foreign land am come to tell thee my love at last ladye gie me thy hand the ladye she turned not pale nor red but she smiled pitiful smile sic coortin as yours my man she said takes lang and weary while and out and laughed the popinjay laugh of bitter scorn coortin done in sic way it ought not to be borne wi that the doggie barked aloud and up and doon he ran and tugged and strained his chain gowd all for to bite the man </s>
<s> hush thee gentle popinjay </s>
<s> hush thee doggie dear </s>
<s> there is word fain wad say it needeth he should hear aye louder screamed that ladye fair to drown her doggie's bark ever the lover shouted mair to make that ladye hark shrill and more shrill the popinjay upraised his angry squall trow the doggie's voice that day was louder than them all </s>
<s> the serving men and serving maids sat by the kitchen fire they heard sic din the parlour within as made them much admire </s>
<s> out spake the boy in buttons ween he wasna thin now wha will tae the parlour gae and stay this deadlie din and they have taen kerchief casted their kevils in for wha will tae the parlour gae and stay that deadlie din </s>
<s> when on that boy the kevil fell to stay the fearsome noise gae in they cried whate'er betide thou prince of button boys syne he has taen supple cane to swinge that dog sae fat the doggie yowled the doggie howled the louder aye for that </s>
<s> syne he has taen mutton bane the doggie ceased his noise and followed doon the kitchen stair that prince of button boys </s>
<s> then sadly spake that ladye fair wi frown upon her brow dearer to me is my sma doggie than dozen sic as thou </s>

<s> gin had popinjay to fly abune my head to tell me what ought to say had by this been wed </s>

<s> was written at the request of some young friends who had gone to ball at an oxford commemoration and also as specimen of what might be done by making the double acrostic connected poem instead of what it has hitherto been string of disjointed stanzas on every conceivable subject and about as interesting to read straight through as page of cyclopaedia </s>
<s> the first two stanzas describe the two main words and each subsequent stanza one of the cross lights no </s>
<s> ii </s>
<s> was written after seeing miss ellen terry perform in the play of hamlet in this case the first stanza describes the two main words </s>
<s> no </s>
<s> iii </s>
<s> was written after seeing miss marion terry perform in mr gilbert's play of pygmalion and galatea the three stanzas respectively describe my first my second and my whole there was an ancient city stricken down with strange frenzy and for many day they paced from morn to eve the crowded town and danced the night away </s>
<s> asked the cause the aged man grew sad they pointed to building gray and tall and hoarsely answered step inside my lad and then you'll see it all yet what are all such gaieties to me whose thoughts are full of indices and surds </s>
<s> but something whispered it will soon be done bands cannot always play nor ladies smile endure with patience the distasteful fun for just little while change came o'er my vision it was night we clove pathway through frantic throng the steeds wild plunging filled us with affright the chariots whirled along </s>
<s> within marble hall river ran living tide half muslin and half cloth and here one mourned broken wreath or fan yet swallowed down her wrath and here one offered to thirsty fair his words half drowned amid those thunders tuneful some frozen viand there were many there tooth ache in each spoonful </s>
<s> there comes happy pause for human strength will not endure to dance without cessation and every one must reach the point at length of absolute prostration </s>
<s> at such moment ladies learn to give to partners who would urge them over much flat and yet decided negative photographers love such </s>
<s> there comes welcome summons hope revives and fading eyes grow bright and pulses quicken incessant pop the corks and busy knives dispense the tongue and chicken </s>
<s> flushed with new life the crowd flows back again and all is tangled talk and mazy motion much like waving field of golden grain or tempestuous ocean </s>
<s> and thus they give the time that nature meant for peaceful sleep and meditative snores to ceaseless din and mindless merriment and waste of shoes and floors </s>
<s> and one we name him not that flies the flowers that dreads the dances and that shuns the salads they doom to pass in solitude the hours writing acrostic ballads </s>
<s> how late it grows </s>
<s> the hour is surely past that should have warned us with its double knock </s>
<s> the twilight wanes and morning comes at last oh uncle what's o'clock the uncle gravely nods and wisely winks </s>
<s> it may mean much but how is one to know </s>
<s> he opens his mouth yet out of it methinks no words of wisdom flow </s>
<s> ii empress of art for thee twine this wreath with all too slender skill </s>

<s> day of tears </s>
<s> whence comes this spectre grim parting like death's cold river souls that love </s>

<s> and still it lives that keen and heavenward flame lives in his eye and trembles in his tone and these wild words of fury but proclaim heart that beats for thee for thee alone </s>

<s> iii </s>

<s> iv </s>
<s> my first is singular at best more plural is my second my third is far the pluralest so plural plural protest it scarcely can be reckoned </s>
<s> my first is followed by bird my second by believers in magic art my simple third follows too often hopes absurd and plausible deceivers </s>
<s> my first to get at wisdom tries failure melancholy </s>
<s> my second men revered as wise my third from heights of wisdom flies to depths of frantic folly </s>
<s> my first is ageing day by day my second's age is ended my third enjoys an age they say that never seems to fade away through centuries extended </s>
<s> my whole </s>
<s> need poet's pen to paint her myriad phases the monarch and the slave of men mountain summit and den of dark and deadly mazes flashing light fleeting shade beginning end and middle of all that human art hath made or wit devised </s>
<s> go seek her aid if you would read my riddle </s>
<s> fame's penny trumpet affectionately dedicated to all original researchers who pant for endowment blow blow your trumpets till they crack ye little men of little souls </s>
<s> and bid them huddle at your back gold sucking leeches shoals on shoals </s>
<s> fill all the air with hungry wails reward us ere we think or write </s>
<s> without your gold mere knowledge fails to sate the swinish appetite and where great plato paced serene or newton paused with wistful eye rush to the chace with hoofs unclean and babel clamour of the sty be yours the pay be theirs the praise we will not rob them of their due nor vex the ghosts of other days by naming them along with you </s>
<s> they sought and found undying fame they toiled not for reward nor thanks their cheeks are hot with honest shame for you the modern mountebanks </s>
<s> who preach of justice plead with tears that love and mercy should abound while marking with complacent ears the moaning of some tortured hound who prate of wisdom nay forbear lest wisdom turn on you in wrath trampling with heel that will not spare the vermin that beset her path </s>
<s> go throng each other's drawing rooms ye idols of petty clique strut your brief hour in borrowed plumes and make your penny trumpets squeak </s>
<s> deck your dull talk with pilfered shreds of learning from nobler time and oil each other's little heads with mutual flattery's golden slime and when the topmost height ye gain and stand in glory's ether clear and grasp the prize of all your pain so many hundred pounds year then let fame's banner be unfurled </s>
<s> sing paeans for victory won </s>
<s> ye tapers that would light the world and cast shadow on the sun who still shall pour his rays sublime one crystal flood from east to west when ye have burned your little time and feebly flickered into rest </s>
