<s> you could not see cloud because no cloud was in the sky no birds were flying overhead there were no birds to fly </s>
<s> the walrus and the carpenter were walking close at hand they wept like anything to see such quantities of sand if this were only cleared away they said it would be grand if seven maids with seven mops swept it for half year do you suppose the walrus said that they could get it clear doubt it said the carpenter and shed bitter tear </s>
<s> oysters come and walk with us the walrus did beseech pleasant walk pleasant talk along the briny beach we cannot do with more than four to give hand to each the eldest oyster looked at him but never word he said the eldest oyster winked his eye and shook his heavy head meaning to say he did not choose to leave the oyster bed </s>
<s> but four young oysters hurried up all eager for the treat their coats were brushed their faces washed their shoes were clean and neat and this was odd because you know they hadn't any feet </s>
<s> four other oysters followed them and yet another four and thick and fast they came at last and more and more and more all hopping through the frothy waves and scrambling to the shore </s>
<s> illustration the walrus and the carpenter walked on mile or so and then they rested on rock conveniently low and all the little oysters stood and waited in row </s>
<s> the time has come the walrus said to talk of many things of shoes and ships and sealing wax of cabbages and kings and why the sea is boiling hot and whether pigs have wings but wait bit the oysters cried before we have our chat for some of us are out of breath and all of us are fat no hurry said the carpenter they thanked him much for that </s>
<s> loaf of bread the walrus said is chiefly what we need pepper and vinegar besides are very good indeed now if you're ready oysters dear we can begin to feed but not on us the oysters cried turning little blue </s>

<s> and you are very nice the carpenter said nothing but cut us another slice wish you were not quite so deaf i've had to ask you twice it seems shame the walrus said to play them such trick after we've brought them out so far and made them trot so quick the carpenter said nothing but the butter's spread too thick weep for you the walrus said deeply sympathize with sobs and tears he sorted out those of the largest size holding his pocket handkerchief before his streaming eyes </s>

<s> and then all the people cheered again and one man who was more excited than the rest flung his hat high into the air and shouted as well as could make out who roar for the sub warden everybody roared but whether it was for the sub warden or not did not clearly appear some were shouting bread and some taxes but no one seemed to know what it was they really wanted </s>
<s> all this saw from the open window of the warden's breakfast saloon looking across the shoulder of the lord chancellor who had sprung to his feet the moment the shouting began almost as if he had been expecting it and had rushed to the window which commanded the best view of the market place </s>
<s> what can it all mean he kept repeating to himself as with his hands clasped behind him and his gown floating in the air he paced rapidly up and down the room </s>

<s> the march up was very curious sight image the march up straggling procession of men marching two and two began from the other side of the market place and advanced in an irregular zig zag fashion towards the palace wildly tacking from side to side like sailing vessel making way against an unfavourable wind so that the head of the procession was often further from us at the end of one tack than it had been at the end of the previous one </s>
<s> yet it was evident that all was being done under orders for noticed that all eyes were fixed on the man who stood just under the window and to whom the chancellor was continually whispering </s>

<s> chapter </s>
<s> l'amie inconnue </s>
<s> as we entered the breakfast saloon the professor was saying and he had breakfast by himself early so he begged you wouldn't wait for him my lady </s>
<s> this way my lady he added this way and then with as it seemed to me most superfluous politeness he flung open the door of my compartment and ushered in young and lovely lady muttered to myself with some bitterness </s>
<s> and this is of course the opening scene of vol </s>
<s> </s>
<s> she is the heroine </s>
<s> and am one of those subordinate characters that only turn up when needed for the development of her destiny and whose final appearance is outside the church waiting to greet the happy pair yes my lady change at fayfield were the next words heard oh that too obsequious guard next station but one and the door closed and the lady settled down into her corner and the monotonous throb of the engine making one feel as if the train were some gigantic monster whose very circulation we could feel proclaimed that we were once more speeding on our way </s>
<s> the lady had perfectly formed nose caught myself saying to myself hazel eyes and lips and here it occurred to me that to see for myself what the lady was really like would be more satisfactory than much speculation </s>
<s> looked round cautiously and was entirely disappointed of my hope </s>
<s> the veil which shrouded her whole face was too thick for me to see more than the glitter of bright eyes and the hazy outline of what might be lovely oval face but might also unfortunately be an equally unlovely one </s>
<s> closed my eyes again saying to myself couldn't have better chance for an experiment in telepathy </s>
<s> i'll think out her face and afterwards test the portrait with the original at first no result at all crowned my efforts though divided my swift mind now hither now thither in way that felt sure would have made aeneas green with envy but the dimly seen oval remained as provokingly blank as ever mere ellipse as if in some mathematical diagram without even the foci that might be made to do duty as nose and mouth </s>
<s> gradually however the conviction came upon me that could by certain concentration of thought think the veil away and so get glimpse of the mysterious face as to which the two questions is she pretty and is she plain still hung suspended in my mind in beautiful equipoise </s>
<s> success was partial and fitful still there was result ever and anon the veil seemed to vanish in sudden flash of light but before could fully realise the face all was dark again </s>
<s> in each such glimpse the face seemed to grow more childish and more innocent and when had at last thought the veil entirely away it was unmistakeably the sweet face of little sylvie </s>
<s> so either i've been dreaming about sylvie said to myself and this is the reality </s>
<s> or else i've really been with sylvie and this is dream </s>
<s> is life itself dream wonder to occupy the time got out the letter which had caused me to take this sudden railway journey from my london home down to strange fishing town on the north coast and read it over again dear old friend i'm sure it will be as great pleasure to me as it can possibly be to you to meet once more after so many years and of course shall be ready to give you all the benefit of such medical skill as have only you know one mustn't violate professional etiquette </s>
<s> and you are already in the hands of first rate london doctor with whom it would be utter affectation for me to pretend to compete </s>
<s> make no doubt he is right in saying the heart is affected all your symptoms point that way one thing at any rate have already done in my doctorial capacity secured you bedroom on the ground floor so that you will not need to ascend the stairs at all </s>
<s> shalt expect you by last train on friday in accordance with your letter and till then shalt say in the words of the old song oh for friday nicht </s>
<s> friday's lang coming yours always arthur forester </s>
<s> ps do you believe in fate this postscript puzzled me sorely </s>
<s> he is far too sensible man thought to have become fatalist </s>
<s> and yet what else can he mean by it and as folded up the letter and put it away inadvertently repeated the words aloud </s>
<s> do you believe in fate the fair incognita turned her head quickly at the sudden question </s>
<s> no don't she said with smile </s>
<s> do you didn't mean to ask the question stammered little taken aback at having begun conversation in so unconventional fashion </s>
<s> the lady's smile became laugh not mocking laugh but the laugh of happy child who is perfectly at her ease </s>
<s> didn't you she said </s>
<s> then it was case of what you doctors call unconscious cerebration am no doctor replied </s>
<s> do look so like one </s>
<s> or what makes you think it she pointed to the book had been reading which was so lying that its title diseases of the heart was plainly visible </s>
<s> one needn't be doctor said to take an interest in medical books </s>
<s> there's another class of readers who are yet more deeply interested you mean the patients she interrupted while look of tender pity gave new sweetness to her face </s>
<s> but with an evident wish to avoid possibly painful topic one needn't be either to take an interest in books of science </s>
<s> which contain the greatest amount of science do you think the books or the minds rather profound question for lady said to myself holding with the conceit so natural to man that woman's intellect is essentially shallow </s>
<s> and considered minute before replying </s>
<s> if you mean living minds don't think it's possible to decide </s>
<s> there is so much written science that no living person has ever read and there is so much thought out science that hasn't yet been written </s>
<s> but if you mean the whole human race then think the minds have it everything recorded in books must have once been in some mind you know isn't that rather like one of the rules in algebra my lady enquired </s>
<s> algebra too thought with increasing wonder mean if we consider thoughts as factors may we not say that the least common multiple of all the minds contains that of all the books but not the other way certainly we may replied delighted with the illustration </s>
<s> and what grand thing it would be went on dreamily thinking aloud rather than talking if we could only apply that rule to books </s>
<s> you know in finding the least common multiple we strike out quantity wherever it occurs except in the term where it is raised to its highest power </s>
<s> so we should have to erase every recorded thought except in the sentence where it is expressed with the greatest intensity my lady laughed merrily </s>
<s> some books would be reduced to blank paper i'm afraid she said </s>
<s> they would </s>
<s> most libraries would be terribly diminished in bulk </s>
<s> but just think what they would gain in quality when will it be done she eagerly asked </s>
<s> if there's any chance of it in my time think i'll leave off reading and wait for it well perhaps in another thousand years or so then there's no use waiting said my lady </s>
<s> let's sit down </s>
<s> uggug my pet come and sit by me anywhere but by me growled the sub warden </s>
<s> the little wretch always manages to upset his coffee guessed at once as perhaps the reader will also have guessed if like myself he is very clever at drawing conclusions that my lady was the sub warden's wife and that uggug hideous fat boy about the same age as sylvie with the expression of prize pig was their son </s>

<s> allow me to explain </s>
<s> it is in fact very simple problem in hydrodynamics </s>
<s> that means combination of water and strength if we take plunge bath and man of great strength such as myself about to plunge into it we have perfect example of this science </s>
<s> am bound to admit the professor continued in lower tone and with downcast eyes that we need man of remarkable strength </s>

<s> it has to be something thick </s>
<s> for instance you might welter in bread sauce </s>
<s> that being white would be more suitable for ghost supposing it wished to welter you have real good terrifying ghost in that book hinted </s>

<s> the accommodation provided for passengers waiting at this junction was distinctly inadequate single wooden bench apparently intended for three sitters only and even this was already partially occupied by very old man in smock frock who sat with rounded shoulders and drooping head and with hands clasped on the top of his stick so as to make sort of pillow for that wrinkled face with its look of patient weariness </s>

<s> we hurried down the road and very soon caught sight of the old beggar about quarter of mile ahead of us and the children at once set off running to overtake him </s>
<s> lightly and swiftly they skimmed over the ground and could not in the least understand how it was kept up with them so easily </s>
<s> but the unsolved problem did not worry me so much as at another time it might have done there were so many other things to attend to </s>
<s> the old beggar must have been very deaf as he paid no attention whatever to bruno's eager shouting but trudged wearily on never pausing until the child got in front of him and held up the slice of cake </s>
<s> the poor little fellow was quite out of breath and could only utter the one word cake not with the gloomy decision with which her excellency had so lately pronounced it but with sweet childish timidity looking up into the old man's face with eyes that loved all things both great and small the old man snatched it from him and devoured it greedily as some hungry wild beast might have done but never word of thanks did he give his little benefactor only growled more more and glared at the half frightened children </s>

<s> follow me were the next words heard as the old man waved his hand with dignified grace that ill suited his ragged dress over bush that stood by the road side which began instantly to sink into the earth </s>
<s> at another time might have doubted the evidence of my eyes or at least have felt some astonishment but in this strange scene my whole being seemed absorbed in strong curiosity as to what would happen next </s>
<s> when the bush had sunk quite out of our sight marble steps were seen leading downwards into darkness </s>
<s> the old man led the way and we eagerly followed </s>
<s> the staircase was so dark at first that could only just see the forms of the children as hand in hand they groped their way down after their guide but it got lighter every moment with strange silvery brightness that seemed to exist in the air as there were no lamps visible and when at last we reached level floor the room in which we found ourselves was almost as light as day </s>
<s> it was eight sided having in each angle slender pillar round which silken draperies were twined </s>
<s> the wall between the pillars was entirely covered to the height of six or seven feet with creepers from which hung quantities of ripe fruit and of brilliant flowers that almost hid the leaves </s>
<s> in another place perchance might have wondered to see fruit and flowers growing together here my chief wonder was that neither fruit nor flowers were such as had ever seen before </s>
<s> higher up each wall contained circular window of coloured glass and over all was an arched roof that seemed to be spangled all over with jewels </s>
<s> with hardly less wonder turned this way and that trying to make out how in the world we had come in for there was no door and all the walls were thickly covered with the lovely creepers </s>
<s> we are safe here my darlings said the old man laying hand on sylvie's shoulder and bending down to kiss her </s>

<s> my son was in the act of saying sixty three as you fell the baron said nothing he was covered with dust and seemed much hurt both in body and mind </s>
<s> however when they had got him into the house and given him good brushing matters looked little better </s>
<s> dinner was served in due course and every fresh dish seemed to increase the good humour of the baron but all efforts to get him to express his opinion as to uggug's cleverness were in vain until that interesting youth had left the room and was seen from the open window prowling about the lawn with little basket which he was filling with frogs </s>
<s> so fond of natural history as he is dear boy said the doting mother </s>
<s> now do tell us baron what you think of him to be perfectly candid said the cautious baron would like little more evidence </s>
<s> think you mentioned his skill in music said the vice warden </s>
<s> why he's simply prodigy </s>
<s> you shall hear him play the piano </s>
<s> and he walked to the window </s>
<s> ug mean my boy </s>
<s> come in for minute and bring the music master with you </s>
<s> to turn over the music for him he added as an explanation </s>
<s> uggug having filled his basket with frogs had no objection to obey and soon appeared in the room followed by fierce looking little man who asked the vice warden vot music vill you haf the sonata that his highness plays so charmingly said the vice warden </s>
<s> his highness haf not the music master began but was sharply stopped by the vice warden </s>
<s> silence sir </s>
<s> go and turn over the music for his highness </s>
<s> my dear to the wardeness will you show him what to do </s>
<s> and meanwhile baron i'll just show you most interesting map we have of outland and fairyland and that sort of thing by the time my lady had returned from explaining things to the music master the map had been hung up and the baron was already much bewildered by the vice warden's habit of pointing to one place while he shouted out the name of another </s>
<s> image the map of fairyland my lady joining in pointing out other places and shouting other names only made matters worse and at last the baron in despair took to pointing out places for himself and feebly asked is that great yellow splotch fairyland yes that's fairyland said the vice warden and you might as well give him hint he muttered to my lady about going back to morrow </s>
<s> he eats like shark </s>
<s> it would hardly do for me to mention it his wife caught the idea and at once began giving hints of the most subtle and delicate kind </s>
<s> just see what short way it is back to fairyland </s>
<s> why if you started to morrow morning you'd get there in very little more than week the baron looked incredulous </s>
<s> it took me full month to come he said </s>
<s> but it's ever so much shorter going back you know the baron looked appealingly to the vice warden who chimed in readily </s>
<s> you can go back five times in the time it took you to come here once if you start to morrow morning all this time the sonata was pealing through the room </s>
<s> the baron could not help admitting to himself that it was being magnificently played but he tried in vain to get glimpse of the youthful performer </s>
<s> every time he had nearly succeeded in catching sight of him either the vice warden or his wife was sure to get in the way pointing out some new place on the map and deafening him with some new name </s>
<s> he gave in at last wished hasty good night and left the room while his host and hostess interchanged looks of triumph </s>
<s> deftly done cried the vice warden </s>
<s> craftily contrived </s>
<s> but what means all that tramping on the stairs he half opened the door looked out and added in tone of dismay the baron's boxes are being carried down and what means all that rumbling of wheels cried my lady </s>
<s> she peeped through the window curtains </s>
<s> the baron's carriage has come round she groaned </s>
<s> at this moment the door opened fat furious face looked in voice hoarse with passion thundered out the words my room is full of frogs leave you and the door closed again </s>
<s> and still the noble sonata went pealing through the room but it was arthur's masterly touch that roused the echoes and thrilled my very soul with the tender music of the immortal sonata pathetique and it was not till the last note had died away that the tired but happy traveler could bring himself to utter the words good night and to seek his much needed pillow </s>
<s> chapter </s>
<s> ride on lion </s>
<s> the next day glided away pleasantly enough partly in settling myself in my new quarters and partly in strolling round the neighbourhood under arthur's guidance and trying to form general idea of elveston and its inhabitants </s>
<s> when five o'clock arrived arthur proposed without any embarrassment this time to take me with him up to the hall in order that might make acquaintance with the earl of ainslie who had taken it for the season and renew acquaintance with his daughter lady muriel </s>
<s> my first impressions of the gentle dignified and yet genial old man were entirely favourable and the real satisfaction that showed itself on his daughter's face as she met me with the words this is indeed an unlooked for pleasure was very soothing for whatever remains of personal vanity the failures and disappointments of many long years and much buffeting with rough world had left in me </s>
<s> yet noted and was glad to note evidence of far deeper feeling than mere friendly regard in her meeting with arthur though this was as gathered an almost daily occurrence and the conversation between them in which the earl and were only occasional sharers had an ease and spontaneity rarely met with except between very old friends and as knew that they had not known each other for longer period than the summer which was now rounding into autumn felt certain that love and love alone could explain the phenomenon </s>
<s> how convenient it would be lady muriel laughingly remarked propos of my having insisted on saving her the trouble of carrying cup of tea across the room to the earl if cups of tea had no weight at all </s>
<s> then perhaps ladies would sometimes be permitted to carry them for short distances one can easily imagine situation said arthur where things would necessarily have no weight relatively to each other though each would have its usual weight looked at by itself some desperate paradox said the earl </s>
<s> tell us how it could be </s>
<s> we shall never guess it well suppose this house just as it is placed few billion miles above planet and with nothing else near enough to disturb it of course it falls to the planet the earl nodded </s>
<s> of course though it might take some centuries to do it and is five o'clock tea to be going on all the while said lady muriel </s>
<s> that and other things said arthur </s>
<s> the inhabitants would live their lives grow up and die and still the house would be falling falling falling </s>
<s> but now as to the relative weight of things </s>
<s> nothing can be heavy you know except by trying to fall and being prevented from doing so </s>
<s> you all grant that we all granted that </s>
<s> well now if take this book and hold it out at arm's length of course feel its weight </s>
<s> it is trying to fall and prevent it </s>
<s> and if let go it fails to the floor </s>
<s> but if we were all falling together it couldn't be trying to fall any quicker you know for if let go what more could it do than fall </s>
<s> and as my hand would be falling too at the same rate it would never leave it for that would be to get ahead of it in the race </s>
<s> and it could never overtake the failing floor see it clearly said lady muriel </s>
<s> but it makes one dizzy to think of such things </s>
<s> how can you make us do it there is more curious idea yet ventured to say </s>
<s> suppose cord fastened to the house from below and pulled down by some one on the planet </s>
<s> then of course the house goes faster than its natural rate of falling but the furniture with our noble selves would go on failing at their old pace and would therefore be left behind practically we should rise to the ceiling said the earl </s>
<s> the inevitable result of which would be concussion of brain to avoid that said arthur let us have the furniture fixed to the floor and ourselves tied down to the furniture </s>
<s> then the five o'clock tea could go on in peace with one little drawback lady muriel gaily interrupted </s>
<s> we should take the cups down with us but what about the tea had forgotten the tea arthur confessed </s>
<s> that no doubt would rise to the ceiling unless you chose to drink it on the way which think is quite nonsense enough for one while said the earl </s>
<s> what news does this gentleman bring us from the great world of london this drew me into the conversation which now took more conventional tone </s>
<s> after while arthur gave the signal for our departure and in the cool of the evening we strolled down to the beach enjoying the silence broken only by the murmur of the sea and the far away music of some fishermen's song almost as much as our late pleasant talk </s>
<s> we sat down among the rocks by little pool so rich in animal vegetable and zoophytic or whatever is the right word life that became entranced in the study of it and when arthur proposed returning to our lodgings begged to be left there for while to watch and muse alone </s>
<s> the fishermen's song grew ever nearer and clearer as their boat stood in for the beach and would have gone down to see them land their cargo of fish had not the microcosm at my feet stirred my curiosity yet more keenly </s>
<s> one ancient crab that was for ever shuffling frantically from side to side of the pool had particularly fascinated me there was vacancy in its stare and an aimless violence in its behaviour that irresistibly recalled the gardener who had befriended sylvie and bruno and as gazed caught the concluding notes of the tune of his crazy song </s>
<s> the silence that followed was broken by the sweet voice of sylvie </s>
<s> would you please let us out into the road what </s>
<s> after that old beggar again the gardener yelled and began singing he thought he saw kangaroo that worked coffee mill he looked again and found it was vegetable pill were to swallow this he said should be very ill image he thought he saw kangaroo we don't want him to swallow anything sylvie explained </s>
<s> he's not hungry </s>
<s> but we want to see him </s>
<s> so will you please certainly the gardener promptly replied </s>
<s> always please </s>
<s> never displeases nobody </s>
<s> there you are and he flung the door open and let us out upon the dusty high road </s>
<s> we soon found our way to the bush which had so mysteriously sunk into the ground and here sylvie drew the magic locket from its hiding place turned it over with thoughtful air and at last appealed to bruno in rather helpless way </s>
<s> what was it we had to do with it bruno </s>
<s> it's all gone out of my head kiss it was bruno's invariable recipe in cases of doubt and difficulty </s>
<s> sylvie kissed it but no result followed </s>
<s> rub it the wrong way was bruno's next suggestion </s>
<s> which is the wrong way sylvie most reasonably enquired </s>
<s> the obvious plan was to try both ways </s>
<s> rubbing from left to right had no visible effect whatever </s>
<s> from right to left oh stop sylvie bruno cried in sudden alarm </s>
<s> whatever is going to happen for number of trees on the neighbouring hillside were moving slowly upwards in solemn procession while mild little brook that had been rippling at our feet moment before began to swell and foam and hiss and bubble in truly alarming fashion </s>
<s> rub it some other way cried bruno </s>
<s> try up and down </s>
<s> quick it was happy thought </s>
<s> up and down did it and the landscape which had been showing signs of mental aberration in various directions returned to its normal condition of sobriety with the exception of small yellowish brown mouse which continued to run wildly up and down the road lashing its tail like little lion </s>
<s> let's follow it said sylvie and this also turned out happy thought </s>
<s> the mouse at once settled down into business like jog trot with which we could easily keep pace </s>
<s> the only phenomenon that gave me any uneasiness was the rapid increase in the size of the little creature we were following which became every moment more and more like real lion </s>
<s> soon the transformation was complete and noble lion stood patiently waiting for us to come up with it </s>
<s> no thought of fear seemed to occur to the children who patted and stroked it as if it had been shetland pony </s>
<s> image the mouse lion help me up cried bruno </s>
<s> and in another moment sylvie had lifted him upon the broad back of the gentle beast and seated herself behind him pillion fashion </s>
<s> bruno took good handful of mane in each hand and made believe to guide this new kind of steed </s>
<s> gee up seemed quite sufficient by way of verbal direction the lion at once broke into an easy canter and we soon found ourselves in the depths of the forest </s>
<s> say we for am certain that accompanied them though how managed to keep up with cantering lion am wholly unable to explain </s>
<s> but was certainly one of the party when we came upon an old beggar man cutting sticks at whose feet the lion made profound obeisance sylvie and bruno at the same moment dismounting and leaping in to the arms of their father </s>

<s> but wouldn't you like to wait just another year and make it four thousand </s>

<s> why you might be king if you liked don't know as i'd care about being king the man said thoughtfully </s>
<s> but it dew sound powerful sight money </s>
<s> well think i'll wait of course you will said the professor </s>
<s> there's good sense in you see </s>
<s> good day to you my man will you ever have to pay him that four thousand pounds sylvie asked as the door closed on the departing creditor </s>
<s> never my child the professor replied emphatically </s>
<s> he'll go on doubling it till he dies </s>
<s> you see it's always worth while waiting another year to get twice as much money </s>
<s> and now what would you like to do my little friends </s>
<s> shall take you to see the other professor </s>
<s> this would be an excellent opportunity for visit he said to himself glancing at his watch he generally takes short rest of fourteen minutes and half about this time bruno hastily went round to sylvie who was standing at the other side of the professor and put his hand into hers </s>
<s> thinks we'd like to go he said doubtfully only please let's go all together </s>
<s> it's best to be on the safe side oo know why you talk as if you were sylvie exclaimed the professor </s>
<s> know did bruno replied very humbly </s>
<s> quite forgotted wasn't sylvie </s>
<s> only fought he might be rarver fierce the professor laughed jolly laugh </s>
<s> oh he's quite tame he said </s>
<s> he never bites </s>
<s> he's only little little dreamy you know he took hold of bruno's other hand and led the children down long passage had never noticed before not that there was anything remarkable in that was constantly coming on new rooms and passages in that mysterious palace and very seldom succeeded in finding the old ones again </s>
<s> near the end of the passage the professor stopped </s>
<s> this is his room he said pointing to the solid wall </s>
<s> we ca'n get in through there bruno exclaimed </s>
<s> sylvie said nothing till she had carefully examined whether the wall opened anywhere </s>
<s> then she laughed merrily </s>
<s> you're playing us trick you dear old thing she said </s>
<s> there's no door here there isn't any door to the room said the professor </s>
<s> we shall have to climb in at the window so we went into the garden and soon found the window of the other professor's room </s>
<s> it was ground floor window and stood invitingly open the professor first lifted the two children in and then he and climbed in after them </s>
<s> image the other professor the other professor was seated at table with large book open before him on which his forehead was resting he had clasped his arms round the book and was snoring heavily </s>
<s> he usually reads like that the professor remarked when the book's very interesting and then sometimes it's very difficult to get him to attend this seemed to be one of the difficult times the professor lifted him up once or twice and shook him violently but he always returned to his book the moment he was let go of and showed by his heavy breathing that the book was as interesting as ever </s>
<s> how dreamy he is the professor exclaimed </s>
<s> he must have got to very interesting part of the book and he rained quite shower of thumps on the other professor's back shouting hoy </s>
<s> hoy all the time </s>
<s> isn't it wonderful that he should be so dreamy he said to bruno </s>
<s> if he's always as sleepy as that bruno remarked course he's dreamy but what are we to do said the professor </s>
<s> you see he's quite wrapped up in the book suppose oo shuts the book bruno suggested </s>
<s> that's it cried the delighted professor </s>
<s> of course that'll do it and he shut up the book so quickly that he caught the other professor's nose between the leaves and gave it severe pinch </s>
<s> the other professor instantly rose to his feet and carried the book away to the end of the room where he put it back in its place in the book case </s>
<s> i've been reading for eighteen hours and three quarters he said and now shall rest for fourteen minutes and half </s>
<s> is the lecture all ready very nearly the professor humbly replied </s>
<s> shall ask you to give me hint or two there will be few little difficulties and banquet think you said oh yes </s>
<s> the banquet comes first of course </s>
<s> people never enjoy abstract science you know when they're ravenous with hunger </s>
<s> and then there's the fancy dress ball </s>
<s> oh there'll be lots of entertainment where will the ball come in said the other professor </s>
<s> think it had better come at the beginning of the banquet it brings people together so nicely you know yes that's the right order </s>
<s> first the meeting then the eating then the treating for i'm sure any lecture you give us will be treat said the other professor who had been standing with his back to us all this time occupying himself in taking the books out one by one and turning them upside down </s>
<s> an easel with black board on it stood near him and every time that he turned book upside down he made mark on the board with piece of chalk </s>
<s> and as to the pig tale which you have so kindly promised to give us the professor went on thoughtfully rubbing his chin </s>
<s> think that had better come at the end of the banquet then people can listen to it quietly shall sing it the other professor asked with smile of delight </s>
<s> if you can the professor replied cautiously </s>
<s> let me try said the other professor seating himself at the pianoforte </s>
<s> for the sake of argument let us assume that it begins on flat and he struck the note in question </s>
<s> la la la </s>
<s> think that's within an octave of it he struck the note again and appealed to bruno who was standing at his side </s>
<s> did sing it like that my child no oo didn't bruno replied with great decision </s>
<s> it were more like duck single notes are apt to have that effect the other professor said with sigh </s>
<s> let me try whole verse </s>
<s> there was pig that sat alone beside ruined pump </s>
<s> by day and night he made his moan it would have stirred heart of stone to see him wring his hoofs and groan because he could not jump </s>
<s> would you call that tune professor he asked when he had finished </s>
<s> the professor considered little </s>
<s> well he said at last some of the notes are the same as others and some are different but should hardly call it tune let me try it bit by myself said the other professor </s>
<s> and he began touching the notes here and there and humming to himself like an angry bluebottle </s>
<s> how do you like his singing the professor asked the children in low voice </s>
<s> it isn't very beautiful sylvie said hesitatingly </s>
<s> it's very extremely ugly bruno said without any hesitation at all </s>
<s> all extremes are bad the professor said very gravely </s>
<s> for instance sobriety is very good thing when practised in moderation but even sobriety when carried to an extreme has its disadvantages what are its disadvantages was the question that rose in my mind and as usual bruno asked it for me </s>
<s> what are its lizard bandages well this is one of them said the professor </s>
<s> when man's tipsy that's one extreme you know he sees one thing as two </s>
<s> but when he's extremely sober that's the other extreme he sees two things as one </s>
<s> it's equally inconvenient whichever happens </s>
<s> what does illconvenient mean bruno whispered to sylvie </s>
<s> the difference between convenient and inconvenient is best explained by an example said the other professor who had overheard the question </s>
<s> if you'll just think over any poem that contains the two words such as the professor put his hands over his ears with look of dismay </s>
<s> if you once let him begin poem he said to sylvie he'll never leave off again </s>
<s> he never does did he ever begin poem and not leave off again sylvie enquired </s>
<s> three times said the professor </s>
<s> bruno raised himself on tiptoe till his lips were on level with sylvie's ear </s>
<s> what became of them three poems he whispered </s>
<s> is he saying them all now hush said sylvie </s>
<s> the other professor is speaking i'll say it very quick murmured the other professor with downcast eyes and melancholy voice which contrasted oddly with his face as he had forgotten to leave off smiling </s>
<s> at least it wasn't exactly smile as sylvie said afterwards it looked as if his mouth was made that shape go on then said the professor </s>
<s> what must be must be remember that sylvie whispered to bruno it's very good rule for whenever you hurt yourself and it's very good rule for whenever make noise said the saucy little fellow </s>
<s> so you remember it too miss whatever do you mean said sylvie trying to frown thing she never managed particularly well </s>
<s> oftens and oftens said bruno haven't oo told me there mustn't be so much noise bruno when i've tolded oo there must why there isn't no rules at all about there mustn't </s>
<s> but oo never believes me as if any one could believe you you wicked wicked boy said sylvie </s>
<s> the words were severe enough but am of opinion that when you are really anxious to impress criminal with sense of his guilt you ought not to pronounce the sentence with your lips quite close to his cheek since kiss at the end of it however accidental weakens the effect terribly </s>
<s> chapter </s>
<s> peter and paul </s>
<s> as was saying the other professor resumed if you'll just think over any poem that contains the words such as peter is poor said noble paul and have always been his friend and though my means to give are small at least can afford to lend </s>
<s> how few in this cold age of greed do good except on selfish grounds </s>
<s> but can feel for peter's need and will lend him fifty pounds how great was peter's joy to find his friend in such genial vein </s>
<s> how cheerfully the bond he signed to pay the money back again </s>
<s> we ca'n said paul be too precise tis best to fix the very day so by learned friend's advice i've made it noon the fourth of may </s>
<s> image how cheefully the bond he signed but this is april </s>
<s> peter said </s>
<s> the first of april as think </s>
<s> five little weeks will soon be fled one scarcely will have time to wink </s>
<s> give me year to speculate to buy and sell to drive trade said paul cannot change the date </s>
<s> on may the fourth it must be paid well well said peter with sigh </s>
<s> hand me the cash and will go </s>
<s> i'll form joint stock company and turn an honest pound or so i'm grieved said paul to seem unkind the money shalt of course be lent but for week or two find it will not be convenient so week by week poor peter came and turned in heaviness away for still the answer was the same cannot manage it to day and now the april showers were dry the five short weeks were nearly spent yet still he got the old reply it is not quite convenient the fourth arrived and punctual paul came with his legal friend at noon </s>
<s> thought it best said he to call one cannot settle things too soon poor peter shuddered in despair his flowing locks he wildly tore and very soon his yellow hair was lying all about the floor </s>
<s> the legal friend was standing by with sudden pity half unmanned the tear drop trembled in his eye the signed agreement in his hand but when at length the legal soul resumed its customary force the law he said we ca'n control pay or the law must take its course said paul how bitterly rue that fatal morning when called </s>
<s> consider peter what you do </s>
<s> you won't be richer when you're bald </s>
<s> think you by rending curls away to make your difficulties less </s>
<s> forbear this violence pray you do but add to my distress image poor peter shuddered in despair not willingly would inflict said peter on that noble heart one needless pang </s>
<s> yet why so strict </s>
<s> is this to act friendly part </s>
<s> however legal it may be to pay what never has been lent this style of business seems to me extremely inconvenient </s>
<s> no nobleness of soul have like some that in this age are found paul blushed in sheer humility and cast his eyes upon the ground this debt will simply swallow all and make my life life of woe nay nay nay peter answered paul </s>
<s> you must not rail on fortune so </s>
<s> you have enough to eat and drink you are respected in the world and at the barber's as think you often get your whiskers curled </s>
<s> though nobleness you ca'n attain to any very great extent the path of honesty is plain however inconvenient tis true said peter i'm alive keep my station in the world once in the week just contrive to get my whiskers oiled and curled </s>
<s> but my assets are very low my little income's overspent to trench on capital you know is always inconvenient but pay your debts cried honest paul </s>
<s> my gentle peter pay your debts </s>
<s> what matter if it swallows all that you describe as your assets </s>
<s> already you're an hour behind yet generosity is best </s>
<s> it pinches me but never mind </s>
<s> will not charge you interest how good </s>
<s> how great poor peter cried </s>
<s> yet must sell my sunday wig the scarf pin that has been my pride my grand piano and my pig full soon his property took wings and daily as each treasure went he sighed to find the state of things grow less and less convenient </s>
<s> weeks grew to months and months to years peter was worn to skin and bone and once he even said with tears remember paul that promised loan said paul i'll lend you when can all the spare money have got ah peter you're happy man </s>
<s> yours is an enviable lot </s>
<s> image such boots as these you seldom see i'm getting stout as you may see it is but seldom am well cannot feel my ancient glee in listening to the dinner bell but you you gambol like boy your figure is so spare and light the dinner bell's note of joy to such healthy appetite said peter am well aware mine is state of happiness and yet how gladly could spare some of the comforts possess </s>
<s> what you call healthy appetite feel as hunger's savage tooth and when no dinner is in sight the dinner bell's sound of ruth </s>
<s> no scare crow would accept this coat such boots as these you seldom see </s>
<s> ah paul single five pound note would make another man of me said paul it fills me with surprise to hear you talk in such tone fear you scarcely realise the blessings that are all your own </s>
<s> you're safe from being overfed you're sweetly picturesque in rags you never know the aching head that comes along with money bags and you have time to cultivate that best of qualities content for which you'll find your present state remarkably convenient said peter though cannot sound the depths of such man as you yet in your character i've found an inconsistency or two </s>
<s> you seem to have long years to spare when there's promise to fulfil and yet how punctual you were in calling with that little bill one can't be too deliberate said paul in parting with one's pelf </s>
<s> with bills as you correctly state i'm punctuality itself man may surely claim his dues but when there's money to be lent man must be allowed to choose such times as are convenient it chanced one day as peter sat gnawing crust his usual meal paul bustled in to have chat and grasped his hand with friendly zeal </s>
<s> knew said he your frugal ways so that might not wound your pride by bringing strangers in to gaze i've left my legal friend outside </s>
<s> you well remember am sure when first your wealth began to go and people sneered at one so poor never used my peter so </s>
<s> and when you'd lost your little all and found yourself thing despised need not ask you to recall how tenderly sympathised </s>
<s> then the advice i've poured on you so full of wisdom and of wit all given gratis though tis true might have fairly charged for it </s>
<s> but refrain from mentioning full many deed might relate for boasting is kind of thing that particularly hate </s>

<s> that fifty pounds </s>
<s> you little guessed how deep it drained my slender store but there's heart within this breast and will lend you fifty more not so was peter's mild reply his cheeks all wet with grateful tears no man recalls so well as your services in bygone years and this new offer admit is very very kindly meant still to avail myself of it would not be quite convenient you'll see in moment what the difference is between convenient and inconvenient you quite understand it now don't you he added looking kindly at bruno who was sitting at sylvie's side on the floor </s>

<s> musical gardener </s>

<s> it hasn't got no water in it bruno explained to him pulling his sleeve to attract his attention </s>
<s> it's lighter to hold said the gardener </s>
<s> lot of water in it makes one's arms ache and he went on with his work singing softly to himself the nights are very damp in digging things out of the ground which you probably do now and then the professor began in loud voice in making things into heaps which no doubt you often do and in kicking things about with one heel which you seem never to leave off doing have you ever happened to notice another professor something like me but different never shouted the gardener so loudly and violently that we all drew back in alarm </s>
<s> there ain't such thing we will try less exciting topic the professor mildly remarked to the children </s>

<s> he needn't open the door for us at all </s>
<s> we can go out with you true dear child the professor thankfully replied as he replaced the coins in his pocket </s>
<s> that saves two shillings and he took the children's hands that they might all go out together when the door was opened </s>
<s> this however did not seem very likely event though the gardener patiently tried all the small keys over and over again </s>
<s> at last the professor ventured on gentle suggestion </s>
<s> why not try the large one </s>
<s> have often observed that door unlocks much more nicely with its own key the very first trial of the large key proved success the gardener opened the door and held out his hand for the money </s>
<s> the professor shook his head </s>
<s> you are acting by rule he explained in opening the door for me </s>
<s> and now it's open we are going out by rule the rule of three the gardener looked puzzled and let us go out but as he locked the door behind us we heard him singing thoughtfully to himself he thought he saw garden door that opened with key he looked again and found it was double rule of three and all its mystery he said is clear as day to me shall now return said the professor when we had walked few yards you see it's impossible to read here for all my books are in the house but the children still kept fast hold of his hands </s>

<s> you see left off at comma and it's so awkward not knowing how the sentence finishes </s>
