<s> it wants just little more working out won't that be very tiring to carry yourself sylvie enquired </s>
<s> well no my child </s>
<s> you see whatever fatigue one incurs by carrying one saves by being carried </s>
<s> good bye dears </s>
<s> good bye sir he added to my intense surprise giving my hand an affectionate squeeze </s>
<s> good bye professor replied but my voice sounded strange and far away and the children took not the slightest notice of our farewell </s>
<s> evidently they neither saw me nor heard me as with their arms lovingly twined round each other they marched boldly on </s>
<s> chapter </s>
<s> visit to dogland </s>
<s> there's house away there to the left said sylvie after we had walked what seemed to me about fifty miles </s>
<s> let's go and ask for night's lodging it looks very comfable house bruno said as we turned into the road leading up to it </s>
<s> doos hope the dogs will be kind to us is so tired and hungry mastiff dressed in scarlet collar and carrying musket was pacing up and down like sentinel in front of the entrance </s>
<s> he started on catching sight of the children and came forwards to meet them keeping his musket pointed straight at bruno who stood quite still though he turned pale and kept tight hold of sylvie's hand while the sentinel walked solemnly round and round them and looked at them from all points of view </s>
<s> image the mastiff sentinel oobooh hooh boohooyah he growled at last </s>
<s> woobah yahwah oobooh </s>
<s> bow wahbah woobooyah </s>
<s> bow wow he asked bruno severely </s>
<s> of course bruno understood all this easily enough </s>
<s> all fairies understand doggee that is dog language </s>
<s> but as you may find it little difficult just at first had better put it into english for you </s>
<s> humans verily believe </s>
<s> couple of stray humans </s>
<s> what dog do you belong to </s>
<s> what do you want we don't belong to dog bruno began in doggee </s>
<s> peoples never belongs to dogs he whispered to sylvie but sylvie hastily checked him for fear of hurting the mastiff's feelings </s>
<s> please we want little food and night's lodging if there's room in the house she added timidly </s>
<s> sylvie spoke doggee very prettily but think it's almost better for you to give the conversation in english </s>
<s> the house indeed growled the sentinel </s>
<s> have you never seen palace in your life </s>
<s> come along with me </s>
<s> his majesty must settle what's to be done with you they followed him through the entrance hall down long passage and into magnificent saloon around which were grouped dogs of all sorts and sizes </s>
<s> two splendid blood hounds were solemnly sitting up one on each side of the crown bearer </s>
<s> two or three bull dogs whom guessed to be the body guard of the king were waiting in grim silence in fact the only voices at all plainly audible were those of two little dogs who had mounted settee and were holding lively discussion that looked very like quarrel </s>
<s> lords and ladies in waiting and various court officials our guide gruffly remarked as he led us in </s>
<s> of me the courtiers took no notice whatever but sylvie and bruno were the subject of many inquisitive looks and many whispered remarks of which only distinctly caught one made by sly looking dachshund to his friend bah wooh wahyah hoobah oobooh hah bah she's not such bad looking human is she leaving the new arrivals in the centre of the saloon the sentinel advanced to door at the further end of it which bore an inscription painted on it in doggee royal kennel scratch and yell before doing this the sentinel turned to the children and said give me your names we'd rather not bruno exclaimed pulling sylvie away from the door </s>
<s> we want them ourselves </s>
<s> come back sylvie </s>
<s> come quick nonsense said sylvie very decidedly and gave their names in doggee </s>
<s> then the sentinel scratched violently at the door and gave yell that made bruno shiver from head to foot </s>
<s> hooyah wah said deep voice inside </s>
<s> that's doggee for come in it's the king himself the mastiff whispered in an awestruck tone </s>
<s> take off your wigs and lay them humbly at his paws what we should call at his feet sylvie was just going to explain very politely that really they couldn't perform that ceremony because their wigs wouldn't come off when the door of the royal kennel opened and an enormous newfoundland dog put his head out </s>
<s> bow wow was his first question </s>
<s> when his majesty speaks to you the sentinel hastily whispered to bruno you should prick up your ears bruno looked doubtfully at sylvie </s>
<s> i'd rather not please he said </s>
<s> it would hurt image the dog king it doesn't hurt bit the sentinel said with some indignation </s>
<s> look </s>
<s> it's like this and he pricked up his ears like two railway signals </s>
<s> sylvie gently explained matters </s>
<s> i'm afraid we ca'n manage it she said in low voice </s>
<s> i'm very sorry but our ears haven't got the right she wanted to say machinery in doggee but she had forgotten the word and could only think of steam engine the sentinel repeated sylvie's explanation to the king </s>
<s> can't prick up their ears without steam engine his majesty exclaimed </s>
<s> they must be curious creatures </s>
<s> must have look at them and he came out of his kennel and walked solemnly up to the children </s>
<s> what was the amazement nor to say the horror of the whole assembly when sylvie actually patted his majesty on the head while bruno seized his long ears and pretended to tie them together under his chin </s>
<s> the sentinel groaned aloud beautiful greyhound who appeared to be one of the ladies in waiting fainted away and all the other courtiers hastily drew back and left plenty of room for the huge newfoundland to spring upon the audacious strangers and tear them limb from limb </s>
<s> only he didn't </s>
<s> on the contrary his majesty actually smiled so far as dog can smile and the other dogs couldn't believe their eyes but it was true all the same his majesty wagged his tail </s>
<s> yah </s>
<s> hooh hahwooh that is well </s>
<s> never was the universal cry </s>
<s> his majesty looked round him severely and gave slight growl which produced instant silence </s>
<s> conduct my friends to the banqueting hall he said laying such an emphasis on my friends that several of the dogs rolled over helplessly on their backs and began to lick bruno's feet </s>
<s> procession was formed but only ventured to follow as far as the door of the banqueting hall so furious was the uproar of barking dogs within </s>
<s> so sat down by the king who seemed to have gone to sleep and waited till the children returned to say good night when his majesty got up and shook himself </s>
<s> time for bed he said with sleepy yawn </s>
<s> the attendants will show you your room he added aside to sylvie and bruno </s>
<s> bring lights and with dignified air he held out his paw for them to kiss </s>
<s> but the children were evidently not well practised in court manners </s>
<s> sylvie simply stroked the great paw bruno hugged it the master of the ceremonies looked shocked </s>
<s> all this time dog waiters in splendid livery were running up with lighted candles but as fast as they put them upon the table other waiters ran away with them so that there never seemed to be one for me though the master kept nudging me with his elbow and repeating ca'n let you sleep here </s>
<s> you're not in bed you know made great effort and just succeeded in getting out the words know i'm not </s>
<s> i'm in an arm chair well forty winks will do you no harm the master said and left me </s>
<s> could scarcely hear his words and no wonder he was leaning over the side of ship that was miles away from the pier on which stood </s>
<s> the ship passed over the horizon and sank back into the arm chair </s>
<s> the next thing remember is that it was morning breakfast was just over sylvie was lifting bruno down from high chair and saying to spaniel who was regarding them with most benevolent smile yes thank you we've had very nice breakfast </s>
<s> haven't we bruno there was too many bones in the bruno began but sylvie frowned at him and laid her finger on her lips for at this moment the travelers were waited on by very dignified officer the head growler whose duty it was first to conduct them to the king to bid him farewell and then to escort them to the boundary of dogland </s>
<s> the great newfoundland received them most affably but instead of saying good bye he startled the head growler into giving three savage growls by announcing that he would escort them himself </s>
<s> it is most unusual proceeding your majesty </s>
<s> the head growler exclaimed almost choking with vexation at being set aside for he had put on his best court suit made entirely of cat skins for the occasion </s>
<s> shall escort them myself his majesty repeated gently but firmly laying aside the royal robes and changing his crown for small coronet and you may stay at home are glad bruno whispered to sylvie when they had got well out of hearing </s>
<s> he were so welly cross and he not only patted their royal escort but even hugged him round the neck in the exuberance of his delight </s>
<s> his majesty calmly wagged the royal tail </s>
<s> it's quite relief he said getting away from that palace now and then </s>
<s> royal dogs have dull life of it can tell you </s>
<s> would you mind this to sylvie in low voice and looking little shy and embarrassed would you mind the trouble of just throwing that stick for me to fetch sylvie was too much astonished to do anything for moment it sounded such monstrous impossibility that king should wish to run after stick </s>
<s> but bruno was equal to the occasion and with glad shout of hi then </s>
<s> fetch it good doggie he hurled it over clump of bushes </s>
<s> the next moment the monarch of dogland had bounded over the bushes and picked up the stick and came galloping back to the children with it in his mouth </s>
<s> bruno took it from him with great decision </s>
<s> beg for it he insisted and his majesty begged </s>
<s> paw commanded sylvie and his majesty gave his paw </s>
<s> in short the solemn ceremony of escorting the travelers to the boundaries of dogland became one long uproarious game of play </s>
<s> but business is business the dog king said at last </s>
<s> and must go back to mine </s>
<s> couldn't come any further he added consulting dog watch which hung on chain round his neck not even if there were cat insight they took an affectionate farewell of his majesty and trudged on </s>
<s> that were dear dog bruno exclaimed </s>
<s> has we to go far sylvie </s>
<s> i's tired not much further darling sylvie gently replied </s>
<s> do you see that shining just beyond those trees </s>
<s> i'm almost sure it's the gate of fairyland </s>
<s> know it's all golden father told me so and so bright so bright she went on dreamily </s>
<s> it dazzles said bruno shading his eyes with one little hand while the other clung tightly to sylvie's hand as if he were half alarmed at her strange manner </s>
<s> for the child moved on as if walking in her sleep her large eyes gazing into the far distance and her breath coming and going in quick pantings of eager delight </s>
<s> knew by some mysterious mental light that great change was taking place in my sweet little friend for such loved to think her and that she was passing from the condition of mere outland sprite into the true fairy nature </s>
<s> upon bruno the change came later but it was completed in both before they reached the golden gate through which knew it would be impossible for me to follow </s>
<s> could but stand outside and take last look at the two sweet children ere they disappeared within and the golden gate closed with bang </s>
<s> and with such bang </s>
<s> it never will shut like any other cupboard door arthur explained </s>
<s> there's something wrong with the hinge </s>
<s> however here's the cake and wine </s>
<s> and you've had your forty winks </s>
<s> so you really must get off to bed old man </s>
<s> you're fit for nothing else </s>
<s> witness my hand arthur forester by this time was wide awake again </s>
<s> not quite yet pleaded </s>
<s> really i'm not sleepy now </s>
<s> and it isn't midnight yet well did want to say another word to you arthur replied in relenting tone as he supplied me with the supper he had prescribed </s>
<s> only thought you were too sleepy for it to night we took our midnight meal almost in silence for an unusual nervousness seemed to have seized on my old friend </s>
<s> what kind of night is it he asked rising and undrawing the window curtains apparently to change the subject for minute </s>
<s> followed him to the window and we stood together looking out in silence </s>
<s> when first spoke to you about arthur began after long and embarrassing silence that is when we first talked about her for think it was you that introduced the subject my own position in life forbade me to do more than worship her from distance and was turning over plans for leaving this place finally and settling somewhere out of all chance of meeting her again </s>
<s> that seemed to be my only chance of usefulness in life </s>
<s> would that have been wise said </s>
<s> to leave yourself no hope at all there was no hope to leave arthur firmly replied though his eyes glittered with tears as he gazed upwards into the midnight sky from which one solitary star the glorious vega blazed out in fitful splendour through the driving clouds </s>
<s> she was like that star to me bright beautiful and pure but out of reach out of reach he drew the curtains again and we returned to our places by the fireside </s>
<s> what wanted to tell you was this he resumed </s>
<s> heard this evening from my solicitor </s>
<s> can't go into the details of the business but the upshot is that my worldly wealth is much more than thought and am or shall soon be in position to offer marriage without imprudence to any lady even if she brought nothing </s>
<s> doubt if there would be anything on her side the earl is poor believe </s>
<s> but should have enough for both even if health failed wish you all happiness in your married life cried </s>
<s> shall you speak to the earl to morrow not yet awhile said arthur </s>
<s> he is very friendly but dare not think he means more than that as yet </s>
<s> and as for as for lady muriel try as may cannot read her feelings towards me </s>
<s> if there is love she is hiding it </s>
<s> no must wait must wait did not like to press any further advice on my friend whose judgment felt was so much more sober and thoughtful than my own and we parted without more words on the subject that had now absorbed his thoughts nay his very life </s>
<s> the next morning letter from my solicitor arrived summoning me to town on important business </s>
<s> chapter </s>
<s> fairy sylvle </s>
<s> for full month the business for which had returned to london detained me there and even then it was only the urgent advice of my physician that induced me to leave it unfinished and pay another visit to elveston </s>
<s> arthur had written once or twice during the month but in none of his letters was there any mention of lady muriel </s>
<s> still did not augur ill from his silence to me it looked like the natural action of lover who even while his heart was singing she is mine would fear to paint his happiness in the cold phrases of written letter but would wait to tell it by word of mouth </s>
<s> yes thought am to hear his song of triumph from his own lips the night arrived we had much to say on other matters and tired with the journey went to bed early leaving the happy secret still untold </s>
<s> next day however as we chatted on over the remains of luncheon ventured to put the momentous question </s>
<s> well old friend you have told me nothing of lady muriel nor when the happy day is to be the happy day arthur said looking unexpectedly grave is yet in the dim future </s>
<s> we need to know or rather she needs to know me better </s>
<s> know her sweet nature thoroughly by this time </s>
<s> but dare not speak till am sure that my love is returned don't wait too long said gaily </s>
<s> faint heart never won fair lady it is faint heart perhaps </s>
<s> but really dare not speak just yet but meanwhile pleaded you are running risk that perhaps you have not thought of </s>
<s> some other man no said arthur firmly </s>
<s> she is heart whole am sure of that </s>
<s> yet if she loves another better than me so be it </s>
<s> will not spoil her happiness </s>
<s> the secret shall die with me </s>
<s> but she is my first and my only love that is all very beautiful sentiment said but it is not practical </s>
<s> it is not like you </s>
<s> he either fears his fate too much or his desert is small who dares not put it to the touch to win or lose it all dare not ask the question whether there is another he said passionately </s>
<s> it would break my heart to know it yet is it wise to leave it unasked </s>
<s> you must not waste your life upon an if tell you dare not may find it out for you asked with the freedom of an old friend </s>
<s> no no he replied with pained look </s>
<s> entreat you to say nothing </s>
<s> let it wait as you please said and judged it best to say no more just then </s>
<s> but this evening thought will call on the earl </s>
<s> may be able to see how the land lies without so much as saying word it was very hot afternoon too hot to go for walk or do anything or else it wouldn't have happened believe </s>
<s> in the first place want to know dear child who reads this why fairies should always be teaching us to do our duty and lecturing us when we go wrong and we should never teach them anything </s>
<s> you can't mean to say that fairies are never greedy or selfish or cross or deceitful because that would be nonsense you know </s>
<s> well then don't you think they might be all the better for little lecturing and punishing now and then </s>
<s> really don't see why it shouldn't be tried and i'm almost sure that if you could only catch fairy and put it in the corner and give it nothing but bread and water for day or two you'd find it quite an improved character it would take down its conceit little at all events </s>
<s> the next question is what is the best time for seeing fairies </s>
<s> believe can tell you all about that </s>
<s> the first rule is that it must be very hot day that we may consider as settled and you must be just little sleepy but not too sleepy to keep your eyes open mind </s>
<s> well and you ought to feel little what one may call fairyish the scotch call it eerie and perhaps that's prettier word if you don't know what it means i'm afraid can hardly explain it you must wait till you meet fairy and then you'll know </s>
<s> and the last rule is that the crickets should not be chirping </s>
<s> can't stop to explain that you must take it on trust for the present </s>
<s> so if all these things happen together you have good chance of seeing fairy or at least much better chance than if they didn't </s>
<s> the first thing noticed as went lazily along through an open place in the wood was large beetle lying struggling on its back and went down upon one knee to help the poor thing to its feet again </s>
<s> in some things you know you ca'n be quite sure what an insect would like for instance never could quite settle supposing were moth whether would rather be kept out of the candle or be allowed to fly straight in and get burnt or again supposing were spider i'm not sure if should be quite pleased to have my web torn down and the fly let loose but feel quite certain that if were beetle and had rolled over on my back should always be glad to be helped up again </s>
<s> so as was saying had gone down upon one knee and was just reaching out little stick to turn the beetle over when saw sight that made me draw back hastily and hold my breath for fear of making any noise and frightening the little creature way </s>
<s> not that she looked as if she would be easily frightened she seemed so good and gentle that i'm sure she would never expect that any one could wish to hurt her </s>
<s> she was only few inches high and was dressed in green so that you really would hardly have noticed her among the long grass and she was so delicate and graceful that she quite seemed to belong to the place almost as if she were one of the flowers </s>
<s> may tell you besides that she had no wings don't believe in fairies with wings and that she had quantities of long brown hair and large earnest brown eyes and then shall have done all can to give you an idea of her </s>
<s> image fairy sylvie sylvie found out her name afterwards had knelt down just as was doing to help the beetle but it needed more than little stick for her to get it on its legs again it was as much as she could do with both arms to roll the heavy thing over and all the while she was talking to it half scolding and half comforting as nurse might do with child that had fallen down </s>
<s> there there </s>
<s> you needn't cry so much about it </s>
<s> you're not killed yet though if you were you couldn't cry you know and so it's general rule against crying my dear </s>
<s> and how did you come to tumble over </s>
<s> but can see well enough how it was needn't ask you that walking over sand pits with your chin in the air as usual </s>
<s> of course if you go among sand pits like that you must expect to tumble </s>
<s> you should look the beetle murmured something that sounded like did look and sylvie went on again </s>
<s> but know you didn't </s>
<s> you never do </s>
<s> you always walk with your chin up you're so dreadfully conceited </s>
<s> well let's see how many legs are broken this time </s>
<s> why none of them declare </s>
<s> and what's the good of having six legs my dear if you can only kick them all about in the air when you tumble </s>
<s> legs are meant to walk with you know </s>
<s> now don't begin putting out your wings yet i've more to say </s>
<s> go to the frog that lives behind that buttercup give him my compliments sylvie's compliments can you say compliments the beetle tried and suppose succeeded </s>
<s> yes that's right </s>
<s> and tell him he's to give you some of that salve left with him yesterday </s>
<s> and you'd better get him to rub it in for you </s>
<s> he's got rather cold hands but you mustn't mind that think the beetle must have shuddered at this idea for sylvie went on in graver tone </s>
<s> now you needn't pretend to be so particular as all that as if you were too grand to be rubbed by frog </s>
<s> the fact is you ought to be very much obliged to him </s>
<s> suppose you could get nobody but toad to do it how would you like that there was little pause and then sylvie added now you may go </s>
<s> be good beetle and don't keep your chin in the air and then began one of those performances of humming and whizzing and restless banging about such as beetle indulges in when it has decided on flying but hasn't quite made up its mind which way to go </s>
<s> at last in one of its awkward zigzags it managed to fly right into my face and by the time had recovered from the shock the little fairy was gone </s>
<s> looked about in all directions for the little creature but there was no trace of her and my eerie feeling was quite gone off and the crickets were chirping again merrily so knew she was really gone </s>
<s> and now i've got time to tell you the rule about the crickets </s>
<s> they always leave off chirping when fairy goes by because fairy's kind of queen over them suppose at all events it's much grander thing than cricket so whenever you're walking out and the crickets suddenly leave off chirping you may be sure that they see fairy </s>
<s> walked on sadly enough you may be sure </s>
<s> however comforted myself with thinking it's been very wonderful afternoon so far </s>
<s> i'll just go quietly on and look about me and shouldn't wonder if were to come across another fairy somewhere peering about in this way happened to notice plant with rounded leaves and with queer little holes cut in the middle of several of them </s>
<s> ah the leafcutter bee carelessly remarked you know am very learned in natural history for instance can always tell kittens from chickens at one glance and was passing on when sudden thought made me stoop down and examine the leaves </s>
<s> then little thrill of delight ran through me for noticed that the holes were all arranged so as to form letters there were three leaves side by side with and marked on them and after some search found two more which contained an and an and then all in moment flash of inner light seemed to illumine part of my life that had all but faded into oblivion the strange visions had experienced during my journey to elveston and with thrill of delight thought those visions are destined to be linked with my waking life by this time the eerie feeling had come back again and suddenly observed that no crickets were chirping so felt quite sure that bruno was somewhere very near </s>
<s> and so indeed he was so near that had very nearly walked over him without seeing him which would have been dreadful always supposing that fairies can be walked over my own belief is that they are something of the nature of will the wisps and there's no walking over them </s>
<s> think of any pretty little boy you know with rosy cheeks large dark eyes and tangled brown hair and then fancy him made small enough to go comfortably into coffee cup and you'll have very fair idea of him </s>
<s> what's your name little one began in as soft voice as could manage </s>
<s> and by the way why is it we always begin by asking little children their names </s>
<s> is it because we fancy name will help to make them little bigger </s>
<s> you never thought of as king real large man his name now did you </s>
<s> but however that may be felt it quite necessary to know his name so as he didn't answer my question asked it again little louder </s>
<s> what's your name my little man what's oors he said without looking up </s>
<s> told him my name quite gently for he was much too small to be angry with </s>
<s> duke of anything he asked just looking at me for moment and then going on with his work </s>
<s> not duke at all said little ashamed of having to confess it </s>
<s> oo're big enough to be two dukes said the little creature </s>
<s> suppose oo're sir something then no said feeling more and more ashamed </s>
<s> haven't got any title the fairy seemed to think that in that case really wasn't worth the trouble of talking to for he quietly went on digging and tearing the flowers to pieces </s>
<s> after few minutes tried again </s>
<s> please tell me what your name is bruno the little fellow answered very readily </s>
<s> why didn't oo say please before that's something like what we used to be taught in the nursery thought to myself looking back through the long years about hundred of them since you ask the question to the time when was little child </s>
<s> and here an idea came into my head and asked him aren't you one of the fairies that teach children to be good well we have to do that sometimes said bruno and dreadful bother it is as he said this he savagely tore heartsease in two and trampled on the pieces </s>
<s> what are you doing there bruno said </s>
<s> spoiling sylvie's garden was all the answer bruno would give at first </s>
<s> but as he went on tearing up the flowers he muttered to himself the nasty cross thing wouldn't let me go and play this morning said must finish my lessons first lessons indeed </s>
<s> i'll vex her finely though oh bruno you shouldn't do that cried </s>
<s> don't you know that's revenge </s>
<s> and revenge is wicked cruel dangerous thing river edge said bruno </s>
<s> what funny word </s>
<s> suppose oo call it cruel and dangerous cause if oo wented too far and tumbleded in oo'd get drownded no not river edge explained revenge saying the word very slowly </s>
<s> but couldn't help thinking that bruno's explanation did very well for either word </s>
<s> oh said bruno opening his eyes very wide but without trying to repeat the word </s>
<s> come </s>
<s> try and pronounce it bruno said cheerfully </s>
<s> re venge re venge but bruno only tossed his little head and said he couldn't that his mouth wasn't the right shape for words of that kind </s>
<s> and the more laughed the more sulky the little fellow got about it </s>
<s> well never mind my little man said </s>
<s> shall help you with that job yes please bruno said quite pacified </s>
<s> only wiss could think of somefin to vex her more than this </s>
<s> oo don't know how hard it is to make her angry now listen to me bruno and i'll teach you quite splendid kind of revenge somefin that'll vex her finely he asked with gleaming eyes </s>
<s> something that will vex her finely </s>
<s> first we'll get up all the weeds in her garden </s>
<s> see there are good many at this end quite hiding the flowers but that won't vex her said bruno </s>
<s> after that said without noticing the remark we'll water this highest bed up here </s>
<s> you see it's getting quite dry and dusty bruno looked at me inquisitively but he said nothing this time </s>
<s> then after that went on the walks want sweeping bit and think you might cut down that tall nettle it's so close to the garden that it's quite in the way what is oo talking about bruno impatiently interrupted me </s>
<s> all that won't vex her bit won't it said innocently </s>
<s> then after that suppose we put in some of these coloured pebbles just to mark the divisions between the different kinds of flowers you know </s>
<s> that'll have very pretty effect bruno turned round and had another good stare at me </s>
<s> at last there came an odd little twinkle into his eyes and he said with quite new meaning in his voice that'll do nicely </s>
<s> let's put em in rows all the red together and all the blue together </s>
<s> that'll do capitally said and then what kind of flowers does sylvie like best bruno had to put his thumb in his mouth and consider little before he could answer </s>
<s> violets he said at last </s>
<s> there's beautiful bed of violets down by the brook oh let's fetch em cried bruno giving little skip into the air </s>
<s> here </s>
<s> catch hold of my hand and i'll help oo along </s>
<s> the grass is rather thick down that way couldn't help laughing at his having so entirely forgotten what big creature he was talking to </s>
<s> no not yet bruno said we must consider what's the right thing to do first </s>
<s> you see we've got quite business before us yes let's consider said bruno putting his thumb into his mouth again and sitting down upon dead mouse </s>
<s> what do you keep that mouse for said </s>
<s> you should either bury it or else throw it into the brook why it's to measure with cried bruno </s>
<s> how ever would oo do garden without one </s>
<s> we make each bed three mouses and half long and two mouses wide stopped him as he was dragging it off by the tail to show me how it was used for was half afraid the eerie feeling might go off before we had finished the garden and in that case should see no more of him or sylvie </s>
<s> think the best way will be for you to weed the beds while sort out these pebbles ready to mark the walks with that's it cried bruno </s>
<s> and i'll tell oo about the caterpillars while we work ah let's hear about the caterpillars said as drew the pebbles together into heap and began dividing them into colours </s>
<s> and bruno went on in low rapid tone more as if he were talking to himself </s>
<s> yesterday saw two little caterpillars when was sitting by the brook just where oo go into the wood </s>
<s> they were quite green and they had yellow eyes and they didn't see me </s>
<s> and one of them had got moth's wing to carry great brown moth's wing oo know all dry with feathers </s>
<s> so he couldn't want it to eat should think perhaps he meant to make cloak for the winter perhaps said for bruno had twisted up the last word into sort of question and was looking at me for an answer </s>
<s> one word was quite enough for the little fellow and he went on merrily </s>
<s> well and so he didn't want the other caterpillar to see the moth's wing oo know so what must he do but try to carry it with all his left legs and he tried to walk on the other set </s>
<s> of course he toppled over after that after what said catching at the last word for to tell the truth hadn't been attending much </s>
<s> he toppled over bruno repeated very gravely and if oo ever saw caterpillar topple over oo'd know it's welly serious thing and not sit grinning like that and sha'n tell oo no more indeed and indeed bruno didn't mean to grin </s>
<s> see i'm quite grave again now but bruno only folded his arms and said don't tell me </s>
<s> see little twinkle in one of oor eyes just like the moon why do you think i'm like the moon bruno asked </s>
<s> oor face is large and round like the moon bruno answered looking at me thoughtfully </s>
<s> it doosn't shine quite so bright but it's more cleaner couldn't help smiling at this </s>
<s> you know sometimes wash my face bruno </s>
<s> the moon never does that oh doosn't she though cried bruno and he leant forwards and added in solemn whisper the moon's face gets dirtier and dirtier every night till it's black all across </s>
<s> and then when it's dirty all over so he passed his hand across his own rosy cheeks as he spoke then she washes it then it's all clean again isn't it not all in moment said bruno </s>
<s> what deal of teaching oo wants </s>
<s> she washes it little by little only she begins at the other edge oo know by this time he was sitting quietly on the dead mouse with his arms folded and the weeding wasn't getting on bit so had to say work first pleasure afterwards no more talking till that bed's finished chapter </s>
<s> bruno's revenge </s>
<s> after that we had few minutes of silence while sorted out the pebbles and amused myself with watching bruno's plan of gardening </s>
<s> it was quite new plan to me he always measured each bed before he weeded it as if he was afraid the weeding would make it shrink and once when it came out longer than he wished he set to work to thump the mouse with his little fist crying out there now </s>
<s> it's all gone wrong again </s>
<s> why don't oo keep oor tail straight when tell oo i'll tell you what i'll do bruno said in half whisper as we worked </s>
<s> oo like fairies don't oo yes said of course do or shouldn't have come here </s>
<s> should have gone to some place where there are no fairies bruno laughed contemptuously </s>
<s> why oo might as well say oo'd go to some place where there wasn't any air supposing oo didn't like air this was rather difficult idea to grasp </s>
<s> tried change of subject </s>
<s> you're nearly the first fairy ever saw </s>
<s> have you ever seen any people besides me plenty said bruno </s>
<s> we see'em when we walk in the road but they ca'n see you </s>
<s> how is it they never tread on you ca'n tread on us said bruno looking amused at my ignorance </s>
<s> why suppose oo're walking here so making little marks on the ground and suppose there's fairy that's me walking here </s>

<s> and bruno tossed his head and said in rather offended tone that might do as pleased there were many he knew that would give their ears to go </s>
<s> have you ever been yourself bruno they invited me once last week bruno said very gravely </s>
<s> it was to wash up the soup plates no the cheese plates mean that was grand enough </s>
<s> and waited at table </s>
<s> and didn't hardly make only one mistake what was it said </s>
<s> you needn't mind telling me only bringing scissors to cut the beef with bruno said carelessly </s>
<s> but the grandest thing of all was fetched the king glass of cider that was grand said biting my lip to keep myself from laughing </s>
<s> wasn't it said bruno very earnestly </s>
<s> oo know it isn't every one that's had such an honour as that this set me thinking of the various queer things we call an honour in this world but which after all haven't bit more honour in them than what bruno enjoyed when he took the king glass of cider </s>
<s> don't know how long might not have dreamed on in this way if bruno hadn't suddenly roused me </s>
<s> oh come here quick he cried in state of the wildest excitement </s>
<s> catch hold of his other horn </s>
<s> ca'n hold him more than minute he was struggling desperately with great snail clinging to one of its horns and nearly breaking his poor little back in his efforts to drag it over blade of grass </s>
<s> saw we should have no more gardening if let this sort of thing go on so quietly took the snail away and put it on bank where he couldn't reach it </s>
<s> we'll hunt it afterwards bruno said if you really want to catch it </s>
<s> but what's the use of it when you've got it what's the use of fox when oo've got it said bruno </s>
<s> know oo big things hunt foxes tried to think of some good reason why big things should hunt foxes and he should not hunt snails but none came into my head so said at last well suppose one's as good as the other </s>
<s> i'll go snail hunting myself some day should think oo wouldn't be so silly said bruno as to go snail hunting by oor self </s>
<s> why oo'd never get the snail along if oo hadn't somebody to hold on to his other horn of course sha'n go alone said quite gravely </s>
<s> by the way is that the best kind to hunt or do you recommend the ones without shells oh no we never hunt the ones without shells bruno said with little shudder at the thought of it </s>
<s> they're always so cross about it and then if oo tumbles over them they're ever so sticky by this time we had nearly finished the garden </s>
<s> had fetched some violets and bruno was just helping me to put in the last when he suddenly stopped and said i'm tired rest then said can go on without you quite well bruno needed no second invitation he at once began arranging the dead mouse as kind of sofa </s>
<s> and i'll sing oo little song he said as he rolled it about </s>
<s> do said like songs very much which song will oo choose bruno said as he dragged the mouse into place where he could get good view of me </s>
<s> ting ting ting is the nicest there was no resisting such strong hint as this however pretended to think about it for moment and then said well like ting ting ting best of all image bruno's revenge that shows oo're good judge of music bruno said with pleased look </s>
<s> how many hare bells would oo like and he put his thumb into his mouth to help me to consider </s>
<s> as there was only one cluster of hare bells within easy reach said very gravely that thought one would do this time and picked it and gave it to him </s>
<s> bruno ran his hand once or twice up and down the flowers like musician trying an instrument producing most delicious delicate tinkling as he did so </s>
<s> had never heard flower music before don't think one can unless one's in the eerie state and don't know quite how to give you an idea of what it was like except by saying that it sounded like peal of bells thousand miles off </s>
<s> when he had satisfied himself that the flowers were in tune he seated himself on the dead mouse he never seemed really comfortable anywhere else and looking up at me with merry twinkle in his eyes he began </s>
<s> by the way the tune was rather curious one and you might like to try it for yourself so here are the notes </s>
<s> image music for hare bells rise oh rise </s>
<s> the daylight dies the owls are hooting ting ting ting </s>
<s> wake oh wake </s>
<s> beside the lake the elves are fluting ting ting ting </s>
<s> welcoming our fairy king we sing sing sing he sang the first four lines briskly and merrily making the hare bells chime in time with the music but the last two he sang quite slowly and gently and merely waved the flowers backwards and forwards </s>
<s> then he left off to explain </s>
<s> the fairy king is oberon and he lives across the lake and sometimes he comes in little boat and we go and meet him and then we sing this song you know and then you go and dine with him said mischievously </s>
<s> oo shouldn't talk bruno hastily said it interrupts the song so said wouldn't do it again </s>
<s> never talk myself when i'm singing he went on very gravely so oo shouldn't either then he tuned the hare bells once more and sang hear oh hear </s>
<s> from far and near the music stealing ting ting ting </s>
<s> fairy belts adown the dells are merrily pealing ting ting ting </s>
<s> welcoming our fairy king we ring ring ring </s>
<s> see oh see </s>
<s> on every tree what lamps are shining ting ting ting </s>
<s> they are eyes of fiery flies to light our dining ting ting ting </s>
<s> welcoming our fairy king they swing swing swing </s>
<s> haste oh haste to take and taste the dainties waiting ting ting ting </s>

<s> she's coming bruno checked his song and as she slowly made her way through the long grass he suddenly rushed out headlong at her like little bull shouting look the other way </s>
<s> look the other way which way sylvie asked in rather frightened tone as she looked round in all directions to see where the danger could be </s>
<s> that way said bruno carefully turning her round with her face to the wood </s>

<s> but he was far too much excited to think of what he was doing </s>

<s> sylvie was silent she only stood and gazed with her hands clasped together and was half afraid she didn't like it after all </s>
<s> bruno too was watching her anxiously and when she jumped down off the mound and began wandering up and down the little walks he cautiously followed her about evidently anxious that she should form her own opinion of it all without any hint from him </s>
<s> and when at last she drew long breath and gave her verdict in hurried whisper and without the slightest regard to grammar it's the loveliest thing as never saw in all my life before the little fellow looked as well pleased as if it had been given by all the judges and juries in england put together </s>
<s> and did you really do it all by yourself bruno said sylvie </s>
<s> and all for me was helped bit bruno began with merry little laugh at her surprise </s>
<s> we've been at it all the afternoon thought oo'd like and here the poor little fellow's lip began to quiver and all in moment he burst out crying and running up to sylvie he flung his arms passionately round her neck and hid his face on her shoulder </s>

<s> at last he got out the words liked putting in the flowers for oo sylvie and never was so happy before and the rosy little face came up at last to be kissed all wet with tears as it was </s>
<s> sylvie was crying too by this time and she said nothing but bruno dear and never was so happy before though why these two children who had never been so happy before should both be crying was mystery to me </s>
<s> felt very happy too but of course didn't cry big things never do you know we leave all that to the fairies </s>
<s> only think it must have been raining little just then for found drop or two on my cheeks </s>
<s> after that they went through the whole garden again flower by flower as if it were long sentence they were spelling out with kisses for commas and great hug by way of full stop when they got to the end </s>
<s> doos oo know that was my river edge sylvie bruno solemnly began </s>

<s> what do you mean she said </s>

<s> changed crocodile </s>
<s> the marvellous the mysterious had quite passed out of my life for the moment and the common place reigned supreme </s>
<s> turned in the direction of the earl's house as it was now the witching hour of five and knew should find them ready for cup of tea and quiet chat </s>
<s> lady muriel and her father gave me delightfully warm welcome </s>
<s> they were not of the folk we meet in fashionable drawing rooms who conceal all such feelings as they may chance to possess beneath the impenetrable mask of conventional placidity </s>
<s> the man with the iron mask was no doubt rarity and marvel in his own age in modern london no one would turn his head to give him second look </s>

<s> still more dreamily found myself following this imperious voice into room where the earl his daughter and arthur were seated </s>

<s> there was no need for me to maintain the conversation </s>
<s> lady muriel and arthur were evidently on those most delightful of terms where one has no need to check thought after thought as it rises to the lips with the fear this will not be appreciated this will give offence this will sound too serious this will sound flippant like very old friends in fullest sympathy their talk rippled on </s>
<s> why shouldn't we desert the picnic and go in some other direction she suddenly suggested </s>

<s> watts who has asked the senseless question why should deprive my neighbour of his goods against his will fancy that as an argument for honesty </s>
<s> his position seems to be i'm only honest because see no reason to steal and the thief's answer is of course complete and crushing </s>
<s> deprive my neighbour of his goods because want them myself </s>
<s> and do it against his will because there's no chance of getting him to consent to it can give you one other exception said an argument heard only to day and not by lady </s>

<s> wouldn't have minded his criticizing the pictures himself but had to agree with him or else to argue the point which would have been worse it was depreciatory criticism of course said arthur </s>
<s> don't see the of course at all why did you ever know conceited man dare to praise picture </s>
<s> the one thing he dreads next to not being noticed is to be proved fallible </s>
<s> if you once praise picture your character for infallibility hangs by thread </s>
<s> suppose it's figure picture and you venture to say draws well somebody measures it and finds one of the proportions an eighth of an inch wrong </s>
<s> you are disposed of as critic </s>
<s> did you say he draws well your friends enquire sarcastically while you hang your head and blush </s>
<s> no </s>
<s> the only safe course if any one says draws well is to shrug your shoulders </s>
<s> draws well you repeat thoughtfully </s>
<s> draws well </s>
<s> humph that's the way to become great critic thus airily chatting after pleasant drive through few miles of beautiful scenery we reached the rendezvous ruined castle where the rest of the picnic party were already assembled </s>
<s> we spent an hour or two in sauntering about the ruins gathering at last by common consent into few random groups seated on the side of mound which commanded good view of the old castle and its surroundings </s>
<s> the momentary silence that ensued was promptly taken possession of or more correctly taken into custody by voice voice so smooth so monotonous so sonorous that one felt with shudder that any other conversation was precluded and that unless some desperate remedy were adopted we were fated to listen to lecture of which no man could foresee the end </s>
<s> the speaker was broadly built man whose large flat pale face was bounded on the north by fringe of hair on the east and west by fringe of whisker and on the south by fringe of beard the whole constituting uniform halo of stubbly whitey brown bristles </s>
<s> his features were so entirely destitute of expression that could not help saying to myself helplessly as if in the clutches of night mare they are only penciled in no final touches as yet and he had way of ending every sentence with sudden smile which spread like ripple over that vast blank surface and was gone in moment leaving behind it such absolute solemnity that felt impelled to murmur it was not he it was somebody else that smiled do you observe such was the phrase with which the wretch began each sentence do you observe the way in which that broken arch at the very top of the ruin stands out against the clear sky </s>
<s> it is placed exactly right and there is exactly enough of it </s>
<s> little more or little less and all would be utterly spoiled image lecture on art oh gifted architect murmured arthur inaudibly to all but lady muriel and myself </s>
<s> foreseeing the exact effect his work would have when in ruins centuries after his death and do you observe where those trees slope down the hill indicating them with sweep of the hand and with all the patronising air of the man who has himself arranged the landscape how the mists rising from the river fill up exactly those intervals where we need indistinctness for artistic effect </s>
<s> here in the foreground few clear touches are not amiss but back ground without mist you know </s>
<s> it is simply barbarous </s>
<s> yes we need indistinctness the orator looked so pointedly at me as he uttered these words that felt bound to reply by murmuring something to the effect that hardly felt the need myself and that enjoyed looking at thing better when could see it </s>
<s> quite so the great man sharply took me up </s>
<s> from your point of view that is correctly put </s>

<s> nature is one thing </s>

<s> but art as latin author tells us art you know the words have escaped my memory ars est celare naturam arthur interposed with delightful promptitude </s>
<s> quite so the orator replied with an air of relief </s>
<s> thank you </s>
<s> ars est celare naturam but that isn't it and for few peaceful moments the orator brooded frowningly over the quotation </s>
<s> the welcome opportunity was seized and another voice struck into the silence </s>
<s> what lovely old ruin it is cried young lady in spectacles the very embodiment of the march of mind looking at lady muriel as the proper recipient of all really original remarks </s>

<s> oh yes indeed indeed </s>

<s> oh yes </s>

<s> what beautiful fact </s>
<s> but how is it proved thus replied arthur with all the gravity of ten professors rolled into one </s>
<s> what we call the vertex of the brain is really its base and what we call its base is really its vertex it is simply question of nomenclature this last polysyllable settled the matter </s>
<s> how truly delightful the fair scientist exclaimed with enthusiasm </s>
<s> shall ask our physiological lecturer why he never gave us that exquisite theory i'd give something to be present when the question is asked arthur whispered to me as at signal from lady muriel we moved on to where the hampers had been collected and devoted ourselves to the more substantial business of the day </s>
<s> we waited on ourselves as the modern barbarism combining two good things in such way as to secure the discomforts of both and the advantages of neither of having picnic with servants to wait upon you had not yet reached this out of the way region and of course the gentlemen did not even take their places until the ladies had been duly provided with all imaginable creature comforts </s>

<s> arthur was bearing it bravely but several faces wore look of alarm and thought it high time to start some less metaphysical topic </s>
<s> in my nursery days began when the weather didn't suit for an out of doors picnic we were allowed to have peculiar kind that we enjoyed hugely </s>

<s> the week passed without any further communication with the hall as arthur was evidently fearful that we might wear out our welcome but when on sunday morning we were setting out for church gladly agreed to his proposal to go round and enquire after the earl who was said to be unwell </s>

<s> then he said to himself almost inaudibly where two or three are gathered together in my name there am in the midst of them yes assented no doubt that is the principle on which church going rests and when he does go he continued our thoughts ran so much together that our conversation was often slightly elliptical suppose he repeats the words believe in the communion of saints but by this time we had reached the little church into which goodly stream of worshipers consisting mainly of fishermen and their families was flowing </s>
<s> the service would have been pronounced by any modern aesthetic religionist or religious aesthete which is it to be crude and cold to me coming fresh from the ever advancing developments of london church under soi disant catholic rector it was unspeakably refreshing </s>
<s> there was no theatrical procession of demure little choristers trying their best not to simper under the admiring gaze of the congregation the people's share in the service was taken by the people themselves unaided except that few good voices judiciously posted here and there among them kept the singing from going too far astray </s>
<s> there was no murdering of the noble music contained in the bible and the liturgy by its recital in dead monotone with no more expression than mechanical talking doll </s>
<s> no the prayers were prayed the lessons were read and best of all the sermon was talked and found myself repeating as we left the church the words of jacob when he awaked out of his sleep surely the lord is in this place </s>
<s> this is none other but the house of god and this is the gate of heaven yes said arthur apparently in answer to my thoughts those high services are fast becoming pure formalism </s>
<s> more and more the people are beginning to regard them as performances in which they only assist in the french sense </s>
<s> and it is specially bad for the little boys </s>
<s> they'd be much less self conscious as pantomime fairies </s>
<s> with all that dressing up and stagy entrances and exits and being always en evidence no wonder if they're eaten up with vanity the blatant little coxcombs when we passed the hall on our return we found the earl and lady muriel sitting out in the garden </s>
<s> eric had gone for stroll </s>
<s> we joined them and the conversation soon turned on the sermon we had just heard the subject of which was selfishness what change has come over our pulpits arthur remarked since the time when paley gave that utterly selfish definition of virtue the doing good to mankind in obedience to the will of god and for the sake of everlasting happiness lady muriel looked at him enquiringly but she seemed to have learned by intuition what years of experience had taught me that the way to elicit arthur's deepest thoughts was neither to assent nor dissent but simply to listen </s>
<s> at that time he went on great tidal wave of selfishness was sweeping over human thought </s>
<s> right and wrong had somehow been transformed into gain and loss and religion had become sort of commercial transaction </s>
<s> we may be thankful that our preachers are beginning to take nobler view of life but is it not taught again and again in the bible ventured to ask </s>
<s> not in the bible as whole said arthur </s>
<s> in the old testament no doubt rewards and punishments are constantly appealed to as motives for action </s>
<s> that teaching is best for children and the israelites seem to have been mentally utter children </s>
<s> we guide our children thus at first but we appeal as soon as possible to their innate sense of right and wrong and when that stage is safely past we appeal to the highest motive of all the desire for likeness to and union with the supreme good </s>
<s> think you will find that to be the teaching of the bible as whole beginning with that thy days may be long in the land and ending with be ye perfect even as your father which is in heaven is perfect we were silent for awhile and then arthur went off on another tack </s>
<s> look at the literature of hymns now </s>
<s> how cankered it is through and through with selfishness </s>
<s> there are few human compositions more utterly degraded than some modern hymns quoted the stanza whatever lord we tend to thee repaid thousandfold shall be then gladly will we give to thee giver of all yes he said grimly that is the typical stanza </s>
<s> and the very last charity sermon heard was infected with it </s>
<s> after giving many good reasons for charity the preacher wound up with and for all you give you will be repaid thousandfold oh the utter meanness of such motive to be put before men who do know what self sacrifice is who can appreciate generosity and heroism </s>
<s> talk of original sin he went on with increasing bitterness </s>
<s> can you have stronger proof of the original goodness there must be in this nation than the fact that religion has been preached to us as commercial speculation for century and that we still believe in god it couldn't have gone on so long lady muriel musingly remarked if the opposition hadn't been practically silenced put under what the french call la cloture </s>
<s> surely in any lecture hall or in private society such teaching would soon have been hooted down trust so said arthur and though don't want to see brawling in church legalised must say that our preachers enjoy an enormous privilege which they ill deserve and which they misuse terribly </s>
<s> we put our man into pulpit and we virtually tell him now you may stand there and talk to us for half an hour </s>
<s> we won't interrupt you by so much as word </s>
<s> you shall have it all your own way and what does he give us in return </s>
<s> shallow twaddle that if it were addressed to you over dinner table you would think does the man take me for fool the return of eric from his walk checked the tide of arthur's eloquence and after few minutes talk on more conventional topics we took our leave </s>
<s> lady muriel walked with us to the gate </s>
<s> you have given me much to think about she said earnestly as she gave arthur her hand </s>
<s> i'm so glad you came in and her words brought real glow of pleasure into that pale worn face of his </s>
<s> on the tuesday as arthur did not seem equal to more walking took long stroll by myself having stipulated that he was not to give the whole day to his books but was to meet me at the hall at about tea time </s>
<s> on my way back passed the station just as the afternoon train came in sight and sauntered down the stairs to see it come in </s>
<s> but there was little to gratify my idle curiosity and when the train was empty and the platform clear found it was about time to be moving on if meant to reach the hall by five </s>
<s> as approached the end of the platform from which steep irregular wooden staircase conducted to the upper world noticed two passengers who had evidently arrived by the train but who oddly enough had entirely escaped my notice though the arrivals had been so few </s>
<s> they were young woman and little girl the former so far as one could judge by appearances was nursemaid or possibly nursery governess in attendance on the child whose refined face even more than her dress distinguished her as of higher class than her companion </s>
<s> the child's face was refined but it was also worn and sad one and told tale or so seemed to read it of much illness and suffering sweetly and patiently borne </s>
<s> she had little crutch to help herself along with and she was now standing looking wistfully up the long staircase and apparently waiting till she could muster courage to begin the toilsome ascent </s>
<s> there are some things one says in life as well as things one does which come automatically by reflex action as the physiologists say meaning no doubt action without reflection just as lucus is said to be derived non lucendo </s>
<s> closing one's eyelids when something seems to be flying into the eye is one of those actions and saying may carry the little girl up the stairs was another </s>
<s> it wasn't that any thought of offering help occurred to me and that then spoke the first intimation had of being likely to make that offer was the sound of my own voice and the discovery that the offer had been made </s>
<s> the servant paused doubtfully glancing from her charge to me and then back again to the child </s>
<s> would you like it dear she asked her </s>
<s> but no such doubt appeared to cross the child's mind she lifted her arms eagerly to be taken up </s>
<s> please was all she said while faint smile flickered on the weary little face </s>
<s> took her up with scrupulous care and her little arm was at once clasped trustfully round my neck </s>
<s> image the lame child she was very light weight so light in fact that the ridiculous idea crossed my mind that it was rather easier going up with her in my arms than it would have been without her and when we reached the road above with its cart ruts and loose stones all formidable obstacles for lame child found that had said i'd better carry her over this rough place before had formed any mental connection between its roughness and my gentle little burden </s>
<s> indeed it's troubling you too much sir the maid exclaimed </s>
<s> she can walk very well on the flat but the arm that was twined about my neck clung just an atom more closely at the suggestion and decided me to say she's no weight really </s>
<s> i'll carry her little further </s>
<s> i'm going your way the nurse raised no further objection and the next speaker was ragged little boy with bare feet and broom over his shoulder who ran across the road and pretended to sweep the perfectly dry road in front of us </s>
<s> give us ap'ny the little urchin pleaded with broad grin on his dirty face </s>
<s> don't give him ap'ny said the little lady in my arms </s>
<s> the words sounded harsh but the tone was gentleness itself </s>
<s> he's an idle little boy and she laughed laugh of such silvery sweetness as had never yet heard from any lips but sylvie's </s>
<s> to my astonishment the boy actually joined in the laugh as if there were some subtle sympathy between them as he ran away down the road and vanished through gap in the hedge </s>
<s> but he was back in few moments having discarded his broom and provided himself from some mysterious source with an exquisite bouquet of flowers </s>
<s> buy posy buy posy </s>
<s> only ap'ny he chanted with the melancholy drawl of professional beggar </s>
<s> don't buy it was her majesty's edict as she looked down with lofty scorn that seemed curiously mixed with tender interest on the ragged creature at her feet </s>
<s> but this time turned rebel and ignored the royal commands </s>
<s> such lovely flowers and of forms so entirely new to me were not to be abandoned at the bidding of any little maid however imperious </s>
<s> bought the bouquet and the little boy after popping the halfpenny into his mouth turned head over heels as if to ascertain whether the human mouth is really adapted to serve as money box </s>
<s> with wonder that increased every moment turned over the flowers and examined them one by one there was not single one among them that could remember having ever seen before </s>
<s> at last turned to the nursemaid </s>
<s> do these flowers grow wild about here </s>
<s> never saw but the speech died away on my lips </s>
<s> the nursemaid had vanished </s>
<s> you can put me down now if you like sylvie quietly remarked </s>
<s> obeyed in silence and could only ask myself is this dream on finding sylvie and bruno walking one on either side of me and clinging to my hands with the ready confidence of childhood </s>
<s> you're larger than when saw you last began </s>
<s> really think we ought to be introduced again </s>

<s> it doesn't take long </s>

<s> and it's esquire oh of course </s>
<s> forgot said sylvie </s>

<s> you know said we'd come on tuesday sylvie explained </s>

<s> no surname she laughed evidently thinking said it in fun and stooped to kiss the children salute to which bruno submitted with reluctance sylvie returned it with interest </s>
<s> while she and arthur who had arrived before me supplied the children with tea and cake tried to engage the earl in conversation but he was restless and distrait and we made little progress </s>
<s> at last by sudden question he betrayed the cause of his disquiet </s>
<s> would you let me look at those flowers you have in your hand willingly said handing him the bouquet </s>

<s> they did not diminish his disquiet </s>

<s> am nearly sure but have book of indian botany here he took volume from the book shelves and turned the leaves with trembling fingers </s>
<s> yes </s>
<s> compare it with this picture </s>
<s> it is the exact duplicate </s>
<s> this is the flower of the upas tree which usually grows only in the depths of forests and the flower fades so quickly after being plucked that it is scarcely possible to keep its form or colour even so far as the outskirts of the forest </s>
<s> yet this is in full bloom </s>
<s> where did you get these flowers he added with breathless eagerness </s>
<s> glanced at sylvie who gravely and silently laid her finger on her lips then beckoned to bruno to follow her and ran out into the garden and found myself in the position of defendant whose two most important witnesses have been suddenly taken away </s>
<s> let me give you the flowers stammered out at last quite at my wit's end as to how to get out of the difficulty </s>
<s> you know much more about them than do accept them most gratefully </s>
<s> but you have not yet told me the earl was beginning when we were interrupted to my great relief by the arrival of eric lindon </s>
<s> to arthur however the new comer was saw clearly anything but welcome </s>
<s> his face clouded over he drew little back from the circle and took no further part in the conversation which was wholly maintained for some minutes by lady muriel and her lively cousin who were discussing some new music that had just arrived from london </s>
<s> do just try this one he pleaded </s>
<s> the music looks easy to sing at sight and the song's quite appropriate to the occasion then suppose it's five o'clock tea </s>
<s> ever to thee faithful i'll be five o'clock tea laughed lady muriel as she sat down to the piano and lightly struck few random chords </s>
<s> not quite and yet it is kind of ever to thee faithful i'll be it's pair of hapless lovers he crosses the briny deep and she is left lamenting that is indeed appropriate she replied mockingly as he placed the song before her </s>
<s> and am to do the lamenting </s>
<s> and who for if you please she played the air once or twice through first in quick and finally in slow time and then gave us the whole song with as much graceful ease as if she had been familiar with it all her life he stept so lightly to the land all in his manly pride he kissed her cheek he pressed her hand yet still she glanced aside </s>
<s> too gay he seems she darkly dreams too gallant and too gay to think of me poor simple me when he is far away bring my love this goodly pearl across the seas he said gem to deck the dearest girl that ever sailor wed she clasps it tight her eyes are bright her throbbing heart would say he thought of me he thought of me when he was far away the ship has sailed into the west her ocean bird is flown dull dead pain is in her breast and she is weak and lone yet there's smile upon her face smile that seems to say he'll think of me he'll think of me when he is far away </s>
<s> though waters wide between us glide our lives are warm and near no distance parts two faithful hearts two hearts that love so dear and will trust my sailor lad for ever and day to think of me to think of me when he is far away the look of displeasure which had begun to come over arthur's face when the young captain spoke of love so lightly faded away as the song proceeded and he listened with evident delight </s>

<s> the bouquet vanished as sylvie had predicted and when day or two afterwards arthur and once more visited the hall we found the earl and his daughter with the old housekeeper out in the garden examining the fastenings of the drawing room window </s>
<s> we are holding an inquest lady muriel said advancing to meet us and we admit you as accessories before the fact to tell us all you know about those flowers the accessories before the fact decline to answer any questions gravely replied </s>
<s> and they reserve their defence well then turn queen's evidence please </s>
<s> the flowers have disappeared in the night she went on turning to arthur and we are quite sure no one in the house has meddled with them </s>
<s> somebody must have entered by the window but the fastenings have not been tampered with said the earl </s>
<s> it must have been while you were dining my lady said the housekeeper </s>
<s> that was it said the earl </s>

<s> some day stammered may be free to tell you </s>

<s> we pronounce you to be an accomplice and we sentence you to solitary confinement and to be fed on bread and butter </s>
<s> do you take sugar it is disquieting certainly she resumed when all creature comforts had been duly supplied to find that the house has been entered by thief in this out of the way place </s>
<s> if only the flowers had been eatables one might have suspected thief of quite another shape you mean that universal explanation for all mysterious disappearances the cat did it said arthur </s>
<s> yes she replied </s>
<s> what convenient thing it would be if all thieves had the same shape </s>
<s> it's so confusing to have some of them quadrupeds and others bipeds it has occurred to me said arthur as curious problem in teleology the science of final causes he added in answer to an enquiring look from lady muriel </s>
<s> and final cause is well suppose we say the last of series of connected events each of the series being the cause of the next for whose sake the first event takes place but the last event is practically an effect of the first isn't it </s>
<s> and yet you call it cause of it arthur pondered moment </s>
<s> the words are rather confusing grant you he said </s>
<s> will this do </s>
<s> the last event is an effect of the first but the necessity for that event is cause of the necessity for the first that seems clear enough said lady muriel </s>
<s> now let us have the problem it's merely this </s>
<s> what object can we imagine in the arrangement by which each different size roughly speaking of living creatures has its special shape </s>
<s> for instance the human race has one kind of shape bipeds </s>
<s> another set ranging from the lion to the mouse are quadrupeds </s>
<s> go down step or two further and you come to insects with six legs hexapods beautiful name is it not </s>
<s> but beauty in our sense of the word seems to diminish as we go down the creature becomes more won't say ugly of any of god's creatures more uncouth </s>
<s> and when we take the microscope and go few steps lower still we come upon animalculae terribly uncouth and with terrible number of legs the other alternative said the earl would be diminuendo series of repetitions of the same type </s>
<s> never mind the monotony of it let's see how it would work in other ways </s>
<s> begin with the race of men and the creatures they require let us say horses cattle sheep and dogs we don't exactly require frogs and spiders do we muriel lady muriel shuddered perceptibly it was evidently painful subject </s>
<s> we can dispense with them she said gravely </s>
<s> well then we'll have second race of men half yard high who would have one source of exquisite enjoyment not possessed by ordinary men arthur interrupted </s>
<s> what source said the earl </s>
<s> why the grandeur of scenery </s>
<s> surely the grandeur of mountain to me depends on its size relative to me </s>
<s> double the height of the mountain and of course it's twice as grand </s>
<s> halve my height and you produce the same effect happy happy happy small lady muriel murmured rapturously </s>
<s> none but the short none but the short none but the short enjoy the tall but let me go on said the earl </s>

<s> true my child was forgetting </s>

<s> yes think our scheme will work fairly well </s>

<s> the complete list of woes was too much for his feelings </s>
<s> and it knewed didn't mean to trod on it he added as the climax </s>
<s> that bee should be ashamed of itself said severely and sylvie hugged and kissed the wounded hero till all tears were dried </s>
<s> my finger's quite unstung now said bruno </s>
<s> why doos there be stones </s>
<s> mister sir doos oo know they're good for something said even if we don't know what </s>
<s> what's the good of dandelions now dindledums said bruno </s>
<s> oh they're ever so pretty </s>
<s> and stones aren't pretty one bit </s>
<s> would oo like some dindledums mister sir bruno sylvie murmured reproachfully </s>
<s> you mustn't say mister and sir both at once </s>
<s> remember what told you you telled me were to say mister when spoked about him and were to say sir when spoked to him well you're not doing both you know ah but is doing bofe miss praticular bruno exclaimed triumphantly </s>
<s> wishted to speak about the gemplun and wishted to speak to the gemplun </s>
<s> so course said mister sir that's all right bruno said </s>
<s> course it's all right said bruno </s>
<s> sylvie just knows nuffin at all there never was an impertinenter boy said sylvie frowning till her bright eyes were nearly invisible </s>
<s> and there never was an ignoranter girl retorted bruno </s>
<s> come along and pick some dindledums </s>
<s> that's all she's fit for he added in very loud whisper to me </s>

<s> dandelions is the right word it's because he jumps about so sylvie said laughing </s>
<s> yes that's it bruno assented </s>
<s> sylvie tells me the words and then when jump about they get shooken up in my head till they're all froth expressed myself as perfectly satisfied with this explanation </s>
<s> but aren't you going to pick me any dindledums after all course we will cried bruno </s>
<s> come along sylvie and the happy children raced away bounding over the turf with the fleetness and grace of young antelopes </s>
<s> then you didn't find your way back to outland said to the professor </s>
<s> oh yes did he replied we never got to queer street but found another way </s>
<s> i've been backwards and forwards several times since then </s>
<s> had to be present at the election you know as the author of the new money act </s>
<s> the emperor was so kind as to wish that should have the credit of it </s>
<s> let come what come may remember the very words of the imperial speech if it should turn out that the warden is alive you will bear witness that the change in the coinage is the professor's doing not mine never was so glorified in my life before tears trickled down his cheeks at the recollection which apparently was not wholly pleasant one </s>
<s> is the warden supposed to be dead well it's supposed so but mind you don't believe it </s>
<s> the evidence is very weak mere hear say </s>
<s> wandering jester with dancing bear they found their way into the palace one day has been telling people he comes from fairyland and that the warden died there </s>
<s> wanted the vice warden to question him but most unluckily he and my lady were always out walking when the jester came round </s>
<s> yes the warden's supposed to be dead and more tears trickled down the old man's cheeks </s>
<s> but what is the new money act the professor brightened up again </s>
<s> the emperor started the thing he said </s>
<s> he wanted to make everybody in outland twice as rich as he was before just to make the new government popular </s>
<s> only there wasn't nearly enough money in the treasury to do it </s>
<s> so suggested that he might do it by doubling the value of every coin and bank note in outland </s>
<s> it's the simplest thing possible </s>
<s> wonder nobody ever thought of it before </s>
<s> and you never saw such universal joy </s>
<s> the shops are full from morning to night </s>
<s> everybody's buying everything and how was the glorifying done sudden gloom overcast the professor's jolly face </s>
<s> they did it as went home after the election he mournfully replied </s>
<s> it was kindly meant but didn't like it </s>
<s> they waved flags all round me till was nearly blind and they rang bells till was nearly deaf and they strewed the road so thick with flowers that lost my way and the poor old man sighed deeply </s>
<s> how far is it to outland asked to change the subject </s>
<s> about five days march </s>
<s> but one must go back occasionally </s>
<s> you see as court professor have to be always in attendance on prince uggug </s>
<s> the empress would be very angry if left him even for an hour but surely every time you come here you are absent ten days at least oh more than that the professor exclaimed </s>
<s> fortnight sometimes </s>
<s> but of course keep memorandum of the exact time when started so that can put the court time back to the very moment excuse me said </s>
<s> don't understand silently the professor drew front his pocket square gold watch with six or eight hands and held it out for my inspection </s>
<s> this he began is an outlandish watch so should have thought which has the peculiar property that instead of its going with the time the time goes with it </s>
<s> trust you understand me now hardly said </s>
<s> permit me to explain </s>
<s> so long as it is let alone it takes its own course </s>
<s> time has no effect upon it have known such watches remarked </s>
<s> it goes of course at the usual rate </s>
<s> only the time has to go with it </s>
<s> hence if move the hands change the time </s>
<s> to move them forwards in advance of the true time is impossible but can move them as much as month backwards that is the limit </s>
<s> and then you have the events all over again with any alterations experience may suggest what blessing such watch would be thought in real life </s>
<s> to be able to unsay some heedless word to undo some reckless deed </s>
<s> might see the thing done with pleasure said the good natured professor </s>
<s> when move this hand back to here pointing out the place history goes back fifteen minutes trembling with excitement watched him push the hand round as he described </s>
<s> hurted mine self welly much shrilly and suddenly the words rang in my ears and more startled than cared to show turned to look for the speaker </s>
<s> yes </s>
<s> there was bruno standing with the tears running down his cheeks just as had seen him quarter of an hour ago and there was sylvie with her arms round his neck </s>
<s> had not the heart to make the dear little fellow go through his troubles second time so hastily begged the professor to push the hands round into their former position </s>
<s> in moment sylvie and bruno were gone again and could just see them in the far distance picking dindledums wonderful indeed exclaimed </s>
<s> it has another property yet more wonderful said the professor </s>
<s> you see this little peg </s>
<s> that is called the reversal peg if you push it in the events of the next hour happen in the reverse order </s>
<s> do not try it now </s>
<s> will lend you the watch for few days and you can amuse yourself with experiments thank you very much said as he gave me the watch </s>

<s> and she clung to my hand half frightened as we came in sight of hare lying on its side with legs stretched out just in the entrance to the wood </s>

<s> poor thing </s>

<s> but they haven't touched it </s>
