<s> thought hunting was thing they played at like game </s>
<s> bruno and hunt snails but we never hurt them when we catch them sweet angel thought </s>
<s> how am to get the idea of sport into your innocent mind and as we stood hand in hand looking down at the dead hare tried to put the thing into such words as she could understand </s>
<s> you know what fierce wild beasts lions and tigers are sylvie nodded </s>
<s> well in some countries men have to kill them to save their own lives you know yes said sylvie if one tried to kill me bruno would kill it if he could well and so the men the hunters get to enjoy it you know the running and the fighting and the shouting and the danger yes said sylvie </s>

<s> and then all in moment her self command gave way </s>
<s> pulling her hand out of mine she ran back to where the dead hare was lying and flung herself down at its side in such an agony of grief as could hardly have believed possible in so young child </s>
<s> oh my darling my darling she moaned over and over again </s>
<s> and god meant your life to be so beautiful sometimes but always keeping her face hidden on the ground she would reach out one little hand to stroke the poor dead thing and then once more bury her face in her hands and sob as if her heart would break </s>
<s> image the dead hare was afraid she would really make herself ill still thought it best to let her weep away the first sharp agony of grief and after few minutes the sobbing gradually ceased and sylvie rose to her feet and looked calmly at me though tears were still streaming down her cheeks </s>
<s> did not dare to speak again just yet but simply held out my hand to her that we might quit the melancholy spot </s>
<s> yes i'll come now she said </s>

<s> thought to myself </s>

<s> crossing the line </s>

<s> hope that's sound common sense and all that strange adventure thought has occupied the space of single comma in lady muriel's speech </s>
<s> single comma for which grammarians tell us to count one felt no doubt that the professor had kindly put back the time for me to the exact point at which had gone to sleep when few minutes afterwards we left the house arthur's first remark was certainly strange one </s>
<s> we've been there just twenty minutes he said and i've done nothing but listen to you and lady muriel talking and yet somehow feel exactly as if had been talking with her for an hour at least and so he had been felt no doubt only as the time had been put back to the beginning of the tete tete he referred to the whole of it had passed into oblivion if not into nothingness </s>
<s> but valued my own reputation for sanity too highly to venture on explaining to him what had happened </s>
<s> for some cause which could not at the moment divine arthur was unusually grave and silent during our walk home </s>
<s> it could not be connected with eric lindon thought as he had for some days been away in london so that having lady muriel almost all to himself for was only too glad to hear those two conversing to have any wish to intrude any remarks of my own he ought theoretically to have been specially radiant and contented with life </s>
<s> can he have heard any bad news said to myself </s>
<s> and almost as if he had read my thoughts he spoke </s>

<s> wish him all happiness with one exception </s>

<s> arthur declared he wasn't fit for society and had to set forth alone for an afternoon stroll </s>
<s> took the road to the station and at the point where the road from the hall joined it paused seeing my friends in the distance seemingly bound for the same goal </s>
<s> will you join us the earl said after had exchanged greetings with him and lady muriel and captain lindon </s>

<s> that goes without saying my child said her father </s>
<s> women are always restless for generous appreciation of all one's best qualities his daughter impressively remarked there's nothing to compare with father is there eric cousins are not in it said eric and then somehow the conversation lapsed into two duologues the younger folk taking the lead and the two old men following with less eager steps </s>
<s> and when are we to see your little friends again said the earl </s>
<s> they are singularly attractive children shall be delighted to bring them when can said </s>

<s> she must bear it as best she can </s>
<s> tell her it's grand opportunity for practising patience </s>
<s> but she hardly sees it from that point of view </s>
<s> why there are the children so indeed they were waiting for us apparently at stile which they could not have climbed over more than few moments as lady muriel and her cousin had passed it without seeing them </s>
<s> on catching sight of us bruno ran to meet us and to exhibit to us with much pride the handle of clasp knife the blade having been broken off which he had picked up in the road </s>
<s> and what shall you use it for bruno said </s>
<s> don't know bruno carelessly replied must think child's first view of life the earl remarked with that sweet sad smile of his is that it is period to be spent in accumulating portable property </s>
<s> that view gets modified as the years glide away and he held out his hand to sylvie who had placed herself by me looking little shy of him </s>
<s> but the gentle old man was not one with whom any child human or fairy could be shy for long and she had very soon deserted my hand for his bruno alone remaining faithful to his first friend </s>
<s> we overtook the other couple just as they reached the station and both lady muriel and eric greeted the children as old friends the latter with the words so you got to babylon by candlelight after all yes and back again cried bruno </s>
<s> lady muriel looked from one to the other in blank astonishment </s>
<s> what you know them eric she exclaimed </s>
<s> this mystery grows deeper every day then we must be somewhere in the third act said eric </s>
<s> you don't expect the mystery to be cleared up till the fifth act do you but it's such long drama was the plaintive reply </s>
<s> we must have got to the fifth act by this time third act assure you said the young soldier mercilessly </s>
<s> scene railway platform </s>
<s> lights down </s>
<s> enter prince in disguise of course and faithful attendant </s>
<s> this is the prince taking bruno's hand and here stands his humble servant what is your royal highness next command and he made most courtier like low bow to his puzzled little friend </s>
<s> oo're not servant bruno scornfully exclaimed </s>
<s> oo're gemplun servant assure your royal highness eric respectfully insisted </s>
<s> allow me to mention to your royal highness my various situations past present and future what did oo begin wiz bruno asked beginning to enter into the jest </s>
<s> was oo shoe black lower than that your royal highness </s>

<s> sad to say your royal highness did not </s>
<s> so had to take situation as as waiter which have now held for some years haven't he again glanced at lady muriel </s>
<s> sylvie dear do help me to button this glove lady muriel whispered hastily stooping down and failing to hear the question </s>
<s> and what will oo be next said bruno </s>
<s> my next place will hope be that of groom </s>
<s> and after that don't puzzle the child so lady muriel interrupted </s>
<s> what nonsense you talk after that eric persisted hope to obtain the situation of housekeeper which fourth act he proclaimed with sudden change of tone </s>
<s> lights turned up </s>
<s> red lights </s>
<s> green lights </s>
<s> distant rumble heard </s>
<s> enter passenger train and in another minute the train drew up alongside of the platform and stream of passengers began to flow out from the booking office and waiting rooms </s>
<s> did you ever make real life into drama said the earl </s>
<s> now just try </s>
<s> i've often amused myself that way </s>
<s> consider this platform as our stage </s>
<s> good entrances and exits on both sides you see </s>
<s> capital background scene real engine moving up and down </s>
<s> all this bustle and people passing to and fro must have been most carefully rehearsed </s>
<s> how naturally they do it </s>
<s> with never glance at the audience </s>
<s> and every grouping is quite fresh you see </s>
<s> no repetition it really was admirable as soon as began to enter into it from this point of view </s>
<s> even porter passing with barrow piled with luggage seemed so realistic that one was tempted to applaud </s>
<s> he was followed by an angry mother with hot red face dragging along two screaming children and calling to some one behind john </s>
<s> come on enter john very meek very silent and loaded with parcels </s>
<s> and he was followed in his turn by frightened little nursemaid carrying fat baby also screaming </s>
<s> all the children screamed </s>
<s> capital byplay said the old man aside </s>
<s> did you notice the nursemaid's look of terror </s>
<s> it was simply perfect you have struck quite new vein said </s>
<s> to most of us life and its pleasures seem like mine that is nearly worked out worked out exclaimed the earl </s>
<s> for any one with true dramatic instincts it is only the overture that is ended </s>
<s> the real treat has yet to begin </s>
<s> you go to theatre and pay your ten shillings for stall and what do you get for your money </s>
<s> perhaps it's dialogue between couple of farmers unnatural in their overdone caricature of farmers dress more unnatural in their constrained attitudes and gestures most unnatural in their attempts at ease and geniality in their talk </s>
<s> go instead and take seat in third class railway carriage and you'll get the same dialogue done to the life </s>
<s> front seats no orchestra to block the view and nothing to pay which reminds me said eric </s>
<s> there is nothing to pay on receiving telegram </s>
<s> shall we enquire for one and he and lady muriel strolled off in the direction of the telegraph office </s>
<s> wonder if shakespeare had that thought in his mind said when he wrote all the world's stage the old man sighed </s>
<s> and so it is he said look at it as you will </s>
<s> life is indeed drama drama with but few encores and no bouquets he added dreamily </s>
<s> we spend one half of it in regretting the things we did in the other half and the secret of enjoying it he continued resuming his cheerful tone is intensity but not in the modern aesthetic sense presume </s>
<s> like the young lady in punch who begins conversation with are you intense by no means replied the earl </s>
<s> what mean is intensity of thought concentrated attention </s>
<s> we lose half the pleasure we might have in life by not really attending </s>
<s> take any instance you like it doesn't matter how trivial the pleasure may be the principle is the same </s>
<s> suppose and are reading the same second rate circulating library novel </s>
<s> never troubles himself to master the relationships of the characters on which perhaps all the interest of the story depends he skips over all the descriptions of scenery and every passage that looks rather dull he doesn't half attend to the passages he does read he goes on reading merely from want of resolution to find another occupation for hours after he ought to have put the book aside and reaches the finis in state of utter weariness and depression </s>
<s> puts his whole soul into the thing on the principle that whatever is worth doing is worth doing well he masters the genealogies he calls up pictures before his mind's eye as he reads about the scenery best of all he resolutely shuts the book at the end of some chapter while his interest is yet at its keenest and turns to other subjects so that when next he allows himself an hour at it it is like hungry man sitting down to dinner and when the book is finished he returns to the work of his daily life like giant refreshed but suppose the book were really rubbish nothing to repay attention well suppose it said the earl </s>
<s> my theory meets that case assure you </s>
<s> never finds out that it is rubbish but maunders on to the end trying to believe he's enjoying himself </s>
<s> quietly shuts the book when he's read dozen pages walks off to the library and changes it for better </s>
<s> have yet another theory for adding to the enjoyment of life that is if have not exhausted your patience </s>
<s> i'm afraid you find me very garrulous old man no indeed exclaimed earnestly </s>
<s> and indeed felt as if one could not easily tire of the sweet sadness of that gentle voice </s>
<s> it is that we should learn to take our pleasures quickly and our pains slowly but why </s>
<s> should have put it the other way myself by taking artificial pain which can be as trivial as you please slowly the result is that when real pain comes however severe all you need do is to let it go at its ordinary pace and it's over in moment very true said but how about the pleasure why by taking it quick you can get so much more into life </s>
<s> it takes you three hours and half to hear and enjoy an opera </s>
<s> suppose can take it in and enjoy it in half an hour </s>
<s> why can enjoy seven operas while you are listening to one always supposing you have an orchestra capable of playing them said </s>
<s> and that orchestra has yet to be found the old man smiled </s>
<s> have heard an air played he said and by no means short one played right through variations and all in three seconds when </s>
<s> and how asked eagerly with half notion that was dreaming again </s>
<s> it was done by little musical box he quietly replied </s>
<s> after it had been wound up the regulator or something broke and it ran down as said in about three seconds </s>
<s> but it must have played all the notes you know did you enjoy it </s>
<s> asked with all the severity of cross examining barrister </s>
<s> no didn't he candidly confessed </s>
<s> but then you know hadn't been trained to that kind of music should much like to try your plan said and as sylvie and bruno happened to run up to us at the moment left them to keep the earl company and strolled along the platform making each person and event play its part in an extempore drama for my especial benefit </s>
<s> what is the earl tired of you already said as the children ran past me </s>
<s> no sylvie replied with great emphasis </s>
<s> he wants the evening paper </s>
<s> so bruno's going to be little news boy mind you charge good price for it called after them </s>
<s> returning up the platform came upon sylvie alone </s>
<s> well child said where's your little news boy </s>
<s> couldn't he get you an evening paper he went to get one at the book stall at the other side said sylvie and he's coming across the line with it oh bruno you ought to cross by the bridge for the distant thud thud of the express was already audible </s>
<s> suddenly look of horror came over her face </s>
<s> oh he's fallen down on the rails she cried and darted past me at speed that quite defied the hasty effort made to stop her </s>
<s> but the wheezy old station master happened to be close behind me he wasn't good for much poor old man but he was good for this and before could turn round he had the child clasped in his arms saved from the certain death she was rushing to </s>
<s> so intent was in watching this scene that hardly saw flying figure in light grey suit who shot across from the back of the platform and was on the line in another second </s>
<s> so far as one could take note of time in such moment of horror he had about ten clear seconds before the express would be upon him in which to cross the rails and to pick up bruno </s>
<s> whether he did so or not it was quite impossible to guess the next thing one knew was that the express had passed and that whether for life or death all was over </s>
<s> when the cloud of dust had cleared away and the line was once more visible we saw with thankful hearts that the child and his deliverer were safe </s>
<s> all right eric called to us cheerfully as he recrossed the line </s>
<s> he's more frightened than hurt image crossing the line he lifted the little fellow up into lady muriel's arms and mounted the platform as gaily as if nothing had happened but he was as pale as death and leaned heavily on the arm hastily offered him fearing he was about to faint </s>
<s> i'll just sit down moment he said dreamily where's sylvie sylvie ran to him and flung her arms round his neck sobbing as if her heart would break </s>
<s> don't do that my darling eric murmured with strange look in his eyes </s>
<s> nothing to cry about now you know </s>
<s> but you very nearly got yourself killed for nothing for bruno the little maiden sobbed </s>
<s> and he would have done it for me </s>
<s> wouldn't you bruno course would bruno said looking round with bewildered air </s>
<s> lady muriel kissed him in silence as she put him down out of her arms </s>
<s> then she beckoned sylvie to come and take his hand and signed to the children to go back to where the earl was seated </s>
<s> tell him she whispered with quivering lips tell him all is well then she turned to the hero of the day </s>
<s> thought it was death she said </s>
<s> thank god you are safe </s>
<s> did you see how near it was saw there was just time eric said lightly </s>
<s> soldier must learn to carry his life in his hand you know </s>
<s> i'm all right now </s>
<s> shall we go to the telegraph office again </s>
<s> daresay it's come by this time went to join the earl and the children and we waited almost in silence for no one seemed inclined to talk and bruno was half asleep on sylvie's lap till the others joined us </s>
<s> no telegram had come </s>
<s> i'll take stroll with the children said feeling that we were little de trop and i'll look in in the course of the evening we must go back into the wood now sylvie said as soon as we were out of hearing </s>
<s> we ca'n stay this size any longer then you will be quite tiny fairies again next time we meet yes said sylvie but we'll be children again some day if you'll let us </s>
<s> bruno's very anxious to see lady muriel again she are welly nice said bruno </s>
<s> shall be very glad to take you to see her again said </s>
<s> hadn't better give you back the professor's watch </s>
<s> it'll be too large for you to carry when you're fairies you know bruno laughed merrily </s>
<s> was glad to see he had quite recovered from the terrible scene he had gone through </s>
<s> oh no it won't he said </s>
<s> when we go small it'll go small and then it'll go straight to the professor sylvie added and you won't be able to use it anymore so you'd better use it all you can now </s>
<s> we must go small when the sun sets </s>
<s> good bye good bye cried bruno </s>
<s> but their voices sounded very far away and when looked round both children had disappeared </s>
<s> and it wants only two hours to sunset said as strolled on </s>
<s> must make the best of my time chapter </s>
<s> an outlandish watch </s>
<s> as entered the little town came upon two of the fishermen's wives interchanging that last word which never was the last and it occurred to me as an experiment with the magic watch to wait till the little scene was over and then to encore it </s>
<s> well good night t'ye </s>
<s> and ye winna forget to send us word when your martha writes nay ah winna forget </s>
<s> an if she isn't suited she can but coom back </s>
<s> good night t'ye casual observer might have thought and there ends the dialogue that casual observer would have been mistaken </s>
<s> ah she'll like em war'n ye </s>
<s> they'll not treat her bad yer may depend </s>
<s> they're varry canny fowk </s>
<s> good night ay they are that </s>
<s> good night good night </s>
<s> and ye'll send us word if she writes aye ah will yer may depend </s>
<s> good night t'ye and at last they parted </s>
<s> waited till they were some twenty yards apart and then put the watch minute back </s>
<s> the instantaneous change was startling the two figures seemed to flash back into their former places </s>
<s> isn't suited she can but coom back </s>
<s> good night t'ye one of them was saying and so the whole dialogue was repeated and when they had parted for the second time let them go their several ways and strolled on through the town </s>
<s> but the real usefulness of this magic power thought would be to undo some harm some painful event some accident had not long to wait for an opportunity of testing this property also of the magic watch for even as the thought passed through my mind the accident was imagining occurred </s>
<s> light cart was standing at the door of the great millinery depot of elveston laden with card board packing cases which the driver was carrying into the shop one by one </s>
<s> one of the cases had fallen into the street but it scarcely seemed worth while to step forward and pick it up as the man would be back again in moment </s>
<s> yet in that moment young man riding bicycle came sharp round the corner of the street and in trying to avoid running over the box upset his machine and was thrown headlong against the wheel of the spring cart </s>
<s> the driver ran out to his assistance and he and together raised the unfortunate cyclist and carried him into the shop </s>
<s> his head was cut and bleeding and one knee seemed to be badly injured and it was speedily settled that he had better be conveyed at once to the only surgery in the place </s>
<s> helped them in emptying the cart and placing in it some pillows for the wounded man to rest on and it was only when the driver had mounted to his place and was starting for the surgery that bethought me of the strange power possessed of undoing all this harm </s>
<s> now is my time said to myself as moved back the hand of the watch and saw almost without surprise this time all things restored to the places they had occupied at the critical moment when had first noticed the fallen packing case </s>
<s> instantly stepped out into the street picked up the box and replaced it in the cart in the next moment the bicycle had spun round the corner passed the cart without let or hindrance and soon vanished in the distance in cloud of dust </s>
<s> delightful power of magic thought </s>
<s> how much of human suffering have not only relieved but actually annihilated and in glow of conscious virtue stood watching the unloading of the cart still holding the magic watch open in my hand as was curious to see what would happen when we again reached the exact time at which had put back the hand </s>
<s> the result was one that if only had considered the thing carefully might have foreseen as the hand of the watch touched the mark the spring cart which had driven off and was by this time half way down the street was back again at the door and in the act of starting while oh woe for the golden dream of world wide benevolence that had dazzled my dreaming fancy the wounded youth was once more reclining on the heap of pillows his pale face set rigidly in the hard lines that told of pain resolutely endured </s>
<s> oh mocking magic watch said to myself as passed out of the little town and took the seaward road that led to my lodgings </s>
<s> the good fancied could do is vanished like dream the evil of this troublesome world is the only abiding reality and now must record an experience so strange that think it only fair before beginning to relate it to release my much enduring reader from any obligation he may feel to believe this part of my story </s>
<s> would not have believed it freely confess if had not seen it with my own eyes then why should expect it of my reader who quite possibly has never seen anything of the sort </s>
<s> was passing pretty little villa which stood rather back from the road in its own grounds with bright flower beds in front creepers wandering over the walls and hanging in festoons about the bow windows an easy chair forgotten on the lawn with newspaper lying near it small pug dog couchant before it resolved to guard the treasure even at the sacrifice of life and front door standing invitingly half open </s>
<s> here is my chance thought for testing the reverse action of the magic watch pressed the reversal peg and walked in </s>
<s> in another house the entrance of stranger might cause surprise perhaps anger even going so far as to expel the said stranger with violence but here knew nothing of the sort could happen </s>
<s> the ordinary course of events first to think nothing about me then hearing my footsteps to look up and see me and then to wonder what business had there would be reversed by the action of my watch </s>
<s> they would first wonder who was then see me then look down and think no more about me </s>
<s> and as to being expelled with violence that event would necessarily come first in this case </s>
<s> so if can once get in said to myself all risk of expulsion will be over image the pug dog sat up the pug dog sat up as precautionary measure as passed but as took no notice of the treasure he was guarding he let me go by without even one remonstrant bark </s>
<s> he that takes my life he seemed to be saying wheezily to himself takes trash but he that takes the daily telegraph but this awful contingency did not face </s>
<s> the party in the drawing room had walked straight in you understand without ringing the bell or giving any notice of my approach consisted of four laughing rosy children of ages from about fourteen down to ten who were apparently all coming towards the door found they were really walking backwards while their mother seated by the fire with some needlework on her lap was saying just as entered the room now girls you may get your things on for walk to my utter astonishment for was not yet accustomed to the action of the watch all smiles ceased as browning says on the four pretty faces and they all got out pieces of needle work and sat down </s>
<s> no one noticed me in the least as quietly took chair and sat down to watch them </s>
<s> when the needle work had been unfolded and they were all ready to begin their mother said come that's done at last </s>
<s> you may fold up your work girls but the children took no notice whatever of the remark on the contrary they set to work at once sewing if that is the proper word to describe an operation such as had never before witnessed </s>
<s> each of them threaded her needle with short end of thread attached to the work which was instantly pulled by an invisible force through the stuff dragging the needle after it the nimble fingers of the little sempstress caught it at the other side but only to lose it again the next moment </s>
<s> and so the work went on steadily undoing itself and the neatly stitched little dresses or whatever they were steadily falling to pieces </s>
<s> now and then one of the children would pause as the recovered thread became inconveniently long wind it on bobbin and start again with another short end </s>
<s> at last all the work was picked to pieces and put away and the lady led the way into the next room walking backwards and making the insane remark not yet dear we must get the sewing done first after which was not surprised to see the children skipping backwards after her exclaiming oh mother it is such lovely day for walk in the dining room the table had only dirty plates and empty dishes on it </s>
<s> however the party with the addition of gentleman as good natured and as rosy as the children seated themselves at it very contentedly </s>
<s> you have seen people eating cherry tart and every now and then cautiously conveying cherry stone from their lips to their plates </s>
<s> well something like that went on all through this ghastly or shall we say ghostly banquet </s>
<s> an empty fork is raised to the lips there it receives neatly cut piece of mutton and swiftly conveys it to the plate where it instantly attaches itself to the mutton already there </s>
<s> soon one of the plates furnished with complete slice of mutton and two potatoes was handed up to the presiding gentleman who quietly replaced the slice on the joint and the potatoes in the dish </s>
<s> their conversation was if possible more bewildering than their mode of dining </s>
<s> it began by the youngest girl suddenly and without provocation addressing her eldest sister </s>
<s> oh you wicked story teller she said </s>
<s> expected sharp reply from the sister but instead of this she turned laughingly to her father and said in very loud stage whisper to be bride the father in order to do his part in conversation that seemed only fit for lunatics replied whisper it to me dear but she didn't whisper these children never did anything they were told she said quite loud of course not </s>
<s> everybody knows what dotty wants and little dolly shrugged her shoulders and said with pretty pettishness now father you're not to tease </s>
<s> you know don't want to be bride's maid to anybody and dolly's to be the fourth was her father's idiotic reply </s>
<s> here number three put in her oar </s>
<s> oh it is settled mother dear really and truly </s>
<s> mary told us all about it </s>
<s> it's to be next tuesday four weeks and three of her cousins are coming to be bride's maids and she doesn't forget it minnie the mother laughingly replied </s>
<s> do wish they'd get it settled </s>
<s> don't like long engagements and minnie wound up the conversation if so chaotic series of remarks deserves the name with only think </s>
<s> we passed the cedars this morning just exactly as mary davenant was standing at the gate wishing good bye to mister forget his name </s>
<s> of course we looked the other way by this time was so hopelessly confused that gave up listening and followed the dinner down into the kitchen </s>
<s> but to you hypercritical reader resolute to believe no item of this weird adventure what need to tell how the mutton was placed on the spit and slowly unroasted how the potatoes were wrapped in their skins and handed over to the gardener to be buried how when the mutton had at length attained to rawness the fire which had gradually changed from red heat to mere blaze died down so suddenly that the cook had only just time to catch its last flicker on the end of match or how the maid having taken the mutton off the spit carried it backwards of course out of the house to meet the butcher who was coming also backwards down the road </s>
<s> the longer thought over this strange adventure the more hopelessly tangled the mystery became and it was real relief to meet arthur in the road and get him to go with me up to the hall to learn what news the telegraph had brought </s>
<s> told him as we went what had happened at the station but as to my further adventures thought it best for the present to say nothing </s>
<s> the earl was sitting alone when we entered </s>
<s> am glad you are come in to keep me company he said </s>
<s> muriel is gone to bed the excitement of that terrible scene was too much for her and eric has gone to the hotel to pack his things to start for london by the early train then the telegram has come said </s>
<s> did you not hear </s>
<s> oh had forgotten it came in after you left the station </s>
<s> yes it's all right eric has got his commission and now that he has arranged matters with muriel he has business in town that must be seen to at once what arrangement do you mean asked with sinking heart as the thought of arthur's crushed hopes came to my mind </s>
<s> do you mean that they are engaged they have been engaged in sense for two years the old man gently replied that is he has had my promise to consent to it so soon as he could secure permanent and settled line in life </s>
<s> could never be happy with my child married to man without an object to live for without even an object to die for hope they will be happy strange voice said </s>
<s> the speaker was evidently in the room but had not heard the door open and looked round in some astonishment </s>
<s> the earl seemed to share my surprise </s>
<s> who spoke he exclaimed </s>
<s> it was said arthur looking at us with worn haggard face and eyes from which the light of life seemed suddenly to have faded </s>
<s> and let me wish you joy also dear friend he added looking sadly at the earl and speaking in the same hollow tones that had startled us so much </s>
<s> thank you the old man said simply and heartily </s>
<s> silence followed then rose feeling sure that arthur would wish to be alone and bade our gentle host good night arthur took his hand but said nothing nor did he speak again as we went home till we were in the house and had lit our bed room candles </s>
<s> then he said more to himself than to me the heart knoweth its own bitterness </s>
<s> never understood those words till now the next few days passed wearily enough </s>
<s> felt no inclination to call by myself at the hall still less to propose that arthur should go with me it seemed better to wait till time that gentle healer of our bitterest sorrows should have helped him to recover from the first shock of the disappointment that had blighted his life </s>
<s> business however soon demanded my presence in town and had to announce to arthur that must leave him for while </s>
<s> but hope to run down again in month added </s>
<s> would stay now if could </s>
<s> don't think it's good for you to be alone </s>
<s> no ca'n face solitude here for long said arthur </s>
<s> but don't think about me </s>
<s> have made up my mind to accept post in india that has been offered me </s>
<s> out there suppose shall find something to live for ca'n see anything at present </s>
<s> this life of mine guard as god's high gift from scathe and wrong not greatly care to lose yes said your name sake bore as heavy blow and lived through it far heavier one than mine said arthur </s>
<s> the woman he loved proved false </s>
<s> there is no such cloud as that on my memory of of he left the name unuttered and went on hurriedly </s>
<s> but you will return will you not yes shall come back for short time do said arthur and you shall write and tell me of our friends </s>
<s> i'll send you my address when i'm settled down chapter </s>
<s> the frogs birthday treat </s>
<s> and so it came to pass that just week after the day when my fairy friends first appeared as children found myself taking farewell stroll through the wood in the hope of meeting them once more </s>
<s> had but to stretch myself on the smooth turf and the eerie feeling was on me in moment </s>
<s> put oor ear welly low down said bruno and i'll tell oo secret </s>
<s> it's the frogs birthday treat and we've lost the baby what baby said quite bewildered by this complicated piece of news </s>
<s> the queen's baby course said bruno </s>
<s> titania's baby </s>
<s> and we's welly sorry </s>
<s> sylvie she's oh so sorry how sorry is she asked mischievously </s>
<s> three quarters of yard bruno replied with perfect solemnity </s>
<s> and i'm little sorry too he added shutting his eyes so as not to see that he was smiling </s>
<s> and what are you doing about the baby well the soldiers are all looking for it up and down everywhere the soldiers exclaimed </s>
<s> yes course said bruno </s>
<s> when there's no fighting to be done the soldiers doos any little odd jobs oo know was amused at the idea of its being little odd job to find the royal baby </s>
<s> but how did you come to lose it asked </s>
<s> we put it in flower sylvie who had just joined us explained with her eyes full of tears </s>
<s> only we ca'n remember which she says us put it in flower bruno interrupted cause she doosn't want to get punished </s>
<s> but it were really me what put it there </s>
<s> sylvie were picking dindledums image the queen's baby you shouldn't say us put it in flower sylvie very gravely remarked </s>
<s> well hus then said bruno </s>
<s> never can remember those horrid h's let me help you to look for it said </s>
<s> so sylvie and made voyage of discovery among all the flowers but there was no baby to be seen </s>
<s> what's become of bruno said when we had completed our tour </s>
<s> he's down in the ditch there said sylvie amusing young frog went down on my hands and knees to look for him for felt very curious to know how young frogs ought to be amused </s>
<s> after minute's search found him sitting at the edge of the ditch by the side of the little frog and looking rather disconsolate </s>
<s> how are you getting on bruno said nodding to him as he looked up </s>
<s> ca'n amuse it no more bruno answered very dolefully cause it won't say what it would like to do next </s>
<s> i've showed it all the duck weeds and live caddis worm but it won't say nuffin </s>
<s> what would oo like he shouted into the ear of the frog but the little creature sat quite still and took no notice of him </s>
<s> it's deaf think bruno said turning away with sigh </s>
<s> and it's time to get the theatre ready who are the audience to be only but frogs said bruno </s>
<s> but they haven't comed yet </s>
<s> they wants to be drove up like sheep would it save time suggested if were to walk round with sylvie to drive up the frogs while you get the theatre ready that are good plan cried bruno </s>
<s> but where are sylvie i'm here said sylvie peeping over the edge of the bank </s>
<s> was just watching two frogs that were having race which won it </s>
<s> bruno eagerly inquired </s>
<s> sylvie was puzzled </s>
<s> he does ask such hard questions she confided to me </s>
<s> and what's to happen in the theatre asked </s>
<s> first they have their birthday feast sylvie said then bruno does some bits of shakespeare then he tells them story should think the frogs like the feast best </s>
<s> don't they well there's generally very few of them that get any </s>
<s> they will keep their mouths shut so tight </s>
<s> and it's just as well they do she added because bruno likes to cook it himself and he cooks very queerly now they're all in </s>
<s> would you just help me to put them with their heads the right way we soon managed this part of the business though the frogs kept up most discontented croaking all the time </s>
<s> what are they saying asked sylvie </s>
<s> they're saying fork </s>
<s> fork it's very silly of them </s>
<s> you're not going to have forks she announced with some severity </s>
<s> those that want any feast have just got to open their mouths and bruno ll put some of it in at this moment bruno appeared wearing little white apron to show that he was cook and carrying tureen full of very queer looking soup </s>
<s> watched very carefully as he moved about among the frogs but could not see that any of them opened their mouths to be fed except one very young one and i'm nearly sure it did it accidentally in yawning </s>
<s> however bruno instantly put large spoonful of soup into its mouth and the poor little thing coughed violently for some time </s>
<s> so sylvie and had to share the soup between us and to pretend to enjoy it for it certainly was very queerly cooked </s>
<s> only ventured to take one spoonful of it sylvie's summer soup bruno said it was and must candidly confess that it was not at all nice and could not feel surprised that so many of the guests had kept their mouths shut up tight </s>
<s> what's the soup made of bruno said sylvie who had put spoonful of it to her lips and was making wry face over it </s>
<s> and bruno's answer was anything but encouraging </s>
<s> bits of things the entertainment was to conclude with bits of shakespeare as sylvie expressed it which were all to be done by bruno sylvie being fully engaged in making the frogs keep their heads towards the stage after which bruno was to appear in his real character and tell them story of his own invention </s>
<s> will the story have moral to it asked sylvie while bruno was away behind the hedge dressing for the first bit think so sylvie replied doubtfully </s>
<s> there generally is moral only he puts it in too soon and will he say all the bits of shakespeare no he'll only act them said sylvie </s>
<s> he knows hardly any of the words </s>
<s> when see what he's dressed like i've to tell the frogs what character it is </s>
<s> they're always in such hurry to guess </s>
<s> don't you hear them all saying what </s>
<s> what and so indeed they were it had only sounded like croaking till sylvie explained it but could now make out the wawt </s>
<s> wawt quite distinctly </s>
<s> but why do they try to guess it before they see it don't know sylvie said but they always do </s>
<s> sometimes they begin guessing weeks and weeks before the day so now when you hear the frogs croaking in particularly melancholy way you may be sure they're trying to guess bruno's next shakespeare bit </s>
<s> isn't that interesting however the chorus of guessing was cut short by bruno who suddenly rushed on from behind the scenes and took flying leap down among the frogs to re arrange them </s>
<s> for the oldest and fattest frog who had never been properly arranged so that he could see the stage and so had no idea what was going on was getting restless and had upset several of the frogs and turned others round with their heads the wrong way </s>
<s> and it was no good at all bruno said to do bit of shakespeare when there was nobody to look at it you see he didn't count me as anybody </s>
<s> so he set to work with stick stirring them up very much as you would stir up tea in cup till most of them had at least one great stupid eye gazing at the stage </s>
<s> oo must come and sit among them sylvie he said in despair i've put these two side by side with their noses the same way ever so many times but they do squarrel so so sylvie took her place as mistress of the ceremonies and bruno vanished again behind the scenes to dress for the first bit hamlet was suddenly proclaimed in the clear sweet tones knew so well </s>
<s> the croaking all ceased in moment and turned to the stage in some curiosity to see what bruno's ideas were as to the behaviour of shakespeare's greatest character </s>
<s> according to this eminent interpreter of the drama hamlet wore short black cloak which he chiefly used for muffling up his face as if he suffered good deal from toothache and turned out his toes very much as he walked </s>
<s> to be or not to be hamlet remarked in cheerful tone and then turned head over heels several times his cloak dropping off in the performance </s>
<s> felt little disappointed bruno's conception of the part seemed so wanting in dignity </s>
<s> won't he say any more of the speech whispered to sylvie </s>
<s> think not sylvie whispered in reply </s>
<s> he generally turns head over heels when he doesn't know any more words bruno had meanwhile settled the question by disappearing from the stage and the frogs instantly began inquiring the name of the next character </s>
<s> you'll know directly cried sylvie as she adjusted two or three young frogs that had struggled round with their backs to the stage </s>
<s> macbeth she added as bruno re appeared </s>
<s> macbeth had something twisted round him that went over one shoulder and under the other arm and was meant believe for scotch plaid </s>
<s> he had thorn in his hand which he held out at arm's length as if he were little afraid of it </s>
<s> is this dagger macbeth inquired in puzzled sort of tone and instantly chorus of thorn </s>
<s> thorn arose from the frogs had quite learned to understand their croaking by this time </s>
<s> it's dagger sylvie proclaimed in peremptory tone </s>
<s> hold your tongues and the croaking ceased at once </s>
<s> shakespeare has not told us so far as know that macbeth had any such eccentric habit as turning head over heels in private life but bruno evidently considered it quite an essential part of the character and left the stage in series of somersaults </s>
<s> however he was back again in few moments having tucked under his chin the end of tuft of wool probably left on the thorn by wandering sheep which made magnificent beard that reached nearly down to his feet </s>
<s> shylock sylvie proclaimed </s>
<s> no beg your pardon she hastily corrected herself king lear </s>
<s> hadn't noticed the crown bruno had very cleverly provided one which fitted him exactly by cutting out the centre of dandelion to make room for his head king lear folded his arms to the imminent peril of his beard and said in mild explanatory tone ay every inch king and then paused as if to consider how this could best be proved </s>
<s> and here with all possible deference to bruno as shakespearian critic must express my opinion that the poet did not mean his three great tragic heroes to be so strangely alike in their personal habits nor do believe that he would have accepted the faculty of turning head over heels as any proof at all of royal descent </s>
<s> yet it appeared that king lear after deep meditation could think of no other argument by which to prove his kingship and as this was the last of the bits of shakespeare we never do more than three sylvie explained in whisper bruno gave the audience quite long series of somersaults before he finally retired leaving the enraptured frogs all crying out more </s>
<s> more which suppose was their way of encoring performance </s>
<s> but bruno wouldn't appear again till the proper time came for telling the story </s>
<s> image the frogs birthday treat when he appeared at last in his real character noticed remarkable change in his behaviour </s>
<s> he tried no more somersaults </s>
<s> it was clearly his opinion that however suitable the habit of turning head over heels might be to such petty individuals as hamlet and king lear it would never do for bruno to sacrifice his dignity to such an extent </s>
<s> but it was equally clear that he did not feel entirely at his ease standing all alone on the stage with no costume to disguise him and though he began several times there were mouse he kept glancing up and down and on all sides as if in search of more comfortable quarters from which to tell the story </s>
<s> standing on one side of the stage and partly overshadowing it was tall foxglove which seemed as the evening breeze gently swayed it hither and thither to offer exactly the sort of accommodation that the orator desired </s>
<s> having once decided on his quarters it needed only second or two for him to run up the stem like tiny squirrel and to seat himself astride on the topmost bend where the fairy bells clustered most closely and from whence he could look down on his audience from such height that all shyness vanished and he began his story merrily </s>
<s> once there were mouse and crocodile and man and goat and lion had never heard the dramatis personae tumbled into story with such profusion and in such reckless haste and it fairly took my breath away </s>
<s> even sylvie gave little gasp and allowed three of the frogs who seemed to be getting tired of the entertainment to hop away into the ditch without attempting to stop them </s>
<s> and the mouse found shoe and it thought it were mouse trap </s>
<s> so it got right in and it stayed in ever so long why did it stay in said sylvie </s>
<s> her function seemed to be much the same as that of the chorus in greek play she had to encourage the orator and draw him out by series of intelligent questions </s>
<s> cause it thought it couldn't get out again bruno explained </s>
<s> it were clever mouse </s>
<s> it knew it couldn't get out of traps but why did it go in at all said sylvie </s>
<s> and it jamp and it jamp bruno proceeded ignoring this question and at last it got right out again </s>
<s> and it looked at the mark in the shoe </s>
<s> and the man's name were in it </s>
<s> so it knew it wasn't its own shoe had it thought it was said sylvie </s>
<s> why didn't tell oo it thought it were mouse trap the indignant orator replied </s>
<s> please mister sir will oo make sylvie attend sylvie was silenced and was all attention in fact she and were most of the audience now as the frogs kept hopping away and there were very few of them left </s>
<s> so the mouse gave the man his shoe </s>
<s> and the man were welly glad cause he hadn't got but one shoe and he were hopping to get the other here ventured on question </s>
<s> do you mean hopping or hoping bofe said bruno </s>
<s> and the man took the goat out of the sack we haven't heard of the sack before said </s>
<s> nor you won't hear of it again said bruno </s>
<s> and he said to the goat oo will walk about here till comes back and he went and he tumbled into deep hole </s>
<s> and the goat walked round and round </s>
<s> and it walked under the tree </s>
<s> and it wug its tail </s>
<s> and it looked up in the tree </s>
<s> and it sang sad little song </s>
<s> oo never heard such sad little song can you sing it bruno asked </s>
<s> iss can bruno readily replied </s>
<s> and sa'n </s>
<s> it would make sylvie cry it wouldn't sylvie interrupted in great indignation </s>
<s> and don't believe the goat sang it at all it did though said bruno </s>
<s> it singed it right froo </s>
<s> sawed it singing with its long beard it couldn't sing with its beard said hoping to puzzle the little fellow beard isn't voice well then oo couldn't walk with sylvie bruno cried triumphantly </s>
<s> sylvie isn't foot thought had better follow sylvie's example and be silent for while </s>
<s> bruno was too sharp for us </s>
<s> and when it had singed all the song it ran away for to get along to look for the man oo know </s>
<s> and the crocodile got along after it for to bite it oo know </s>
<s> and the mouse got along after the crocodile wasn't the crocodile running sylvie enquired </s>
<s> she appealed to me </s>
<s> crocodiles do run don't they suggested crawling as the proper word </s>
<s> he wasn't running said bruno and he wasn't crawling </s>
<s> he went struggling along like portmanteau </s>
<s> and he held his chin ever so high in the air what did he do that for said sylvie </s>
<s> cause he hadn't got toofache said bruno </s>
<s> ca'n oo make out nuffin wizout splain it </s>
<s> why if he'd had toofache course he'd have held his head down like this and he'd have put lot of warm blankets round it if he'd had any blankets sylvie argued </s>
<s> course he had blankets retorted her brother </s>
<s> doos oo think crocodiles goes walks wizout blankets </s>
<s> and he frowned with his eyebrows </s>
<s> and the goat was welly flightened at his eyebrows i'd never be afraid of eyebrows exclaimed sylvie </s>
<s> should think oo would though if they'd got crocodile fastened to them like these had </s>
<s> and so the man jamp and he jamp and at last he got right out of the hole sylvie gave another little gasp this rapid dodging about among the characters of the story had taken away her breath </s>
<s> and he runned away for to look for the goat oo know </s>
<s> and he heard the lion grunting lions don't grunt said sylvie </s>
<s> this one did said bruno </s>
<s> and its mouth were like large cupboard </s>
<s> and it had plenty of room in its mouth </s>
<s> and the lion runned after the man for to eat him oo know </s>
<s> and the mouse runned after the lion but the mouse was running after the crocodile said he couldn't run after both bruno sighed over the density of his audience but explained very patiently </s>
<s> he did runned after bofe cause they went the same way </s>
<s> and first he caught the crocodile and then he didn't catch the lion </s>
<s> and when he'd caught the crocodile what doos oo think he did cause he'd got pincers in his pocket ca'n guess said sylvie </s>
<s> image he wrenched out that crocodile's toof nobody couldn't guess it bruno cried in high glee </s>
<s> why he wrenched out that crocodile's toof which tooth ventured to ask </s>
<s> but bruno was not to be puzzled </s>
<s> the toof he were going to bite the goat with course he couldn't be sure about that argued unless he wrenched out all its teeth bruno laughed merrily and half sang as he swung himself backwards and forwards he did wrenched out all its teef why did the crocodile wait to have them wrenched out said sylvie </s>
<s> it had to wait said bruno </s>
<s> ventured on another question </s>
<s> but what became of the man who said you may wait here till come back he didn't say oo may bruno explained </s>
<s> he said oo will just like sylvie says to me oo will do oor lessons till twelve o'clock oh wiss he added with little sigh wiss sylvie would say oo may do oor lessons this was dangerous subject for discussion sylvie seemed to think </s>
<s> she returned to the story </s>
<s> but what became of the man well the lion springed at him </s>
<s> but it came so slow it were three weeks in the air did the man wait for it all that time said </s>
<s> course he didn't bruno replied gliding head first down the stem of the fox glove for the story was evidently close to its end </s>
<s> he sold his house and he packed up his things while the lion were coming </s>
<s> and he went and he lived in another town </s>
<s> so the lion ate the wrong man this was evidently the moral so sylvie made her final proclamation to the frogs </s>
<s> the story's finished </s>
<s> and whatever is to be learned from it she added aside to me i'm sure don't know did not feel quite clear about it myself so made no suggestion but the frogs seemed quite content moral or no moral and merely raised husky chorus of off </s>
<s> off as they hopped away </s>

<s> looking eastward </s>
<s> it's just week said three days later to arthur since we heard of lady muriel's engagement </s>
<s> think ought to call at any rate and offer my congratulations </s>
<s> won't you come with me pained expression passed over his face </s>
<s> when must you leave us he asked </s>
<s> by the first train on monday well yes will come with you </s>
<s> it would seem strange and unfriendly if didn't </s>
<s> but this is only friday </s>
<s> give me till sunday afternoon </s>
<s> shall be stronger then shading his eyes with one hand as if half ashamed of the tears that were coursing down his cheeks he held the other out to me </s>
<s> it trembled as clasped it </s>
<s> tried to frame some words of sympathy but they seemed poor and cold and left them unspoken </s>
<s> good night was all said </s>
<s> good night dear friend he replied </s>
<s> there was manly vigour in his tone that convinced me he was wrestling with and triumphing over the great sorrow that had so nearly wrecked his life and that on the stepping stone of his dead self he would surely rise to higher things </s>
<s> there was no chance was glad to think as we set out on sunday afternoon of meeting eric at the hall as he had returned to town the day after his engagement was announced </s>
<s> his presence might have disturbed the calm the almost unnatural calm with which arthur met the woman who had won his heart and murmured the few graceful words of sympathy that the occasion demanded </s>
<s> lady muriel was perfectly radiant with happiness sadness could not live in the light of such smile and even arthur brightened under it and when she remarked you see i'm watering my flowers though it is the sabbath day his voice had almost its old ring of cheerfulness as he replied even on the sabbath day works of mercy are allowed </s>
<s> but this isn't the sabbath day </s>
<s> the sabbath day has ceased to exist know it's not saturday lady muriel replied but isn't sunday often called the christian sabbath it is so called think in recognition of the spirit of the jewish institution that one day in seven should be day of rest </s>
<s> but hold that christians are freed from the literal observance of the fourth commandment then where is our authority for sunday observance we have first the fact that the seventh day was sanctified when god rested from the work of creation </s>
<s> that is binding on us as theists </s>
<s> secondly we have the fact that the lord's day is christian institution </s>
<s> that is binding on us as christians and your practical rules would be first as theists to keep it holy in some special way and to make it so far as is reasonably possible day of rest </s>
<s> secondly as christians to attend public worship and what of amusements would say of them as of all kinds of work whatever is innocent on week day is innocent on sunday provided it does not interfere with the duties of the day then you would allow children to play on sunday certainly should </s>
<s> why make the day irksome to their restless natures have letter somewhere said lady muriel from an old friend describing the way in which sunday was kept in her younger days </s>
<s> will fetch it for you had similar description viva voce years ago arthur said when she had left us from little girl </s>
<s> it was really touching to hear the melancholy tone in which she said on sunday mustn't play with my doll </s>
<s> on sunday mustn't run on the sands </s>
<s> on sunday mustn't dig in the garden poor child </s>
<s> she had indeed abundant cause for hating sunday here is the letter said lady muriel returning </s>
<s> let me read you piece of it when as child first opened my eyes on sunday morning feeling of dismal anticipation which began at least on the friday culminated </s>
<s> knew what was before me and my wish if not my word was would god it were evening it was no day of rest but day of texts of catechisms watts of tracts about converted swearers godly charwomen and edifying deaths of sinners saved </s>
<s> up with the lark hymns and portions of scripture had to be learned by heart till o'clock when there were family prayers then breakfast which was never able to enjoy partly from the fast already undergone and partly from the outlook dreaded </s>
<s> at came sunday school and it made me indignant to be put into the class with the village children as well as alarmed lest by some mistake of mine should be put below them </s>
<s> the church service was veritable wilderness of zin </s>
<s> wandered in it pitching the tabernacle of my thoughts on the lining of the square family pew the fidgets of my small brothers and the horror of knowing that on the monday should have to write out from memory jottings of the rambling disconnected extempore sermon which might have had any text but its own and to stand or fall by the result </s>
<s> this was followed by cold dinner at servants to have no work sunday school again from to and evening service at </s>
<s> the intervals were perhaps the greatest trial of all from the efforts had to make to be less than usually sinful by reading books and sermons as barren as the dead sea </s>
<s> there was but one rosy spot in the distance all that day and that was bed time which never could come too early such teaching was well meant no doubt said arthur but it must have driven many of its victims into deserting the church services altogether i'm afraid was deserter this morning she gravely said </s>
<s> had to write to eric </s>
<s> would you would you mind my telling you something he said about prayer </s>
<s> it had never struck me in that light before in what light said arthur </s>
<s> why that all nature goes by fixed regular laws science has proved that </s>
<s> so that asking god to do anything except of course praying for spiritual blessings is to expect miracle and we've no right to do that </s>
<s> i've not put it as well as he did but that was the outcome of it and it has confused me </s>
<s> please tell me what you can say in answer to it don't propose to discuss captain lindon's difficulties arthur gravely replied specially as he is not present </s>
<s> but if it is your difficulty his voice unconsciously took tenderer tone then will speak it is my difficulty she said anxiously </s>
<s> then will begin by asking why did you except spiritual blessings is not your mind part of nature yes but free will comes in there can choose this or that and god can influence my choice then you are not fatalist oh no she earnestly exclaimed </s>
<s> thank god arthur said to himself but in so low whisper that only heard it </s>
<s> you grant then that can by an act of free choice move this cup suiting the action to the word this way or that way yes grant it well let us see how far the result is produced by fixed laws </s>
<s> the cup moves because certain mechanical forces are impressed on it by my hand </s>
<s> my hand moves because certain forces electric magnetic or whatever nerve force may prove to be are impressed on it by my brain </s>
<s> this nerve force stored in the brain would probably be traceable if science were complete to chemical forces supplied to the brain by the blood and ultimately derived from the food eat and the air breathe but would not that be fatalism </s>
<s> where would free will come in in choice of nerves replied arthur </s>
<s> the nerve force in the brain may flow just as naturally down one nerve as down another </s>
<s> we need something more than fixed law of nature to settle which nerve shall carry it </s>
<s> that something is free will her eyes sparkled see what you mean she exclaimed </s>
<s> human free will is an exception to the system of fixed law </s>
<s> eric said something like that </s>
<s> and then think he pointed out that god can only influence nature by influencing human wills </s>
<s> so that we might reasonably pray give us this day our daily bread because many of the causes that produce bread are under man's control </s>
<s> but to pray for rain or fine weather would be as unreasonable as she checked herself as if fearful of saying something irreverent </s>
<s> in hushed low tone that trembled with emotion and with the solemnity of one in the presence of death arthur slowly replied shalt he that contendeth with the almighty instruct him </s>
<s> shall we the swarm that in the noontide beam were born feeling in ourselves the power to direct this way or that the forces of nature of nature of which we form so trivial part shall we in our boundless arrogance in our pitiful conceit deny that power to the ancient of days </s>
<s> saying to our creator thus far and no further </s>
<s> thou madest but thou canst not rule lady muriel had covered her face in her hands and did not look up </s>
<s> she only murmured thanks thanks again and again </s>
<s> we rose to go </s>
<s> arthur said with evident effort one word more </s>
<s> if you would know the power of prayer in anything and everything that man can need try it </s>
<s> ask and it shall be given you </s>
<s> have tried it </s>
<s> know that god answers prayer our walk home was silent one till we had nearly reached the lodgings then arthur murmured and it was almost an echo of my own thoughts what knowest thou wife whether thou shalt save thy husband the subject was not touched on again </s>
<s> we sat on talking while hour after hour of this our last night together glided away unnoticed </s>
<s> he had much to tell me about india and the new life he was going to and the work he hoped to do </s>
<s> and his great generous soul seemed so filled with noble ambition as to have no space left for any vain regret or selfish repining </s>
<s> come it is nearly morning </s>
<s> arthur said at last rising and leading the way upstairs </s>
<s> the sun will be rising in few minutes and though have basely defrauded you of your last chance of night's rest here i'm sure you'll forgive me for really couldn't bring myself to say good night sooner </s>
<s> and god knows whether you'll ever see me again or hear of me hear of you am certain shall warmly responded and quoted the concluding lines of that strange poem waring oh never star was lost here but it rose afar look east where whole new thousands are </s>
<s> in vishnu land what avatar aye look eastward arthur eagerly replied pausing at the stair case window which commanded fine view of the sea and the eastward horizon </s>
<s> the west is the fitting tomb for all the sorrow and the sighing all the errors and the follies of the past for all its withered hopes and all its buried loves </s>
<s> from the east comes new strength new ambition new hope new life new love </s>
<s> look eastward </s>
<s> aye look eastward his last words were still ringing in my ears as entered my room and undrew the window curtains just in time to see the sun burst in glory from his ocean prison and clothe the world in the light of new day </s>
<s> so may it be for him and me and all of us mused </s>
<s> all that is evil and dead and hopeless fading with the night that is past </s>
<s> all that is good and living and hopeful rising with the dawn of day </s>
<s> fading with the night the chilly mists and the noxious vapours and the heavy shadows and the wailing gusts and the owl's melancholy hootings rising with the day the darting shafts of light and the wholesome morning breeze and the warmth of dawning life and the mad music of the lark </s>
<s> look eastward </s>
<s> fading with the night the clouds of ignorance and the deadly blight of sin and the silent tears of sorrow and ever rising higher higher with the day the radiant dawn of knowledge and the sweet breath of purity and the throb of world's ecstasy </s>
<s> look eastward </s>
<s> image look eastward fading with the night the memory of dead love and the withered leaves of blighted hope and the sickly repinings and moody regrets thatnumb the best energies of the soul and rising broadening rolling upward like living flood the manly resolve and the dauntless will and the heavenward gaze of faith the substance of things hoped for the evidence of things not seen </s>
<s> look eastward </s>
<s> aye look eastward </s>
<s> pg symbolic logic by lewis carroll pg ii pg iii pg iv syllogism worked out </s>
<s> that story of yours about your once meeting the sea serpent always sets me off yawning never yawn unless when i'm listening to something totally devoid of interest </s>
<s> the premisses separately </s>
<s> the premisses combined </s>
<s> the conclusion </s>
<s> that story of yours about your once meeting the sea serpent is totally devoid of interest </s>
<s> pg symbolic logic part elementary by lewis carroll second thousand fourth edition price two shillings london macmillan and co limited new york the macmillan company all rights reserved pg vi richard clay and sons limited london and bungay pg vii advertisement </s>
<s> an envelope containing two blank diagrams biliteral and triliteral and counters red and grey may be had from messrs </s>
<s> macmillan for by post shall be grateful to any reader of this book who will point out any mistakes or misprints he may happen to notice in it or any passage which he thinks is not clearly expressed </s>
<s> have quantity of ms </s>
<s> in hand for parts ii and iii and hope to be able should life and health and opportunity be granted to me to publish them in the course of the next few years </s>
<s> their contents will be as follows part ii </s>
<s> advanced further investigations in the subjects of part </s>
<s> propositions of other forms such as not all are </s>
<s> triliteral and multiliteral propositions such as all abc are de </s>

<s> transcendental analysis of proposition into its elements </s>
<s> numerical and geometrical problems </s>

<s> pg viii preface to the fourth edition </s>
<s> the chief alterations since the first edition have been made in the chapter on classification pp </s>
<s> and the book on propositions pp </s>
<s> to </s>
<s> the chief additions have been the questions on words and phrases added to the examination papers at </s>
<s> and the notes inserted at pp </s>
<s> </s>
<s> in book chapter ii have adopted new definition of classification which enables me to regard the whole universe as class and thus to dispense with the very awkward phrase set of things in the chapter on propositions of existence have adopted new normal form in which the class whose existence is affirmed or denied is regarded as the predicate instead of the subject of the proposition thus evading very subtle difficulty which besets the other form </s>
<s> these subtle difficulties seem to lie at the root of every tree of knowledge and they are far more hopeless to grapple with than any that occur in its higher branches </s>
<s> for example the difficulties of the forty seventh proposition of euclid are mere child's play compared with the mental torture endured in the effort to think out the essential nature of straight line </s>
<s> and in the present work the difficulties of the liars problem at </s>
<s> are trifles light as air compared with the bewildering question what is thing in the chapter on propositions of relation have inserted new section containing the proof that proposition beginning with all is double proposition fact that is quite independent of the arbitrary rule laid down in the next section that such proposition is to be understood as implying the actual existence of its subject </s>
<s> this proof was given in the earlier editions incidentally in the course of the discussion of the biliteral diagram but its proper place in this treatise is where have now introduced it </s>
<s> pg ix in the sorites examples have made good many verbal alterations in order to evade difficulty which fear will have perplexed some of the readers of the first three editions </s>
<s> some of the premisses were so worded that their terms were not specieses of the univ </s>
<s> named in the dictionary but of larger class of which the univ </s>
<s> was only portion </s>
<s> in all such cases it was intended that the reader should perceive that what was asserted of the larger class was thereby asserted of the univ and should ignore as superfluous all that it asserted of its other portion </s>
<s> thus in ex </s>
<s> the univ </s>
<s> was stated to be ducks in this village and the third premiss was mrs bond has no gray ducks </s>
<s> no gray ducks are ducks belonging to mrs bond here the terms are not specieses of the univ but of the larger class ducks of which the univ </s>
<s> is only portion and it was intended that the reader should perceive that what is here asserted of ducks is thereby asserted of ducks in this village and should treat this premiss as if it were mrs bond has no gray ducks in this village and should ignore as superfluous what it asserts as to the other portion of the class ducks viz </s>
<s> mrs bond has no gray ducks out of this village </s>
<s> in the appendix have given new version of the problem of the five liars my object in doing so is to escape the subtle and mysterious difficulties which beset all attempts at regarding proposition as being its own subject or set of propositions as being subjects for one another </s>
<s> it is certainly most bewildering and unsatisfactory theory one cannot help feeling that there is great lack of substance in all this shadowy host that as the procession of phantoms glides before us there is not one that we can pounce upon and say here is proposition that must be either true or false that it is but barmecide feast to which we have been bidden and that its prototype is to be found in that mythical island whose inhabitants earned precarious living by taking in each others washing </s>
<s> by simply translating telling truths into taking both of condiments salt and mustard telling lies into taking neither of them and telling truth and lie order not specified into taking only one condiment it is not specified which have escaped all those metaphysical puzzles and have produced problem which when translated into set of symbolized premisses furnishes the very same data as were furnished by the problem of the five liars pg the coined words introduced in previous editions such as eliminands and retinends perhaps hardly need any apology they were indispensable to my system but the new plural here used for the first time viz </s>
<s> soriteses will fear be condemned as bad english unless say word in its defence </s>
<s> we have three singular nouns in english of plural form series species and sorites in all three the awkwardness of using the same word for both singular and plural must often have been felt this has been remedied in the case of series by coining the plural serieses which has already found its way into the dictionaries so am no rash innovator but am merely following suit in using the new plural soriteses </s>
<s> in conclusion let me point out that even those who are obliged to study formal logic with view to being able to answer examination papers in that subject will find the study of symbolic logic most helpful for this purpose in throwing light upon many of the obscurities with which formal logic abounds and in furnishing delightfully easy method of testing the results arrived at by the cumbrous processes which formal logic enforces upon its votaries </s>
<s> this is believe the very first attempt with the exception of my own little book the game of logic published in very incomplete performance that has been made to popularise this fascinating subject </s>
<s> it has cost me years of hard work but if it should prove as hope it may to be of real service to the young and to be taken up in high schools and in private families as valuable addition to their stock of healthful mental recreations such result would more than repay ten times the labour that have expended on it </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> bedford street strand </s>
<s> christmas pg xi introduction </s>
<s> to learners </s>
<s> some remarks addressed to teachers will be found in the appendix at </s>
<s> the learner who wishes to try the question fairly whether this little book does or does not supply the materials for most interesting mental recreation is earnestly advised to adopt the following rules begin at the beginning and do not allow yourself to gratify mere idle curiosity by dipping into the book here and there </s>
<s> this would very likely lead to your throwing it aside with the remark this is much too hard for me and thus losing the chance of adding very large item to your stock of mental delights </s>
<s> this rule of not dipping is very desirable with other kinds of books such as novels for instance where you may easily spoil much of the enjoyment you would otherwise get from the story by dipping into it further on so that what the author meant to be pleasant surprise comes to you as matter of course </s>
<s> some people know make practice of looking into vol </s>
<s> iii first just to see how the story ends and perhaps it is as well just to know that all ends happily that the much persecuted lovers do marry after all that he is proved to be quite innocent of the murder that the wicked cousin is completely foiled in his plot and gets the punishment he deserves and that the rich uncle in india qu why in india </s>
<s> ans because somehow uncles never can get rich anywhere else dies at exactly the right moment before taking the trouble to read vol </s>
<s> </s>
<s> this say is just permissible with novel where vol </s>
<s> iii has meaning even for those who have not read the earlier part of the story but with scientific book it is sheer insanity you will find the latter part hopelessly unintelligible if you read it before reaching it in regular course </s>
<s> pg xii don't begin any fresh chapter or section until you are certain that you thoroughly understand the whole book up to that point and that you have worked correctly most if not all of the examples which have been set </s>
<s> so long as you are conscious that all the land you have passed through is absolutely conquered and that you are leaving no unsolved difficulties behind you which will be sure to turn up again later on your triumphal progress will be easy and delightful </s>
<s> otherwise you will find your state of puzzlement get worse and worse as you proceed till you give up the whole thing in utter disgust </s>
<s> when you come to any passage you don't understand read it again if you still don't understand it read it again if you fail even after three readings very likely your brain is getting little tired </s>
<s> in that case put the book away and take to other occupations and next day when you come to it fresh you will very likely find that it is quite easy </s>
<s> if possible find some genial friend who will read the book along with you and will talk over the difficulties with you </s>
<s> talking is wonderful smoother over of difficulties </s>
<s> when come upon anything in logic or in any other hard subject that entirely puzzles me find it capital plan to talk it over aloud even when am all alone </s>
<s> one can explain things so clearly to one's self </s>
<s> and then you know one is so patient with one's self one never gets irritated at one's own stupidity </s>
<s> if dear reader you will faithfully observe these rules and so give my little book really fair trial promise you most confidently that you will find symbolic logic to be one of the most if not the most fascinating of mental recreations </s>
<s> in this first part have carefully avoided all difficulties which seemed to me to be beyond the grasp of an intelligent child of say twelve or fourteen years of age </s>
<s> have myself taught most of its contents viv voce to many children and have found them take real intelligent interest in the subject </s>
<s> for those who succeed in mastering part and who begin like oliver asking for more hope to provide in part ii some tolerably hard nuts to crack nuts that will require all the nut crackers they happen to possess </s>
<s> pg xiii mental recreation is thing that we all of us need for our mental health and you may get much healthy enjoyment no doubt from games such as back gammon chess and the new game halma </s>
<s> but after all when you have made yourself first rate player at any one of these games you have nothing real to show for it as result you enjoyed the game and the victory no doubt at the time but you have no result that you can treasure up and get real good out of </s>
<s> and all the while you have been leaving unexplored perfect mine of wealth </s>
<s> once master the machinery of symbolic logic and you have mental occupation always at hand of absorbing interest and one that will be of real use to you in any subject you may take up </s>
<s> it will give you clearness of thought the ability to see your way through puzzle the habit of arranging your ideas in an orderly and get at able form and more valuable than all the power to detect fallacies and to tear to pieces the flimsy illogical arguments which you will so continually encounter in books in newspapers in speeches and even in sermons and which so easily delude those who have never taken the trouble to master this fascinating art </s>
<s> try it that is all ask of you </s>
