<s> six friends and their six wives are staying in the same hotel and they all walk out daily in parties of various size and composition </s>
<s> to ensure variety in these daily walks they have agree to observe the following rules if acres is with </s>
<s> is in the same party with his wife and barry with his and eden with mrs hall cole must be with mrs dix if acres is with his wife and hall with his and barry with mrs cole dix must not be with mrs eden if cole and dix and their wives are all in the same party and acres not with mrs barry eden must not be with mrs hall if acres is with his wife and dix with his and barry not with mrs cole eden must be with mrs hall if eden is with his wife and hall with his and cole with mrs dix acres must not be with mrs barry if barry and cole and their wives are all in the same party and eden not with mrs hall dix must be with mrs eden </s>
<s> the problem is to prove that there must be every day at least one married couple who are not in the same party </s>
<s> pg </s>
<s> after the six friends named in problem had returned from their tour three of them barry cole and dix agreed with two other friends of theirs lang and mill that the five should meet every day at certain table d'h te </s>
<s> remembering how much amusement they had derived from their code of rules for walking parties they devised the following rules to be observed whenever beef appeared on the table if barry takes salt then either cole or lang takes one only of the two condiments salt and mustard if he takes mustard then either dix takes neither condiment or mill takes both </s>
<s> if cole takes salt then either barry takes only one condiment or mill takes neither if he takes mustard then either dix or lang takes both </s>
<s> if dix takes salt then either barry takes neither condiment or cole take both if he takes mustard then either lang or mill takes neither </s>
<s> if lang takes salt then barry or dix takes only one condiment if he takes mustard then either cole or mill takes neither </s>
<s> if mill takes salt then either barry or lang takes both condiments if he takes mustard then either cole or dix takes only one </s>
<s> the problem is to discover whether these rules are compatible and if so what arrangements are possible </s>
<s> </s>
<s> in this problem it is assumed that the phrase if barry takes salt allows of two possible cases viz </s>
<s> he takes salt only he takes both condiments </s>
<s> and so with all similar phrases </s>
<s> it is also assumed that the phrase either cole or lang takes one only of the two condiments allows three possible cases viz </s>
<s> cole takes one only lang takes both or neither cole takes both or neither lang takes one only cole takes one only lang takes one only </s>
<s> and so with all similar phrases </s>
<s> it is also assumed that every rule is to be understood as implying the words and vice vers thus the first rule would imply the addition and if either cole or lang takes only one condiment then barry takes salt pg </s>
<s> brothers who are much admired are apt to be self conscious when two men of the same height are on opposite sides in politics if one of them has his admirers so also has the other brothers who avoid general society look well when walking together whenever you find two men who differ in politics and in their views of society and who are not both of them ugly you may be sure that they look well when walking together ugly men who look well when walking together are not both of them free from self consciousness brothers who differs in politics and are not both of them handsome never give themselves airs john declines to go into society but never gives himself airs brothers who are apt to be self conscious though not both of them handsome usually dislike society men of the same height who do not give themselves airs are free from self consciousness men who agree on questions of art though they differ in politics and who are not both of them ugly are always admired men who hold opposite views about art and are not admired always give themselves airs brothers of the same height always differ in politics two handsome men who are neither both of them admired nor both of them self conscious are no doubt of different heights brothers who are self conscious and do not both of them like society never look well when walking together </s>
<s> </s>
<s> see note at end of problem pg </s>
<s> man can always master his father an inferior of man's uncle owes that man money the father of an enemy of friend of man owes that man nothing man is always persecuted by his son's creditors an inferior of the master of man's son is senior to that man grandson of man's junior is not his nephew servant of an inferior of friend of man's enemy is never persecuted by that man friend of superior of the master of man's victim is that man's enemy an enemy of persecutor of servant of man's father is that man's friend </s>
<s> the problem is to deduce some fact about great grandsons </s>
<s> </s>
<s> in this problem it is assumed that all the men here referred to live in the same town and that every pair of them are either friends or enemies that every pair are related as senior and junior superior and inferior and that certain pairs are related as creditor and debtor father and son master and servant persecutor and victim uncle and nephew </s>
<s> jack sprat could eat no fat his wife could eat no lean and so between them both they licked the platter clean solve this as sorites problem taking lines and as the conclusion to be proved </s>
<s> it is permitted to use as premisses not only all that is here asserted but also all that we may reasonably understand to be implied </s>
<s> pg notes to appendix </s>
<s> see </s>
<s> line it may perhaps occur to the reader who has studied formal logic that the argument here applied to the propositions and will apply equally well to the propositions and since in the ordinary text books the propositions all xy are and some xy are not are regarded as contradictories </s>
<s> hence it may appear to him that the argument might have been put as follows we now have and asserting hence if the proposition all xy are be true some things exist with the attributes and </s>
<s> some are also we know that if the proposition some xy are not be true the same result follows </s>
<s> but these two propositions are contradictories so that one or other of them must be true </s>
<s> hence this result is always true </s>
<s> the proposition some are is always true </s>
<s> quod est absurdum hence cannot assert this matter will be discussed in part ii but may as well give here what seems to me to be an irresistable proof that this view that and are contradictories though adopted in the ordinary text books is untenable </s>
<s> the proof is as follows with regard to the relationship existing between the class xy and the two classes and not there are four conceivable states of things viz </s>
<s> some xy are and some are not none no xy some none of these four no </s>
<s> is equivalent to all xy are no </s>
<s> is equivalent to all xy are not and no </s>
<s> is equivalent to no xy exist now it is quite undeniable that of these four states of things each is priori possible some one must be true and the other three must be false </s>
<s> hence the contradictory to is either or or is true now the assertion either or is true is equivalent to some xy are not and the assertion is true is equivalent to no xy exist hence the contradictory to all xy are may be expressed as the alternative proposition either some xy are not or no xy exist but not as the categorical proposition some are not pg see </s>
<s> at end of section there are yet other views current among the logicians as to the existential import of propositions which have not been mentioned in this section </s>
<s> one is that the proposition some are is to be interpreted neither as some exist and are nor yet as if there were any in existence some of them would be but merely as some can be </s>
<s> the attributes and are compatible </s>
<s> on this theory there would be nothing offensive in my telling my friend jones some of your brothers are swindlers since if he indignantly retorted what do you mean by such insulting language you scoundrel should calmly reply merely mean that the thing is conceivable that some of your brothers might possibly be swindlers </s>
<s> but it may well be doubted whether such an explanation would entirely appease the wrath of jones </s>
<s> another view is that the proposition all are sometimes implies the actual existence of and sometimes does not imply it and that we cannot tell without having it in concrete form which interpretation we are to give to it </s>
<s> this view is think strongly supported by common usage and it will be fully discussed in part ii but the difficulties which it introduces seem to me too formidable to be even alluded to in part which am trying to make as far as possible easily intelligible to mere beginners </s>
<s> see </s>
<s> the three conclusions are no conceited child of mine is greedy none of my boys could solve this problem some unlearned boys are not choristers pg index </s>

<s> the game of logic by lewis carroll colours for counters see the sun is overhead shining on us full and red </s>

<s> the game of logic by lewis carrol to my child friend </s>
<s> charm in vain for never again all keenly as my glance bend will memory goddess coy embody for my joy departed days nor let me gaze on thee my fairy friend </s>
<s> yet could thy face in mystic grace moment smile on me twould send far darting rays of light from heaven athwart the night by which to read in very deed thy spirit sweetest friend </s>
<s> so may the stream of life's long dream flow gently onward to its end with many floweret gay adown its willowy way may no sigh vex no care perplex my loving little friend </s>
<s> nota bene </s>
<s> with each copy of this book is given an envelope containing diagram similar to the frontispiece on card and nine counters four red and five grey </s>
<s> the envelope </s>
<s> can be had separately at </s>
<s> each </s>
<s> the author will be very grateful for suggestions especially from beginners in logic of any alterations or further explanations that may seem desirable </s>
<s> letters should be addressed to him at bedford street covent garden london preface there foam'd rebellious logic gagg'd and bound this game requires nine counters four of one colour and five of another say four red and five grey </s>
<s> besides the nine counters it also requires one player at least </s>
<s> am not aware of any game that can be played with less than this number while there are several that require more take cricket for instance which requires twenty two </s>
<s> how much easier it is when you want to play game to find one player than twenty two </s>
<s> at the same time though one player is enough good deal more amusement may be got by two working at it together and correcting each other's mistakes </s>
<s> second advantage possessed by this game is that besides being an endless source of amusement the number of arguments that may be worked by it being infinite it will give the players little instruction as well </s>
<s> but is there any great harm in that so long as you get plenty of amusement </s>

<s> chapter </s>
<s> new lamps for old </s>

<s> propositions </s>
<s> some new cakes are nice no new cakes are nice all new cakes are nice there are three propositions for you the only three kinds we are going to use in this game and the first thing to be done is to learn how to express them on the board </s>
<s> let us begin with some new cakes are nice but before doing so remark has to be made one that is rather important and by no means easy to understand all in moment so please to read this very carefully </s>
<s> the world contains many things such as buns babies beetles </s>
<s> battledores </s>
<s> and these things possess many attributes such as baked beautiful black broken in fact whatever can be attributed to that is said to belong to any thing is an attribute </s>
<s> whenever we wish to mention thing we use substantive when we wish to mention an attribute we use an adjective </s>
<s> people have asked the question can thing exist without any attributes belonging to it it is very puzzling question and i'm not going to try to answer it let us turn up our noses and treat it with contemptuous silence as if it really wasn't worth noticing </s>
<s> but if they put it the other way and ask can an attribute exist without any thing for it to belong to we may say at once no no more than baby could go railway journey with no one to take care of it you never saw beautiful floating about in the air or littered about on the floor without any thing to be beautiful now did you </s>
<s> and now what am driving at in all this long rigmarole </s>
<s> it is this </s>
<s> you may put is or are between names of two things for example some pigs are fat animals or between the names of two attributes for example pink is light red and in each case it will make good sense </s>
<s> but if you put is or are between the name of thing and the name of an attribute for example some pigs are pink you do not make good sense for how can thing be an attribute unless you have an understanding with the person to whom you are speaking </s>
<s> and the simplest understanding would think be this that the substantive shall be supposed to be repeated at the end of the sentence so that the sentence if written out in full would be some pigs are pink pigs </s>
<s> and now the word are makes quite good sense </s>
<s> thus in order to make good sense of the proposition some new cakes are nice we must suppose it to be written out in full in the form some new cakes are nice cakes </s>
<s> now this contains two terms new cakes being one of them and nice cakes the other </s>
<s> new cakes being the one we are talking about is called the subject of the proposition and nice cakes the predicate </s>
<s> also this proposition is said to be particular one since it does not speak of the whole of its subject but only of part of it </s>
<s> the other two kinds are said to be universal because they speak of the whole of their subjects the one denying niceness and the other asserting it of the whole class of new cakes </s>
<s> lastly if you would like to have definition of the word proposition itself you may take this sentence stating that some or none or all of the things belonging to certain class called its subject are also things belonging to certain other class called its predicate </s>
<s> you will find these seven words proposition attribute term subject predicate particular universal charmingly useful if any friend should happen to ask if you have ever studied logic </s>
<s> mind you bring all seven words into your answer and you friend will go away deeply impressed sadder and wiser man </s>
<s> now please to look at the smaller diagram on the board and suppose it to be cupboard intended for all the cakes in the world it would have to be good large one of course </s>
<s> and let us suppose all the new ones to be put into the upper half marked and all the rest that is the not new ones into the lower half marked </s>
<s> thus the lower half would contain elderly cakes aged cakes ante diluvian cakes if there are any haven't seen many myself and so on </s>
<s> let us also suppose all the nice cakes to be put into the left hand half marked and all the rest that is the not nice ones into the right hand half marked </s>
<s> at present then we must understand to mean new not new nice and not nice and now what kind of cakes would you expect to find in compartment no </s>
<s> </s>
<s> it is part of the upper half you see so that if it has any cakes in it they must be new and it is part of the left hand half so that they must be nice </s>
<s> hence if there are any cakes in this compartment they must have the double attribute new and nice or if we use letters the must be observe that the letters are written on two of the edges of this compartment </s>
<s> this you will find very convenient rule for knowing what attributes belong to the things in any compartment </s>
<s> take no </s>
<s> for instance </s>
<s> if there are any cakes there they must be that is they must be not new and nice now let us make another agreement that red counter in compartment shall mean that it is occupied that is that there are some cakes in it </s>
<s> the word some in logic means one or more so that single cake in compartment would be quite enough reason for saying there are some cakes here </s>
<s> also let us agree that grey counter in compartment shall mean that it is empty that is that there are no cakes in it </s>
<s> in the following diagrams shall put meaning one or more where you are to put red counter and meaning none where you are to put grey one </s>
<s> as the subject of our proposition is to be new cakes we are only concerned at present with the upper half of the cupboard where all the cakes have the attribute that is new now fixing our attention on this upper half suppose we found it marked like this that is with red counter in no </s>
<s> </s>
<s> what would this tell us with regard to the class of new cakes </s>
<s> would it not tell us that there are some of them in the compartment </s>
<s> that is that some of them besides having the attribute which belongs to both compartments have the attribute that is nice </s>
<s> this we might express by saying some cakes are cakes or putting words instead of letters some new cakes are nice cakes or in shorter form some new cakes are nice </s>
<s> at last we have found out how to represent the first proposition of this section </s>
<s> if you have not clearly understood all have said go no further but read it over and over again till you do understand it </s>
<s> after that is once mastered you will find all the rest quite easy </s>
<s> it will save little trouble in doing the other propositions if we agree to leave out the word cakes altogether </s>
<s> find it convenient to call the whole class of things for which the cupboard is intended the universe thus we might have begun this business by saying let us take universe of cakes sounds nice doesn't it of course any other things would have done just as well as cakes </s>
<s> we might make propositions about universe of lizards or even universe of hornets </s>
<s> wouldn't that be charming universe to live in so far then we have learned that means some and </s>
<s> some new are nice think you will see without further explanation that means some are </s>
<s> some new are not nice now let us put grey counter into no </s>
<s> and ask ourselves the meaning of this tells us that the compartment is empty which we may express by no are or no new cakes are nice </s>
<s> this is the second of the three propositions at the head of this section </s>
<s> in the same way would mean no are or no new cakes are not nice what would you make of this wonder </s>
<s> hope you will not have much trouble in making out that this represents double proposition namely some are and some are </s>
<s> some new are nice and some are not nice the following is little harder perhaps this means no are and none are </s>
<s> no new are nice and none are not nice which leads to the rather curious result that no new exist </s>
<s> no cakes are new this is because nice and not nice make what we call an exhaustive division of the class new cakes </s>
<s> between them they exhaust the whole class so that all the new cakes that exist must be found in one or the other of them </s>
<s> and now suppose you had to represent with counters the contradictory to no cakes are new which would be some cakes are new or putting letters for words some cakes are how would you do it </s>
<s> this will puzzle you little expect </s>
<s> evidently you must put red counter somewhere in the half of the cupboard since you know there are some new cakes </s>
<s> but you must not put it into the left hand compartment since you do not know them to be nice nor may you put it into the right hand one since you do not know them to be not nice </s>
<s> what then are you to do </s>
<s> think the best way out of the difficulty is to place the red counter on the division line between the xy compartment and the xy compartment </s>
<s> this shall represent as always put where you are to put red counter by the diagram our ingenious american cousins have invented phrase to express the position of man who wants to join one or the other of two parties such as their two parties democrats and republicans but can't make up his mind which </s>
<s> such man is said to be sitting on the fence now that is exactly the position of the red counter you have just placed on the division line </s>
<s> he likes the look of no </s>
<s> and he likes the look of no </s>
<s> and he doesn't know which to jump down into </s>
<s> so there he sits astride silly fellow dangling his legs one on each side of the fence </s>
<s> now am going to give you much harder one to make out </s>
<s> what does this mean </s>
<s> this is clearly double proposition </s>
<s> it tells us not only that some are but also the no are not hence the result is all are </s>
<s> all new cakes are nice which is the last of the three propositions at the head of this section </s>
<s> we see then that the universal proposition all new cakes are nice consists of two propositions taken together namely some new cakes are nice and no new cakes are not nice in the same way would mean all are that is all new cakes are not nice now what would you make of such proposition as the cake you have given me is nice </s>
<s> is it particular or universal </s>
<s> particular of course you readily reply </s>
<s> one single cake is hardly worth calling some even no my dear impulsive reader it is universal </s>
<s> remember that few as they are and grant you they couldn't well be fewer they are or rather it is all that you have given me </s>
<s> thus if leaving red out of the question divide my universe of cakes into two classes the cakes you have given me to which assign the upper half of the cupboard and those you haven't given me which are to go below find the lower half fairly full and the upper one as nearly as possible empty </s>
<s> and then when am told to put an upright division into each half keeping the nice cakes to the left and the not nice ones to the right begin by carefully collecting all the cakes you have given me saying to myself from time to time generous creature </s>
<s> how shall ever repay such kindness and piling them up in the left hand compartment </s>
<s> and it doesn't take long to do it </s>
<s> here is another universal proposition for you </s>
<s> barzillai beckalegg is an honest man that means all the barzillai beckaleggs that am now considering are honest men you think invented that name now don't you </s>
<s> but didn't </s>
<s> it's on carrier's cart somewhere down in cornwall this kind of universal proposition where the subject is single thing is called an individual proposition </s>
<s> now let us take nice cakes as the subject of proposition that is let us fix our thoughts on the left hand half of the cupboard where all the cakes have attribute that is nice suppose we find it marked like this what would that tell us </s>
<s> hope that it is not necessary after explaining the horizontal oblong so fully to spend much time over the upright one </s>
<s> hope you will see for yourself that this means some are that is some nice cakes are new but you will say we have had this case before </s>
<s> you put red counter into no </s>
<s> and you told us it meant some new cakes are nice and now you tell us that it means some nice cakes are new </s>
<s> can it mean both the question is very thoughtful one and does you great credit dear reader </s>
<s> it does mean both </s>
<s> if you choose to take that is new cakes as your subject and to regard no </s>
<s> as part of horizontal oblong you may read it some are that is some new cakes are nice but if you choose to take that is nice cake as your subject and to regard no </s>
<s> as part of an upright oblong then you may read it some are that is some nice cakes are new </s>
<s> they are merely two different ways of expressing the very same truth </s>
<s> without more words will simply set down the other ways in which this upright oblong might be marked adding the meaning in each case </s>
<s> by comparing them with the various cases of the horizontal oblong you will hope be able to understand them clearly </s>
<s> you will find it good plan to examine yourself on this table by covering up first one column and then the other and dodging about as the children say </s>
<s> also you will do well to write out for yourself two other tables one for the lower half of the cupboard and the other for its right hand half </s>
<s> and now think we have said all we need to say about the smaller diagram and may go on to the larger one </s>
<s> symbols </s>
<s> meanings </s>
<s> some are </s>
<s> some nice are not new </s>
<s> no are </s>
<s> no nice are new </s>
<s> observe that this is merely another way of expressing no new are nice no are </s>
<s> no nice are not new </s>
<s> some are and some are </s>
<s> some nice are new and some are not new </s>
<s> no are and none are </s>
<s> no exist </s>
<s> no cakes are nice </s>
<s> all are </s>
<s> all nice are new </s>
<s> all are </s>
<s> all nice are not new </s>
<s> this may be taken to be cupboard divided in the same way as the last but also divided into two portions for the attribute </s>
<s> let us give to the meaning wholesome and let us suppose that all wholesome cakes are placed inside the central square and all the unwholesome ones outside it that is in one or other of the four queer shaped outer compartments </s>
<s> we see that just as in the smaller diagram the cakes in each compartment had two attributes so here the cakes in each compartment have three attributes and just as the letters representing the two attributes were written on the edges of the compartment so here they are written at the corners </s>
<s> observe that is supposed to be written at each of the four outer corners so that we can tell in moment by looking at compartment what three attributes belong to the things in it </s>
<s> for instance take no </s>
<s> </s>
<s> here we find at the corners so we know that the cakes in it if there are any have the triple attribute xy'm that is new not nice and wholesome again take no </s>
<s> </s>
<s> here we find at the corners so the cakes in it are not new not nice and unwholesome remarkably untempting cakes it would take far too long to go through all the propositions containing and and and and which can be represented on this diagram there are ninety six altogether so am sure you will excuse me and must content myself with doing two or three as specimens </s>
<s> you will do well to work out lot more for yourself </s>
<s> taking the upper half by itself so that our subject is new cakes how are we to represent no new cakes are wholesome </s>
<s> this is writing letters for words no are now this tells us that none of the cakes belonging to the upper half of the cupboard are to be found inside the central square that is the two compartments no </s>
<s> and no </s>
<s> are empty </s>
<s> and this of course is represented by and now how are we to represent the contradictory proposition some are </s>
<s> this is difficulty have already considered </s>
<s> think the best way is to place red counter on the division line between no </s>
<s> and no </s>
<s> and to understand this to mean that one of the two compartments is occupied but that we do not at present know which </s>
<s> this shall represent thus now let us express all are this consists we know of two propositions some are and no are let us express the negative part first </s>
<s> this tells us that none of the cakes belonging to the upper half of the cupboard are to be found outside the central square that is the two compartments no </s>
<s> and no </s>
<s> are empty </s>
<s> this of course is represented by but we have yet to represent some are this tells us that there are some cakes in the oblong consisting of no </s>
<s> and no </s>
<s> so we place our red counter as in the previous example on the division line between no </s>
<s> and no </s>
<s> and the result is now let us try one or two interpretations </s>
<s> what are we to make of this with regard to and </s>
<s> this tells us with regard to the xy square that it is wholly empty since both compartments are so marked </s>
<s> with regard to the xy square it tells us that it is occupied </s>
<s> true it is only one compartment of it that is so marked but that is quite enough whether the other be occupied or empty to settle the fact that there is something in the square </s>
<s> if then we transfer our marks to the smaller diagram so as to get rid of the subdivisions we have right to mark it which means you know all are the result would have been exactly the same if the given oblong had been marked thus once more how shall we interpret this with regard to and </s>
<s> this tells us as to the xy square that one of its compartments is empty </s>
<s> but this information is quite useless as there is no mark in the other compartment </s>
<s> if the other compartment happened to be empty too the square would be empty and if it happened to be occupied the square would be occupied </s>
<s> so as we do not know which is the case we can say nothing about this square </s>
<s> the other square the xy square we know as in the previous example to be occupied </s>
<s> if then we transfer our marks to the smaller diagram we get merely this which means you know some are these principles may be applied to all the other oblongs </s>
<s> for instance to represent all are we should mark the right hand upright oblong the one that has the attribute thus and if we were told to interpret the lower half of the cupboard marked as follows with regard to and we should transfer it to the smaller diagram thus and read it all are two more remarks about propositions need to be made </s>
<s> one is that in every proposition beginning with some or all the actual existence of the subject is asserted </s>
<s> if for instance say all misers are selfish mean that misers actually exist </s>
<s> if wished to avoid making this assertion and merely to state the law that miserliness necessarily involves selfishness should say no misers are unselfish which does not assert that any misers exist at all but merely that if any did exist they would be selfish </s>
<s> the other is that when proposition begins with some or no and contains more that two attributes these attributes may be re arranged and shifted from one term to the other ad libitum for example some abc are def may be re arranged as some bf are acde each being equivalent to some things are abcdef </s>
<s> again no wise old men are rash and reckless gamblers may be re arranged as no rash old gamblers are wise and reckless each being equivalent to no men are wise old rash reckless gamblers </s>
<s> syllogisms now suppose we divide our universe of things in three ways with regard to three different attributes </s>
<s> out of these three attributes we may make up three different couples for instance if they were we might make up the three couples ab ac bc </s>
<s> also suppose we have two propositions given us containing two of these three couples and that from them we can prove third proposition containing the third couple </s>
<s> for example if we divide our universe for and and if we have the two propositions given us no are and all are containing the two couples mx and my it might be possible to prove from them third proposition containing and in such case we call the given propositions the premisses the third one the conclusion and the whole set syllogism </s>
<s> evidently one of the attributes must occur in both premisses or else one must occur in one premiss and its contradictory in the other </s>
<s> in the first case when for example the premisses are some are and no are the term which occurs twice is called the middle term because it serves as sort of link between the other two terms </s>
<s> in the second case when for example the premisses are no are and all are the two terms which contain these contradictory attributes may be called the middle terms </s>
<s> thus in the first case the class of things is the middle term and in the second case the two classes of things and things are the middle terms </s>
<s> the attribute which occurs in the middle term or terms disappears in the conclusion and is said to be eliminated which literally means turned out of doors </s>
<s> now let us try to draw conclusion from the two premisses some new cakes are unwholesome no nice cakes are unwholesome in order to express them with counters we need to divide cakes in three different ways with regard to newness to niceness and to wholesomeness </s>
<s> for this we must use the larger diagram making mean new nice and wholesome </s>
<s> everything inside the central square is supposed to have the attribute and everything outside it the attribute </s>
<s> not you had better adopt the rule to make mean the attribute which occurs in the middle term or terms </s>
<s> have chosen as the symbol because middle begins with now in representing the two premisses prefer to begin with the negative one the one beginning with no because grey counters can always be placed with certainty and will then help to fix the position of the red counters which are sometimes little uncertain where they will be most welcome </s>
<s> let us express the no nice cakes are unwholesome cakes </s>
<s> no cakes are cakes </s>
<s> this tells us that none of the cakes belonging to the half of the cupboard are in its compartments </s>
<s> the ones outside the central square </s>
<s> hence the two compartments no </s>
<s> and no </s>
<s> are both empty and we must place grey counter in each of them thus we have now to express the other premiss namely some new cakes are unwholesome cakes </s>
<s> some cakes are cakes </s>
<s> this tells us that some of the cakes in the half of the cupboard are in its compartments </s>
<s> hence one of the two compartments no </s>
<s> and no </s>
<s> is occupied and as we are not told in which of these two compartments to place the red counter the usual rule would be to lay it on the division line between them but in this case the other premiss has settled the matter for us by declaring no </s>
<s> to be empty </s>
<s> hence the red counter has no choice and must go into no </s>
<s> thus and now what counters will this information enable us to place in the smaller diagram so as to get some proposition involving and only leaving out </s>
<s> let us take its four compartments one by one </s>
<s> first no </s>
<s> </s>
<s> all we know about this is that its outer portion is empty but we know nothing about its inner portion </s>
<s> thus the square may be empty or it may have something in it </s>
<s> who can tell </s>
<s> so we dare not place any counter in this square </s>
<s> secondly what of no </s>
<s> </s>
<s> here we are little better off </s>
<s> we know that there is something in it for there is red counter in its outer portion </s>
<s> it is true we do not know whether its inner portion is empty or occupied but what does that matter </s>
<s> one solitary cake in one corner of the square is quite sufficient excuse for saying this square is occupied and for marking it with red counter </s>
<s> as to no </s>
<s> we are in the same condition as with no </s>
<s> we find it partly empty but we do not know whether the other part is empty or occupied so we dare not mark this square </s>
<s> and as to no </s>
<s> we have simply no information at all </s>
<s> the result is our conclusion then must be got out of the rather meager piece of information that there is red counter in the xy square </s>
<s> hence our conclusion is some are </s>
<s> some new cakes are not nice cakes or if you prefer to take as your subject some not nice cakes are new cakes but the other looks neatest </s>
<s> we will now write out the whole syllogism putting the symbol there for therefore and omitting cakes for the sake of brevity at the end of each proposition </s>
<s> note from brett the use of there is rather arbitrary selection </s>
<s> there is no font available in general practice which renders the therefore symbol correction three dots in triangular formation </s>
<s> this can be done however in html so if this document is read in browser then the symbol will be properly recognized </s>
<s> this is poor man's excuse some new cakes are unwholesome no nice cakes are unwholesome there some new cakes are not nice and you have now worked out successfully your first syllogism </s>
<s> permit me to congratulate you and to express the hope that it is but the beginning of long and glorious series of similar victories </s>
<s> we will work out one other syllogism rather harder one than the last and then think you may be safely left to play the game by yourself or better with any friend whom you can find that is able and willing to take share in the sport </s>
<s> let us see what we can make of the two premisses all dragons are uncanny all scotchmen are canny remember don't guarantee the premisses to be facts </s>
<s> in the first place never even saw dragon and in the second place it isn't of the slightest consequence to us as logicians whether our premisses are true or false all we have to do is to make out whether they lead logically to the conclusion so that if they were true it would be true also </s>
<s> you see we must give up the cakes now or our cupboard will be of no use to us </s>
<s> we must take as our universe some class of things which will include dragons and scotchmen shall we say animals </s>
<s> and as canny is evidently the attribute belonging to the middle terms we will let stand for canny for dragons and for scotchmen </s>
<s> so that our two premisses are in full all dragon animals are uncanny animals all scotchman animals are canny animals and these may be expressed using letters for words thus all are all are the first premiss consists as you already know of two parts some are and no are and the second also consists of two parts some are and no are let us take the negative portions first </s>
<s> we have then to mark on the larger diagram first no are and secondly no are </s>
<s> think you will see without further explanation that the two results separately are and that these two when combined give us we have now to mark the two positive portions some are and some are </s>
<s> the only two compartments available for things which are xm are no </s>
<s> and no </s>
<s> </s>
<s> of these no </s>
<s> is already marked as empty so our red counter must go into no </s>
<s> </s>
<s> similarly the only two available for ym are no </s>
<s> and no </s>
<s> </s>
<s> of these no </s>
<s> is already marked as empty so our red counter must go into no </s>
<s> </s>
<s> the final result is and now how much of this information can usefully be transferred to the smaller diagram </s>
<s> let us take its four compartments one by one </s>
<s> as to no </s>
<s> </s>
<s> this we see is wholly empty </s>
<s> so mark it with grey counter as to no </s>
<s> </s>
<s> this we see is occupied </s>
<s> so mark it with red counter as to no </s>
<s> </s>
<s> ditto ditto </s>
<s> as to no </s>
<s> </s>
<s> no information </s>
<s> the smaller diagram is now pretty liberally marked and now what conclusion can we read off from this </s>
<s> well it is impossible to pack such abundant information into one proposition we shall have to indulge in two this time </s>
<s> first by taking as subject we get all are that is all dragons are not scotchmen secondly by taking as subject we get all are that is all scotchmen are not dragons </s>
<s> let us now write out all together our two premisses and our brace of conclusions </s>
<s> all dragons are uncanny all scotchmen are canny </s>
<s> there all dragons are not scotchmen all scotchmen are not dragons let me mention in conclusion that you may perhaps meet with logical treatises in which it is not assumed that any thing exists at all by some are is understood to mean the attributes are compatible so that thing can have both at once and no are to mean the attributes are incompatible so that nothing can have both at once </s>
<s> in such treatises propositions have quite different meanings from what they have in our game of logic and it will be well to understand exactly what the difference is </s>
<s> first take some are </s>
<s> here we understand are to mean are as an actual fact which of course implies that some things exist </s>
<s> but they the writers of these other treatises only understand are to mean can be which does not at all imply that any exist </s>
<s> so they mean less than we do our meaning includes theirs for of course some are includes some can be but theirs does not include ours </s>
<s> for example some welsh hippopotami are heavy would be true according to these writers since the attributes welsh and heavy are quite compatible in hippopotamus but it would be false in our game since there are no welsh hippopotami to be heavy </s>
<s> secondly take no are </s>
<s> here we only understand are to mean are as an actual fact which does not at all imply that no can be </s>
<s> but they understand the proposition to mean not only that none are but that none can possibly be </s>
<s> so they mean more than we do their meaning includes ours for of course no can be includes no are but ours does not include theirs </s>
<s> for example no policemen are eight feet high would be true in our game since as an actual fact no such splendid specimens are ever found but it would be false according to these writers since the attributes belonging to the police force and eight feet high are quite compatible there is nothing to prevent policeman from growing to that height if sufficiently rubbed with rowland's macassar oil which said to make hair grow when rubbed on hair and so of course will make policeman grow when rubbed on policeman </s>
<s> thirdly take all are which consists of the two partial propositions some are and no are </s>
<s> here of course the treatises mean less than we do in the first part and more than we do in the second </s>
<s> but the two operations don't balance each other any more than you can console man for having knocked down one of his chimneys by giving him an extra door step </s>
<s> if you meet with syllogisms of this kind you may work them quite easily by the system have given you you have only to make are mean are capable of being and all will go smoothly </s>
<s> for some are will become some are capable of being that is the attributes are compatible </s>
<s> and no are will become no are capable of being that is the attributes are incompatible </s>
<s> and of course all are will become some are capable of being and none are capable of being that is the attributes are compatible and the attributes are incompatible in using the diagrams for this system you must understand red counter to mean there may possibly be something in this compartment and grey one to mean there cannot possibly be anything in this compartment </s>
<s> fallacies </s>
<s> and so you think do you that the chief use of logic in real life is to deduce conclusions from workable premisses and to satisfy yourself that the conclusions deduced by other people are correct </s>
<s> only wish it were </s>
<s> society would be much less liable to panics and other delusions and political life especially would be totally different thing if even majority of the arguments that scattered broadcast over the world were correct </s>
<s> but it is all the other way fear </s>
<s> for one workable pair of premisses mean pair that lead to logical conclusion that you meet with in reading your newspaper or magazine you will probably find five that lead to no conclusion at all and even when the premisses are workable for one instance where the writer draws correct conclusion there are probably ten where he draws an incorrect one </s>
<s> in the first case you may say the premisses are fallacious in the second the conclusion is fallacious the chief use you will find in such logical skill as this game may teach you will be in detecting fallacies of these two kinds </s>
<s> the first kind of fallacy fallacious premisses you will detect when after marking them on the larger diagram you try to transfer the marks to the smaller </s>
<s> you will take its four compartments one by one and ask for each in turn what mark can place here and in every one the answer will be no information showing that there is no conclusion at all </s>
<s> for instance all soldiers are brave some englishmen are brave </s>
<s> there some englishmen are soldiers looks uncommonly like syllogism and might easily take in less experienced logician </s>
<s> but you are not to be caught by such trick </s>
<s> you would simply set out the premisses and would then calmly remark fallacious premisses you wouldn't condescend to ask what conclusion the writer professed to draw knowing that whatever it is it must be wrong </s>
<s> you would be just as safe as that wise mother was who said mary just go up to the nursery and see what baby's doing and tell him not to do it the other kind of fallacy fallacious conclusion you will not detect till you have marked both diagrams and have read off the correct conclusion and have compared it with the conclusion which the writer has drawn </s>
<s> but mind you mustn't say fallacious conclusion simply because it is not identical with the correct one it may be part of the correct conclusion and so be quite correct as far as it goes </s>
<s> in this case you would merely remark with pitying smile defective conclusion suppose of example you were to meet with this syllogism all unselfish people are generous no misers are generous </s>
<s> there no misers are unselfish the premisses of which might be thus expressed in letters all are no are here the correct conclusion would be all are that is all unselfish people are not misers while the conclusion drawn by the writer is no are which is the same as no are and so is part of all are here you would simply say defective conclusion the same thing would happen if you were in confectioner's shop and if little boy were to come in put down twopence and march off triumphantly with single penny bun </s>
<s> you would shake your head mournfully and would remark defective conclusion </s>
<s> poor little chap and perhaps you would ask the young lady behind the counter whether she would let you eat the bun which the little boy had paid for and left behind him and perhaps she would reply sha'n but if in the above example the writer had drawn the conclusion all misers are selfish that is all are this would be going beyond his legitimate rights since it would assert the existence of which is not contained in the premisses and you would very properly say fallacious conclusion now when you read other treatises on logic you will meet with various kinds of so called fallacies which are by no means always so </s>
<s> for example if you were to put before one of these logicians the pair of premisses no honest men cheat no dishonest men are trustworthy and were to ask him what conclusion followed he would probably say none at all </s>
<s> your premisses offend against two distinct rules and are as fallacious as they can well be then suppose you were bold enough to say the conclusion is no men who cheat are trustworthy fear your logical friend would turn away hastily perhaps angry perhaps only scornful in any case the result would be unpleasant </s>
<s> advise you not to try the experiment </s>
<s> but why is this you will say </s>
<s> do you mean to tell us that all these logicians are wrong far from it dear reader </s>
<s> from their point of view they are perfectly right </s>
<s> but they do not include in their system anything like all the possible forms of syllogisms </s>
<s> they have sort of nervous dread of attributes beginning with negative particle </s>
<s> for example such propositions as all not are no are not are quite outside their system </s>
<s> and thus having from sheer nervousness excluded quantity of very useful forms they have made rules which though quite applicable to the few forms which they allow of are no use at all when you consider all possible forms </s>
<s> let us not quarrel with them dear reader </s>
<s> there is room enough in the world for both of us </s>
<s> let us quietly take our broader system and if they choose to shut their eyes to all these useful forms and to say they are not syllogisms at all we can but stand aside and let them rush upon their fate </s>
<s> there is scarcely anything of yours upon which it is so dangerous to rush as your fate </s>
<s> you may rush upon your potato beds or your strawberry beds without doing much harm you may even rush upon your balcony unless it is new house built by contract and with no clerk of the works and may survive the foolhardy enterprise but if you once rush upon your fate why you must take the consequences </s>

<s> chapter iii </s>
<s> crooked answers </s>
<s> answered him as thought good as many as red herrings grow in the wood </s>
<s> elementary </s>
<s> </s>
<s> whatever can be attributed to that is said to belong to thing is called an attribute </s>
<s> for example baked which can frequently be attributed to buns and beautiful which can seldom be attributed to babies </s>
<s> </s>
<s> when they are the names of two things for example these pigs are fat animals or of two attributes for example pink is light red </s>
<s> </s>
<s> when one is the name of thing and the other the name of an attribute for example these pigs are pink since thing cannot actually be an attribute </s>
<s> </s>
<s> that the substantive shall be supposed to be repeated at the end of the sentence for example these pigs are pink pigs </s>
<s> </s>
<s> proposition is sentence stating that some or none or all of the things belonging to certain class called the subject are also things belonging to certain other class called the predicate </s>
<s> for example some new cakes are not nice that is written in full some new cakes are not nice cakes where the class new cakes is the subject and the class not nice cakes is the predicate </s>
<s> </s>
<s> proposition stating that some of the things belonging to its subject are so and so is called particular </s>
<s> for example some new cakes are nice some new cakes are not nice proposition stating that none of the things belonging to its subject or that all of them are so and so is called universal </s>
<s> for example no new cakes are nice all new cakes are not nice </s>
<s> </s>
<s> the things in each compartment possess two attributes whose symbols will be found written on two of the edges of that compartment </s>
<s> </s>
<s> one or more </s>
<s> as name of the class of things to which the whole diagram is assigned </s>
<s> </s>
<s> proposition containing two statements </s>
<s> for example some new cakes are nice and some are not nice </s>
<s> when the whole class thus divided is exhausted among the sets into which it is divided there being no member of it which does not belong to some one of them </s>
<s> for example the class new cakes is exhaustively divided into nice and not nice since every new cake must be one or the other </s>
<s> </s>
<s> when man cannot make up his mind which of two parties he will join he is said to be sitting on the fence not being able to decide on which side he will jump down </s>
<s> </s>
<s> some are and no are </s>
<s> </s>
<s> proposition whose subject is single thing is called individual </s>
<s> for example am happy john is not at home </s>
<s> these are universal propositions being the same as all the i's that exist are happy all the johns that am now considering are not at home </s>
<s> </s>
<s> propositions beginning with some or all </s>
<s> </s>
<s> when they begin with some or no </s>
<s> for example some abc are def may be re arranged as some bf are acde each being equivalent to some abcdef exist </s>
<s> </s>
<s> some tigers are fierce no tigers are not fierce </s>
<s> </s>
<s> some hard boiled eggs are unwholesome no hard boiled eggs are wholesome </s>
<s> </s>
<s> some i's are happy no i's are unhappy </s>
<s> </s>
<s> some johns are not at home no johns are at home </s>
<s> </s>
<s> the things in each compartment of the larger diagram possess three attributes whose symbols will be found written at three of the corners of the compartment except in the case of which is not actually inserted in the diagram but is supposed to stand at each of its four outer corners </s>
<s> </s>
<s> if the universe of things be divided with regard to three different attributes and if two propositions be given containing two different couples of these attributes and if from these we can prove third proposition containing the two attributes that have not yet occurred together the given propositions are called the premisses the third one the conclusion and the whole set syllogism </s>
<s> for example the premisses might be no are and all are and it might be possible to prove from them conclusion containing and </s>
<s> </s>
<s> if an attribute occurs in both premisses the term containing it is called the middle term </s>
<s> for example if the premisses are some are and no are the class of things is the middle term if an attribute occurs in one premiss and its contradictory in the other the terms containing them may be called the middle terms </s>
<s> for example if the premisses are no are and all are the two classes of things and things may be called the middle terms </s>
<s> </s>
<s> because they can be marked with certainty whereas affirmative propositions that is those that begin with some or all sometimes require us to place red counter sitting on fence </s>
<s> </s>
<s> because the only question we are concerned with is whether the conclusion follows logically from the premisses so that if they were true it also would be true </s>
<s> </s>
<s> by understanding red counter to mean this compartment can be occupied and grey one to mean this compartment cannot be occupied or this compartment must be empty </s>
<s> </s>
<s> fallacious premisses and fallacious conclusion </s>
<s> </s>
<s> by finding when we try to transfer marks from the larger diagram to the smaller that there is no information for any of its four compartments </s>
<s> </s>
<s> by finding the correct conclusion and then observing that the conclusion offered to us is neither identical with it nor part of it </s>
<s> </s>
<s> when the offered conclusion is part of the correct conclusion </s>
<s> in this case we may call it defective conclusion </s>
<s> </s>
<s> half of smaller diagram </s>
<s> propositions represented </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> it might be thought that the proper diagram would be in order to express some exist but this is really contained in some are to put red counter on the division line would only tell us one of the compartments is occupied which we know already in knowing that one is occupied </s>

<s> no exist </s>
<s> </s>
<s> nobody is unhealthy </s>

<s> smaller diagram </s>
<s> propositions represented </s>
<s> </s>

<s> </s>

<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>

<s> </s>
<s> </s>
<s> </s>

<s> we had better take persons as universe </s>
<s> we may choose myself as middle term in which case the premisses will take the form am person who sent him to bring kitten am person to whom he brought kettle by mistake </s>
<s> or we may choose he as middle term in which case the premisses will take the form he is person whom sent to bring me kitten he is person who brought me kettle by mistake </s>
<s> the latter form seems best as the interest of the anecdote clearly depends on his stupidity not on what happened to me </s>
<s> let us then make he persons whom sent and persons who brought hence all are all are </s>
<s> and the required diagram is </s>
<s> both diagrams employed </s>

<s> let periods be universe days rainy tiresome </s>
<s> some are there some are </s>
<s> all xm are </s>
<s> </s>
<s> some rainy periods are tiresome </s>
<s> </s>
<s> these are not legitimate premisses since the conclusion is really part of the second premiss so that the first premiss is superfluous </s>
<s> this may be shown in letters thus all xm are contains some xm are which contains some are </s>
<s> or in words all rainy days are tiresome contains some rainy days are tiresome which contains some rainy periods are tiresome </s>
<s> moreover the first premiss besides being superfluous is actually contained in the second since it is equivalent to some rainy days exist which as we know is implied in the proposition all rainy days are tiresome </s>
<s> altogether most unsatisfactory pair of premisses </s>

<s> so extract syllogism out of each of the following and test its correctness </s>
<s> don't talk to me </s>
<s> i've known more rich merchants than you have and can tell you not one of them was ever an old miser since the world began and what has that got to do with old mr brown why isn't he very rich yes of course he is </s>
<s> and what then why don't you see that it's absurd to call him miserly merchant </s>
<s> either he's not merchant or he's not miser </s>
<s> it is so kind of you to enquire </s>
<s> i'm really feeling great deal better to day and is it nature or art that is to have the credit of this happy change art think </s>
<s> the doctor has given me some of that patent medicine of his well i'll never call him humbug again </s>
<s> there's somebody at any rate that feels better after taking his medicine </s>
<s> no don't like you one bit </s>
<s> and i'll go and play with my doll </s>
<s> dolls are never unkind so you like doll better than cousin </s>
<s> oh you little silly of course do </s>
<s> cousins are never kind at least no cousins i've ever seen well and what does that prove i'd like to know </s>
<s> if you mean that cousins aren't dolls who ever said they were </s>
<s> what are you talking about geraniums for </s>
<s> you can't tell one flower from another at this distance </s>
<s> grant you they're all red flowers it doesn't need telescope to know that well some geraniums are red aren't they don't deny it </s>
<s> and what then </s>
<s> suppose you'll be telling me some of those flowers are geraniums of course that's what should tell you if you'd the sense to follow an argument </s>
<s> but what's the good of proving anything to you should like to know </s>
