<s> who should know better extract from the following speech series of syllogisms or arguments having the form of syllogisms and test their correctness </s>
<s> it is supposed to be spoken by fond mother in answer to friend's cautious suggestion that she is perhaps little overdoing it in the way of lessons with her children </s>
<s> </s>
<s> well they've got their own way to make in the world </s>
<s> we can't leave them fortune apiece </s>
<s> and money's not to be had as you know without money's worth they must work if they want to live </s>
<s> and how are they to work if they don't know anything </s>
<s> take my word for it there's no place for ignorance in these times </s>
<s> and all authorities agree that the time to learn is when you're young </s>
<s> one's got no memory afterwards worth speaking of </s>
<s> child will learn more in an hour than grown man in five </s>
<s> so those that have to learn must learn when they're young if ever they're to learn at all </s>
<s> of course that doesn't do unless children are healthy quite allow that </s>
<s> well the doctor tells me no children are healthy unless they've got good colour in their cheeks </s>
<s> and only just look at my darlings </s>
<s> why their cheeks bloom like peonies </s>
<s> well now they tell me that to keep children in health you should never give them more than six hours altogether at lessons in the day and at least two half holidays in the week </s>
<s> and that's exactly our plan can assure you </s>
<s> we never go beyond six hours and every wednesday and saturday as ever is not one syllable of lessons do they do after their one o'clock dinner </s>
<s> so how you can imagine i'm running any risk in the education of my precious pets is more than can understand promise you the end </s>
<s> </s>
<s> the hunting of the snark lewis carroll the millennium fulcrum edition the hunting of the snark an agony in eight fits by lewis carroll preface if and the thing is wildly possible the charge of writing nonsense were ever brought against the author of this brief but instructive poem it would be based feel convinced on the line in then the bowsprit got mixed with the rudder sometimes in view of this painful possibility will not as might appeal indignantly to my other writings as proof that am incapable of such deed will not as might point to the strong moral purpose of this poem itself to the arithmetical principles so cautiously inculcated in it or to its noble teachings in natural history will take the more prosaic course of simply explaining how it happened </s>
<s> the bellman who was almost morbidly sensitive about appearances used to have the bowsprit unshipped once or twice week to be revarnished and it more than once happened when the time came for replacing it that no one on board could remember which end of the ship it belonged to </s>
<s> they knew it was not of the slightest use to appeal to the bellman about it he would only refer to his naval code and read out in pathetic tones admiralty instructions which none of them had ever been able to understand so it generally ended in its being fastened on anyhow across the rudder </s>
<s> the helmsman used to stand by with tears in his eyes he knew it was all wrong but alas </s>
<s> rule of the code no one shall speak to the man at the helm had been completed by the bellman himself with the words and the man at the helm shall speak to no one so remonstrance was impossible and no steering could be done till the next varnishing day </s>
<s> during these bewildering intervals the ship usually sailed backwards </s>
<s> as this poem is to some extent connected with the lay of the jabberwock let me take this opportunity of answering question that has often been asked me how to pronounce slithy toves the in slithy is long as in writhe and toves is pronounced so as to rhyme with groves again the first in borogoves is pronounced like the in borrow have heard people try to give it the sound of the in worry </s>
<s> such is human perversity </s>
<s> this also seems fitting occasion to notice the other hard works in that poem </s>
<s> humpty dumpty's theory of two meanings packed into one word like portmanteau seems to me the right explanation for all </s>
<s> for instance take the two words fuming and furious make up your mind that you will say both words but leave it unsettled which you will first </s>
<s> now open your mouth and speak </s>
<s> if your thoughts incline ever so little towards fuming you will say fuming furious if they turn by even hair's breadth towards furious you will say furious fuming but if you have the rarest of gifts perfectly balanced mind you will say frumious supposing that when pistol uttered the well known words under which king bezonian </s>
<s> speak or die justice shallow had felt certain that it was either william or richard but had not been able to settle which so that he could not possibly say either name before the other can it be doubted that rather than die he would have gasped out rilchiam fit the first the landing just the place for snark the bellman cried as he landed his crew with care supporting each man on the top of the tide by finger entwined in his hair </s>
<s> just the place for snark </s>
<s> have said it twice that alone should encourage the crew </s>
<s> just the place for snark </s>
<s> have said it thrice what tell you three times is true the crew was complete it included boots maker of bonnets and hoods barrister brought to arrange their disputes and broker to value their goods </s>
<s> billiard marker whose skill was immense might perhaps have won more than his share but banker engaged at enormous expense had the whole of their cash in his care </s>
<s> there was also beaver that paced on the deck or would sit making lace in the bow and had often the bellman said saved them from wreck though none of the sailors knew how </s>
<s> there was one who was famed for the number of things he forgot when he entered the ship his umbrella his watch all his jewels and rings and the clothes he had bought for the trip </s>
<s> he had forty two boxes all carefully packed with his name painted clearly on each but since he omitted to mention the fact they were all left behind on the beach </s>
<s> the loss of his clothes hardly mattered because he had seven coats on when he came with three pairs of boots but the worst of it was he had wholly forgotten his name </s>
<s> he would answer to hi or to any loud cry such as fry me or fritter my wig to what you may call um or what was his name but especially thing um jig while for those who preferred more forcible word he had different names from these his intimate friends called him candle ends and his enemies toasted cheese his form is ungainly his intellect small so the bellman would often remark but his courage is perfect </s>
<s> and that after all is the thing that one needs with snark he would joke with hyenas returning their stare with an impudent wag of the head and he once went walk paw in paw with bear just to keep up its spirits he said </s>
<s> he came as baker but owned when too late and it drove the poor bellman half mad he could only bake bridecake for which may state no materials were to be had </s>
<s> the last of the crew needs especial remark though he looked an incredible dunce he had just one idea but that one being snark the good bellman engaged him at once </s>
<s> he came as butcher but gravely declared when the ship had been sailing week he could only kill beavers </s>
<s> the bellman looked scared and was almost too frightened to speak but at length he explained in tremulous tone there was only one beaver on board and that was tame one he had of his own whose death would be deeply deplored </s>
<s> the beaver who happened to hear the remark protested with tears in its eyes that not even the rapture of hunting the snark could atone for that dismal surprise </s>
<s> it strongly advised that the butcher should be conveyed in separate ship but the bellman declared that would never agree with the plans he had made for the trip navigation was always difficult art though with only one ship and one bell and he feared he must really decline for his part undertaking another as well </s>
<s> the beaver's best course was no doubt to procure second hand dagger proof coat so the baker advised it and next to insure its life in some office of note this the banker suggested and offered for hire on moderate terms or for sale two excellent policies one against fire and one against damage from hail </s>
<s> yet still ever after that sorrowful day whenever the butcher was by the beaver kept looking the opposite way and appeared unaccountably shy </s>
<s> fit the second the bellman's speech the bellman himself they all praised to the skies such carriage such ease and such grace </s>
<s> such solemnity too </s>
<s> one could see he was wise the moment one looked in his face </s>
<s> he had bought large map representing the sea without the least vestige of land and the crew were much pleased when they found it to be map they could all understand </s>
<s> what's the good of mercator's north poles and equators tropics zones and meridian lines so the bellman would cry and the crew would reply they are merely conventional signs </s>
<s> other maps are such shapes with their islands and capes </s>
<s> but we've got our brave captain to thank so the crew would protest that he's bought us the best perfect and absolute blank this was charming no doubt but they shortly found out that the captain they trusted so well had only one notion for crossing the ocean and that was to tingle his bell </s>
<s> he was thoughtful and grave but the orders he gave were enough to bewilder crew </s>
<s> when he cried steer to starboard but keep her head larboard what on earth was the helmsman to do </s>
<s> then the bowsprit got mixed with the rudder sometimes thing as the bellman remarked that frequently happens in tropical climes when vessel is so to speak snarked but the principal failing occurred in the sailing and the bellman perplexed and distressed said he had hoped at least when the wind blew due east that the ship would not travel due west </s>
<s> but the danger was past they had landed at last with their boxes portmanteaus and bags yet at first sight the crew were not pleased with the view which consisted of chasms and crags </s>
<s> the bellman perceived that their spirits were low and repeated in musical tone some jokes he had kept for season of woe but the crew would do nothing but groan </s>
<s> he served out some grog with liberal hand and bade them sit down on the beach and they could not but own that their captain looked grand as he stood and delivered his speech </s>
<s> friends romans and countrymen lend me your ears they were all of them fond of quotations so they drank to his health and they gave him three cheers while he served out additional rations </s>
<s> we have sailed many months we have sailed many weeks four weeks to the month you may mark but never as yet tis your captain who speaks have we caught the least glimpse of snark </s>
<s> we have sailed many weeks we have sailed many days seven days to the week allow but snark on the which we might lovingly gaze we have never beheld till now </s>
<s> come listen my men while tell you again the five unmistakable marks by which you may know wheresoever you go the warranted genuine snarks </s>
<s> let us take them in order </s>
<s> the first is the taste which is meagre and hollow but crisp like coat that is rather too tight in the waist with flavour of will the wisp </s>
<s> its habit of getting up late you'll agree that it carries too far when say that it frequently breakfasts at five o'clock tea and dines on the following day </s>
<s> the third is its slowness in taking jest </s>
<s> should you happen to venture on one it will sigh like thing that is deeply distressed and it always looks grave at pun </s>
<s> the fourth is its fondness for bathing machines which is constantly carries about and believes that they add to the beauty of scenes sentiment open to doubt </s>
<s> the fifth is ambition </s>
<s> it next will be right to describe each particular batch distinguishing those that have feathers and bite and those that have whiskers and scratch </s>
<s> for although common snarks do no manner of harm yet feel it my duty to say some are boojums the bellman broke off in alarm for the baker had fainted away </s>
<s> fit the third the baker's tale they roused him with muffins they roused him with ice they roused him with mustard and cress they roused him with jam and judicious advice they set him conundrums to guess </s>
<s> when at length he sat up and was able to speak his sad story he offered to tell and the bellman cried silence </s>
<s> not even shriek and excitedly tingled his bell </s>
<s> there was silence supreme </s>
<s> not shriek not scream scarcely even howl or groan as the man they called ho told his story of woe in an antediluvian tone </s>
<s> my father and mother were honest though poor skip all that cried the bellman in haste </s>
<s> if it once becomes dark there's no chance of snark we have hardly minute to waste skip forty years said the baker in tears and proceed without further remark to the day when you took me aboard of your ship to help you in hunting the snark </s>
<s> dear uncle of mine after whom was named remarked when bade him farewell oh skip your dear uncle the bellman exclaimed as he angrily tingled his bell </s>
<s> he remarked to me then said that mildest of men if your snark be snark that is right fetch it home by all means you may serve it with greens and it's handy for striking light </s>
<s> you may seek it with thimbles and seek it with care you may hunt it with forks and hope you may threaten its life with railway share you may charm it with smiles and soap that's exactly the method the bellman bold in hasty parenthesis cried that's exactly the way have always been told that the capture of snarks should be tried but oh beamish nephew beware of the day if your snark be boojum </s>
<s> for then you will softly and suddenly vanish away and never be met with again it is this it is this that oppresses my soul when think of my uncle's last words and my heart is like nothing so much as bowl brimming over with quivering curds </s>
<s> it is this it is this we have had that before the bellman indignantly said </s>
<s> and the baker replied let me say it once more </s>
<s> it is this it is this that dread </s>
<s> engage with the snark every night after dark in dreamy delirious fight serve it with greens in those shadowy scenes and use it for striking light but if ever meet with boojum that day in moment of this am sure shall softly and suddenly vanish away and the notion cannot endure fit the fourth the hunting the bellman looked uffish and wrinkled his brow </s>
<s> if only you'd spoken before </s>
<s> it's excessively awkward to mention it now with the snark so to speak at the door </s>
<s> we should all of us grieve as you well may believe if you never were met with again but surely my man when the voyage began you might have suggested it then </s>
<s> it's excessively awkward to mention it now as think i've already remarked and the man they called hi replied with sigh informed you the day we embarked </s>
<s> you may charge me with murder or want of sense we are all of us weak at times but the slightest approach to false pretence was never among my crimes </s>
<s> said it in hebrew said it in dutch said it in german and greek but wholly forgot and it vexes me much that english is what you speak tis pitiful tale said the bellman whose face had grown longer at every word but now that you've stated the whole of your case more debate would be simply absurd </s>
<s> the rest of my speech he explained to his men you shall hear when i've leisure to speak it </s>
<s> but the snark is at hand let me tell you again </s>
<s> tis your glorious duty to seek it </s>
<s> to seek it with thimbles to seek it with care to pursue it with forks and hope to threaten its life with railway share to charm it with smiles and soap </s>
<s> for the snark's peculiar creature that won't be caught in commonplace way </s>
<s> do all that you know and try all that you don't not chance must be wasted to day </s>
<s> for england expects forbear to proceed tis maxim tremendous but trite and you'd best be unpacking the things that you need to rig yourselves out for the fight then the banker endorsed blank cheque which he crossed and changed his loose silver for notes </s>
<s> the baker with care combed his whiskers and hair and shook the dust out of his coats </s>
<s> the boots and the broker were sharpening spade each working the grindstone in turn but the beaver went on making lace and displayed no interest in the concern though the barrister tried to appeal to its pride and vainly proceeded to cite number of cases in which making laces had been proved an infringement of right </s>
<s> the maker of bonnets ferociously planned novel arrangement of bows while the billiard marker with quivering hand was chalking the tip of his nose </s>
<s> but the butcher turned nervous and dressed himself fine with yellow kid gloves and ruff said he felt it exactly like going to dine which the bellman declared was all stuff introduce me now there's good fellow he said if we happen to meet it together and the bellman sagaciously nodding his head said that must depend on the weather the beaver went simply galumphing about at seeing the butcher so shy and even the baker though stupid and stout made an effort to wink with one eye </s>
<s> be man said the bellman in wrath as he heard the butcher beginning to sob </s>
<s> should we meet with jubjub that desperate bird we shall need all our strength for the job fit the fifth the beaver's lesson they sought it with thimbles they sought it with care they pursued it with forks and hope they threatened its life with railway share they charmed it with smiles and soap </s>
<s> then the butcher contrived an ingenious plan for making separate sally and had fixed on spot unfrequented by man dismal and desolate valley </s>
<s> but the very same plan to the beaver occurred it had chosen the very same place yet neither betrayed by sign or word the disgust that appeared in his face </s>
<s> each thought he was thinking of nothing but snark and the glorious work of the day and each tried to pretend that he did not remark that the other was going that way </s>
<s> but the valley grew narrow and narrower still and the evening got darker and colder till merely from nervousness not from goodwill they marched along shoulder to shoulder </s>
<s> then scream shrill and high rent the shuddering sky and they knew that some danger was near the beaver turned pale to the tip of its tail and even the butcher felt queer </s>
<s> he thought of his childhood left far far behind that blissful and innocent state the sound so exactly recalled to his mind pencil that squeaks on slate </s>
<s> tis the voice of the jubjub he suddenly cried </s>
<s> this man that they used to call dunce as the bellman would tell you he added with pride have uttered that sentiment once </s>
<s> tis the note of the jubjub </s>
<s> keep count entreat you will find have told it you twice </s>
<s> tis the song of the jubjub </s>
<s> the proof is complete if only i've stated it thrice the beaver had counted with scrupulous care attending to every word but it fairly lost heart and outgrabe in despair when the third repetition occurred </s>
<s> it felt that in spite of all possible pains it had somehow contrived to lose count and the only thing now was to rack its poor brains by reckoning up the amount </s>
<s> two added to one if that could but be done it said with one's fingers and thumbs recollecting with tears how in earlier years it had taken no pains with its sums </s>
<s> the thing can be done said the butcher think </s>
<s> the thing must be done am sure </s>
<s> the thing shall be done </s>
<s> bring me paper and ink the best there is time to procure the beaver brought paper portfolio pens and ink in unfailing supplies while strange creepy creatures came out of their dens and watched them with wondering eyes </s>
<s> so engrossed was the butcher he heeded them not as he wrote with pen in each hand and explained all the while in popular style which the beaver could well understand </s>
<s> taking three as the subject to reason about convenient number to state we add seven and ten and then multiply out by one thousand diminished by eight </s>
<s> the result we proceed to divide as you see by nine hundred and ninety two then subtract seventeen and the answer must be exactly and perfectly true </s>
<s> the method employed would gladly explain while have it so clear in my head if had but the time and you had but the brain but much yet remains to be said </s>
<s> in one moment i've seen what has hitherto been enveloped in absolute mystery and without extra charge will give you at large lesson in natural history in his genial way he proceeded to say forgetting all laws of propriety and that giving instruction without introduction would have caused quite thrill in society as to temper the jubjub's desperate bird since it lives in perpetual passion its taste in costume is entirely absurd it is ages ahead of the fashion but it knows any friend it has met once before it never will look at bribe and in charity meetings it stands at the door and collects though it does not subscribe </s>
<s> its flavour when cooked is more exquisite far than mutton or oysters or eggs some think it keeps best in an ivory jar and some in mahogany kegs you boil it in sawdust you salt it in glue you condense it with locusts and tape still keeping one principal object in view to preserve its symmetrical shape the butcher would gladly have talked till next day but he felt that the lesson must end and he wept with delight in attempting to say he considered the beaver his friend </s>
<s> while the beaver confessed with affectionate looks more eloquent even than tears it had learned in ten minutes far more than all books would have taught it in seventy years </s>
<s> they returned hand in hand and the bellman unmanned for moment with noble emotion said this amply repays all the wearisome days we have spent on the billowy ocean such friends as the beaver and butcher became have seldom if ever been known in winter or summer twas always the same you could never meet either alone </s>
<s> and when quarrels arose as one frequently finds quarrels will spite of every endeavour the song of the jubjub recurred to their minds and cemented their friendship for ever </s>
<s> fit the sixth the barrister's dream they sought it with thimbles they sought it with care they pursued it with forks and hope they threatened its life with railway share they charmed it with smiles and soap </s>
<s> but the barrister weary of proving in vain that the beaver's lace making was wrong fell asleep and in dreams saw the creature quite plain that his fancy had dwelt on so long </s>
<s> he dreamed that he stood in shadowy court where the snark with glass in its eye dressed in gown bands and wig was defending pig on the charge of deserting its sty </s>
<s> the witnesses proved without error or flaw that the sty was deserted when found and the judge kept explaining the state of the law in soft under current of sound </s>
<s> the indictment had never been clearly expressed and it seemed that the snark had begun and had spoken three hours before any one guessed what the pig was supposed to have done </s>
<s> the jury had each formed different view long before the indictment was read and they all spoke at once so that none of them knew one word that the others had said </s>
<s> you must know said the judge but the snark exclaimed fudge that statute is obsolete quite </s>
<s> let me tell you my friends the whole question depends on an ancient manorial right </s>
<s> in the matter of treason the pig would appear to have aided but scarcely abetted while the charge of insolvency fails it is clear if you grant the plea never indebted the fact of desertion will not dispute but its guilt as trust is removed so far as related to the costs of this suit by the alibi which has been proved </s>
<s> my poor client's fate now depends on your votes here the speaker sat down in his place and directed the judge to refer to his notes and briefly to sum up the case </s>
<s> but the judge said he never had summed up before so the snark undertook it instead and summed it so well that it came to far more than the witnesses ever had said </s>
<s> when the verdict was called for the jury declined as the word was so puzzling to spell but they ventured to hope that the snark wouldn't mind undertaking that duty as well </s>
<s> so the snark found the verdict although as it owned it was spent with the toils of the day when it said the word guilty the jury all groaned and some of them fainted away </s>
<s> then the snark pronounced sentence the judge being quite too nervous to utter word when it rose to its feet there was silence like night and the fall of pin might be heard </s>
<s> transportation for life was the sentence it gave and then to be fined forty pound the jury all cheered though the judge said he feared that the phrase was not legally sound </s>
<s> but their wild exultation was suddenly checked when the jailer informed them with tears such sentence would have not the slightest effect as the pig had been dead for some years </s>
<s> the judge left the court looking deeply disgusted but the snark though little aghast as the lawyer to whom the defense was entrusted went bellowing on to the last </s>
<s> thus the barrister dreamed while the bellowing seemed to grow every moment more clear till he woke to the knell of furious bell which the bellman rang close at his ear </s>
<s> fit the seventh the banker's fate they sought it with thimbles they sought it with care they pursued it with forks and hope they threatened its life with railway share they charmed it with smiles and soap </s>
<s> and the banker inspired with courage so new it was matter for general remark rushed madly ahead and was lost to their view in his zeal to discover the snark but while he was seeking with thimbles and care bandersnatch swiftly drew nigh and grabbed at the banker who shrieked in despair for he knew it was useless to fly </s>
<s> he offered large discount he offered cheque drawn to bearer for seven pounds ten but the bandersnatch merely extended its neck and grabbed at the banker again </s>
<s> without rest or pause while those frumious jaws went savagely snapping around he skipped and he hopped and he floundered and flopped till fainting he fell to the ground </s>
<s> the bandersnatch fled as the others appeared led on by that fear stricken yell and the bellman remarked it is just as feared and solemnly tolled on his bell </s>
<s> he was black in the face and they scarcely could trace the least likeness to what he had been while so great was his fright that his waistcoat turned white wonderful thing to be seen </s>
<s> to the horror of all who were present that day </s>
<s> he uprose in full evening dress and with senseless grimaces endeavoured to say what his tongue could no longer express </s>
<s> down he sank in chair ran his hands through his hair and chanted in mimsiest tones words whose utter inanity proved his insanity while he rattled couple of bones </s>
<s> leave him here to his fate it is getting so late the bellman exclaimed in fright </s>
<s> we have lost half the day </s>
<s> any further delay and we sha'nt catch snark before night fit the eighth the vanishing they sought it with thimbles they sought it with care they pursued it with forks and hope they threatened its life with railway share they charmed it with smiles and soap </s>
<s> they shuddered to think that the chase might fail and the beaver excited at last went bounding along on the tip of its tail for the daylight was nearly past </s>
<s> there is thingumbob shouting the bellman said he is shouting like mad only hark </s>
<s> he is waving his hands he is wagging his head he has certainly found snark they gazed in delight while the butcher exclaimed he was always desperate wag they beheld him their baker their hero unnamed on the top of neighboring crag </s>
<s> erect and sublime for one moment of time </s>
<s> in the next that wild figure they saw as if stung by spasm plunge into chasm while they waited and listened in awe </s>
<s> it's snark was the sound that first came to their ears and seemed almost too good to be true </s>
<s> then followed torrent of laughter and cheers then the ominous words it's boo then silence </s>
<s> some fancied they heard in the air weary and wandering sigh then sounded like jum but the others declare it was only breeze that went by </s>
<s> they hunted till darkness came on but they found not button or feather or mark by which they could tell that they stood on the ground where the baker had met with the snark </s>
<s> in the midst of the word he was trying to say in the midst of his laughter and glee he had softly and suddenly vanished away for the snark was boojum you see </s>
<s> the end </s>
<s> three sunsets and other poems illustration three sunsets and other poems by lewis carroll with twelve fairy fancies by </s>
<s> gertrude thomson price four shillings net london macmillan and co limited new york the macmillan company all rights reserved richard clay and sons limited london and bungay </s>
<s> preface </s>
<s> nearly the whole of this volume is reprint of the serious portion of phantasmagoria and other poems which was first published in and has long been out of print </s>
<s> the path of roses was written soon after the crimean war when the name of florence nightingale had already become household word </s>
<s> only woman's hair was suggested by circumstance mentioned in the life of dean swift viz that after his death small packet was found among his papers containing single lock of hair and inscribed with those words </s>
<s> after three days was written after seeing holman hunt's picture the finding of christ in the temple </s>
<s> the two poems far away and song of love are reprinted from sylvie and bruno and sylvie and bruno concluded books whose high price made necessary by the great cost of production has fear put them out of the reach of most of my readers </s>
<s> lesson in latin is reprinted from the jabberwock magazine got up among the members of the girls latin school boston the only poems here printed for the first time are put together under the title of puck lost and found having been inscribed in two books fairies poem by allingham illustrated by miss </s>
<s> gertrude thomson and merry elves story book by whom written do not know illustrated by </s>
<s> </s>
<s> murray which were presented to little girl and boy as sort of memento of visit paid by them to the author one day on which occasion he taught them the pastime dear to the hearts of children of folding paper pistols which can be made to imitate fairly well the noise of real one </s>
<s> jan contents </s>
<s> page three sunsets the path of roses the valley of the shadow of death solitude far away beatrice stolen waters the willow tree only woman's hair the sailor's wife after three days faces in the fire lesson in latin puck lost and found song of love list of illustrations </s>
<s> fairies and nautilus front fairies in boat fairies and bower sleeping fairies fairy riding on cray fish fairies and squirrel fairies and jonquils fairies and frog fairy on mushroom fairies riding on fish fairy and wasp fairies under mushroom three sunsets </s>
<s> he saw her once and in the glance moment's glance of meeting eyes his heart stood still in sudden trance he trembled with sweet surprise all in the waning light she stood the star of perfect womanhood </s>
<s> that summer eve his heart was light with lighter step he trod the ground and life was fairer in his sight and music was in every sound he blessed the world where there could be so beautiful thing as she </s>
<s> there once again as evening fell and stars were peering overhead two lovers met to bid farewell the western sun gleamed faint and red lost in drift of purple cloud that wrapped him like funeral shroud </s>
<s> long time the memory of that night the hand that clasped the lips that kissed the form that faded from his sight slow sinking through the tearful mist in dreamy music seemed to roll through the dark chambers of his soul </s>
<s> so after many years he came wanderer from distant shore the street the house were still the same but those he sought were there no more his burning words his hopes and fears unheeded fell on alien ears </s>
<s> only the children from their play would pause the mournful tale to hear shrinking in half alarm away or step by step would venture near to touch with timid curious hands that strange wild man from other lands </s>
<s> he sat beside the busy street there where he last had seen her face and thronging memories bitter sweet seemed yet to haunt the ancient place her footfall ever floated near her voice was ever in his ear </s>
<s> he sometimes as the daylight waned and evening mists began to roll in half soliloquy complained of that black shadow on his soul and blindly fanned with cruel care the ashes of vain despair </s>
<s> the summer fled the lonely man still lingered out the lessening days still as the night drew on would scan each passing face with closer gaze till sick at heart he turned away and sighed she will not come to day so by degrees his spirit bent to mock its own despairing cry in stern self torture to invent new luxuries of agony and people all the vacant space with visions of her perfect face </s>
<s> then for moment she was nigh he heard no step but she was there as if an angel suddenly were bodied from the viewless air and all her fine ethereal frame should fade as swiftly as it came </s>
<s> so half in fancy's sunny trance and half in misery's aching void with set and stony countenance his bitter being he enjoyed and thrust for ever from his mind the happiness he could not find </s>
<s> as when the wretch in lonely room to selfish death is madly hurled the glamour of that fatal fume shuts out the wholesome living world so all his manhood's strength and pride one sickly dream had swept aside </s>
<s> yea brother and we passed him there but yesterday in merry mood and marveled at the lordly air that shamed his beggar's attitude nor heeded that ourselves might be wretches as desperate as he who let the thought of bliss denied make havoc of our life and powers and pine in solitary pride for peace that never shall be ours because we will not work and wait in trustful patience for our fate </s>
<s> and so it chanced once more that she came by the old familiar spot the face he would have died to see bent o'er him and he knew it not too rapt in selfish grief to hear even when happiness was near </s>
<s> and pity filled her gentle breast for him that would not stir nor speak the dying crimson of the west that faintly tinged his haggard cheek fell on her as she stood and shed glory round the patient head </s>
<s> ah let him wake </s>
<s> the moments fly this awful tryst may be the last </s>
<s> and see the tear that dimmed her eye had fallen on him ere she passed she passed the crimson paled to gray and hope departed with the day </s>
<s> the heavy hours of night went by and silence quickened into sound and light slid up the eastern sky and life began its daily round but light and life for him were fled his name was numbered with the dead </s>
<s> nov illustration the path of roses </s>
<s> in the dark silence of an ancient room whose one tall window fronted to the west where through laced tendrils of hanging vine the sunset glow was fading into night sat pale lady resting weary hands upon great clasped volume and her face within her hands </s>
<s> not as in rest she bowed but large hot tears were coursing down her cheek and her low panted sobs broke awefully upon the sleeping echoes of the night </s>
<s> soon she unclasp'd the volume once again and read the words in tone of agony as in self torture weeping as she read he crowns the glory of his race he prayeth but in some fit place to meet his foeman face to face and battling for the true the right from ruddy dawn to purple night to perish in the midmost fight where hearts are fierce and hands are strong where peals the bugle loud and long where blood is dropping in the throng still with dim and glazing eye to watch the tide of victory to hear in death the battle cry then gathered grandly to his grave to rest among the true and brave in holy ground where yew trees wave where from church windows sculptured fair float out upon the evening air the note of praise the voice of prayer where no vain marble mockery insults with loud and boastful lie the simple soldier's memory where sometimes little children go and read in whisper'd accent slow the name of him who sleeps below her voice died out like one in dreams she sat </s>
<s> alas she sighed </s>
<s> for what can woman do </s>
<s> her life is aimless and her death unknown hemmed in by social forms she pines in vain </s>
<s> man has his work but what can woman do and answer came there from the creeping gloom the creeping gloom that settled into night peace </s>
<s> for thy lot is other than man's his is path of thorns he beats them down he faces death he wrestles with despair </s>
<s> thine is of roses to adorn and cheer his lonely life and hide the thorns in flowers she spake again in bitter tone she spake aye as toy the puppet of an hour or fair posy newly plucked at morn but flung aside and withered ere the night and answer came there from the creeping gloom the creeping gloom that blackened into night so shalt thou be the lamp to light his path what time the shades of sorrow close around and so it seemed to her an awful light pierced slowly through the darkness orbed and grew until all passed away the ancient room the sunlight dying through the trellised vine the one tall window all had passed away and she was standing on the mighty hills </s>
<s> beneath around and far as eye could see squadron on squadron stretched opposing hosts ranked as for battle mute and motionless </s>
<s> anon distant thunder shook the ground the tramp of horses and troop shot by plunged headlong in that living sea of men plunged to their death back from that fatal field scattered handful fighting hard for life broke through the serried lines but as she gazed they shrank and melted and their forms grew thin grew pale as ghosts when the first morning ray dawns from the east the trumpet's brazen blare died into silence and the vision passed passed to room where sick and dying lay in long sad line there brooded fear and pain darkness was there the shade of azrael's wing </s>
<s> but there was one that ever to and fro moved with light footfall purely calm her face and those deep steadfast eyes that starred the gloom still as she went she ministered to each comfort and counsel cooled the fevered brow with softest touch and in the listening ear of the pale sufferer whispered words of peace </s>
<s> the dying warrior gazing as she passed clasped his thin hands and blessed her </s>
<s> bless her too thou who didst bless the merciful of old </s>
<s> so prayed the lady watching tearfully her gentle moving onward till the night had veiled her wholly and the vision passed </s>
<s> then once again the solemn whisper came so in the darkest path of man's despair where war and terror shake the troubled earth lies woman's mission with unblenching brow to pass through scenes of horror and affright where men grow sick and tremble unto her all things are sanctified for all are good </s>
<s> nothing so mean but shall deserve her care nothing so great but she may bear her part </s>
<s> no life is vain each hath his place assigned do thou thy task and leave the rest to god and there was silence but the lady made no answer save one deeply breathed amen and she arose and in that darkening room stood lonely as spirit of the night stood calm and fearless in the gathered night and raised her eyes to heaven </s>
<s> there were tears upon her face but in her heart was peace peace that the world nor gives nor takes away </s>
<s> april illustration the valley of the shadow of death </s>
<s> hark said the dying man and sighed to that complaining tone like sprite condemned each eventide to walk the world alone </s>
<s> at sunset when the air is still hear it creep from yonder hill it breathes upon me dead and chill moment and is gone </s>
<s> my son it minds me of day left half life behind that have prayed to put away for ever from my mind </s>
<s> but bitter memory will not die it haunts my soul when none is nigh hear its whisper in the sigh of that complaining wind </s>
<s> and now in death my soul is fain to tell the tale of fear that hidden in my breast hath lain through many weary year yet time would fail to utter all the evil spells that held me thrall and thrust my life from fall to fall thou needest not to hear </s>
<s> the spells that bound me with chain sin's stern behests to do till pleasure's self invoked in vain heavy burden grew till from my spirit's fevered eye hunted thing seemed to fly through the dark woods that underlie yon mountain range of blue </s>
<s> deep in those woods found vale no sunlight visiteth nor star nor wandering moonbeam pale where never comes the breath of summer breeze there in mine ear even as lingered half in fear heard whisper cold and clear this is the gate of death </s>
<s> bitter is it to abide in weariness alway at dawn to sigh for eventide at eventide for day </s>
<s> thy noon hath fled thy sun hath shone </s>
<s> the brightness of thy day is gone what need to lag and linger on till life be cold and gray </s>
<s> well it said beneath yon pool in some still cavern deep the fevered brain might slumber cool the eyes forget to weep within that goblet's mystic rim are draughts of healing stored for him whose heart is sick whose sight is dim who prayeth but to sleep the evening breeze went moaning by like mourner for the dead and stirred with shrill complaining sigh the tree tops overhead my guardian angel seemed to stand and mutely wave warning hand with sudden terror all unmanned turned myself and fled </s>
<s> cottage gate stood open wide soft fell the dying ray on two fair children side by side that rested from their play together bent the earnest head as ever and anon they read from one dear book the words they said come back to me to day </s>
<s> like twin cascades on mountain stair together wandered down the ripples of the golden hair the ripples of the brown while through the tangled silken haze blue eyes looked forth in eager gaze more starlike than the gems that blaze about monarch's crown </s>
<s> my son there comes to each an hour when sinks the spirit's pride when weary hands forget their power the strokes of death to guide in such moment warriors say word the panic rout may stay sudden charge redeem the day and turn the living tide </s>
<s> could not see for blinding tears the glories of the west heavenly music filled mine ears heavenly peace my breast </s>
<s> come unto me come unto me all ye that labour unto me ye heavy laden come to me and will give you rest the night drew onward thin and blue the evening mists arise to bathe the thirsty land in dew as erst in paradise while over silent field and town the deep blue vault of heaven looked down not as of old in angry frown but bright with angels eyes </s>
<s> blest day </s>
<s> then first heard the voice that since hath oft beguiled these eyes from tears and bid rejoice this heart with anguish wild thy mother boy thou hast not known so soon she left me here to moan left me to weep and watch alone our one beloved child </s>
<s> though parted from my aching sight like homeward speeding dove she passed into the perfect light that floods the world above yet our twin spirits well know though one abide in pain below love as in summers long ago and evermore shall love </s>
<s> so with glad and patient heart move toward mine end the streams that flow awhile apart shall both in ocean blend </s>
<s> dare not weep can but bless the love that pitied my distress and lent me in life's wilderness so sweet and true friend </s>
<s> but if there be if there be truth in what they say that angel forms we cannot see go with us on our way then surely she is with me here dimly feel her spirit near the morning mists grow thin and clear and death brings in the day </s>
<s> april illustration solitude </s>
<s> love the stillness of the wood love the music of the rill love to couch in pensive mood upon some silent hill </s>
<s> scarce heard beneath yon arching trees the silver crested ripples pass and like mimic brook the breeze whispers among the grass </s>
<s> here from the world win release nor scorn of men nor footstep rude break in to mar the holy peace of this great solitude </s>
<s> here may the silent tears weep lull the vexed spirit into rest as infants sob themselves to sleep upon mother's breast </s>
<s> but when the bitter hour is gone and the keen throbbing pangs are still oh sweetest then to couch alone upon some silent hill </s>
<s> to live in joys that once have been to put the cold world out of sight and deck life's drear and barren scene with hues of rainbow light </s>
<s> for what to man the gift of breath if sorrow be his lot below if all the day that ends in death be dark with clouds of woe </s>
<s> shall the poor transport of an hour repay long years of sore distress the fragrance of lonely flower make glad the wilderness </s>
<s> ye golden hours of life's young spring of innocence of love and truth </s>
<s> bright beyond all imagining thou fairy dream of youth </s>
<s> i'd give all wealth that years have piled the slow result of life's decay to be once more little child for one bright summer day </s>

<s> beatrice </s>
<s> still as gaze on thee visions of two sweet maids arise whose life was of yesterday of beatrice pale and stern with the lips of dumb despair with the innocent eyes that yearn yearn for the young sweet hours of life far from sorrow and far from strife for the happy summers that never return when the world seemed good and fair of beatrice glorious bright of sainted ethereal maid whose blue eyes are deep fountains of light cheering the poet that broodeth apart filling with gladness his desolate heart like the moon when she shines thro cloudless night on world of silence and shade </s>
<s> and the visions waver and faint and the visions vanish away that my fancy delighted to paint she is here at my side living child with the glowing cheek and the tresses wild nor death pale martyr nor radiant saint yet stainless and bright as they </s>
<s> for think if grim wild beast were to come from his charnel cave from his jungle home in the east stealthily creeping with bated breath stealthily creeping with eyes of death he would all forget his dream of the feast and crouch at her feet slave </s>
<s> she would twine her hand in his mane she would prattle in silvery tone like the tinkle of summer rain questioning him with her laughing eyes questioning him with glad surprise till she caught from those fierce eyes again the love that lit her own </s>
<s> and be sure if savage heart in mask of human guise were to come on her here apart bound for dark and deadly deed hurrying past with pitiless speed he would suddenly falter and guiltily start at the glance of her pure blue eyes </s>
<s> nay be sure if an angel fair bright seraph undefiled were to stoop from the trackless air fain would she linger in glad amaze lovingly linger to ponder and gaze with sister's love and sister's care on the happy innocent child </s>

<s> illustration after three days </s>

<s> jan illustration lesson in latin </s>
<s> our latin books in motley row invite us to our task gay horace stately cicero yet there's one verb when once we know no higher skill we ask this ranks all other lore above we've learned amare means to love so hour by hour from flower to flower we sip the sweets of life till all too soon the clouds arise and flaming cheeks and flashing eyes proclaim the dawn of strife with half smile and half sigh amare </s>
<s> bitter one we cry </s>
<s> last night we owned with looks forlorn too well the scholar knows there is no rose without thorn but peace is made </s>
<s> we sing this morn no thorn without rose our latin lesson is complete we've learned that love is bitter sweet </s>

<s> illustration song of love </s>
<s> say what is the spell when her fledgelings are cheeping that lures the bird home to her nest </s>
<s> or wakes the tired mother whose infant is weeping to cuddle and croon it to rest </s>
<s> what the magic that charms the glad babe in her arms till it cooes with the voice of the dove </s>
<s> tis secret and so let us whisper it low and the name of the secret is love </s>
<s> for think it is love for feel it is love for i'm sure it is nothing but love </s>

<s> that stirs the vexed soul with an aching yearning for the brotherly hand grip of peace </s>
<s> whence the music that fills all our being that thrills around us beneath and above </s>
<s> tis secret none knows how it comes how it goes but the name of the secret is love </s>
