<s> well this is the very queerest shop ever saw so she went on wondering more and more at every step as everything turned into tree the moment she came up to it and she quite expected the egg to do the same </s>
<s> chapter vi </s>
<s> humpty dumpty however the egg only got larger and larger and more and more human when she had come within few yards of it she saw that it had eyes and nose and mouth and when she had come close to it she saw clearly that it was humpty dumpty himself </s>
<s> it can't be anybody else she said to herself </s>
<s> i'm as certain of it as if his name were written all over his face it might have been written hundred times easily on that enormous face </s>
<s> humpty dumpty was sitting with his legs crossed like turk on the top of high wall such narrow one that alice quite wondered how he could keep his balance and as his eyes were steadily fixed in the opposite direction and he didn't take the least notice of her she thought he must be stuffed figure after all </s>
<s> and how exactly like an egg he is she said aloud standing with her hands ready to catch him for she was every moment expecting him to fall </s>
<s> it's very provoking humpty dumpty said after long silence looking away from alice as he spoke to be called an egg very said you looked like an egg sir alice gently explained </s>
<s> and some eggs are very pretty you know she added hoping to turn her remark into sort of compliment </s>
<s> some people said humpty dumpty looking away from her as usual have no more sense than baby alice didn't know what to say to this it wasn't at all like conversation she thought as he never said anything to her in fact his last remark was evidently addressed to tree so she stood and softly repeated to herself humpty dumpty sat on wall humpty dumpty had great fall </s>
<s> all the king's horses and all the king's men couldn't put humpty dumpty in his place again that last line is much too long for the poetry she added almost out loud forgetting that humpty dumpty would hear her </s>
<s> don't stand there chattering to yourself like that humpty dumpty said looking at her for the first time but tell me your name and your business my name is alice but it's stupid enough name humpty dumpty interrupted impatiently </s>
<s> what does it mean must name mean something alice asked doubtfully </s>
<s> of course it must humpty dumpty said with short laugh my name means the shape am and good handsome shape it is too </s>
<s> with name like yours you might be any shape almost why do you sit out here all alone said alice not wishing to begin an argument </s>
<s> why because there's nobody with me cried humpty dumpty </s>
<s> did you think didn't know the answer to that </s>
<s> ask another don't you think you'd be safer down on the ground alice went on not with any idea of making another riddle but simply in her good natured anxiety for the queer creature </s>
<s> that wall is so very narrow what tremendously easy riddles you ask humpty dumpty growled out </s>
<s> of course don't think so </s>
<s> why if ever did fall off which there's no chance of but if did here he pursed up his lips and looked so solemn and grand that alice could hardly help laughing </s>
<s> if did fall he went on the king has promised me ah you may turn pale if you like </s>
<s> you didn't think was going to say that did you </s>
<s> the king has promised me with his very own mouth to to to send all his horses and all his men alice interrupted rather unwisely </s>
<s> now declare that's too bad humpty dumpty cried breaking into sudden passion </s>
<s> you've been listening at doors and behind trees and down chimneys or you couldn't have known it haven't indeed alice said very gently </s>
<s> it's in book ah well </s>
<s> they may write such things in book humpty dumpty said in calmer tone </s>
<s> that's what you call history of england that is </s>
<s> now take good look at me </s>
<s> i'm one that has spoken to king am mayhap you'll never see such another and to show you i'm not proud you may shake hands with me and he grinned almost from ear to ear as he leant forwards and as nearly as possible fell off the wall in doing so and offered alice his hand </s>
<s> she watched him little anxiously as she took it </s>
<s> if he smiled much more the ends of his mouth might meet behind she thought and then don't know what would happen to his head </s>
<s> i'm afraid it would come off yes all his horses and all his men humpty dumpty went on </s>
<s> they'd pick me up again in minute they would </s>
<s> however this conversation is going on little too fast let's go back to the last remark but one i'm afraid can't quite remember it alice said very politely </s>
<s> in that case we start fresh said humpty dumpty and it's my turn to choose subject he talks about it just as if it was game thought alice so here's question for you </s>
<s> how old did you say you were alice made short calculation and said seven years and six months wrong humpty dumpty exclaimed triumphantly </s>
<s> you never said word like it though you meant how old are you alice explained </s>
<s> if i'd meant that i'd have said it said humpty dumpty </s>
<s> alice didn't want to begin another argument so she said nothing </s>
<s> seven years and six months humpty dumpty repeated thoughtfully </s>
<s> an uncomfortable sort of age </s>
<s> now if you'd asked my advice i'd have said leave off at seven but it's too late now never ask advice about growing alice said indignantly </s>
<s> too proud the other inquired </s>
<s> alice felt even more indignant at this suggestion </s>
<s> mean she said that one can't help growing older one can't perhaps said humpty dumpty but two can </s>
<s> with proper assistance you might have left off at seven what beautiful belt you've got on alice suddenly remarked </s>
<s> they had had quite enough of the subject of age she thought and if they really were to take turns in choosing subjects it was her turn now at least she corrected herself on second thoughts beautiful cravat should have said no belt mean beg your pardon she added in dismay for humpty dumpty looked thoroughly offended and she began to wish she hadn't chosen that subject </s>
<s> if only knew she thought to herself which was neck and which was waist evidently humpty dumpty was very angry though he said nothing for minute or two </s>
<s> when he did speak again it was in deep growl </s>
<s> it is most provoking thing he said at last when person doesn't know cravat from belt know it's very ignorant of me alice said in so humble tone that humpty dumpty relented </s>
<s> it's cravat child and beautiful one as you say </s>
<s> it's present from the white king and queen </s>
<s> there now is it really said alice quite pleased to find that she had chosen good subject after all </s>
<s> they gave it me humpty dumpty continued thoughtfully as he crossed one knee over the other and clasped his hands round it they gave it me for an un birthday present beg your pardon alice said with puzzled air </s>
<s> i'm not offended said humpty dumpty </s>
<s> mean what is an un birthday present present given when it isn't your birthday of course alice considered little </s>
<s> like birthday presents best she said at last </s>
<s> you don't know what you're talking about cried humpty dumpty </s>
<s> how many days are there in year three hundred and sixty five said alice </s>
<s> and how many birthdays have you one and if you take one from three hundred and sixty five what remains three hundred and sixty four of course humpty dumpty looked doubtful </s>
<s> i'd rather see that done on paper he said </s>
<s> alice couldn't help smiling as she took out her memorandum book and worked the sum for him humpty dumpty took the book and looked at it carefully </s>
<s> that seems to be done right he began </s>
<s> you're holding it upside down alice interrupted </s>
<s> to be sure was humpty dumpty said gaily as she turned it round for him </s>
<s> thought it looked little queer </s>
<s> as was saying that seems to be done right though haven't time to look it over thoroughly just now and that shows that there are three hundred and sixty four days when you might get un birthday presents certainly said alice </s>
<s> and only one for birthday presents you know </s>
<s> there's glory for you don't know what you mean by glory alice said </s>
<s> humpty dumpty smiled contemptuously </s>
<s> of course you don't till tell you </s>
<s> meant there's nice knock down argument for you but glory doesn't mean nice knock down argument alice objected </s>
<s> when use word humpty dumpty said in rather scornful tone it means just what choose it to mean neither more nor less the question is said alice whether you can make words mean so many different things the question is said humpty dumpty which is to be master that's all alice was too much puzzled to say anything so after minute humpty dumpty began again </s>
<s> they've temper some of them particularly verbs they're the proudest adjectives you can do anything with but not verbs however can manage the whole lot of them </s>
<s> impenetrability </s>
<s> that's what say would you tell me please said alice what that means now you talk like reasonable child said humpty dumpty looking very much pleased </s>
<s> meant by impenetrability that we've had enough of that subject and it would be just as well if you'd mention what you mean to do next as suppose you don't mean to stop here all the rest of your life that's great deal to make one word mean alice said in thoughtful tone </s>
<s> when make word do lot of work like that said humpty dumpty always pay it extra oh said alice </s>
<s> she was too much puzzled to make any other remark </s>
<s> ah you should see em come round me of saturday night humpty dumpty went on wagging his head gravely from side to side for to get their wages you know alice didn't venture to ask what he paid them with and so you see can't tell you you seem very clever at explaining words sir said alice </s>
<s> would you kindly tell me the meaning of the poem called jabberwocky let's hear it said humpty dumpty </s>
<s> can explain all the poems that were ever invented and good many that haven't been invented just yet this sounded very hopeful so alice repeated the first verse twas brillig and the slithy toves did gyre and gimble in the wabe all mimsy were the borogoves and the mome raths outgrabe </s>
<s> that's enough to begin with humpty dumpty interrupted there are plenty of hard words there </s>
<s> brillig means four o'clock in the afternoon the time when you begin broiling things for dinner that'll do very well said alice and slithy well slithy means lithe and slimy lithe is the same as active you see it's like portmanteau there are two meanings packed up into one word see it now alice remarked thoughtfully and what are toves well toves are something like badgers they're something like lizards and they're something like corkscrews they must be very curious looking creatures they are that said humpty dumpty also they make their nests under sun dials also they live on cheese and what's the gyre and to gimble to gyre is to go round and round like gyroscope </s>
<s> to gimble is to make holes like gimlet and the wabe is the grass plot round sun dial suppose said alice surprised at her own ingenuity </s>
<s> of course it is </s>
<s> it's called wabe you know because it goes long way before it and long way behind it and long way beyond it on each side alice added </s>
<s> exactly so </s>
<s> well then mimsy is flimsy and miserable there's another portmanteau for you </s>
<s> and borogove is thin shabby looking bird with its feathers sticking out all round something like live mop and then mome raths said alice </s>
<s> i'm afraid i'm giving you great deal of trouble well rath is sort of green pig but mome i'm not certain about </s>
<s> think it's short for from home meaning that they'd lost their way you know and what does outgrabe mean well outgrabing is something between bellowing and whistling with kind of sneeze in the middle however you'll hear it done maybe down in the wood yonder and when you've once heard it you'll be quite content </s>
<s> who's been repeating all that hard stuff to you read it in book said alice </s>
<s> but had some poetry repeated to me much easier than that by tweedledee think it was as to poetry you know said humpty dumpty stretching out one of his great hands can repeat poetry as well as other folk if it comes to that oh it needn't come to that alice hastily said hoping to keep him from beginning </s>
<s> the piece i'm going to repeat he went on without noticing her remark was written entirely for your amusement alice felt that in that case she really ought to listen to it so she sat down and said thank you rather sadly </s>
<s> in winter when the fields are white sing this song for your delight only don't sing it he added as an explanation </s>
<s> see you don't said alice </s>
<s> if you can see whether i'm singing or not you've sharper eyes than most humpty dumpty remarked severely </s>
<s> alice was silent </s>
<s> in spring when woods are getting green i'll try and tell you what mean thank you very much said alice </s>
<s> in summer when the days are long perhaps you'll understand the song in autumn when the leaves are brown take pen and ink and write it down will if can remember it so long said alice </s>
<s> you needn't go on making remarks like that humpty dumpty said they're not sensible and they put me out sent message to the fish told them this is what wish the little fishes of the sea they sent an answer back to me </s>
<s> the little fishes answer was we cannot do it sir because i'm afraid don't quite understand said alice </s>
<s> it gets easier further on humpty dumpty replied </s>
<s> sent to them again to say it will be better to obey the fishes answered with grin why what temper you are in told them once told them twice they would not listen to advice </s>
<s> took kettle large and new fit for the deed had to do </s>
<s> my heart went hop my heart went thump filled the kettle at the pump </s>
<s> then some one came to me and said the little fishes are in bed said to him said it plain then you must wake them up again said it very loud and clear went and shouted in his ear humpty dumpty raised his voice almost to scream as he repeated this verse and alice thought with shudder wouldn't have been the messenger for anything but he was very stiff and proud he said you needn't shout so loud and he was very proud and stiff he said i'd go and wake them if took corkscrew from the shelf went to wake them up myself </s>
<s> and when found the door was locked pulled and pushed and kicked and knocked </s>
<s> and when found the door was shut tried to turn the handle but there was long pause </s>
<s> is that all alice timidly asked </s>
<s> that's all said humpty dumpty </s>
<s> good bye this was rather sudden alice thought but after such very strong hint that she ought to be going she felt that it would hardly be civil to stay </s>
<s> so she got up and held out her hand </s>
<s> good bye till we meet again she said as cheerfully as she could </s>
<s> shouldn't know you again if we did meet humpty dumpty replied in discontented tone giving her one of his fingers to shake you're so exactly like other people the face is what one goes by generally alice remarked in thoughtful tone </s>
<s> that's just what complain of said humpty dumpty </s>
<s> your face is the same as everybody has the two eyes so marking their places in the air with this thumb nose in the middle mouth under </s>
<s> it's always the same </s>
<s> now if you had the two eyes on the same side of the nose for instance or the mouth at the top that would be some help it wouldn't look nice alice objected </s>
<s> but humpty dumpty only shut his eyes and said wait till you've tried alice waited minute to see if he would speak again but as he never opened his eyes or took any further notice of her she said good bye once more and getting no answer to this she quietly walked away but she couldn't help saying to herself as she went of all the unsatisfactory she repeated this aloud as it was great comfort to have such long word to say of all the unsatisfactory people ever met she never finished the sentence for at this moment heavy crash shook the forest from end to end </s>
<s> chapter vii </s>
<s> the lion and the unicorn the next moment soldiers came running through the wood at first in twos and threes then ten or twenty together and at last in such crowds that they seemed to fill the whole forest </s>
<s> alice got behind tree for fear of being run over and watched them go by </s>
<s> she thought that in all her life she had never seen soldiers so uncertain on their feet they were always tripping over something or other and whenever one went down several more always fell over him so that the ground was soon covered with little heaps of men </s>
<s> then came the horses </s>
<s> having four feet these managed rather better than the foot soldiers but even they stumbled now and then and it seemed to be regular rule that whenever horse stumbled the rider fell off instantly </s>
<s> the confusion got worse every moment and alice was very glad to get out of the wood into an open place where she found the white king seated on the ground busily writing in his memorandum book </s>
<s> i've sent them all the king cried in tone of delight on seeing alice </s>
<s> did you happen to meet any soldiers my dear as you came through the wood yes did said alice several thousand should think four thousand two hundred and seven that's the exact number the king said referring to his book </s>
<s> couldn't send all the horses you know because two of them are wanted in the game </s>
<s> and haven't sent the two messengers either </s>
<s> they're both gone to the town </s>
<s> just look along the road and tell me if you can see either of them see nobody on the road said alice </s>
<s> only wish had such eyes the king remarked in fretful tone </s>
<s> to be able to see nobody </s>
<s> and at that distance too </s>
<s> why it's as much as can do to see real people by this light all this was lost on alice who was still looking intently along the road shading her eyes with one hand </s>
<s> see somebody now she exclaimed at last </s>
<s> but he's coming very slowly and what curious attitudes he goes into for the messenger kept skipping up and down and wriggling like an eel as he came along with his great hands spread out like fans on each side not at all said the king </s>
<s> he's an anglo saxon messenger and those are anglo saxon attitudes </s>
<s> he only does them when he's happy </s>
<s> his name is haigha he pronounced it so as to rhyme with mayor love my love with an alice couldn't help beginning because he is happy </s>
<s> hate him with an because he is hideous </s>
<s> fed him with with with ham sandwiches and hay </s>
<s> his name is haigha and he lives he lives on the hill the king remarked simply without the least idea that he was joining in the game while alice was still hesitating for the name of town beginning with </s>
<s> the other messenger's called hatta </s>
<s> must have two you know to come and go </s>
<s> one to come and one to go beg your pardon said alice </s>
<s> it isn't respectable to beg said the king </s>
<s> only meant that didn't understand said alice </s>
<s> why one to come and one to go didn't tell you the king repeated impatiently </s>
<s> must have two to fetch and carry </s>
<s> one to fetch and one to carry at this moment the messenger arrived he was far too much out of breath to say word and could only wave his hands about and make the most fearful faces at the poor king </s>
<s> this young lady loves you with an the king said introducing alice in the hope of turning off the messenger's attention from himself but it was no use the anglo saxon attitudes only got more extraordinary every moment while the great eyes rolled wildly from side to side </s>
<s> you alarm me said the king </s>
<s> feel faint give me ham sandwich on which the messenger to alice's great amusement opened bag that hung round his neck and handed sandwich to the king who devoured it greedily </s>
<s> another sandwich said the king </s>
<s> there's nothing but hay left now the messenger said peeping into the bag </s>
<s> hay then the king murmured in faint whisper </s>
<s> alice was glad to see that it revived him good deal </s>
<s> there's nothing like eating hay when you're faint he remarked to her as he munched away </s>
<s> should think throwing cold water over you would be better alice suggested or some sal volatile didn't say there was nothing better the king replied </s>
<s> said there was nothing like it which alice did not venture to deny </s>

<s> nobody said the messenger </s>
<s> quite right said the king this young lady saw him too </s>
<s> so of course nobody walks slower than you do my best the messenger said in sulky tone </s>
<s> i'm sure nobody walks much faster than do he can't do that said the king or else he'd have been here first </s>
<s> however now you've got your breath you may tell us what's happened in the town i'll whisper it said the messenger putting his hands to his mouth in the shape of trumpet and stooping so as to get close to the king's ear </s>
<s> alice was sorry for this as she wanted to hear the news too </s>
<s> however instead of whispering he simply shouted at the top of his voice they're at it again do you call that whisper cried the poor king jumping up and shaking himself </s>
<s> if you do such thing again i'll have you buttered </s>
<s> it went through and through my head like an earthquake it would have to be very tiny earthquake thought alice </s>
<s> who are at it again she ventured to ask </s>
<s> why the lion and the unicorn of course said the king </s>
<s> fighting for the crown yes to be sure said the king and the best of the joke is that it's my crown all the while </s>
<s> let's run and see them and they trotted off alice repeating to herself as she ran the words of the old song the lion and the unicorn were fighting for the crown the lion beat the unicorn all round the town </s>
<s> some gave them white bread some gave them brown some gave them plum cake and drummed them out of town does the one that wins get the crown she asked as well as she could for the run was putting her quite out of breath </s>
<s> dear me no said the king </s>
<s> what an idea would you be good enough alice panted out after running little further to stop minute just to get one's breath again i'm good enough the king said only i'm not strong enough </s>
<s> you see minute goes by so fearfully quick </s>
<s> you might as well try to stop bandersnatch alice had no more breath for talking so they trotted on in silence till they came in sight of great crowd in the middle of which the lion and unicorn were fighting </s>
<s> they were in such cloud of dust that at first alice could not make out which was which but she soon managed to distinguish the unicorn by his horn </s>
<s> they placed themselves close to where hatta the other messenger was standing watching the fight with cup of tea in one hand and piece of bread and butter in the other </s>
<s> he's only just out of prison and he hadn't finished his tea when he was sent in haigha whispered to alice and they only give them oyster shells in there so you see he's very hungry and thirsty </s>

<s> hatta looked round and nodded and went on with his bread and butter </s>

<s> but hatta only munched away and drank some more tea </s>
<s> speak won't you cried the king </s>
<s> how are they getting on with the fight hatta made desperate effort and swallowed large piece of bread and butter </s>

<s> it's waiting for em now said hatta this is bit of it as i'm eating there was pause in the fight just then and the lion and the unicorn sat down panting while the king called out ten minutes allowed for refreshments haigha and hatta set to work at once carrying rough trays of white and brown bread </s>

<s> what time the monster is cutting up that cake alice had seated herself on the bank of little brook with the great dish on her knees and was sawing away diligently with the knife </s>

<s> now cut it up said the lion as she returned to her place with the empty dish </s>

<s> the monster has given the lion twice as much as me she's kept none for herself anyhow said the lion </s>
<s> do you like plum cake monster but before alice could answer him the drums began </s>
<s> where the noise came from she couldn't make out the air seemed full of it and it rang through and through her head till she felt quite deafened </s>
<s> she started to her feet and sprang across the little brook in her terror and had just time to see the lion and the unicorn rise to their feet with angry looks at being interrupted in their feast before she dropped to her knees and put her hands over her ears vainly trying to shut out the dreadful uproar </s>
<s> if that doesn't drum them out of town she thought to herself nothing ever will chapter viii </s>
<s> it's my own invention after while the noise seemed gradually to die away till all was dead silence and alice lifted up her head in some alarm </s>
<s> there was no one to be seen and her first thought was that she must have been dreaming about the lion and the unicorn and those queer anglo saxon messengers </s>
<s> however there was the great dish still lying at her feet on which she had tried to cut the plum cake so wasn't dreaming after all she said to herself unless unless we're all part of the same dream </s>
<s> only do hope it's my dream and not the red king's </s>
<s> don't like belonging to another person's dream she went on in rather complaining tone i've great mind to go and wake him and see what happens at this moment her thoughts were interrupted by loud shouting of ahoy </s>
<s> ahoy </s>
<s> check and knight dressed in crimson armour came galloping down upon her brandishing great club </s>
<s> just as he reached her the horse stopped suddenly you're my prisoner the knight cried as he tumbled off his horse </s>
<s> startled as she was alice was more frightened for him than for herself at the moment and watched him with some anxiety as he mounted again </s>
<s> as soon as he was comfortably in the saddle he began once more you're my but here another voice broke in ahoy </s>
<s> ahoy </s>
<s> check and alice looked round in some surprise for the new enemy </s>
<s> this time it was white knight </s>
<s> he drew up at alice's side and tumbled off his horse just as the red knight had done then he got on again and the two knights sat and looked at each other for some time without speaking </s>
<s> alice looked from one to the other in some bewilderment </s>
<s> she's my prisoner you know the red knight said at last </s>
<s> yes but then came and rescued her the white knight replied </s>
<s> well we must fight for her then said the red knight as he took up his helmet which hung from the saddle and was something the shape of horse's head and put it on </s>
<s> you will observe the rules of battle of course the white knight remarked putting on his helmet too </s>
<s> always do said the red knight and they began banging away at each other with such fury that alice got behind tree to be out of the way of the blows </s>
<s> wonder now what the rules of battle are she said to herself as she watched the fight timidly peeping out from her hiding place one rule seems to be that if one knight hits the other he knocks him off his horse and if he misses he tumbles off himself and another rule seems to be that they hold their clubs with their arms as if they were punch and judy what noise they make when they tumble </s>
<s> just like whole set of fire irons falling into the fender </s>
<s> and how quiet the horses are </s>
<s> they let them get on and off them just as if they were tables another rule of battle that alice had not noticed seemed to be that they always fell on their heads and the battle ended with their both falling off in this way side by side when they got up again they shook hands and then the red knight mounted and galloped off </s>
<s> it was glorious victory wasn't it said the white knight as he came up panting </s>
<s> don't know alice said doubtfully </s>
<s> don't want to be anybody's prisoner </s>

<s> i'll see you safe to the end of the wood and then must go back you know </s>
<s> that's the end of my move thank you very much said alice </s>
<s> may help you off with your helmet it was evidently more than he could manage by himself however she managed to shake him out of it at last </s>
<s> now one can breathe more easily said the knight putting back his shaggy hair with both hands and turning his gentle face and large mild eyes to alice </s>
<s> she thought she had never seen such strange looking soldier in all her life </s>
<s> he was dressed in tin armour which seemed to fit him very badly and he had queer shaped little deal box fastened across his shoulder upside down and with the lid hanging open </s>
<s> alice looked at it with great curiosity </s>
<s> see you're admiring my little box the knight said in friendly tone </s>
<s> it's my own invention to keep clothes and sandwiches in </s>
<s> you see carry it upside down so that the rain can't get in but the things can get out alice gently remarked </s>
<s> do you know the lid's open didn't know it the knight said shade of vexation passing over his face </s>
<s> then all the things must have fallen out </s>
<s> and the box is no use without them he unfastened it as he spoke and was just going to throw it into the bushes when sudden thought seemed to strike him and he hung it carefully on tree </s>
<s> can you guess why did that he said to alice </s>
<s> alice shook her head </s>
<s> in hopes some bees may make nest in it then should get the honey but you've got bee hive or something like one fastened to the saddle said alice </s>
<s> yes it's very good bee hive the knight said in discontented tone one of the best kind </s>
<s> but not single bee has come near it yet </s>
<s> and the other thing is mouse trap </s>
<s> suppose the mice keep the bees out or the bees keep the mice out don't know which was wondering what the mouse trap was for said alice </s>
<s> it isn't very likely there would be any mice on the horse's back not very likely perhaps said the knight but if they do come don't choose to have them running all about you see he went on after pause it's as well to be provided for everything </s>
<s> that's the reason the horse has all those anklets round his feet but what are they for alice asked in tone of great curiosity </s>
<s> to guard against the bites of sharks the knight replied </s>
<s> it's an invention of my own </s>
<s> and now help me on </s>
<s> i'll go with you to the end of the wood what's the dish for it's meant for plum cake said alice </s>
<s> we'd better take it with us the knight said </s>
<s> it'll come in handy if we find any plum cake </s>
<s> help me to get it into this bag this took very long time to manage though alice held the bag open very carefully because the knight was so very awkward in putting in the dish the first two or three times that he tried he fell in himself instead </s>
<s> it's rather tight fit you see he said as they got it in last there are so many candlesticks in the bag and he hung it to the saddle which was already loaded with bunches of carrots and fire irons and many other things </s>
<s> hope you've got your hair well fastened on he continued as they set off </s>
<s> only in the usual way alice said smiling </s>
<s> that's hardly enough he said anxiously </s>
<s> you see the wind is so very strong here </s>
<s> it's as strong as soup have you invented plan for keeping the hair from being blown off alice enquired </s>
<s> not yet said the knight </s>
<s> but i've got plan for keeping it from falling off should like to hear it very much first you take an upright stick said the knight </s>
<s> then you make your hair creep up it like fruit tree </s>
<s> now the reason hair falls off is because it hangs down things never fall upwards you know </s>
<s> it's plan of my own invention </s>
<s> you may try it if you like it didn't sound comfortable plan alice thought and for few minutes she walked on in silence puzzling over the idea and every now and then stopping to help the poor knight who certainly was not good rider </s>
<s> whenever the horse stopped which it did very often he fell off in front and whenever it went on again which it generally did rather suddenly he fell off behind </s>
<s> otherwise he kept on pretty well except that he had habit of now and then falling off sideways and as he generally did this on the side on which alice was walking she soon found that it was the best plan not to walk quite close to the horse </s>
<s> i'm afraid you've not had much practice in riding she ventured to say as she was helping him up from his fifth tumble </s>
<s> the knight looked very much surprised and little offended at the remark </s>
<s> what makes you say that he asked as he scrambled back into the saddle keeping hold of alice's hair with one hand to save himself from falling over on the other side </s>
<s> because people don't fall off quite so often when they've had much practice i've had plenty of practice the knight said very gravely plenty of practice alice could think of nothing better to say than indeed but she said it as heartily as she could </s>
<s> they went on little way in silence after this the knight with his eyes shut muttering to himself and alice watching anxiously for the next tumble </s>
<s> the great art of riding the knight suddenly began in loud voice waving his right arm as he spoke is to keep here the sentence ended as suddenly as it had begun as the knight fell heavily on the top of his head exactly in the path where alice was walking </s>
<s> she was quite frightened this time and said in an anxious tone as she picked him up hope no bones are broken none to speak of the knight said as if he didn't mind breaking two or three of them </s>
<s> the great art of riding as was saying is to keep your balance properly </s>
<s> like this you know he let go the bridle and stretched out both his arms to show alice what he meant and this time he fell flat on his back right under the horse's feet </s>
<s> plenty of practice he went on repeating all the time that alice was getting him on his feet again </s>
<s> plenty of practice it's too ridiculous cried alice losing all her patience this time </s>
<s> you ought to have wooden horse on wheels that you ought does that kind go smoothly the knight asked in tone of great interest clasping his arms round the horse's neck as he spoke just in time to save himself from tumbling off again </s>
<s> much more smoothly than live horse alice said with little scream of laughter in spite of all she could do to prevent it </s>
<s> i'll get one the knight said thoughtfully to himself </s>
<s> one or two several there was short silence after this and then the knight went on again </s>
<s> i'm great hand at inventing things </s>
<s> now daresay you noticed that last time you picked me up that was looking rather thoughtful you were little grave said alice </s>
<s> well just then was inventing new way of getting over gate would you like to hear it very much indeed alice said politely </s>
<s> i'll tell you how came to think of it said the knight </s>
<s> you see said to myself the only difficulty is with the feet the head is high enough already now first put my head on the top of the gate then stand on my head then the feet are high enough you see then i'm over you see yes suppose you'd be over when that was done alice said thoughtfully but don't you think it would be rather hard haven't tried it yet the knight said gravely so can't tell for certain but i'm afraid it would be little hard he looked so vexed at the idea that alice changed the subject hastily </s>
<s> what curious helmet you've got she said cheerfully </s>
<s> is that your invention too the knight looked down proudly at his helmet which hung from the saddle </s>
<s> yes he said but i've invented better one than that like sugar loaf </s>
<s> when used to wear it if fell off the horse it always touched the ground directly </s>
<s> so had very little way to fall you see but there was the danger of falling into it to be sure </s>
<s> that happened to me once and the worst of it was before could get out again the other white knight came and put it on </s>
<s> he thought it was his own helmet the knight looked so solemn about it that alice did not dare to laugh </s>
<s> i'm afraid you must have hurt him she said in trembling voice being on the top of his head had to kick him of course the knight said very seriously </s>
<s> and then he took the helmet off again but it took hours and hours to get me out </s>
<s> was as fast as as lightning you know but that's different kind of fastness alice objected </s>
<s> the knight shook his head </s>
<s> it was all kinds of fastness with me can assure you he said </s>
<s> he raised his hands in some excitement as he said this and instantly rolled out of the saddle and fell headlong into deep ditch </s>
<s> alice ran to the side of the ditch to look for him </s>
<s> she was rather startled by the fall as for some time he had kept on very well and she was afraid that he really was hurt this time </s>
<s> however though she could see nothing but the soles of his feet she was much relieved to hear that he was talking on in his usual tone </s>
<s> all kinds of fastness he repeated but it was careless of him to put another man's helmet on with the man in it too how can you go on talking so quietly head downwards alice asked as she dragged him out by the feet and laid him in heap on the bank </s>
<s> the knight looked surprised at the question </s>
<s> what does it matter where my body happens to be he said </s>
<s> my mind goes on working all the same </s>
<s> in fact the more head downwards am the more keep inventing new things now the cleverest thing of the sort that ever did he went on after pause was inventing new pudding during the meat course in time to have it cooked for the next course said alice </s>
<s> well not the next course the knight said in slow thoughtful tone no certainly not the next course then it would have to be the next day </s>
<s> suppose you wouldn't have two pudding courses in one dinner well not the next day the knight repeated as before not the next day </s>
<s> in fact he went on holding his head down and his voice getting lower and lower don't believe that pudding ever was cooked </s>
<s> in fact don't believe that pudding ever will be cooked </s>
<s> and yet it was very clever pudding to invent what did you mean it to be made of alice asked hoping to cheer him up for the poor knight seemed quite low spirited about it </s>
<s> it began with blotting paper the knight answered with groan </s>
<s> that wouldn't be very nice i'm afraid not very nice alone he interrupted quite eagerly but you've no idea what difference it makes mixing it with other things such as gunpowder and sealing wax </s>
<s> and here must leave you they had just come to the end of the wood </s>
<s> alice could only look puzzled she was thinking of the pudding </s>
<s> you are sad the knight said in an anxious tone let me sing you song to comfort you is it very long alice asked for she had heard good deal of poetry that day </s>
<s> it's long said the knight but very very beautiful </s>
<s> everybody that hears me sing it either it brings the tears into their eyes or else or else what said alice for the knight had made sudden pause </s>
<s> or else it doesn't you know </s>
<s> the name of the song is called haddocks eyes oh that's the name of the song is it alice said trying to feel interested </s>
<s> no you don't understand the knight said looking little vexed </s>
<s> that's what the name is called </s>
<s> the name really is the aged aged man then ought to have said that's what the song is called alice corrected herself </s>
<s> no you oughtn't that's quite another thing </s>
<s> the song is called ways and means but that's only what it's called you know well what is the song then said alice who was by this time completely bewildered </s>
<s> was coming to that the knight said </s>
<s> the song really is sitting on gate and the tune's my own invention so saying he stopped his horse and let the reins fall on its neck then slowly beating time with one hand and with faint smile lighting up his gentle foolish face as if he enjoyed the music of his song he began </s>
<s> of all the strange things that alice saw in her journey through the looking glass this was the one that she always remembered most clearly </s>
<s> years afterwards she could bring the whole scene back again as if it had been only yesterday the mild blue eyes and kindly smile of the knight the setting sun gleaming through his hair and shining on his armour in blaze of light that quite dazzled her the horse quietly moving about with the reins hanging loose on his neck cropping the grass at her feet and the black shadows of the forest behind all this she took in like picture as with one hand shading her eyes she leant against tree watching the strange pair and listening in half dream to the melancholy music of the song </s>
<s> but the tune isn't his own invention she said to herself it's give thee all can no more she stood and listened very attentively but no tears came into her eyes </s>
<s> i'll tell thee everything can there's little to relate </s>
<s> saw an aged aged man sitting on gate </s>
<s> who are you aged man said and how is it you live and his answer trickled through my head like water through sieve </s>
<s> he said look for butterflies that sleep among the wheat make them into mutton pies and sell them in the street </s>
<s> sell them unto men he said who sail on stormy seas and that's the way get my bread trifle if you please but was thinking of plan to dye one's whiskers green and always use so large fan that they could not be seen </s>
<s> so having no reply to give to what the old man said cried come tell me how you live and thumped him on the head </s>
<s> his accents mild took up the tale he said go my ways and when find mountain rill set it in blaze and thence they make stuff they call rolands macassar oil yet twopence halfpenny is all they give me for my toil but was thinking of way to feed oneself on batter and so go on from day to day getting little fatter </s>
<s> shook him well from side to side until his face was blue come tell me how you live cried and what it is you do he said hunt for haddocks eyes among the heather bright and work them into waistcoat buttons in the silent night </s>
<s> and these do not sell for gold or coin of silvery shine but for copper halfpenny and that will purchase nine </s>
<s> sometimes dig for buttered rolls or set limed twigs for crabs sometimes search the grassy knolls for wheels of hansom cabs </s>
<s> and that's the way he gave wink by which get my wealth and very gladly will drink your honour's noble health heard him then for had just completed my design to keep the menai bridge from rust by boiling it in wine </s>
<s> thanked him much for telling me the way he got his wealth but chiefly for his wish that he might drink my noble health </s>
<s> and now if e'er by chance put my fingers into glue or madly squeeze right hand foot into left hand shoe or if drop upon my toe very heavy weight weep for it reminds me so of that old man used to know whose look was mild whose speech was slow whose hair was whiter than the snow whose face was very like crow with eyes like cinders all aglow who seemed distracted with his woe who rocked his body to and fro and muttered mumblingly and low as if his mouth were full of dough who snorted like buffalo that summer evening long ago sitting on gate as the knight sang the last words of the ballad he gathered up the reins and turned his horse's head along the road by which they had come </s>
<s> you've only few yards to go he said down the hill and over that little brook and then you'll be queen but you'll stay and see me off first he added as alice turned with an eager look in the direction to which he pointed </s>
<s> shan't be long </s>
<s> you'll wait and wave your handkerchief when get to that turn in the road </s>
<s> think it'll encourage me you see of course i'll wait said alice and thank you very much for coming so far and for the song liked it very much hope so the knight said doubtfully but you didn't cry so much as thought you would so they shook hands and then the knight rode slowly away into the forest </s>
<s> it won't take long to see him off expect alice said to herself as she stood watching him </s>
<s> there he goes </s>
<s> right on his head as usual </s>
<s> however he gets on again pretty easily that comes of having so many things hung round the horse so she went on talking to herself as she watched the horse walking leisurely along the road and the knight tumbling off first on one side and then on the other </s>
<s> after the fourth or fifth tumble he reached the turn and then she waved her handkerchief to him and waited till he was out of sight </s>
<s> hope it encouraged him she said as she turned to run down the hill and now for the last brook and to be queen </s>
<s> how grand it sounds very few steps brought her to the edge of the brook </s>
<s> the eighth square at last she cried as she bounded across and threw herself down to rest on lawn as soft as moss with little flower beds dotted about it here and there </s>
<s> oh how glad am to get here </s>
<s> and what is this on my head she exclaimed in tone of dismay as she put her hands up to something very heavy and fitted tight all round her head </s>
<s> but how can it have got there without my knowing it she said to herself as she lifted it off and set it on her lap to make out what it could possibly be </s>
<s> it was golden crown </s>
<s> chapter ix </s>
<s> queen alice well this is grand said alice </s>
<s> never expected should be queen so soon and i'll tell you what it is your majesty she went on in severe tone she was always rather fond of scolding herself it'll never do for you to be lolling about on the grass like that </s>
<s> queens have to be dignified you know so she got up and walked about rather stiffly just at first as she was afraid that the crown might come off but she comforted herself with the thought that there was nobody to see her and if really am queen she said as she sat down again shall be able to manage it quite well in time everything was happening so oddly that she didn't feel bit surprised at finding the red queen and the white queen sitting close to her one on each side she would have liked very much to ask them how they came there but she feared it would not be quite civil </s>
<s> however there would be no harm she thought in asking if the game was over </s>
<s> please would you tell me she began looking timidly at the red queen </s>
<s> speak when you're spoken to the queen sharply interrupted her </s>
<s> but if everybody obeyed that rule said alice who was always ready for little argument and if you only spoke when you were spoken to and the other person always waited for you to begin you see nobody would ever say anything so that ridiculous cried the queen </s>
<s> why don't you see child here she broke off with frown and after thinking for minute suddenly changed the subject of the conversation </s>
<s> what do you mean by if you really are queen </s>
<s> what right have you to call yourself so </s>
<s> you can't be queen you know till you've passed the proper examination </s>
<s> and the sooner we begin it the better only said if poor alice pleaded in piteous tone </s>
<s> the two queens looked at each other and the red queen remarked with little shudder she says she only said if but she said great deal more than that the white queen moaned wringing her hands </s>
<s> oh ever so much more than that so you did you know the red queen said to alice </s>

<s> you should have meant </s>

<s> said you couldn't if you tried she's in that state of mind said the white queen that she wants to deny something only she doesn't know what to deny nasty vicious temper the red queen remarked and then there was an uncomfortable silence for minute or two </s>
<s> the red queen broke the silence by saying to the white queen invite you to alice's dinner party this afternoon the white queen smiled feebly and said and invite you didn't know was to have party at all said alice but if there is to be one think ought to invite the guests we gave you the opportunity of doing it the red queen remarked but daresay you've not had many lessons in manners yet manners are not taught in lessons said alice </s>

<s> in our country she remarked there's only one day at time the red queen said that's poor thin way of doing things </s>

<s> what am to do exclaimed alice looking about in great perplexity as first one round head and then the other rolled down from her shoulder and lay like heavy lump in her lap </s>

<s> no not in all the history of england it couldn't you know because there never was more than one queen at time </s>
<s> do wake up you heavy things she went on in an impatient tone but there was no answer but gentle snoring </s>
<s> the snoring got more distinct every minute and sounded more like tune at last she could even make out the words and she listened so eagerly that when the two great heads vanished from her lap she hardly missed them </s>
<s> she was standing before an arched doorway over which were the words queen alice in large letters and on each side of the arch there was bell handle one was marked visitors bell and the other servants bell i'll wait till the song's over thought alice and then i'll ring the which bell must ring she went on very much puzzled by the names </s>
<s> i'm not visitor and i'm not servant </s>
<s> there ought to be one marked queen you know just then the door opened little way and creature with long beak put its head out for moment and said no admittance till the week after next and shut the door again with bang </s>
<s> alice knocked and rang in vain for long time but at last very old frog who was sitting under tree got up and hobbled slowly towards her he was dressed in bright yellow and had enormous boots on </s>
<s> what is it now the frog said in deep hoarse whisper </s>
<s> alice turned round ready to find fault with anybody </s>
<s> where's the servant whose business it is to answer the door she began angrily </s>
<s> which door said the frog </s>
<s> alice almost stamped with irritation at the slow drawl in which he spoke </s>
<s> this door of course the frog looked at the door with his large dull eyes for minute then he went nearer and rubbed it with his thumb as if he were trying whether the paint would come off then he looked at alice </s>
<s> to answer the door he said </s>
<s> what's it been asking of he was so hoarse that alice could scarcely hear him </s>
<s> don't know what you mean she said </s>
<s> talks english doesn't the frog went on </s>
<s> or are you deaf </s>
<s> what did it ask you nothing alice said impatiently </s>

<s> vexes it you know then he went up and gave the door kick with one of his great feet </s>
<s> you let it alone he panted out as he hobbled back to his tree and it'll let you alone you know at this moment the door was flung open and shrill voice was heard singing to the looking glass world it was alice that said i've sceptre in hand i've crown on my head let the looking glass creatures whatever they be come and dine with the red queen the white queen and me and hundreds of voices joined in the chorus then fill up the glasses as quick as you can and sprinkle the table with buttons and bran put cats in the coffee and mice in the tea and welcome queen alice with thirty times three then followed confused noise of cheering and alice thought to herself thirty times three makes ninety </s>
<s> wonder if any one's counting in minute there was silence again and the same shrill voice sang another verse looking glass creatures quoth alice draw near </s>
<s> tis an honour to see me favour to hear tis privilege high to have dinner and tea along with the red queen the white queen and me then came the chorus again then fill up the glasses with treacle and ink or anything else that is pleasant to drink mix sand with the cider and wool with the wine and welcome queen alice with ninety times nine ninety times nine alice repeated in despair oh that'll never be done </s>
<s> i'd better go in at once and there was dead silence the moment she appeared </s>
<s> alice glanced nervously along the table as she walked up the large hall and noticed that there were about fifty guests of all kinds some were animals some birds and there were even few flowers among them </s>
<s> i'm glad they've come without waiting to be asked she thought should never have known who were the right people to invite there were three chairs at the head of the table the red and white queens had already taken two of them but the middle one was empty </s>
<s> alice sat down in it rather uncomfortable in the silence and longing for some one to speak </s>
<s> at last the red queen began </s>
<s> you've missed the soup and fish she said </s>
<s> put on the joint and the waiters set leg of mutton before alice who looked at it rather anxiously as she had never had to carve joint before </s>

<s> alice mutton mutton alice the leg of mutton got up in the dish and made little bow to alice and alice returned the bow not knowing whether to be frightened or amused </s>

<s> certainly not the red queen said very decidedly it isn't etiquette to cut any one you've been introduced to </s>

<s> won't be introduced to the pudding please alice said rather hastily or we shall get no dinner at all </s>

<s> remove the pudding and the waiters took it away so quickly that alice couldn't return its bow </s>

<s> bring back the pudding and there it was again in moment like conjuring trick </s>
<s> it was so large that she couldn't help feeling little shy with it as she had been with the mutton however she conquered her shyness by great effort and cut slice and handed it to the red queen </s>
<s> what impertinence said the pudding </s>
<s> wonder how you'd like it if were to cut slice out of you you creature it spoke in thick suety sort of voice and alice hadn't word to say in reply she could only sit and look at it and gasp </s>
<s> make remark said the red queen it's ridiculous to leave all the conversation to the pudding do you know i've had such quantity of poetry repeated to me to day alice began little frightened at finding that the moment she opened her lips there was dead silence and all eyes were fixed upon her and it's very curious thing think every poem was about fishes in some way </s>
<s> do you know why they're so fond of fishes all about here she spoke to the red queen whose answer was little wide of the mark </s>
<s> as to fishes she said very slowly and solemnly putting her mouth close to alice's ear her white majesty knows lovely riddle all in poetry all about fishes </s>
<s> shall she repeat it her red majesty's very kind to mention it the white queen murmured into alice's other ear in voice like the cooing of pigeon </s>
<s> it would be such treat </s>
<s> may please do alice said very politely </s>
<s> the white queen laughed with delight and stroked alice's cheek </s>
<s> then she began first the fish must be caught that is easy baby think could have caught it </s>
<s> next the fish must be bought that is easy penny think would have bought it </s>
<s> now cook me the fish that is easy and will not take more than minute </s>
<s> let it lie in dish that is easy because it already is in it </s>
<s> bring it here </s>
<s> let me sup it is easy to set such dish on the table </s>
<s> take the dish cover up ah that is so hard that fear i'm unable </s>
<s> for it holds it like glue holds the lid to the dish while it lies in the middle which is easiest to do un dish cover the fish or dishcover the riddle take minute to think about it and then guess said the red queen </s>
<s> meanwhile we'll drink your health queen alice's health she screamed at the top of her voice and all the guests began drinking it directly and very queerly they managed it some of them put their glasses upon their heads like extinguishers and drank all that trickled down their faces others upset the decanters and drank the wine as it ran off the edges of the table and three of them who looked like kangaroos scrambled into the dish of roast mutton and began eagerly lapping up the gravy just like pigs in trough thought alice </s>
<s> you ought to return thanks in neat speech the red queen said frowning at alice as she spoke </s>
<s> we must support you you know the white queen whispered as alice got up to do it very obediently but little frightened </s>
<s> thank you very much she whispered in reply but can do quite well without that wouldn't be at all the thing the red queen said very decidedly so alice tried to submit to it with good grace </s>
<s> and they did push so she said afterwards when she was telling her sister the history of the feast </s>
<s> you would have thought they wanted to squeeze me flat in fact it was rather difficult for her to keep in her place while she made her speech the two queens pushed her so one on each side that they nearly lifted her up into the air rise to return thanks alice began and she really did rise as she spoke several inches but she got hold of the edge of the table and managed to pull herself down again </s>
<s> take care of yourself screamed the white queen seizing alice's hair with both her hands </s>
<s> something's going to happen and then as alice afterwards described it all sorts of things happened in moment </s>
<s> the candles all grew up to the ceiling looking something like bed of rushes with fireworks at the top </s>
<s> as to the bottles they each took pair of plates which they hastily fitted on as wings and so with forks for legs went fluttering about in all directions and very like birds they look alice thought to herself as well as she could in the dreadful confusion that was beginning </s>
<s> at this moment she heard hoarse laugh at her side and turned to see what was the matter with the white queen but instead of the queen there was the leg of mutton sitting in the chair </s>
<s> here am cried voice from the soup tureen and alice turned again just in time to see the queen's broad good natured face grinning at her for moment over the edge of the tureen before she disappeared into the soup </s>
<s> there was not moment to be lost </s>
<s> already several of the guests were lying down in the dishes and the soup ladle was walking up the table towards alice's chair and beckoning to her impatiently to get out of its way </s>
<s> can't stand this any longer she cried as she jumped up and seized the table cloth with both hands one good pull and plates dishes guests and candles came crashing down together in heap on the floor </s>
<s> and as for you she went on turning fiercely upon the red queen whom she considered as the cause of all the mischief but the queen was no longer at her side she had suddenly dwindled down to the size of little doll and was now on the table merrily running round and round after her own shawl which was trailing behind her </s>
<s> at any other time alice would have felt surprised at this but she was far too much excited to be surprised at anything now </s>
<s> as for you she repeated catching hold of the little creature in the very act of jumping over bottle which had just lighted upon the table i'll shake you into kitten that will chapter </s>
<s> shaking she took her off the table as she spoke and shook her backwards and forwards with all her might </s>
<s> the red queen made no resistance whatever only her face grew very small and her eyes got large and green and still as alice went on shaking her she kept on growing shorter and fatter and softer and rounder and chapter xi </s>
<s> waking and it really was kitten after all </s>
<s> chapter xii </s>
<s> which dreamed it </s>
<s> your majesty shouldn't purr so loud alice said rubbing her eyes and addressing the kitten respectfully yet with some severity </s>
<s> you woke me out of oh </s>
<s> such nice dream </s>
<s> and you've been along with me kitty all through the looking glass world </s>
<s> did you know it dear it is very inconvenient habit of kittens alice had once made the remark that whatever you say to them they always purr </s>
<s> if they would only purr for yes and mew for no or any rule of that sort she had said so that one could keep up conversation </s>
<s> but how can you talk with person if they always say the same thing on this occasion the kitten only purred and it was impossible to guess whether it meant yes or no so alice hunted among the chessmen on the table till she had found the red queen then she went down on her knees on the hearth rug and put the kitten and the queen to look at each other </s>
<s> now kitty she cried clapping her hands triumphantly </s>
<s> confess that was what you turned into but it wouldn't look at it she said when she was explaining the thing afterwards to her sister it turned away its head and pretended not to see it but it looked little ashamed of itself so think it must have been the red queen sit up little more stiffly dear alice cried with merry laugh </s>
<s> and curtsey while you're thinking what to what to purr </s>
<s> it saves time remember and she caught it up and gave it one little kiss just in honour of having been red queen snowdrop my pet she went on looking over her shoulder at the white kitten which was still patiently undergoing its toilet when will dinah have finished with your white majesty wonder </s>
<s> that must be the reason you were so untidy in my dream dinah </s>
<s> do you know that you're scrubbing white queen </s>
<s> really it's most disrespectful of you </s>
<s> and what did dinah turn to wonder she prattled on as she settled comfortably down with one elbow in the rug and her chin in her hand to watch the kittens </s>
<s> tell me dinah did you turn to humpty dumpty </s>
<s> think you did however you'd better not mention it to your friends just yet for i'm not sure </s>
<s> by the way kitty if only you'd been really with me in my dream there was one thing you would have enjoyed had such quantity of poetry said to me all about fishes </s>
<s> to morrow morning you shall have real treat </s>
<s> all the time you're eating your breakfast i'll repeat the walrus and the carpenter to you and then you can make believe it's oysters dear </s>
<s> now kitty let's consider who it was that dreamed it all </s>
<s> this is serious question my dear and you should not go on licking your paw like that as if dinah hadn't washed you this morning </s>
<s> you see kitty it must have been either me or the red king </s>
<s> he was part of my dream of course but then was part of his dream too </s>
<s> was it the red king kitty </s>
<s> you were his wife my dear so you ought to know oh kitty do help to settle it </s>
<s> i'm sure your paw can wait but the provoking kitten only began on the other paw and pretended it hadn't heard the question </s>
<s> which do you think it was </s>
<s> boat beneath sunny sky lingering onward dreamily in an evening of july children three that nestle near eager eye and willing ear pleased simple tale to hear long has paled that sunny sky echoes fade and memories die </s>
<s> autumn frosts have slain july </s>
<s> still she haunts me phantomwise alice moving under skies never seen by waking eyes </s>
<s> children yet the tale to hear eager eye and willing ear lovingly shall nestle near </s>
<s> in wonderland they lie dreaming as the days go by dreaming as the summers die ever drifting down the stream lingering in the golden gleam life what is it but dream </s>
<s> the end </s>
